column2: Tcgãyas Jeso Krestem dis qhàòs di sa, Dafitem ka tsgõose-coa ba, Abrahamam ka tsgõose-coa ba.
Abrahama ba kò Isakam ka xõò me e,
me Isaka ba Jakobem ka xõò me e,
me Jakobe ba Jutam ka xõò me e,
káíkhoe ga xu hẽé naka qõese ga xu hẽéthẽé di ba.
Me kò Juta ba Perese ba hẽé
naka Sera ba hẽéthẽé tsara ka xõò me e
(gatsara ka xõò sa kò Tamara si i).
Me Perese ba Heseronem ka xõò me e,
me Heserone ba Ramem ka xõò me e,
me Rame ba Aminadabem ka xõò me e,
me Aminadabe ba Nasonem ka xõò me e,
me Nasone ba Salemonem ka xõò me e,
me kò Salemone ba Boasem ka xõò me e
(gam ka xõò sa kò Rahabe si i),
me kò Boase ba Obetem ka xõò me e
(gam ka xõò sa kò Rute si i),
me Obete ba Jesem ka xõò me e,
me Jese ba x'aigam Dafitem ka xõò me e.
Dafite ba kò Solomonem ka xõò me e
(xõò sa kò Uriam ka kò séèèas khóè si i).
Me kò Solomone ba Rehoboamem ka xõò me e,
Me Rehoboame ba Abiam ka xõò me e,
me Abia ba Asam ka xõò me e,
me Asa ba Jehosafatem ka xõò me e,
me Jehosafate ba Joramem ka xõò me e,
me Jorame ba Usiam ka xõò me e,
me Usia ba Jotamem ka xõò me e,
me Jotame ba Ahasem ka xõò me e,
me Ahase ba Hesekiam ka xõò me e,
me Hesekia ba Manasem ka xõò me e,
me Manase ba Amosem ka xõò me e,
me Amose ba Josiam ka xõò me e,
me kò Josia, Jekonia ba hẽé
naka qõese ga xu hẽéthẽé ka xõò me e,
ncẽe khóè ne kò tcg'òóè a ko Babilone koe úúè ka.
Eẽs séèa tcg'òóku a Babilone koe chùia úúkus qãá q'oo
koem kò Jekonia ba Salatiele ba ábà,
me Salatiele ba Serobabelem ka xõò me e,
me Serobabele ba Abiutem ka xõò me e,
me Abiute ba Eliakimem ka xõò me e,
me Eliakime ba Asorem ka xõò me e,
me Asore ba Satokem ka xõò me e,
me Satoke ba Akimem ka xõò me e,
me Akime ba Eliutem ka xõò me e,
me Eliute ba Eleasarem ka xõò me e,
me Eleasare ba Matanem ka xõò me e,
me Matane ba Jakobem ka xõò me e,
me kò Jakobe ba Josefam ka xõò me e,
ncẽe kò Marias dim khóè ba ii ba,
ncẽe Jesom ka xõò kò ii sa,
ncẽe ko Kreste ta ma tciiè ba.

Nxãaska zi kò wèé zi qhàò zi Abrahamam koe guu a síí Dafitem koe tcãà zi 14 zi i, zi kò Dafitem koe guu a síí séèa tcg'òóku a Babilone koe chùia úúkus dim x'aèm koe tcãà ka zi 14 zi qhàò zi i, zi kò séèa tcg'òóku a Babilone koe úúkus dim x'aèm koe guu, a síí Krestem di x'aèan koe tcãà ka zi kò 14 zi qhàò zi i.

Ncẽe zi gúù zi kò Jeso Krestem ko ábàè ka kúrúse. Gam ka xõòs Maria sa kò Josefam ka séèkuan tòóa mááèa hãa. Igaba ẽe khara qanega xg'ae ta ga hãa kas kò bóòè a Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽem ka ncãàn úúkaguèa.

Gas dim khóèm Josefa ba kò tchànom khóè me e, a kò tc'ẽe tama nxàea tcg'òóan gaan di i, sau-cgaekagu sim gha khama, a ba a kò tcáóa ba q'oo koe bìrísea hãa, cg'uri-cg'uri si tamasem gha q'aa cgoa si sa.
Qanegam hãa a ko ncẽe zi gúù zi ka tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese kam ko moengelem X'aigam
Si gha kg'áòm cóá ba ábà, tsi gha cg'õèa ba Jeso ta ma tcii, Gam di ne khóè nem gha gane di chìbian koe kgoara khama,” témé.
Wèéan ncẽea kò kúrúse, nxãasegas gha X'aigam
“Dxàe-coas qanega xóé cgoaè tama sa gha ncãàn úú, a sa a gha kg'áòm Cóá ba ábà, Me gha Emanuele ta ma tciiè,” tam méé, ncẽe sa ko máá, ‘Nqari ba hãa cgoa taa,’ témé.
Me Josefa ba tc'oman koe tẽe, a ba a ẽem kò ma X'aigam dim moengele ba ma x'áè mea khama ma kúrú. A ba a síí Maria sa gam dis khóès iise séè.
Igabam kò táá xóé cgoa si, si nxãakg'aiga síí kg'áòm cóá ba ábà. Me cg'õèa ba Jeso ta ma tcii.
Jesom Betelehema koe ábàèa hãa, Jutea di i, x'aigam Herotem di x'aèan ka, ka xu kò tco̱nò q'ãa-kg'ao xu cáḿs ko tcg'oa xòè koe guu a Jerusalema koe hàà,
a hàà tẽè a máá: “Gaam ẽe ábàèam x'aigam Juta ne di ba ndaa? Gaam dim tco̱nò ba xae ncãa cáḿs ko tcg'oa xòè za bóò, xae hààraa hãa, hàà xae gha dqo̱m̀ Me ka,” témé.
Eẽm ko x'aigam Herote ba ncẽes gúùs ka kóḿ kam kò tcg'áì-tcao, naka wèém x'áém Jerusalema di ba hẽéthẽé e, gam cgoa.
Me wèé xu kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé naka x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu khóè ne di xu hẽéthẽé tciia xg'ae, a tẽè xu nda koe méém ga
Xu bìrí me a máá: “Betelehema koe e, Jutea di i. Ncẽea porofitim kò ma góá hãa ga a khama:
‘Tsáá Betelehema tseè,
Juta dim nqõóm koe hãa tsi,
cg'áré tama tsia x'aiga xu Juta di xu koe.
Tsáá koem gha tc'ãà-cookg'ai ba guu a tcg'oa khama,
ncẽe gha Tiri ne khóè ne Iseraele di ne kòre ba,’
témé,” ta xu méé.
Nxãaskam kò Herote ba tco̱nò q'ãa-kg'ao xu kàa ka tciia tcg'òó, a ba a qãèse tẽèa kg'ónò xu dùútsa x'aè kam tco̱nò ba bóòsea sa.

A ba a Betelehema koe tsééa úú xu a máá: “Qõò naka síí Cóám ka qãèse kóḿ, naka ẽe xao kòo hòò Me ne kg'uian tsééa máá te, nakar gha nxãasega tíí igaba síí dqo̱m̀ Me,” témé.

Eẽ xu ko x'aiga ba kóḿa xg'ara ka xu kò xgoaba a qõò. Me gaa x'aè kaga tco̱nòm ẽe xu kò cáḿs ko tcg'oa xòè za bóòa ba tc'ãà-cookg'ai xu, a ba a nxãakg'aiga síí Cóám hãa qgáì tc'amkg'ai koe téé.
Tco̱nò ba xu ko bóò ka xu kò kaisase qãè-tcao.

Nquum q'oo koe xu kò tcãà, a Cóá ba bóò xõòs Marias cgoa, a xu a qám̀se a dqo̱m̀ Me, a x'aian di cãan gaxu di xgobekg'am, a gautan di zi gúù zi hẽé, qãè hm̀m̀ xg'ãò tshãán hẽé naka tcgáùse di tshãán hẽéthẽé di zi aba zi tcg'òó a máà Me.
Sõokuris q'oo koe xu ko q'ãakaguèa, táá méé xu Herotem koe ka̱bise sa khama xu kò tãám dàò ba séè a gaxu dim nqõóm koe ka̱bise.
Eẽ xu qõòa hãa kam kò moengelem X'aigam
Me ẽem ntcùúm ka tẽe, a ba a Cóá ba hẽé naka xõò sa hẽéthẽé séè, a Egepeto koe qõò.
Gaa koem kò hãa, me nxãakg'aiga síí Herote ba x'óó.
Ncẽe sa kò kúrúse, nxãasegas gha X'aigam

Eẽm ko Herote bóòa q'ãa, tco̱nò q'ãa-kg'ao xu kam qàe-qaeèa hãa sa, kam kò nxãaska kaisase xgóà, a ba a ncõo-kg'ao xu tsééa tcg'òó, síí xu gha wèé xu cóá xu ẽe cám̀ kuri xu, kana gaxu ka nqãaka hàna kurian úúa xu, Betelehema ba hẽé naka gam qàe koe hàna xu qgáì xu wèé xu koe hẽéthẽé hàna xu cg'õo ka. Ncẽe sam kò kúrú, tco̱nò q'ãa-kg'ao xu hàà bìrí mea hãas domka, ẽe xu kò bìrí meam x'aèm koe guu a.
Ka i kò nxãaska porofitim Jeremiam ka kò kg'uièa sa tseegukaguè, ncẽe kò máá:
“Dòm̀ ba kò Rama koe kóḿse,
kg'ae sa hẽé
naka thõò-tcaoase kg'ae sa hẽéthẽé di ba.
Ragele sa ko gas di cóán kg'ae cgae,
a kò qgài-qgai-tcáókuan xguì,
kaàra i hãa khama,”
témé ba.
Herotem ko x'óó qãá q'oo koem kò moengelem X'aigam
a ba a máá: “Tẽe naka tsia Cóá ba hẽé naka xõò sa hẽéthẽé séè, naka tsia Iseraele dim nqõóm koe qõò, ẽe kò Cóám di kg'õèan qaa nea x'óóa hãa ke,” témé.
Me tẽe, a Cóá ba hẽé naka xõò sa hẽéthẽé séè, a ba a Iseraele dim nqõóm koe qõò.

Igaba ẽem ko Josefa kóḿ Arekelose ba Jutea dim nqõó ba tc'ãà-cookg'aia sa, gam ka xõòm Herotem téé-q'oo koe, kam kò gaa koe síían bèe. Sõokuris koem ko q'ãakaguèa, khamam kò Galilea dim xòèm koe qõò,
a síí Nasareta ta ko ma tciièm x'áé-dxoom koe x'ãè, ẽe porofiti xu ka kg'uièa hãas gha nxãasega tseegukaguè ka, ncẽe kò máá: “Nasareta dim khóè ba, tam gha ma tciiè,” témé sa.
Eẽ xu cáḿ xu kam kò Johanem tcguù-tcguu-kg'ao ba hàà, a ba a hàà tchàa-xgóós Jutea dis q'oo koe Nqarim di zi kg'ui zi xgaa-xgaa a máá:
“Tcóóse tu gatu di chìbian koe, nqarikg'ai di x'aia nea cúù u ke,” témé.
Ncẽem Johane ba porofitim Isaiam kò gam ka kg'uia hãam ga me e, a ko máá:
“C'ẽem dòm̀ ba ko tchàa-xgóós koe guu
a q'au a ko máá:
‘X'aigam
naka Gam di dàòan tchàno-tchanoa máá Me,’ ”
témé ba.
Johane ba kò nqabè c'õò cgoa kúrúèa qgáían ha̱na, a khòo dim bàne ba kháóa ba koe qáéa. Gam di tc'õoa nea kò tcòm̀an hẽé naka qãáka di dènean hẽéthẽé e.
Ne kò khóè ne Jerusalema hẽé naka wèé Jutea hẽé naka wèém xg'aeku-coam Jorotane qàe dim koe hẽéthẽé guu a síí cgae me,
a ne a gane di chìbian nxàe, a Jorotane dim tshàam koe tcguù-tcguuè.

Igaba ẽem ko káí xu Farasai xu hẽé naka Saduke xu hẽéthẽé bóò, xu tcguù-tcguukuan domka gam koe hààraa, kam kò bìrí xu a máá: “Gaxao cg'aoan di xao cóá xaoè! Dìín ka xaoa q'ãa-q'ãaèa hãa a ko hààko xgóàn
Nxãaska méé xao chìbian koe xao tcóósea hãa sa gha x'áí tc'áróan kúrú.

Táá méé xao bìríse naka máá, ‘Abrahama ba xae úúa, sixae ka tsgõose ba,’ témé guu. Bìrí xao or ko a ko máá: Nqari ba qarian úúa, ncẽe zi nxõ̱á zim gha séè a Abrahama ba tsgõo-coan kúrúa máá di i ke.
Bòó sa nxãakamaga hìi zi di to̱bean kg'ónòa tòóa mááèa, si gha wèés hìis ẽe qãè tc'áróan kúrú tama sa xg'aoa tcg'òó, a c'eean q'oo koe xaoa tcãàè.

“Tíí ra ko tshàan cgoa tcguù-tcguu tu u, chìbian koe tu gha tcóóse ka, igaba Gaam ẽe ko tíí qãá q'oo koe hàà ba tíí ka qari Me e, ncẽe Gam di zi nxàbo zi qgóóan gar tc'ãò tama ba. Gabá gha Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽem cgoa hẽé naka c'eem cgoa hẽéthẽé tcguù-tcguu tu u.

Mabere tsoroa nem ko dqòrò cgoam hìi ba tshàua ba koe hãa, Me gha maberea nem ko dqòròs qgáìs koe dqòròa xgãá a, a gha Gam di maberean Gam dis nxàés koe xg'ae-xg'ae, igabam gha ts'irì tamam c'eem koe tsoroan dàò,” tam méé.
Me kò Jeso ba Galilea koe guu, a Jorotane koe hàà, hààm gha Johanem ka tcguù-tcguuè ka.
Igabam kò Johane ba xgáè-kg'am Me, a máá: “Tsáá kar gha tcguù-tcguuè sa ko qaase, ka Tsi gáé ko Tsáá tíí koe hàà?” témé.

Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Guu u ncẽeska, kg'anoa i máá tsama, ncẽeta tsam gha hẽé sa ke. Ncẽem dàòm ka tsam gha ko wèé zi gúù zi tchàno zi kúrú, Nqarim ka ko qaaè zi,” témé. Me dtcòm̀ Me.
Eẽm kò Jeso ba tcguù-tcguuèa xg'ara kam kò kúúga tshàam koe tcg'oa, i kò gaa x'aè kaga nqarikg'aian xgobekg'amse, Me Nqarim dim Tc'ẽe ba bóò, Me tcíbís khama ii a ko Gam koe xõa.
Me gaa x'aè kaga dòm̀ ba nqarikg'ai koe guu a máá: “Ncẽe ba Tirim Cóám ncàm̀a Raa Me e, Gam kar ko kaisase qãè-tcao,” témé.
Me nxãaska Jeso ba Tc'ẽem ka séè a qãáka úúè, síím gha dxãwam ka kúrúa bóòè ka.
Eẽm ko 40 cáḿan hẽé naka 40 ntcùúan hẽéthẽé tc'õoan carasea hãa kam kò gaa koe guus ka xàbàa.
Me kò kúrúa bóò-kg'ao ba hàà cgae Me, a bìrí Me a máá: “Nqarim di Tsi Cóá Tsi kò ii ne, ncẽe nxõ̱án bìrí naka i péréan kúrúse,” témé.

Me Jeso ba xo̱a a máá: “Góásea i hãa a ko máá: ‘Khóè ba péréan ka cúí kg'õèkaguè tite, igaba wèém kg'uim ka a, ẽe ko Nqarim di kg'áḿan koe guu a tcg'oa ba,’ téméèa,” tam méé.
Kam ko nxãaska dxãwa ba tcom-tcomsam x'áé-dxoom
a bìrí Me a máá: “Nqarim di Tsi Cóá Tsi kò ii ne, nqãaka xaoa xòóse. Góásea i hãa ke a ko máá:
‘Gam di xu moengele xum gha Tsáá ka x'áèan máà,
xu gha gaxu di tshàuan cgoa ghùi Tsi,
táá Tsi gha nxãasega nqàrèa Tsi
nxõ̱án koe xg'áḿa tòó ka,’ ”
tam méé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí me a máá: “Gaicara i góásea hãa a ko máá: ‘Táá méé tsi tsarim X'aigam Nqari ba kúrúa bóò guu,’ ” témé.
Gaicaram kò dxãwa ba séè a kaisase kaiam xàbìm koe úú Me, a ba a wèé x'aian nqõómkg'ai di hẽé, naka gaan di ka̱rean hẽéthẽé x'áí Me.
A ba a bìrí Me a máá: “Wèéan ncẽe gar gha máà Tsi, góḿankg'ai koe Tsi kòo cg'áé a ko dqo̱m̀ te ne,” témé.
Me Jeso ba nxãaska bìrí me a máá: “Tíí koe tcg'oa, satanaè! Góásea i hãa a ko máá: ‘X'aigam Nqari ba tsi gha dqo̱m̀, a Gam cúí ba kúrúa máá,’ témé,” tam méé.
Me nxãaska dxãwa ba guu Me. Ka i ko gaa x'aè kaga moengelean hàà, a hàà hùi Me.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba Johane ba qáéèa hãa sa kóḿ, kam kò Galilea koe ka̱bise.
Nasareta koem kò tcg'oa, a Kaperenaume koe síí x'ãè, ncẽe ko tshàam qàe koe hànam qgáì ba, Sebulone ba hẽé naka Nafetali ba hẽéthẽé tsara dim nqõóm koe,
ẽe porofitim Isaiam ka kò kg'uièas gha nxãasega tseegukaguè ka, ncẽe kòo máá:
“Sebulonem dim nqõó ba hẽé
naka Nafetalim dim nqõó ba hẽéthẽé tsara
tshàam koe ko qõòm dàòm koe hãa,
Jorotanem qàe koe, Galilea koe,
nqõóm tãá zi qhàò zi di ba;
khóè ne ncẽe
kaiam x'áà ba hòòa.
X'ooan dim nqõóm ntcùúm q'oo koe hãa ne koe
i x'áàn hààraa,”
témé.
Eẽm x'aèm koem kò Jeso ba guu a tshoa-tshoa a xgaa-xgaa a máá: “Tcóóse tu gatu di chìbian koe, nqarikg'ai di x'aia nea cúù u ke,” témé.

Eẽm Jeso ba Galilea dim tshàam qàe koe xóé a ko qõò kam kò khóè qõeku tsara bóò, Simonem ncẽe kòo Petere ta ma tciiè ba hẽé naka Anterea ba hẽéthẽé e, tsara c'uisí sa tshàan q'oo koe tcãà, x'aù qgóó-kg'ao tsara a kò ii khama.
A ba a bìrí tsara a a máá: “Xùri Te tsao, kúrú tsao or gha tsao khóè ne qgóó-kg'ao tsao ii,” témé.
Tsara kúúga gatsara di c'uisían guu, a xùri Me.

Gaa koem guu a ko qõò kam kò khóè qõeku tsara c'ẽe tsara bóò, Sebetem ka cóásem Jakobo ba hẽé naka qõesem Johane ba hẽéthẽé e, tsara gatsara ka xõòm Sebetem cgoa dxòrom q'oo koe hãa, xu ko gaxu di c'uisían kg'ónò, Me Jeso ba tcii tsara a.
Ka tsara kò kúúga dxòro ba hẽé naka gatsara ka xõò ba hẽéthẽé guu, a xùri Me.

Me Jeso ba wèém Galileam koe qõòa te, a gane di còrè-nquuan koe xgaa-xgaa, a ko x'aian di qãè tchõàn ka khóè ne bìrí, a ko wèé tcììan koe hẽé naka wèé thõòan koe hẽéthẽé qãèkagu ne.

Gaam di tchõà ne kò wèém Siriam koe tsa̱i-tsa̱ise, ne kò Gaam koe wèé ne ẽe ko tãáka zi tcìì zi tsàa ne óá, naka thõòkase tsàara hãa ne hẽé naka dxãwa tc'ẽean ka tcãàèa ne hẽé, naka x'óóa qae ko ne hẽé naka nqo̱ara ne hẽéthẽé e, Me kúrú ne ne qãè.
Zi kò káí zi xg'ae zi Galilea koe hẽé naka Dekapolise koe hẽé naka Jerusalema koe hẽé naka Jutea koe hẽé naka c'ẽe xòè Jorotane di koe hẽéthẽé guu a xùri Me.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba xg'ae zi bóò kam kò xàbìm koe qaò, a síí gaa koe ntcõó, xu Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hàà cgae Me.
Me tshoa-tshoa a xgaa-xgaa xu a máá:
“Ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa nea
gane ẽe tc'ẽem koe dxàua hãa
igaba Nqari ba dtcãasea hãa ne,
nqarikg'ai di x'aia nea gane di i khama.
Ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa nea
gane ẽe ko kg'ae ne,
qgài-qgai tcáóè ne gha khama.
Ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa nea
gane ẽe ko cg'áré-cg'arese ne,
nqõó ba ne gha q'õò khama.
Ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa nea
gane ẽe tchànoan xàbà máána hãa ne,
a cáḿa máá ana ne,
xg'ãàkaguè ne gha khama.
Ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa nea
ẽe thõò-xama-máákuan úúa ne,
Nqarim ka ne gha thõò-xama mááè khama.
Ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa nea
gane ẽe q'ano-tcáó ne,
Nqari ba ne gha bóò khama.
Ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa nea
gane ẽe ko tòókuan kúrú ne,
Nqarim di ne cóá ne ta ne gha ma tciiè khama.
Ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa nea
gane ẽe ko tchànoan domka xgàraè ne,
nqarikg'ai di x'aia nea gane di i khama.
Ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa tua,
ncẽè khóèan kòo nco̱i tu u, a ko xgàra tu u ne,
a ko Tíí domka wèé zi gúù zi cg'ãè zi
[tshúù-ntcõase] gatu ka nxàe ne.
Qãè-tcao méé tu naka tua cgabà-cgaban-tcao,
gatu di surutan nqarikg'ai dia kaia hãa ke,
gatà iim dàòm kaga ne kò porofiti xu xgàra
ncẽe kò gatu cookg'ai koe ga hàna xu khama.

“Gatua nqõómkg'ai di tu ta̱be tu u. Igaba i kò ta̱bean di tsa̱u-q'ooan kaà cgae e, ne i gha gaicara ntama kúrúè a tsa̱u? Cúí gúù ga i qãèa máánaa hãa tite, kg'ama tchàa koe aaguè a khóèan ka náàès cúí si i.
“Gatua nqõóm di tu x'áà tu u. X'áé-dxoom xàbìm tc'amkg'ai koe hàna ba cuiskaga chóm̀mèa hãa tite.
Cúí khóè ga gataga lampi sa x'áà-x'aa naka q'ores ka nqãaka tòó sia hãa tite, igaba i gha téé-q'ooa sa koe tòó si, si gha wèé ne ẽe nquum q'oo koe hàna ne x'áàn máà.
Gatu di x'áàn méé i gatà iim dàòm ka khóè ne cookg'ai koe x'áà, naka ne gha nxãasega gatu di qãè tsééan bóò, naka nea gatu dim Xõòm nqarikg'ai koe hàna ba dqo̱m̀.
“Táá tu tc'ẽea máá, hààr ko x'áèan ko méé sa kana porofiti xu ko méé sa kaàkagu, ta tc'ẽe guu. Hààra Raa, hààr gha táá kaàkagu si ka, igabar ko hàà tseegukagu si.

Tseegua ner ko bìrí tu u a ko máá: Nqarikg'aian hẽé naka nqõókg'aian hẽéthẽéa gha kaà, igabam cúím góám cg'árém ga ba kana góá-hìim ka góáèa gúùan ga igaba x'áèan koe guu a kaà tite, i gha nxãakg'aiga síí wèé gúùan kúrúse.

Khama nxãaska, dìím wèém ẽe gha ncẽe x'áè-kg'áḿan ka cg'áré ba kaàkagu ba, a ba a ncẽes gúù sa kúrúan khóè ne xgaa-xgaa ba, nxãa ba gha nqarikg'ai di x'aian koe cg'áré ba ta ma tciiè. Igaba ẽe ko x'áè-kg'áḿan kúrú, a ba a ko xgaa-xgaa a ba, nxãa ba gha nqarikg'ai di x'aian koe kaia ba ta ma tciiè.
Bìrí tu ur ko a ko máá: Gatu di tchànoan kòo x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu dian hẽé naka Farasai xu dian hẽéthẽé nqáé tama ne tu cuiskaga nqarikg'ai di x'aian koe tcãà tite.
“Kóḿa tu hãa, ne kò ncìí kuri di ne khóè ne bìríè a ko máá: ‘Táá cg'õo guu.’ ‘Wèém ẽe gha cg'õo ba gha xgàrakuan tééa máá,’ téméè.

Igabar ko Tíía bìrí tu u a ko máá: Dìím wèém ẽe qõesem koe xgóà hãa ba gha xgàrakuan tééa máá. Gataga dìím wèém ẽe ko qõese ba bìrí a máá: ‘Káà hùi tsi gúù tsi i,’ témé ba gha x'áèan di xu kaia xu cookg'ai koe xo̱ara mááse. Igaba dìím wèém ẽe ko máá: ‘Tsáá káà tc'ẽe tsi gúù tsi,’ témé ba chõò tamas c'ees dxãwam dis ka tééa mááèa hãa.
“Khama nxãaska, ẽe tsi kò tsaris aba sa altaram koe úú ne, a tsi a ko gaa koe tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese tsáá qõe ba c'ẽes gúù sa tsáá cgoa úúa sa ne,
méé tsi tsari aban gaa koe guu, altaram cookg'ai koe. Naka tsia kg'aia qõò naka síí tsáá qõem cgoa tòókuan kúrú, naka nxãwa hàà tsari aban úú.

“Qháésega méé tsi ẽe ko chìbi-chibi tsim cgoa kóḿku, ẽe tsi kòo xgàrakuan dis qhàìs koe síí cgoa me ne. Nxãa tama kò ii nem gha xgàra-kg'aom tshàu q'oo koe tcãà tsi, me gha xgàra-kg'ao ba qáé-kg'aom tshàu q'oo koe tcãà tsi, tsi gha qáé-nquus koe tcãàè.
Tseegua ner ko bìrí tsi a ko máá: cuiskaga tsi gaa koe tcg'oara hãa tite, a gha nxãakg'aiga síí ẽe qaùa hãam mari-coa ba suruta.
“Kóḿa tu hãa i kòo ncẽeta mééè a ko máá: ‘Táá cg'áràn kúrú guu,’ téméè.
Igabar ko Tíí bìrí tu u a ko máá: wèém khóèm ẽe ko dxàe-khoe sa bóò, a ba a ko ncóó si ba, ncãa nxãakamaga cg'áràn kúrú cgoa si tcáóa ba koe.

A ncẽè kg'áò xòè dim tcgáím tsarim kòo chìbian kúrúkagu tsi ne méé tsi nxo̱bea tcg'òó naka aagu me. Qãè e, c'ẽe xòèa tsi gha aaguè sa ke, wèé tc'áróa tsi chõò tamas c'ees dxãwam dis koe xaoa tcãàèan ka.

Gataga ncẽè kg'áòm x'õàm tsarim kòo chìbian kúrúkagu tsi ne méé tsi q'ãea tcg'òó naka aagu me. Qãè e c'ẽe xòèa tsi gha aaguè sa, wèé tc'áróa tsi gha chõò tamas c'ees dxãwam dis koe tcãàèan ka ke.
“Gataga i kò ncẽeta mééè a ko máá: ‘Dìím wèém ẽe ko gam dis khóès cgoa q'aa ba méém tcgãya sa góá máá si, q'aa cgoa siam hãa di sa,’ ta mééè.

Igabar ko Tíí bìrí tu u a ko máá: Wèém khóèm ẽe ko gam dis khóè sa aagu ba, cg'árà nes kúrúa domka tamase, ba ko cg'árà-kg'ao sa kúrú si, me ko dìím wèém ẽe ko aaguèas khóè sa séè ba cg'áràn kúrú, tar ko méé.
“Gataga tu kóḿa hãa, ne kò ncìí kuri di ne khóè ne bìríè a ko máá: ‘Táá tshúù-ntcõan cgoa gaìse guu, igaba méé tsi tsari gaìsean X'aigam
Igabar ko Tíí bìrí tu u a ko máá: Táá gaìse guu, nqarikg'ai cgoa ga igaba, Nqarim dis ntcõó-q'oos x'aian di si i ke,
kana nqõómkg'ai cgoa ga igaba, Gam di nqàrèa nem ko tòó qgáì i ke, kana Jerusaleman cgoa ga igaba, kaiam X'aigam dim x'áé-dxoo me e ke.
Gataga méé tsi táá tcúúa tsi cgoa gaìse guu, cuiskaga tsi cúím c'õòm tsarim ga ba kúrú nakam q'úú kana ntcùúa hãa tite ke.
Kg'amaga méés gatu dis ‘Eè’ sa ‘Eè’ sa ii, nakas gatu dis ‘Eẽ ẽe’ sa ‘Eẽ ẽe’ sa ii. A ncẽè c'ẽes gúù sa tsi kò ncẽe zi kg'ui zi koe càùa mááse nes gha nxãa sa dxãwam koe guua.
“Kóḿa tu hãa i kòo ncẽeta mééè a ko máá: ‘Tcgáí ba méém tcgáím c'ẽem domka tcg'òóè, nakam xõ̱ó ba xõ̱óm domka tcg'òóè,’ ta mééè.

Igabar ko Tíí bìrí tu u a ko máá: Táá cg'ãè tc'ẽem khóè ba ka̱bia máá guu, igaba dìím wèém ẽe ko kg'áò xòè di góóa tsi koe xg'áḿ tsi ba, nxãa ba c'ẽem góó xòè ba máà thẽé
A ncẽè khóèm kò xgàrakuan dis qhàìs koe úú tsi, a tsari subu marian di qgáían séè kg'oana ne, máà me gataga thẽé tsari kaisa marian di qgáía ne.
Dìím wèém ẽe gha ko chùi tsi, cúím kilomitara ba tsi gha gam di zi gúù zi xgàm a qõò ba, nxãam cgoa méé tsi cám̀ kilomitaran qõò.
Máà ẽe ko dtcàrà tsi ba, naka ẽe cgóbè cgae tsi kg'oana ba táá q'aumana guu.
“Kóḿa tu hãa i kòo ncẽeta mééè a ko máá: ‘Tsáá ka c'ẽe ba méé tsi ncàm̀, naka tsia tsarim cg'õo-kg'ao ba hòre,’ téméè.
Igabar ko Tíía bìrí tu u a ko máá: Gatu di cg'õo-kg'aoan méé tu ncàm̀, naka còrèa máá ẽe ko xgàra tu u ne,

naka tua gha nxãasega gatu ka Xõòm nqarikg'ai koe hànam di tu cóá tu ii. Gam dis cáḿ sam ko kúrú si ẽe cg'ãè ne hẽé naka ẽe qãè ne hẽéthẽé qaò cgae, a ba a ko túúan ẽe tchàno ne koe hẽé naka ẽe kàma ne koe hẽéthẽé tsééa úú.
Eẽ ncàm̀ tua hãa ne tu kò ncàm̀a hãa, ne ia gha dùútsa surutan ka̱bisea máá tu u? Mari xg'ae-xg'ae-kg'ao xu igaba xu ko thẽé gataga hẽé khama.
A ncẽè gatu di qõean cúí ga tu kòo tsgám̀kagu, ne tu ko dùús cgáé sa kúrú? A tãá zi qhàò zi di ne igaba ne gáé thẽé gataga hẽé tama?
Nxãaska méé tu tchàno ii, ncẽem ma gatu ka Xõòm nqarikg'ai koe hàna ba ma tchàno Me e khamaga ma.

“Q'ãa méé tu naka tua gatu di zi tséé zi tchàno zi táá khóè ne cookg'ai koe kúrú guu, naka táá khóè ne x'áí zi guu. Gatà tu kò hẽé ne tu surutan hòò tite, gatu ka Xõòm nqarikg'ai koe hànam koe.

“A c'ẽem dtcàrà-kg'ao ba tu kò c'ẽes gúù sa máà kg'oana ne méé tu còrè-nquuan hẽé naka x'áéan xg'aeku koe hẽéthẽé táá torompitan cgoa nxàe ana téé guu, qãè khóèan khama ko ma kúrúse xu khóè xu ko hẽé khama, nxãasega xu gha c'ẽe khóèan ka dqo̱m̀mè ka. Tseegua ner ko bìrí tu u a ko máá: Gaxu di surutan xu
Igaba tsáá ẽe tsi kòo c'ẽem dtcàrà-kg'ao ba c'ẽes gúù sa máà ne, táá hẽé nas dxàes x'õàs tsari sa q'ãa, kg'áòm x'õàm tsarim ko kúrú sa.
Naka i gha nxãasega gúùan tsi tcg'òó q'oo chóm̀sea hãa, Me gha Saòm ncẽe ko chóm̀sea zi gúù zi bóò ba gha suruta tsi.

“Naka gatà còrè tu kò ne méé tu táá qãè khóèan khama ko ma kúrúse xu khóè xu khama ii guu, còrè-nquuan q'oo koe hẽé naka x'áéan xg'aeku koe hẽéthẽé ko nqàrè ka téé a còrèan ncàm̀a xu, nxãasega ne gha wèé ne khóè ne bóò xu ka. Tseegukar ko bìrí tu u a ko máá: Gaxu di surutan xu

Igaba tsáá ẽe tsi kò còrè ne méé tsi tsarim nquum q'oo koe tcãà, naka nquu-kg'áḿ ba tcẽekg'am, naka tsia Saò ba còrè, ncẽe hòòse tama ba. Nakam gha nxãasega Saò ba suruta tsi, ncẽe ko chóm̀sea zi gúù zi bóò ba.

Naka gatà còrè tu kòo ne, táá qaase tama zi kg'ui zi káí zi tséékagu guu, tãá zi qhàò zi di ne ko hẽé khama, káí zi kg'ui zi ẽe ne ko kg'ui zi ka ne gha komsanaè, ta ne tc'ẽea khama.
Táá gane khama ii guu. Gatu ka Xõò ba tu ko dtcàràs cookg'ai koem gatu koe ko tcào sa nxãakamaga q'ana hãa ke.
Ke méé tu ncẽeta ma còrè na máá:
Sita ka Xõò Tseè
nqarikg'ai koe hàna Tseè,
cg'õèa Tsi méé i dqo̱m̀mè,
Tsari x'aian méé i hàà.
Tsáá ko tc'ẽe sa méés nqõómkg'ai koe kúrúè
nqarikg'ai koes ko ma kúrúè khama.
Sita dis tc'õos wèé cáḿ di sa
ncẽe cáḿ ka máà ta a.
Naka qgóóa máá ta a chìbia ta,
sita ma c'ẽe ne gane di chìbian
ma qgóóa máána hãa khama.
Táá kúrúa bóòkuan koe tcéèa úú ta a guu,
igaba dxãwam dim dàòm koe tcg'òó ta a.
[X'aian hẽé,
naka qarian hẽé,
naka x'áàn hẽéthẽéa
chõò tamase Tsari i ke.
Amen.]
“Khóè ne tu kò gane di chìbian qgóóa máá nem gha gataga gatu ka Xõòm nqarikg'ai di ba gatu di chìbian koe qgóóa máá tu u khama.
Igaba ncẽè khóèan tu kò gaan di chìbian qgóóa máá tama, nem gatu ka Xõò ba thẽé cuiskaga chìbia tu qgóóa máá tu ua hãa tite.

“Gataga thẽé, ẽe tu kò tc'õoan carase ne méé tu táá cg'ãè-cg'ãe kg'áí guu, qãè khóèan khama ko ma kúrúse xu khama ma, ncẽe cg'ãè-cg'ãe kg'áí ko xu, c'ẽe ne xu gha nxãasega x'áí, tc'õoa ne xu ko carase sa ka xu. Tseegua ner ko bìrí tu u a ko máá: Gaxu di surutan xu
Igaba ẽe tsi kò tc'õoan carase ne méé tsi xg'aà kg'áí naka nxúìan tcgáùse.
Naka i gha nxãasega tsari tc'õoan carasean táá c'ẽe ne ka bóòè guu, igaba tsarim Xõòm ka, ncẽe hòòse tama ba. Me gha Saòm ncẽe chóm̀sea zi gúù zi ko bóò ba suruta tsi.
“Táá méé tu nqõómkg'ai koe qguùan tòóa mááse guu, ncẽe tcg'ãàn hẽé naka ncàbàn hẽéthẽé ko tc'õó o koe, ncẽe ts'ãà-kg'aoan ko khõá a tcãà a ts'ãà a koe.
Igaba méé tu gatu di qguùan nqarikg'ai koe tòóa mááse, ncẽe tcg'ãàn hẽé naka ncàbàn hẽéthẽé tc'õó o tite koe, kana ts'ãà-kg'aoan ga khõá naka tcãà na ts'ãà tite koe.
Eẽ tsari qguùan hãa koe i gha gataga thẽé tsari tcáóan hãa khama.
“Tcgáí ba tc'áróm dim x'áà me e. Ncẽè tcgáía tsi kò qãè ii, nem tsarim tc'áróm wèé ba x'áàn ka cg'oèa.
Igaba ncẽè tcgáía tsi kò tshúù ii, nem tc'áróm tsari ba dcùú-qoman ka cg'oè cgaeèa. A ncẽè tsari x'áàn kò dcùú-qom sa ii ne, i gáé gha nta noose dcùú-qoman kaia!

“Cám̀ x'aigan gha tsééa máám khóè ba káà me e. C'ẽe bam gha hòre, a c'ẽe ba ncàm̀ khama, kanam gha c'ẽem koe dtcãàse, a c'ẽe ba ntcoe khama. Cuiskaga tu Nqari ba hẽé naka qguùan dim nqárì ba hẽéthẽé tsara cúí x'aè ka tsééa máána hãa tite.

“Gaa domkar ko bìrí tu u, a ko máá: Táá gatu di kg'õèan ka káíse tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese guu, dùú tu gha tc'õó kana kg'áà sa, kana tc'áróa tu ka igaba, dùú tu gha hã̱a sa. Kg'õè sa gáé tc'õoan ka cgáé tama, me tc'áró ba qgáían ka cgáé tama?
Bóò nqarikg'ai di tsa̱rá ne: xhárà tama i hãa, a tcuù tama, a gataga tòóa mááse tama, gabàm ko qanega gatu ka Xõòm nqarikg'ai di ba xárò o. Ka gatu gáé gaan ka cgáé tama?
Gatu ka c'ẽem dìí ba gha gáé káíse tc'ẽe-tc'ẽesean ka, kg'õèa ba di cáḿan koe cáḿ ba càù?
“A tu a ko dùús domka qgáían ka káíse tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese? Bóò, nta i qãáka di x'aan ii sa, nta i ko ma tso̱m sa. Tséé tama i hãa, a gataga qgáían qgãéa mááse tama.
Igabar ko bìrí tu u a ko máá:

Ncẽè Nqarim kòo qãáka di dcãan, ncẽe ko ncẽe cáḿ ka hãa, a q'uu ka c'eean q'oo koe xaoa tcãàè, nxãan ncẽeta ma hã̱akagu, nem gha tseegukaga cgáése gatua hã̱akagu tu u, oo, gatu ncẽe cg'áré dtcòm̀an úúa tuè!
“Gaa domka méé tu táá káíse tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese guu naka máá: ‘Dùú sa ta gha tc'õó?’ témé, kana máá: ‘Dùú sa ta gha kg'áà?’ témé, kana máá: ‘Dùú sa ta gha hã̱a?’ témé guu.
Tãá zi qhàò zi di nea ko wèé gúùan ncẽe ga qaa, Me gatu ka Xõòm nqarikg'ai di ba ncẽe gúùan tu ko tcào sa q'ana hãa ke.
Igabaga méé tu kg'áíka
Ke tu táá q'uu dim cáḿ ka káíse tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese guu, q'uu dim cáḿ ba gha cúía tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese gam ka ke. Wèém cáḿ ba gam di xháéan tc'ãòa.
“Táá c'ẽem khóè ba xgàra guu, naka tua gha nxãasega táá xgàraè guu.
Gaam dàòm cúím ẽe tu ko c'ẽe ne bóò a xgàram cgoaga tu gha Nqarim ka bóò a xgàraè ke, si gha tc'ãò-tc'ãos ẽe tu ko c'ẽe ne koe tséékagu sa gatu koe tséékaguè.
“Dùús domka tsi ko tsáá ka c'ẽem tcgáí q'oo koe hãam tcg'óbé ba hòòa máá, igaba tsi tsáá tcgáí q'oo koe hãam hìi-dxoo ba hòò tama?
Nta tsi gha tsáá ka c'ẽe ba bìrí a máá: ‘Tíí tcáràè, hàà nakar tcgáí q'ooa tsi koe tcg'óbé ba tcg'òó,’ témé, ncẽe tsáá tcgáí q'oo koe hãam hìi-dxoo ba tsi hòò tama koe.

Tsáá qãè khóèan khama ko ma kúrúse tseè! Kg'áíka tcgáí q'ooa tsi koe hànam hìi-dxoo ba tcg'òó, naka nxãwa qãèse bóò naka tsáá ka c'ẽem tcgáí q'oo koe hàna tcg'óbéan tcg'òó.

“Táá ẽe tcom-tcomsa ii sa ha̱ghuan máà guu, naka gataga táá gatu di tca̱àko nxõ̱án xgùuan cookg'ai koe aagu guu. Gatà tu kò hẽé ne i gha nqàrèan gaan di ka náà tcãà a, a i a gha ka̱bise a tòà q'aa tu u.
“Dtcàrà tu, máàè tu gha ke, qaa tu, hòò tu gha ke, nquu-kg'áḿ ba tu xg'áḿ-xg'am, xgobekg'ama tu gha mááè ke.
Dìím wèém ẽe ko dtcàrà ba ko máàè, me ko wèém ẽe ko qaa ba hòò, me gha wèém ẽe ko nquu-kg'áḿ ba xg'áḿ-xg'am ba xgobekg'ama mááè khama.
Kana ndakam khóè ba gha gam dim cóám kòo péréan dtcàrà me ne, péréan téé-q'oo koe nxõ̱án máà me?
Kana ẽem kòo x'aù ba dtcàrà me ne, cg'ao ba máà me?

A ncẽè gatu ncẽe cg'ãè tc'ẽe ii tu kò qãè aban gatu di cóán máà q'ana hãa, ne ba gha nxãaska gatu ka Xõòm ncẽe nqarikg'ai koe hãa ba ẽe ko dtcàrà Me ne nta noose nqáéa hãase qãè aban máà!
“Gaa domka
“Xgáḿ-xgam naka nquu-kg'áḿ koe tcãà. Cg'ãèan koe ko úúm kg'áḿ ba tchàà me e, me gaa koe ko qõòm dàò ba thamka me e ke, ne gaa koe ko tcãà ne káí ne e.
Igaba bóò, kg'õèan dis heke-kg'áḿ sa cg'áré si i, me gaa koe ko qõòm dàò ba qóḿ me e, ne ẽe ko hòò me ne cg'orò ne e.
“Tshúù-ntcõan di xu porofiti xu méé tu q'ãa! Gatu koe xu ko ghùuan di khòoan hã̱a a hàà, igabaga xu q'ooa xu koe xaùko xu ncuutshaa xu u.
Gaxu di tc'áróan ka tu gha bóòa q'ãa xu. Khóèa ne gáé ko kuri dxàman úúa zi hìi-coa zi koe kg'oman tcuù, kana ia ko dxàmga zi hìi-coa zi koe faian tcuù?
Gatagas ko ma wèés hìis qãè sa qãè tc'áróan kúrú, igabas ko tshúùs hìi sa tshúù tc'áróan kúrú.
Qãès hìi sa cuiskaga tshúù tc'áróan kúrúa hãa tite, kanas gataga tshúùs hìi sa cuiskaga qãè tc'áróan kúrúa hãa tite.
Wèés hìis ẽe tc'áróan qãè kúrú tama sa ko xg'aoa tcg'òóè, a c'eean q'oo koe tcãàè.
Gaa domka tu gha gaxu di tc'áróan ka q'ãa xu.

“Wèém khóèm ẽe ko bìrí Te a máá: ‘X'aigaè, X'aigaè,’ témé ba nqarikg'ai di x'aian koe tcãà tite, igaba ẽe ko Tirim Abom nqarikg'ai koe hànam ko tc'ẽe sa kúrúm cúím ga ba gha tcãà.
Káí ne gha ẽem cáḿ
Ra gha nxãaska tchànose bìrí ne a máá: ‘Ncìísegar c'úù tua, gatu cg'ãè gúù kúrú-kg'ao tu, ke tu Tíí koe tcg'oa!’ témé.
“Dìím wèém ẽe ko Tiri kg'uian ncẽe kóḿ, a i ko méé sa kúrú ba gha tc'ẽegam khóèm khama ii, ncẽe ko gam dim nquu ba qãès tshoa-tshoase-q'oos koe tshào ba.
I túúan hàà, i tshàan cg'oè a tòè, i tc'ãán tc'ãá a i a ẽem nquu ba xàbù, igabagam kò táá cg'áé, qãès tshoa-tshoase-q'oos koem kò tshàoa tòóèa khama.
Igaba dìím wèém ẽe ko Tiri kg'uian kóḿ, igaba kúrú u tama ba gha káà tc'ẽem khóèm khama ii, ncẽe ko gam dim nquu ba góḿankg'ai koe tshàoa tòó ba,
I túúan hàà, i tshàan cg'oè a tòè, i tc'ãán tc'ãá, a i a ẽem nquu ba tcãò, me cg'áé, a kaias gúùs khama ma cg'áé ba,” tam méé.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba ncẽe zi gúù zi nxàea xg'ara ka zi ko xg'ae zi Gam di xgaa-xgaa-q'ooan ka area hãa.
Qarian úúam khóèm khamam kòo ma xgaa-xgaa ne khama, gane di xu x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu khama tamase.
Eẽm kò Jeso ba xàbìm koe guu a ko xõa ka zi kò káí zi xg'ae zi khóè ne di zi xùri Me.
Me gaa x'aè kaga lepero dis tcìì sa tsàaram khóè ba hàà cgae Me, a hàà cookg'aia ba koe qgom-tsi-quri, a máá: “X'aigaè, tc'ẽe Tsi kòo ne Tsi ga kúrú ter q'ano,” témé.
Me tchoanà tshàu, a qgóó me, a máá: “Gatàr ko ma tc'ẽe, ke q'ano!” témé. Kas kò gam dis tcììs lepero di sa kúúga kaà cgae me.

Me Jeso ba bìrí me a máá: “Q'ãa, naka táá cúí khóè ga c'ẽe gúù ga bìrí guu. Igaba méé tsi qõò naka síí peresitim koe x'áíse, naka ẽem Moshe x'áèa hãas aba sa tcg'òó, x'áís iise khóè ne koe,” témé.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba Kaperenaume koe síí tcãà kam kò ncõo-kg'ao xu dim tc'ãà-cookg'ai ba hàà cgae Me, a hàà hùikuan dtcàrà cgae Me a máá:
“X'aigaè, tirim qãà ba x'áéa te koe xõe, a nqo̱ara hãa, a ba a kaisa thõòan koe hãa,” témé.
Me bìrí me a máá: “Síír gha a kúrú mem qãè,” témé.

Me ncõo-kg'ao xu dim tc'ãà-cookg'ai ba xo̱a a máá: “X'aigaè, dìí cgáér tama ra a, nquua te tco̱be dòm̀ q'oo koe Tsi ga tcãà ra. Ke kg'amaga kg'ui ba tcg'òó nakam gha tirim qãà ba kg'õè.

Tíí igabar kaia xu dòm̀ q'oo koe hànar khóè ra a, xu gataga ncõo-kg'ao xu tíí dòm̀ q'oo koe hàna ke. Ra ko ncẽe ba bìrí a máá: ‘Qõò,’ témé, me qõò, ra c'ẽe ba bìrí a máá: ‘Hàà,’ témé, me hàà. Ra tirim qãà ba bìrí a máá: ‘Ncẽe sa kúrú,’ témé, me kúrú si,” tam méé.

Eẽm ko Jeso ba ẽe sa kóḿ kam kò kaisase are, a ba a ẽe kòo xùri Me ne bìrí a máá: “Tseegua ner ko bìrí tu u: Qanegar cúí khóè ga Iseraele koe hòò ta ga hãa ncẽeta ma kaias dtcòm̀ sa úúa hãa a.

Bìrí tu ur ko, káí ne gha cáḿs ko tcg'oa xòè koe hẽé naka cáḿs ko tcheè xòè koe hẽéthẽé guu a hàà, a ne a hàà Abrahama ba hẽé naka Isaka ba hẽé naka Jakobe ba hẽéthẽé xu cgoa ntcõó a tc'õó, nqarikg'ai di x'aian koe.
Igaba ne gha gane ẽe x'aian di ne tchàa koe xaoa tcg'òóè, dcùú-qoms q'oo koe, ncẽe kg'aean hẽé naka gãò xõ̱óan hẽéthẽé gha hãa koe,” tam méé.

Me nxãaska Jeso ba ncõo-kg'ao xu dim tc'ãà-cookg'ai ba bìrí a máá: “Eẽ tsi ma dtcòm̀a hãa khamaga méé i tsáá koe ii, ke qõò,” témé. Me kò gam dim qãà ba gaa x'aèan ẽe kaga qãè.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba Peterem dim nquum koe tcãà kam kò Peterem ka c'uìse sa bóò, si cgùrukagu si kos tcììs ka qgóóèa, a xóé-xõe.
Me kò tshàua sa qgóó, i tcììan guu si, si tẽe a sa a tshoa-tshoa a tsééa máá Me.
Eẽm dqòam ka ne kò káí ne khóè ne dxãwa tc'ẽean úúa hãa ne Gam koe óá. Me kg'uim cgoa dxãwa tc'ẽean xhàiagu, a ba a wèé ne ẽe kò tsàa ne kúrú ne kg'õè.
nxãasegas gha ẽem ko porofitim Isaia ba nxàea sa tseegukaguè ka, ncẽe ko máá:
“Gatá di thõòa nem séèa,
a ba a tcììa ta xgàm a qõò cgoaa,”
témé sa.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba khóè ne dis xg'ae sa qàea ba koe bóò, kam kò x'áèan tcg'òó, tchoaba méé xu c'ẽem xòèm tshàam dim koe di i.
Me nxãaska x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao ba hàà cgae Me, a hàà bìrí Me a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'aoè, ẽe Tsi ko síí qgáì wèé koer gha xùri Tsi,” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Círía ne gaan di ha̱éan úúa, i tsa̱rán gaan di nquuan úúa, igabagam Khóèm dim Cóá ba tòó tcúúm gha qgáì úú tama,” témé.
Me c'ẽem xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao ba bìrí Me a máá: “X'aigaè, kg'aia qãà te nakar síí tirim xõò ba kg'ónò,” témé.
Igabam kò Jeso ba bìrí me a máá: “Xùri Te, naka ẽe x'óóa hãa ne guu naka ne gane dian ẽe x'óóa hãa kg'ónò,” témé.
Eẽm ko dxòrom q'oo koe tcãà ka xu kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu xùri Me.
Me kò kúúga kaiam tc'ãá ba tshàam tc'amkg'ai koe tẽe, me dxòro ba tshàam di qhonèan ka xàbùa tcg'òóè, igabam kò Jeso ba x'óm̀a hãa.
Xu síí ghùi Me a máá: “X'aigaè, hùi xae e! Tom̀ xae ko ke!” témé.

Me bìrí xu a máá: “Dùús domka xao ko ma q'aea, gaxao ncẽe cg'áré dtcòm̀an úúa hãa xaoè?” témé. Kam ko nxãaska tẽe a ba a tc'ãá ba hẽé naka tshàa ba hẽéthẽé dqàè, si kaisas nqoo sa xóé.
Xu ẽe kò hãa cgoa Mea xu are, a tẽèku a máá: “Dùútsa khóè ba gáé ncẽe ba? Tc'ãán ga hẽé naka tshàan ga hẽéthẽé ka ko komsanaè ba!” témé.

Eẽm ko c'ẽem xòèm tshàam dim koe síí, Gadarene dim xg'aekum di ba, kam ko cám̀ tsara khóè tsara dxãwa tc'ẽean úúa tsara cgoa xg'ae, tc'ám̀ zi koe kò guua hãa tsara. Kaisase bèe-beesa kò ii tsara, i kò cúí khóè ga gaam dàò ba séè naka nqáé tite.
Gaa x'aè kaga tsara kò q'au a máá: “Dùú sa Tsi ko tc'ẽe sitsam koe, Nqarim di Tsi Cóá Tseè? A hààra Tsia, hàà Tsi gha xgàra tsam m ka, nxárá tòóèam x'aèm cookg'ai koe?” ta méé.
Zi kò káí zi xgùu zi gaxu ka cg'árése nqúù ka hãa a ko dxòó.
I kò gatsara di dxãwa tc'ẽean Jeso ba dtcàrà a máá: “Ncẽè hàà Tsi kò ko xhàiagu ta a ne méé Tsi xgùuan dis xg'aes koe tsééa úú ta a,” témé.
Me bìrí i a máá: “Qõò!” témé. I tcg'oa, a i a síí xgùuan koe tcãà. Si wèés xg'aes xgùuan di sa kari-karisea xõa a síí tshàan q'oo koe x'óó.
Xu ẽe kòo xgùuan kòre xu khóè xu bèe a qgóé, a x'áé-dxoom koe síí, a síí wèéan ga nxàe, ẽe kò dxãwa tc'ẽean úúa tsara khóè tsara koe kúrúsean ga hẽéthẽé e.
Kam kò wèém x'áé-dxoo ba tcg'oa, a síí Jesom cgoa xg'ae. Eẽ ne ko bóò Me, ka ne kò dtcàrà Me, gane dim nqõóm koem gha tcg'oa sa.
Nxãaskam kò Jeso ba dxòrom q'oo koe tcãà, a tchoaba a ba a Gam dim x'áé-dxoom koe síí.

Ka xu kò gaa x'aè kaga c'ẽe xu khóè xu khóèm nqo̱ara hãa ba Gam koe óága, gam dim tcoàm koe xòó mea hãase. Eẽm ko Jeso ba gaxu di dtcòm̀an bóò kam kò ẽe nqo̱ara hãa ba bìrí a máá: “Tòón tcáó, Tiri tsi cóá tseè, chìbia tsi tsi qgóóa mááèa hãa ke,” témé.
Ka xu ko c'ẽe xu x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu tcáóa xu q'oo koe máá: “Ncẽem khóè ba ko
Igabam ko Jeso ba bóòa q'ãa ẽe xu tc'ẽea hãa sa a máá: “Dùús domka xao ko cg'ãè zi gúù zi tcáóa xao q'oo koe tc'ẽea máá?
Ndaka nea thamkaà? ‘Chìbia tsi tsi qgóóa mááèa,’ témé saa kana máá: ‘Tẽe naka qõò,’ témé saa?” tam ma tẽè xu.

“Igabagar gha x'áí xao o, xao gha nxãasega q'ãa, Khóèm dim Cóá ba nqõómkg'ai koe qarian úúa hãa sa, khóèa nem gha gaan di chìbian qgóóa máá di i,” témé. Nxãaskam kò ẽe nqo̱ara kò hãa ba bìrí a máá: “Tẽe naka tsarim tcoà ba séè naka x'áé koe dìbi,” témé.
Me tẽe a ba a x'áéa ba koe dìbi.
Eẽ zi ko khóè ne di zi xg'ae zi ncẽes gúù sa bóò, ka ne kò q'áòs ka tcãàè, a ne a Nqari ba dqo̱m̀, ncẽe kò ẽeta ii qarian khóèan máà ba.

Eẽm ko Jeso ba gaa koe guu kam kò Mataio ta ko ma tciièm mari xg'ae-xg'ae-kg'ao ba bóò, me marian ko séèa xg'ae-xg'aeèm nquum koe ntcõóa-ntcõe. Me bìrí me a máá: “Xùri Te,” témé. Me tẽe a xùri Me.

I kúrúse Me Jeso ba Mataiom x'áé koe síí hãa a ko tc'õó. Ka i ko káí mari xg'ae-xg'ae-kg'aoan hẽé naka chìbi-kg'aoan hẽéthẽé hàà, a hàà Jeso ba hẽé naka Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé cgoa ntcõó.

Eẽ xu ko Farasai xu ẽes gúù sa bóò ka xu kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu tẽè a máá: “Dùús domka ba ko gaxao dim Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao ba mari xg'ae-xg'ae-kg'aoan hẽé naka chìbi-kg'aoan hẽéthẽé cgoa tc'õóa máá?” témé.
Ncẽes gúù sam ko kóḿ kam kò Jeso ba máá: “Eẽ tsàa tama ne khóè nea naakan qaa tama, igaba ẽe ko tsàa ne ko qaa a.
Ke xao qõò naka síí xgaa-xgaase, ncẽem kg'ui ba ko dùú sa méé sa: ‘Thõò-xama-máákua ner ko

Nxãaska xu kò Johanem di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu síí cgae Me a síí tẽè Me a máá: “Dùús domka xae ko sixae hẽé naka Farasai xu hẽéthẽé xae káíse tc'õoan carase, igaba xu Tsari xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu tc'õoan carase tama?” témé.

Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Séè-kg'aom kò gam di ne cg'áè-kg'ao ne cgoa hãa ne nea gha dùús domka kg'ae? Igabam gha x'aè ba hàà, séè-kg'aom gha gane koe guu a séèa tcg'òóè ba, ne gha nxãaska tc'õoan carase.
“Dìím ga ba cuiskaga qgáí cg'anà ba ka̱bam qgáím cgoa nqàba hãa tite, ẽes nqàba sa gha ẽem qgáím koe tòàra tcg'oa, si gha tòà sa càùse khama.

Gataga i khóèan cuiskaga ka̱ba gõéan ncìí zi khòo dtcòbè zi gõéan di zi q'oo koe gõéan qg'oea hãa tite. A ncẽè gatà i kò ko hẽé ne zi gha khòo dtcòbè zi qgaìse, i gõéan ntcã̱a, zi dtcòbè zi tòàra q'aase. Igaba i ko ka̱ba gõéan ka̱ba zi khòo zi koe qg'oeè, i wèéan qãè qgáì koe tòóè,” tam méé.

Eẽm qanega hãa a ko ncẽes gúù sa gane cgoa nxàe kam kò kúúga c'ẽem tc'ãà-cookg'ai ba hàà, a hàà cookg'aia ba koe qám̀se, a máá: “Tiris cóá sa ncãa sencgaga x'óó. Ke hàà naka hàà Tsari tshàuan tòó cgae si, nakas kg'õè,” témé.
Me Jeso ba tẽe a qõò cgoa me, xu Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu xùri tsara a.
Kas ko 12 kurian kò úúa hãa, a ko xòm̀ x'aèse nxoean hòòs khóè sa qãáa ba koe guu a hàà, a hàà Gam dim qgáím di xgáḿ-kg'aman qgóó.
Gaas kas kò bìríse a máá: “Gam dim qgáí bar kò qgóó ne cúígar gha qãè,” témé.
Me Jeso ba ka̱bise a bóò si, a máá: “Tòón tcáó, Tiri si cóá seè, sari dtcòm̀a nea qãèkagu sia ke,” témé. Si khóè sa gaa x'aèan ẽe kaga qãè.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba tc'ãà-cookg'aim dim nquum koe tcãà, a ko fulutu cii-kg'ao xu hẽé naka tcẽé-tcẽe kò kos xg'ae sa hẽéthẽé bóò,
kam kò máá: “Qõò tu, cóá sa x'óó tama, igabagas kg'ama x'óm̀a hãa ke,” témé. Igabaga ne kò kg'ãè Me.
Igaba ẽes kò xg'ae sa tchàa koe tcg'òóèa xg'ara kam kò q'oo koe tcãà, a ba a cóá sa tshàua sa koe séè, si tẽe.
Ncẽe tchõà ne kò wèém xg'aekum ẽem koe qõò.
Eẽm Jeso ba ẽe koe guu a ko qõò ka tsara ko káà tcgáí tsara khóè tsara xùri Me, a q'au a ko máá: “Thõò-xama máá tsam m, Dafitem ka Tsgõose-coa Tseè,” témé.

Eẽm ko nquum q'oo koe tcãà ka tsara ko gaa tsara káà tcgáí tsara khóè tsara hàà cgae Me, Me tẽè tsara a, a máá: “Dtcòm̀ tsao ko qaria ner úúa sa, ncẽe gúùa ner gha kúrú di i?” témé. Tsara xo̱a Me a máá: “Eè, X'aigaè,” témé.
Me nxãaska tcgáía tsara qgóó, a ba a máá: “Gatsao di dtcòm̀an khamaga méé i ma kúrúse,” témé.
I gatsara di tcgáían xgobekg'amse. Me Jeso ba qarika dqàè tsara a, a máá: “Bóò méé tsao naka i táá cúí khóè ga ncẽes gúù sa q'ãa guu!” témé.
Igabaga tsara kò qõò, a síí Gam di tchõàn wèém xg'aekum ẽem koe xàà.
Eẽ tsara kòo qõò kam kò dxãwa tc'ẽean ka tcãàèa a kg'ui tamam khóè ba Jesom koe óágaè.
Eẽ i ko gaa dxãwa tc'ẽean xhàiaguè kam kò gaam khóèm ẽe kò kg'ui tama ba kg'ui. Zi kò xg'ae zi area, a zi a máá: “Ncẽeta iis gúù sa qanega Iseraele koe kúrúse tama!” témé.
Igaba xu kò Farasai xu máá: “Dxãwa tc'ẽean dim tc'ãà-cookg'aim cgoam ko dxãwa tc'ẽean xhàiagu,” témé.

Me kò Jeso ba wèé xu x'áé-dxoo xu koe hẽé naka x'áé-coa xu koe hẽéthẽé qõòa te, a ba a gane di còrè-nquuan koe xgaa-xgaa, a kò x'aian di qãè tchõàn khóè ne xgaa-xgaa, a ba a kò wèés tcìì sa hẽé naka wèés thõò sa hẽéthẽé tsoò.
Eẽm ko xg'ae zi bóò kam kò thõò-xama máá zi, ntcãa-ntcãaè ne kòo, a ne a kò káà hùi ne e khama, kòre-kg'ao ba úú tama zi ghùu zi khama ma.
Me nxãaska Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu bìrí a máá: “Tcuùè gha gúùa ne káí i, igaba i tséé-kg'aoan cg'orò o.
Ke xao tcuùs dim X'aiga ba dtcàrà, nakam tséé-kg'aoan tsééa óá naka i hàà tcuù,” témé.

Me kò Jeso ba Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu 12 xu Gaam koe tciia óá, a ba a dxãwa tc'ẽean xhàiagu di qarian máà xu, naka wèé zi tcìì-kg'áḿ zi hẽé naka wèé zi thõò-kg'áḿ zi hẽéthẽé qãèkaguan di i.
Ncẽea kò cg'õèan x'áè úú-kg'ao
Filipi ba hẽé naka Baretolomaio ba hẽé, Tomase ba hẽé naka Mataiom mari xg'ae-xg'ae-kg'ao ba hẽé, Alefaiom ka cóásem Jakobo ba hẽé naka Tadaio ba hẽé,
Simonem ncẽe kò tòókuan x'ãà máá ba hẽé naka Jutasem Isekariote ba hẽéthẽé e, ncẽe kò khóè ne tshàu q'oo koe tcãà Me ba.

Nxãa xu 12 xum kò Jeso ba ncẽe x'áè-kg'áḿan cgoa tsééa tcg'òó, a máá: “Táá tãá zi qhàò zi di qgáìan koe síí guu, naka táá x'áé-dxooan Samaria ne di ka c'ẽean koe ga tcãà guu.
Igaba méé xao Iseraele di ne khóè ne koe qõò, ncẽe aagusea ghùuan
Naka xaoa ẽe xao xóé a ko qõò ka, ncẽe kg'uian xgaa-xgaa naka máá: ‘Nqarikg'ai di x'aia nea cúù u!’ témé.

Eẽ ko tsàa ne kg'õèkagu, ẽe x'óóa ne ghùi, gane ẽe lepero dis tcììs di ne q'ano-q'ano, dxãwa tc'ẽean xhàiagu. Surutakaguè tamase xao máàèa hãa, ke xao kg'ama c'ẽe ne surutakagu tamase thẽé máà.
Táá xao c'ẽe mari x'õà ga qòè guu.

Gaxao dis qõòs koe méé xao táá dtcòbèan ga, kana cám̀ tsara qgáí tsara igaba, kana nxàboan ga igaba, kana dqàbian ga igaba séè guu. Tséé-kg'ao ba gam di tc'õoan ka kg'anoèa hãa ke.
“Wèém x'áé-dxoo ba kana x'áém ẽe xao ko tcãàm koe méé xao khóèan kg'ano-kg'anosa qaa, naka gaan di x'áéan koe hãa naka nxãakg'aiga síí gaa koe tcg'oa.
Eẽ xao kòo x'áém koe tcãà ne méé xao tsgám̀kagu me.
A ncẽè x'áém kò kg'ano-kg'anosa ba ii, ne méé i gaxao di tòókuan gaam koe hãa, igaba ncẽè gatàm kò ii tama ne méé i gaxao di tòókuan ka̱bise cgae xao o.

A ncẽè c'ẽe khóè ga kò qãèse hààkagu xao o tama, kana gaxao di kg'uian komsana tama, ne méé xao gaam x'áém koe kana x'áé-dxoom koe tcg'oa naka xaoa nqàrèa xao di tsharàn qãè-qãe.
Tseeguan kagar ko bìrí xao o a ko máá: xgàrakuan dim cáḿ kam gha gam x'áé-dxoo ba Sodoma hẽé naka Gomora hẽéthẽé ka kaisa xgàrakuan hòò.
“Bóò, Tíí ra ko ghùu zi khama ma ncuutshaan xg'aeku koe tsééa úú xao o. Gaa domka méé xao nxãaska tc'ẽega ii cg'aoan khama ma, naka xaoa tcíbí zi khama ma tc'aua hãa.
Igabaga méé xao khóè ne koe kòrese, qáé xao o ne gha a qhàìs cookg'ai koe úú xao o, a gha gane di còrè-nquuan koe xg'áḿ xao o ke.
Xao gha Tíí domka

Igaba ẽe ne kò ko gaxu tshàu q'oo koe tcãà xao o ne méé xao táá káíse tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese guu, dùú sa xao gha kg'ui sa, kana nta xao gha ma nxàe si sa, ẽe xao gha kg'ui sa xao gha ẽem x'aèm ka máàè ke.
Gaxao tama xao gha ko kg'ui khama, igaba gaxao ka Xõòm dim Tc'ẽe Me e gha ii, ẽe gha ko gaxao koe kg'ui ba.
“Khóè ba gha qõese ba x'oos koe tcãà, me xõò ba gam dim cóám ka gataga hẽé, i gha cóán gaan di xõòan ntcoe, a gha cg'õo o.
Xao gha Tiri cg'õèan domka wèé khóèan ka hòreè. Igaba gaam ẽe gha qarika téé a chõò-q'oos koe síí ba gha kgoaraè.

Eẽ c'ẽem x'áém koe xao kò ko xgàraè ne méé xao c'ẽem za bèea síí. Tseegua ner ko bìrí xao o a ko máá: X'áé-dxoo xu Iseraele di xu koe qõoatean cgoa xao xg'ara tite, Me gha nxãakg'aiga síí Khóèm dim Cóá ba hàà.
“Xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao ba gam dim xgaa-xgaa-kg'aom ka tc'amaka hãa tama, kana qãà ba gam ka q'õòsem ka tc'amaka hãa tama.

Tc'ãòa i hãa, xgaa-xgaase-kg'aom ga gaam dim xgaa-xgaa-kg'aom khama ii sa, me qãà ba gaam ka q'õòsem khama ii. X'áém dim tcúúm kò ko Belesebule ta ma tciiè ne, ne gha gaam x'áém di ne nxãaska ntama cg'ãèse tciiè!
“Ke táá q'áò ne guu. Wèés gúùs ẽe chóm̀sea hãa sa gha xgòre-kg'aiè, si gha wèés tchõàs chóm̀sea sa nxàese ke.
Eẽr ko ntcùúan q'oo koe bìrí xao o gúùan méé xao x'áàn q'oo koe nxàe. Naka ẽe xao kóḿ si ko c'am̀a hãase nxàeè sa méé xao nquuan tco̱be koe kgoarasea hãase nxàe.
Táá méé xao
A nxã̱e tsa̱rá sara gáé cúím mari-coam cgoa x'ámáè tama? Igabas cúís ga sa gatu ka Xõòm tc'ẽe tamase, góḿan koe tcheèa hãa tite.
I gataga wèé c'õòan tcúúa tu di ga nxáráèa.
Ke táá q'áò guu. Káí zi nxã̱e tsa̱rá zi ka tu kaisase cgáé tu u ke.
“Khama wèém khóèm ẽe ko khóè ne cookg'ai koe Tíí ka nxàese bar gha Tíí igaba Tirim Xõòm nqarikg'ai koe hãam cookg'ai koe nxàea tcg'òó.
Igaba dìím wèém ẽe ko khóè ne cookg'ai koe xo̱ase Te bar gha Tíí igaba Tirim Xõòm nqarikg'ai koe hãam cookg'ai koe xo̱aseè.
“Táá tc'ẽea máá, nqõómkg'ai koer ko hàà tòókuan óá, ta tc'ẽea guu. Hààr tòókuan óá tama, igaba ntcàu me e.
Hààra Raa,
hààr gha khóè ba ka̱bi ka,
me gam ka xõòm cgoa táá kóḿku,
si cóá sa gas ka xõòs cgoa táá kóḿku,
si c'uìse-coa sa c'uìses cgoa táá kóḿku ka.
I gha khóèm di cg'õo-kg'aoan
gam dim x'áém di ne khóè ne ii.
“Wèém ẽe xõò ba kana xõò sa kaisase Tíí ka ncàm̀a ba kg'ano Te tama. Me wèém ẽe gam dim cóá ba kana cóá sa kaisase Tíí ka ncàm̀a ba kg'ano Te tama.
Me dìím wèém ẽe gam dim xgàu ba séè naka xùri Te tama ba kg'ano Te tama.
Dìím wèém ẽe ko gam dis kg'õè sa qarika qaa ba gha aaguse cgaeè si, me gha dìím wèém ẽe ko Tíí domka gam dis kg'õès ka aaguse cgaeè ba gha hòò si.
“Wèém ẽe ko qãèse hààkagu xao o ba ko Tíí ga Ra qãèse hààkagu, Me ko dìím wèém ẽe ko qãèse hààkagu Te ba qãèse hààkagu ẽe tsééa óága Tea ba.

Dìím wèém ẽe ko porofiti ba qãèse hààkagu, porofiti me e domka ba gha porofitian ko máàè surutan hòò. Me gha dìím wèém ẽe ko tchànom khóè ba qãèse hààkagu, tchànom khóè me e domka ba tchànom khóèm ko máàè surutan hòò.

Tseeguan kagar ko gataga bìrí xao o a ko máá: Dìím wèém ẽe ko qgàisa tshàan dis kubis igaba ncẽe ne cg'áré ne ka c'ẽe ba máà, Tirim xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao me e domka ba gha tseeguan kaga gam di surutan hòò.”
Eẽm ko Jeso ba Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu 12 xu x'áèa xg'ara, kam kò ẽe koe guu a qõò, síím gha Galilea di xu x'áé xu koe khóè ne xgaa-xgaa, a
Me Johane qáé-nquus koe hànase Krestem ko kúrú zi tséé zi ka kóḿ, a ba a kg'uian gam di tsara xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao tsara cgoa tsééa úú,
síí méé tsara tẽè Me naka máá: “A Tsáá ga Tsia ncẽe ga ko koma hàà Tsi kana méé xae c'ẽem khóè ba nqòò?” témé.
Me kò Jeso ba xo̱a tsara, a máá: “Qõò naka síí Johane ba bìrí ẽe tsao ko kóḿ a ko bóò sa:

Ncẽe káà tcgáí ne ko bóò, ne ko ẽe kò qõò tama ne qõò, ne kò lepero dis tcììs di ne qãèkaguè, ne ko ẽe kóḿ tama ne kóḿ, ne ẽe kò x'óóa hãa ne ghùiè, ne ko ẽe dxàua hãa ne qãè tchõàn xgaa-xgaaè.
Ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa baa khóèm ẽe gam di dtcòm̀an Tíí koe tcgàba tite ba

Eẽ tsara ko qõò kam kò Jeso ba tshoa-tshoa a xg'ae zi cgoa kg'ui Johanem ka a máá: “Tchàa-xgóós koe tu kò ko qõò ka tu kò síí dùú sa bóò? Tc'ãán ka ko ntcãa-ntcãaèm tc'áà baa kò ii?
Nxãas tamas kò ii ne tu kò ko síí dùú sa bóò? Khóèm xaam qgáí ba ha̱na baa?
Kháé dùú sa tu kò nxãaska síí ko bóò? A porofiti baa? Eè, bìrí tu ur ko, porofitim ka tc'amaka hãa me e.
Ncẽe ba gaam ka i góáèa hãam ga me e, a ko máá:
‘Bóò, Tirim tchõà xàà-kg'ao bar gha
Tsáá cookg'ai koe tsééa úú,
ncẽe gha síí Tsarim dàò ba
kg'ónòa máá Tsi ba,’
ta mééèa ba.

Tseegukar ko bìrí tu u, a ko máá: Eẽ khóè zi ka ábàèa hãa xu ka x'áísea hãa ba káà me e, Johanem tcguù-tcguu-kg'aom kam kaia hãa sa. Igaba gam ẽe nqarikg'ai di x'aian koe cg'áré ii ba gam ka kaia hãam ga me e.
Johanem tcguù-tcguu-kg'aom di cáḿan koe guu a ncẽem x'aèm koe hààs koe i kò nqarikg'ai di x'aian qarian cgoa qgóókua, ne ko qaris di ne khóè ne qarian cgoa séè e.
Porofiti xu wèé xu hẽé naka
A ncẽes gúù sa tu kò dtcòm̀ kg'oana ne, gam Johane ba Elijam ga me e, ncẽe
Eẽ tceean úúa hãa ba méém kóḿ.
“Igaba Ra gha kháé ncẽem x'aèm dis qhàò sa dùús cgoa nxárá xg'ae? Kg'amaga i cg'áré cóán khama ii, ncẽe gúùan ko x'ámáguè qgáì koe hãa a ko tciiku u, a ko máá:
‘Fulutuan ta kò ciia máá tu u,
tu kò táá ntcãà,
ta kò gataga x'ooan di ciian nxáè,
tu kò táá kg'ae,’
témé.
Johanem ko hàà kam kò tc'õó tama kana kg'áà tama, ne kò máá: ‘Dxãwa tc'ẽea nem úúa,’ témé khama.

Igabam kò Khóèm dim Cóá ba hàà, a ko tc'õó a ba a ko kg'áà, ne kò máá: ‘Bóò, tc'õó-kg'aom ncẽe ba, a kg'áà-kg'aom gõéan di ba, mari xg'ae-xg'ae-kg'aoan hẽé naka chìbi-kg'aoan hẽéthẽé dim tcárà ba,’ ta méé. Igaba i ko q'ãan di tc'ẽean gaan di kúrúse-kg'áḿan ka tchàno o sa x'áíse.”

Me Jeso ba nxãaska tshoa-tshoa a ba a x'áé-dxoo xu, ncẽe káí-kg'aise zi Gam di zi x'áí zi are-aresa zi gaxu koe kúrúsea xu dqàè, táá xu kò gaxu di chìbian koe tcóóse khama, a ba a máá:

“Haò, cg'ãè i gha ii tsáá ka Korasineè! Cg'ãè i gha ii tsáá ka Betesaidaè! Are-aresa zi x'áí zi ncẽe ko gatsao koe kúrúsea zi kò Ture hẽé naka Sitone hẽéthẽé koe kúrúsea hãa ne ne ga kò ncìíse gane di chìbian koe tcóósea, a saka di qgáían hã̱a, a tháúan tcgáùsea.
Igabar ko bìrí tsao o a ko máá: ‘Xgàrakuan dim cáḿ ka tsara gha Turea tsara Sitonea tsara subu xgàrakuan hòò gatsao dian ka,’ témé.

A ncẽe tsáá ka, Kaperenaume tseè! Ncẽè x'áí zi are-aresa zi tsáá koe kúrúsea zi kò Sodomam koe kúrúsea nem ga ko ncẽeska qanega hàna. Gaa domka tsi gha kaisase nqãaka xòóè, x'óóa ne khóè ne dim qgáìm koe, nqarikg'ai koe tsi gha ghùi a úúè, ta tsi tc'ẽea igaba.
Igabar kò bìrí tsi a ko máá: Xgàrakuan dim cáḿ kam gha Sodoma ba subu xgàrakuan hòò tsarian ka, témé,” tam Jeso ba méé.

Eẽm x'aèm kam kò Jeso ba nxàe a máá: “Dqo̱m̀ Tsir ko, Aboè, X'aiga Tsi, nqarikg'ai hẽé naka nqõómkg'ai hẽéthẽé di Tsi, ncẽe zi gúù zi Tsi kò tc'ẽega ne hẽé naka xgaa-xgaasea hãa ne hẽéthẽé chóm̀-kg'aia hãa, a Tsi a kò ẽe cg'áré ne xgaa-xgaase tama ne
Eè, Aboè, ncẽea Tsi kò ma ncàm̀a hãa ga a khama.

“Wèé zi gúù zi Ra Tirim Abom ka máàèa, i cúí khóè ga Cóá ba c'úùa, Xõòm oose, i cúí khóè ga Xõò ba c'úùa hãa, Cóásem oose, naka wèém ẽe Cóám ka nxárá tcg'òóèa ba hẽéthẽé e, gaam koem gha Cóá ba Xõò ba x'áí ka ba.
“Hàà tu Tíí koe gatu wèé tu ẽe xhõea a ko tààè tu, sãakagu tu ur gha ke.
Séè tu Tiris joko sa naka gatu ka xgàm, naka tua Tíí koe xgaa-xgaase. Tíí Ra kgàea hãa a ko cg'áré-cg'arese, a Ra a tcáóa Te koe tc'aua, tu gha nxãaska sãa-q'ooan hòò gatu di i.
Tiris joko sa xhóà-xhóà si i, si xgàms Tiri sa subu si i khama.”

Eẽm x'aèm kam kò Jeso ba maberean dim xháràm q'oo koe ko Sabata dim cáḿ ka qõò. Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu kò xàbà hãa ka xu kò nxãaska tshoa-tshoa a maberean tc'áró khõá a tc'õó.
Igaba ẽe xu ko Farasai xu ẽe sa bóò, ka xu kò bìrí Me a máá: “Bóò! Tsari xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ko Sabata dim cáḿ ka x'áèan koe kgoara mááè tama sa kúrú,” témé.
Igabam kò Jeso ba bìrí xu a máá: “Qanega xao gáé nxárá ta ga hãa Dafitem xg'ao kúrú sa, gabá hẽé naka gam ka c'ẽea xu hẽéthẽé kò xàbà hãa ka?

Nqarim dim nquum koem kò ma tcãà, a ba a gam ka c'ẽea xu cgoa ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa péréan tc'õó, ncẽe peresiti xu ka cúí ko tc'õóè e, gabá hẽé naka ẽem kò hãa cgoa xu hẽéthẽé kò tc'õóan gaan di kgoara mááè tama a.
Kana xaoa qanega Moshem di x'áèan koe nxárá ta ga hãa, Sabata dim cáḿ ka xu kò peresiti xu tempelem q'oo koe Sabata dim cáḿ ba táá tcom, igaba xu kò táá chìbi-chibiè sa.
Bìrí xao or ko a ko máá: C'ẽes gúùs tempelem ka kaia sa ncẽe koe hàna, témé.

kg'uia ne ko máá: ‘Thõò-xama-máákua ner ko qaa, dàòa-máákuan ka tamase,’ témé. Ncẽè tseegukaga xao kò q'ana ncẽes gúùs ko nxàe sa ne xao ga kò khóè ne ncẽe chìbi úú tama ne, chìbi-chibi naka xgàra tama.
Khóèm dim Cóá ba Sabata dim cáḿ dim X'aiga Me e khama,” tam méé.
Eẽm qgáìm koem kò guu a gane dim còrè-nquum koe síí tcãà.
Gaa x'aè kagam kò nqo̱ara tshàua hãam khóè ba gaa koe hàna. C'ẽe xu khóè xu kò hàna a xu a ko dàòan qaa, Jeso ba xu gha chìbi-chibi di i, khama xu kò tẽè Me, a máá: “A
Me bìrí xu a máá: “Kháé ncẽè gaxao ka c'ẽem kò cúís ghùu sa úúa, si Sabata dim cáḿ ka ha̱ém q'oo koe cg'áéa tcãà ne, a cuiskaga baa qgóó si naka tcg'òó sia hãa tite?
Nta noose ba khóè ba ghùuan koe cgáé baa! Gaa domka i
A ba a nxãaska gaam khóè ba bìrí a máá: “Tchoanà tshàua tsi,” témé. Me khóè ba tchoanà a, i tshàua ba ka̱bise a qãèa xg'ara a c'ẽean khamaga ii.
Igaba xu kò Farasai xu tcg'oa, a xu a kàan qaa, ntama xu gha ma Jeso ba cg'õo di i.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba bóòa q'ãa
A ba a q'ãa-q'ãa ne, táá ne gha c'ẽe ne bìrí, dìí Me e sa ka.
Ncẽes gúù sam kò kúrú, porofitim Isaiam kò kg'uia gúùan gha nxãasega hàà tseegukaguè ka, ncẽem kòo máá:
“Bóò, Ncẽea tirim Qãàm ga Me e,
nxárár tcg'òóa hãa ba,
ncẽer ncàm̀a ba,
ncẽe Gam kar ko qãè-tcao ba.
Tirim Tc'ẽe bar gha Gam koe tòó,
Me gha tchànoan ka
Khóèan cgoam mẽékua hãa tite
kana q'aua hãa tite,
i cúí khóè ga dòm̀a ba
dàòan q'oo koe kóḿa hãa tite.
Na̱iseam tc'áà bam khõá tite,
a ba a x'óó kg'oanam lampi dqùi ba ts'íría hãa tite,
a ba a gha tchànoan tcg'òó tcúúkagu.
Gam dim cg'õèm koe
zi gha
gazi di nqòòan tòó,”
témé ka.
Nxãaska ne kò khóè ne dxãwa tc'ẽean ka tcãàèam khóè ba Gam koe óá, ncẽe kò bóò tama a kg'ui tama ba, Me kò Jeso ba qãèkagu me, me kg'ui a bóò.
Zi kò wèé zi xg'ae zi area, a zi a máá: “A ncẽe ba Dafitem ka Tsgõose-coam gabàa?” témé.

Igaba ẽe xu ko Farasai xu ncẽes gúù sa kóḿ ka xu kò máá: “Ncẽem khóè ba ko Belesebulem ncẽe dxãwa tc'ẽean dim tc'ãà-cookg'aim di qarian cgoa cúí ga dxãwa tc'ẽean xhàiagu!” témé.
Igabam kò Jeso ba gaxu di tc'ẽean q'ana khamam kò bìrí xu a máá: “Wèés x'ais ẽe q'aara hãa sa gha kaà, i gha x'áé-dxooan kana nquuan ẽe q'aa-q'aasea hãa a, táá gaicara hãa.
A ncẽè satanam kò satana ba xhàiagu, nem gaam igaba q'aara. Ntama i gha kháé nxãaska gam di x'aian hãa?

A ncẽè Tíí kòo Belesebulem di qarian cgoa dxãwa tc'ẽean xhàiagu, ne ia ko gaxao di khóèan dìím cgoa xhàiagu u? Gaa domkaga ne gha gaxao di ne khóè ne chìbi-chibi xao o a ẽe xao ko kg'ui sa tseegu tama sa x'áí xao o.
Igaba ncẽè Tíí kò ko dxãwa tc'ẽean Nqarim dim Tc'ẽem cgoa xhàiagu, nes ko nxãa sa Nqarim di x'aia ne gatu koe hààraa sa x'áí.

“Ka ba gha khóè ba ntama ma qarim khóèm dim nquum koe tcãà, a gam di zi gúù zi ts'ãà, kg'aia méém ẽem khóèm qari ba qáéa ntcòo. Nxãaska cúígam gha nquua ba q'oo koe tcãà a gam di zi gúù zi ts'ãà.
“Gaam ẽem Tíí cgoa hãa tama ba q'aumana Tea, me gaam ẽem Tíí cgoa xg'ae-xg'ae tama ba ko tsa̱i-tsa̱i.

Khama Ra ko bìrí tu u a ko máá: Khóè ne gha wèés chìbi sa hẽé naka wèés cg'ãès gúùs Nqarim ka ne ko kg'uis ka hẽéthẽé qgóóa mááè, igaba ne cuiskaga cg'ãès gúùs Tc'ẽem ka ne ko kg'uis ka qgóóa mááè tite.

Me wèém khóèm ẽe ko Khóèm dim Cóám ka cg'ãèse kg'ui ba gha qgóóa mááè, igaba wèém khóèm ẽe gha Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽem ka cg'ãèse kg'ui ba qgóóa mááè tite, ncẽem x'aèm koe igaba kana hààkom x'aèm koe ga igaba,” tam méé.
“Qãès hìi sa tsi kò úúa ne tsi gha qãè tc'áróan hòò, a tshúùs hìi sa úúa ne gha tshúù tc'áróan hòò. Hìi sa ko gas di tc'áróan ka xám̀a q'ãaè khama.
Cg'aoan di tu cóá tuè, ncẽè cg'ãè cau tu kò ii ne tu gha ntama qãè zi gúù zi nxàe? Dùús wèés ẽe tcáós koe cg'oèa hãa sas ko kg'áḿ sa nxàea tcg'òó ka.
Qãèm khóè ba ko gam di qãèan koe guu a qãè zi gúù zi tcg'òó, me ko cg'ãè caum khóè ba gam di cg'ãè cauan koe guu a cg'ãè zi gúù zi tcg'òó.
“Igabar ko bìrí tu u a ko máá: Xgàrakuan dim cáḿ ka ne gha khóè ne cg'ãèm kg'uim wèém ẽe ne kò kg'uia hãam ka xo̱ara mááse.
Tsari kg'uian ka tsi gha tchàno iise bóòè, a tsi a gha tsari kg'uian ka chìbi-chibi a xgàraè khama,” tam méé.
Xu kò nxãaska c'ẽe xu x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu hẽé naka Farasai xu hẽéthẽé xu bìrí Me a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè,
Igabam kò xo̱a xu a máá: “Qhàòs ncẽe cg'ãè cau a cg'árà di sa ko

Eẽm xg'ao ma Jona ma nqoana cáḿan hẽé naka nqoana ntcùúan hẽéthẽé kaiam x'aùm ncãà q'oo koe hãa khamagam gha gataga Khóèm dim Cóá ba nqoana cáḿan hẽé naka nqoana ntcùúan hẽéthẽé nqõóm ka nqãaka hãa.

Xgàrakuan dim cáḿ ka xu gha khóè xu Ninefe di xu tẽe a téé, a gha ncẽes qhàò sa chìbi-chibi. Jonam di xgaa-xgaan koe xu kò guu a gaxu di chìbian koe tcóóse khama. Me ncẽeska Jonam ka kaia ba ncẽe koe hàna.

X'aigas Sheba di sa gha xgàrakuan dim cáḿ ka tẽe a téé, a ncẽes qhàò sa chìbi-chibi, nqõóm chõò-q'oo koes kò guu a ko hàà Solomonem di tc'ẽegan komsana khama. Igaba bóò, Solomonem ka kaia ba ncẽeska ncẽe koe hàna.
“Eẽ i ko dxãwa tc'ẽean khóèm koe tcg'oa, ne i ko c'óòa qgáìan koe qõò, a síí sãa i gha qgáìan qaa, a ncẽè hòò o tama i kò hãa ne
i ko nxãaska bìríse a máá: ‘Tirim nquum ẽer guua hãam koer gha ka̱bise,’ témé, a ẽe i kò hàà nquu ba bóò me káà gúù ii, a xgàia q'ano-q'anoèa, a qãèse kg'ónòèa,

ne i ko nxãaska qõò a síí 7 tc'ẽean séè ncẽe gaan nqáéase cg'ãè tc'ẽe e a hàà cgoa, i hàà tcãà a ia a gaa koe x'ãè. Si ẽem khóèm dis téé-q'oo sa hàà kaisase cg'ãè kg'aiaka dis ka. Ncẽeta ga i gha qhàòs ncẽe cg'ãè caus ka ii,” tam méé.
Eẽm Jeso ba qanega hãa a ko xg'aes cgoa kg'ui, ka ne kò xõò sa hẽé naka qõese ga xu hẽéthẽé ne tchàa za hàà téé, a ko dtcàrà kg'ui cgoa Me ne gha sa.
[C'ẽem khóè ba kò bìrí Me a máá: “Bóò, saò sa hẽé naka Tsáá qõe ga xu hẽéthẽéa tchàa za tẽe, a ko dtcàrà kg'ui cgoa Tsi ne gha sa,” témé.]
Igabam kò xo̱a me a máá: “Dìí sa tiris xõò sa, i dìín Tíí qõea?” témé.
A ba a Gam di ne xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao ne nxáá a máá: “Bóò, ncẽea Tiris xõòs ga si i, a Tíí qõe ga ne ne e.
Wèém khóèm ẽe ko Tirim Xõòm nqarikg'ai koe hànam ko tc'ẽe sa kúrú ba Tíí qõem ga me e, a Tíí qões ga si i, a gataga Tiris xõòs ga si i khama,” témé.
Eẽm cáḿ kagam kò Jeso ba nquum q'oo koe tcg'oa, a ba a síí tshàam-kg'áḿ koe ntcõó.
Káí ne khóè ne kò hàà cgae Me, khamam nxãaska dxòrom q'oo koe tcãà a gaa koe ntcõó, si wèés xg'ae sa tshàam-kg'áḿ koe téé.
Kam ko káí zi gúù zi sere-sere zi cgoa bìrí ne a máá:
“Bóò, c'ẽe x'aè kam kò xhárà-kg'ao ba qõò a síí xhárà.
A ẽem kò xhárà ka i kò c'ẽe cgùrian dàòm qàe koe tcheè, zi tsa̱rá zi hàà tc'õó o.
I c'ẽe cgùrian nxõ̱á-kg'ai di qgáìan koe tcheè, ncẽe káí góḿan kò káà a koe. I kò kúúga qháése tso̱m, góḿa ne kò kaisa tama khama.
Igaba ẽes ko cáḿ sa qaò ka i kò gaa tso̱man dào. A i a kò to̱be ga i kò úú tama khama nqa̱i.
I c'ẽe cgùrian dxàman hàna qgáì koe tcheè, i dxàman kai, a chúú-chuu u.
I c'ẽe cgùrian qãè góḿan koe tcheè, a i a tc'õoan kúrú, i c'ẽean 100 q'oro kúrúse, i c'ẽean 60 q'oro kúrúse, i c'ẽean 30 q'oro kúrúse.
“Eẽ tceean úúa hãa ba méém kóḿ,” tam Jeso ba méé.
Xu kò nxãaska xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hàà, a tẽè Me a máá: “Dùús domka Tsi ko sere-sere zi cgoa kg'ui cgoa ne?” témé.
Me xo̱a xu a máá: “Gaxaoa máàèa, chóm̀sea zi kàa zi nqarikg'ai di x'aian di zi xao gha q'ãa sa, igaba ne gane máàè e tama.
Wèém khóèm ẽe úúa hãa ba gha káían máàè, a ba a gha kaian úú khama. Igaba wèém ẽe gúù úú tama ba, ẽem úúa hãa gúù-coan gam gha séè cgaeè.
Gaa gúù domkagar ko sere-sere zi cgoa kg'ui cgoa ne,
bóòan kaga ne bóò tama,
a ne a kóḿan kaga kóḿ tama,
a kóḿa q'ãa ga hẽé tama khama.
“Gatà iis gúùs ka i kò Isaiam di porofitan gane koe tseegukaguè,
‘Kóḿ tu gha, igaba tu kóḿa q'ãa tite,
a tu a gha bóò, igaba tu bóòa q'ãa tite.
Ncẽe ne khóè ne di tcáóa nea c'óòa hãa,
i ko gane di tceean tshúù-xamse kóḿ,
ne tcgáía ne tcẽekg'ama khama,
nxãasega ne gha táá tcgáía ne cgoa bóò,
a táá tceea ne cgoa kóḿ,
a táá tcáóa ne cgoa kóḿa q'ãa,
a ne a táá Tíí koe ka̱bise,
Ra qãèkagu ne ka,’
ta ko méé e.
Igaba i gaxao di tcgáían ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa, bóò i ko khama, naka tceea xao ga hẽéthẽéa ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa, kóḿ i ko khama.

Tseegukar ko bìrí xao o a ko máá: Káí porofitian hẽé naka tchàno khóèan hẽéthẽéa kò bóò kg'oana, ẽe xao ko gaxao bóò sa, igaba i kò táá bóò si, a kò kóḿ kg'oana ẽe xao ko gaxao kóḿ sa, igaba i kò táá kóḿ si.
“Ke xao nxãaska komsana xhárà-kg'aom dis sere-sere sa.
Gane ẽe x'aian dim kg'ui ba ko kóḿ, igaba kóḿa q'ãa me tama nea dàòm qàe koe xháràèa cgùrian khama ii ne ne e. Gaam cg'ãèm
A ncẽe nxõ̱án hàna qgáì koe xháràèa nea: ẽe kg'ui ba ko kóḿ ne ko kúúga qãè-tcaoan cgoa hààkagu me ne e,
igaba ne káà to̱be ne e, a ko xòm̀ x'aè séè a hãa. A ẽe i ko kg'uim domka xháéa ne kana xgàrakuan hàà nem ko qháésega cg'áé.

Cgùrian ẽe dxàman koe tcheèa nea kg'ui ba kóḿam khóè me e, igaba tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese zi ncẽes kg'õès di zi hẽé, naka qguù sa ncàm̀an hẽéthẽéa kò kg'ui ba xgáè-kg'am, me táá tc'áróan kúrú.

Igaba ẽe qãè góḿan koe xháràèa cgùria nea, kg'ui ba ko kóḿ a kóḿa q'ãa mem ga me e. Tc'áróa nem ko kúrú, 100 q'oro, kana 60 q'oro, kana 30 q'oro ẽe ko xháràèa cgùrian ka,” témé.
Jeso ba ko gaicara c'ẽes sere-sere sa bìrí ne a máá: “Nqarikg'ai di x'aia nea khóèm gam dim xháràm koe qãè cgùrian xháràm khama ii.
Igaba ẽe i wèé khóèan x'óm̀a hãa kam kò gam dim cg'õo-kg'ao ba hàà, a hàà gam di maberean xg'aeku koe tc'ẽese tama tso̱man xhárà, a ba a qõò.
“Eẽ i ko maberean kai, a ko tc'áróan kúrú ka i ko tc'ẽese tama tso̱man qhúí thẽé.

Xu qãà xu xháràm koe ko tséé xu hàà q'õò mea ba bìrí a máá: ‘X'aigaè, a tsarim xháràm koe tsi gáé kò qãè cgùrian xhárà hãa tama? Kháé tc'ẽese tama tso̱ma nea nxãaska nda guua?’ témé.
Me xo̱a xu a máá: ‘Tiri cg'õo-kg'aoa nea ncẽe gúùan kúrúa,’ témé. Xu qãà xu tẽè me a máá: ‘Kháé tsi ko tc'ẽe, síí méé xae tshõé e sa?’ témé.
Me xo̱a a máá: ‘Eẽ-ẽe, tc'ẽese tama tso̱man xao kòo tshõé ne xao gha maberean di to̱bean cgoa xg'ae-xg'ae a q'óè e.

Ke guu u naka i xg'ae naka kai, naka i nxãakg'aiga síí khõá di x'aèan hàà. Eẽ x'aè kar gha khõá-kg'ao xu bìrí a máá: ‘Tc'ẽese tama tso̱man méé xao kg'aia tshõe naka qáé xg'ae, naka i síí dàòè, naka xao nxãaska maberean khõá naka tòóa mááse nquum tirim koe óága,’ témé,’ ” tam Jeso ba méé.
C'ẽes sere-sere sam kò gaicara bìrí ne a máá: “Nqarikg'ai di x'aia nea mosetara

Wèé xu cgùri xu kam cg'áré me e, igaba ẽem kò tso̱m nem wèé hìian xháràm di ka kaiam ga me e, a ba a ko hìi sa kúrú, i gha nqarikg'ai di tsa̱rán hàà gas di nxã̱an koe nquuan kúrú,” témé.

Gatagam kò c'ẽes sere-sere sa bìrí ne a máá: “Nqarikg'ai di x'ai ne péré gãé-gãean khama ii, ncẽes ko dxàes khóè sa séè a káí péréan cgoa xg'ae-xg'ae e, i wèés pérés koe tséé, si gãe,” tam méé.
Jeso ba kò wèé gúùan ncẽe ga sere-serean cgoa xg'ae zi bìrí. Táám kò cúí gúù ga gazi cgoa kg'ui, sere-serean tséékagu tamase.
Ncẽe gúùa nem kò kúrú, porofitim kg'uia gúùan gha hàà nxãasega tseegukaguè ka, ncẽem kòo máá:
“Sere-sere zi cgoar gha kg'áḿa Te xgobekg'am,
a gha nqõóm dis tshoa-tshoas koe guu a
chóm̀sea zi gúù zi bìrí ne,”
témé ka.

Jeso ba kò nxãaska xg'ae zi guu a ba a nquum q'oo koe tcãà. Xu Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hàà cgae Me a máá: “Bìría tchàno-tchano xae e xháràm koe tc'ẽese tama tso̱man dis sere-seres ka,” témé.
Me xo̱a xu a máá: “Gaam ẽem qãè cgùrian xhárà baa Khóèm dim Cóá Me e,
me xhárà ba nqõó me e, i qãè cgùrian khóè ne e
Me cg'õo-kg'aom ẽe xhárà ana ba dxãwa me e, i khõán di x'aèan kurian chõò-q'oo o, xu khõá-kg'ao xu moengele xu u.
Ncẽe ẽe i ko ma tc'ẽese tama tso̱man q'óèa tcg'òóè a ko ma dàòè khamaga i gha kurian chõò-q'oo koe ii:

Khóèm dim Cóá ba gha Gam di xu moengele xu tsééa tcg'òó, xu gha wèé gúùan ẽe ko khóèan chìbian kúrúkaguan hẽé naka cg'ãèan ko kúrú khóèan hẽéthẽé Gam di x'aian koe q'óèa tcg'òó.
A xu a gha c'eean dim ha̱ém q'oo koe xaoa tcãà ne, ncẽe kg'aean hẽé naka gãò xõ̱óan hẽéthẽé gha hàna koe.
Nxãaska ne gha ẽe tchàno ne gane ka Xõòm di x'aian koe cáḿs khama ma x'áà. Gaam ẽe tceean úúa ba méém kóḿ.”

“Nqarikg'ai di x'aia nea qguùs xháràm koe chóm̀mèas khama ii, khóèm ko hòò nem ko gaicara chóm̀ sa, a ba a gam di qãè-tcaoan ka qõò a síí wèéan ẽem úúa ga x'ámágu, a ba a ẽem xhárà ba hàà x'ámá.
“Gataga i gaicara nqarikg'ai di x'aian x'ámá-kg'aom khama ii, ncẽe tca̱àko zi nxõ̱á zi ko qaa ba, ncẽe kaisa marian ko tc'oà zi.
A ẽem kò c'ẽes tca̱àkos nxõ̱ás kaisase káí marian ko tc'óà sa hòò, nem ko qõò a síí wèé gúùan ẽem úúa x'ámágu, a ba a hàà x'ámá si.
“Gaicara i nqarikg'ai di x'aian c'uisís khama ii, ncẽe ko tshàan q'oo koe tcãàè sa, a wèé x'aù qhàòan qgóó.
A ẽe cg'oèas kò hãa ne xu ko x'aù qgóó-kg'ao xu tchàa koe tshàam-kg'áḿ koe tceea úú si, a xu a síí ntcõó a qãè x'aùan sáà tcãà gàba xu koe, a ẽe qãè taman aagu.
Ncẽeta ga i gha hàà ii kurian chõò-q'oo koe. Moengele xu gha hàà a ẽe tchàno tama ne ẽe tchàno ne xg'aeku koe tcg'òó.
A xu a gha c'eean dim ha̱ém q'oo koe xaoa tcãà ne, ncẽe kg'aean hẽé naka gãò xõ̱óan hẽéthẽé gha hàna koe,” tam méé.
Me Jeso tẽè xu a máá: “Ncãa xao wèé gúùan ncẽe kóḿa q'ãa?” témé. Xu xo̱a Me a máá: “Eè” témé.

Me bìrí xu a máá: “Gaa domkam wèém x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao ba, ncẽe nqarikg'aian di x'aian ka qãèse xgaa-xgaaèa ba, nquum ka q'õòsem khama ii, ncẽe ko gam di zi qguù zi ka̱ba zi hẽé naka ncìí zi hẽéthẽé gam dim nquum tòóa mááse dim koe tcg'òó,
Eẽm ko Jeso ba ncẽe zi sere-sere zi cgoa xg'ara, kam kò gaam qgáì ba tcg'oara guu.

Gam dim x'áé-dxoom koem ko hàà kam ko tshoa-tshoa a gane dim còrè-nquum koe khóè ne xgaa-xgaa, ne khóè ne kaisase are a máá: “Ncẽem khóè ba ncẽe tc'ẽean hẽé naka are-aresa zi qari zi hẽéthẽé nda hòòa?
A ncẽe ba gáé hìi xom-kg'aom dim cóám tama baa? A gam ka xõòs di cg'õèa ne gáé Maria tama? A gataga gaam ka qõesea xu gáé Jakoboa xu, Josefaa xu, Simonea xu, Jutasea xu tama xua?
A gam ka qõese ga zi wèé zia gáé gatá cgoa hãa tama? Kháé ba nxãaska ncẽem khóè ba ncẽe zi gúù zi wèé zi nda séèa?” ta ne ma tẽè.
Ne bóòa xguì Me.
Igabam kò Jeso ba bìrí ne a máá: “Porofiti ba wèé za ga tcommèam khóè me e, gam dim x'áé-dxoom koe hẽé naka gam di x'áéan koe hẽéthẽé cúí oose,” témé.
A ba a kò gaa koe táá káí zi are-aresa zi tséé zi kúrú, gane di dtcòm̀an úú tama domka.
Eẽm x'aèm kam kò x'aigam Galilea dim Herote ba Jesom ka kóḿ.
A ba a gam di ne qãà ne bìrí a máá: “Ncẽe ba Johanem tcguù-tcguu-kg'ao me e. X'ooan koem tẽea! Gaa domka i ko ncẽe qarian are-aresa zi tséé zi di gam koe kúrúse,” témé.
Herote ba kò Johane ba qgóó a qáé, a qáé-nquus koe tcãà mea khama, Herotiases gam ka káíkhoem Filipim dis khóès domka.
Johane ba kò bìrí mea a máá: “X'áèan koe tsi kgoara mááè tama, séè si tsi ga kò hãa sa,” tam mééa khama.
kò Herote ba cg'õo me kg'oana hãa, igabam kò khóè ne q'áò, Johane ba ne kòo porofitim iise séè khama.
Igaba Herotem di ábà x'aèan di cáḿan kas kò Herotiases ka cóáse sa ntcãà máá ne, a sa a Herote ba kaisase qãè-tcaokagu.
Me gaìses cgoa nqòòkagu si, dùús wèés ẽes ko dtcàrà sam gha máà si sa.
Xõòs kas kò qg'áìèa xg'ara khamas kò máá: “Johanem tcguù-tcguu-kg'aom dis tcúú sa gàbas q'oo koe máà te,” témé.
Me x'aiga ba kaisase tshúù-tcao, igabam kò gaìsean ẽem kò kúrúa hãa hẽé naka cg'áè-khoe ne hẽéthẽé domka x'áè sa tcg'òó, máàè sis gha sa.
A ba a
Si kò gam dis tcúú sa gàbas koe óáè a hàà dxàe-coa sa máàè, si kò séè a xõòs koe úú si.
Xu gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hàà a hàà tc'áróa ba séè a síí kg'ónò. A xu a qõò a síí Jeso ba bìrí i.

Eẽm ko Jeso ba ncẽe sa kóḿ kam kò dxòrom cgoa tcg'oa a nqoo-nqoosam qgáìm koe qõò a síí cúíse hãa. Igaba ẽes ko xg'ae sa ncẽes gúù sa kóḿ ka ne ko x'áé-dxoo xu koe guu a nqàrè cgoa xùri Me.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba tcg'oa kam kò kaias xg'ae sa bóò si ko xùri Me, Me thõò-xama máá ne a ba a gane di tcìì-khoean kg'õèkagu.

Dqòara i ko qõò ka xu kò xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hàà cgae Me a máá: “Ncẽe ba cúía hãam qgáì me e, i ncãa gataga dqòa, ke khóè ne qõòa q'aakagu naka ne x'áéa ne koe dìbi, naka síí tc'õoan x'ámá mááse,” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Qaase tama ia qõò ne gha sa, gaxao c'ẽe gúùan máà ne naka ne tc'õó,” témé.
Xu bìrí Me a máá: “5 xu péré xu cúí xu xae úúa, naka cám̀ x'aù tsara hẽéthẽé e,” témé.
Me máá: “Ncẽe koe óága a, Tíí koe,” témé.

A ba a khóè ne bìrí ne dcãan-kg'ai koe ntcõó, Me 5 xu péré xu hẽé, naka cám̀ x'aù tsara hẽéthẽé séè, a nqarikg'ai koe ghùi-kg'ai, a ts'ee-ts'eekg'ai i, a péréan khõá q'aa. A ba a xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu máà, xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu khóè ne máà a.
Ne kò wèéa ne ga tc'õó a ne a xg'ãà, xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ẽe ncãa tc'õóa qaùèan ka 12 xu q'ore xu tcãà, xu cg'oè.
Eẽ kò tc'õóa hãa xu di xg'ae-q'ooa ne kò 5,000 khama noo xu khóè xu u, khóè zi hẽé naka cóán hẽéthẽé ko nxárá tcãàè tama ne.
Me nxãaska Jeso ba qháése xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu chùi, xu dxòrom q'oo koe tcãà, a c'ẽem xòèm
Eẽm ko xg'ae zi qõòa q'aakagua xg'ara kam kò cúíse xàbìm koe q'ábà qaò, síím gha còrè ka. Eẽ i ko dqòa kam kò gaa koe cúíse hãa.
Igabam kò dxòro ba tshàan nqáè koe hãa, nqõóm ka nqúù ka, a ko tshàan di qhonèan ka ntcãa-ntcãaè, tc'ãá ba xu kò q'óá-kg'ama khama.
Me Jeso ba q'uu-kg'ai-q'oo ka hàà cgae xu, tshàam tc'amkg'ai koe náà qõò a.
Igaba ẽe xu ko xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu bóò Mem ko tshàam tc'amkg'ai koe náà qõò ka xu kò kaisase q'ae, a máá: “Dca̱usoma me e!” témé, a xu a q'áòan ka q'au.
Igabam kò Jeso ba qháése kg'ui cgoa xu a máá: “Tíí Ra a ke xao tòón tcáó! Táá q'áò guu,” témé.
Me Petere xo̱a Me a máá: “X'aiga Tsi Nqari Tseè, Tsáá ga Tsi kò ii ne, bìrí te nakar tshàam tc'amkg'ai koe síí cgae Tsi,” témé.
Me máá: “Hàà,” témé. Me kò nxãaska Petere ba dxòrom koe xõa, a ba a tshàam tc'amkg'ai koe qõò a Jesom koe síí.
Igaba ẽem ko tc'ãá ba bóò kam kò q'áò, a ba a tshoa-tshoa a tshàan ka tóm̀mè, kam ko q'au a máá: “X'aigaè, hùi te,” témé.
Me Jeso ba tshàua ba qháése tchoanà a qgóó me, a bìrí me a máá: “Tsáá ncẽe cg'áré dtcòm̀an di tsi, dùús domka tsi kò káíse tc'ẽe-tc'ẽesea máá?” témé.
Eẽ tsara ko dxòrom koe q'ábà kam kò gam tc'ãá ba téé.
Xu nxãaska ẽe kò dxòrom koe hàna xu dqo̱m̀ Me a máá: “Tseeguan kaga Tsi Nqarim di Tsi Cóá Tsi i,” témé.
Eẽ xu ko tshàa ba tchoaba ka xu kò Genesarete dim nqõóm koe hàà.
Eẽm nqõóm di xu khóè xu ko Jeso ba bóòa q'ãa ka ne kò kg'uian tsééa úú gaam nqõó ba nxa̱ma-nxa̱ma hãa xu nqõó xu koe, ne wèé ne khóè ne gane di tcìì-khoean Gam koe óága,
a ne a dtcàrà Me, kg'amaga ne gha Gam dim qgáím xgáḿ-kg'am qgóó sa. Ne kò wèéa ne ẽe ko qgóó Me ne kg'õèkaguè.
Xu nxãaska Farasai xu hẽé naka x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé Jerusalema koe guu a Jeso ba hàà cgae, a hàà tẽè Me a máá:
“Dùús domka xu ko Tsari xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ncìí kuri di cauan kaia ne khóè ne di ntcoea máá? Eẽ xu ko tc'õós cookg'ai koe xu xg'aà tshàu tama ka,” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Dùús domka xao ko gaxao igaba gaxao di cauan tc'ãà-tc'ãa a Nqarim di x'áèan ntcoea máá?
Nqari ba ko máá: ‘Tcom méé tsi saò ba hẽé naka saò sa hẽéthẽé e,’ a ko gataga máá: ‘Wèém ẽe ko xõòm ka kana xõòs ka cg'ãèse kg'ui ba gha cg'õoè,’ témé.
Igaba xao ko gaxao máá: ‘Khóèm kò ko xõò ba kana xõò sa bìrí a máá: ‘Eẽr ga ko hùi cgoa tsia sa, nxãa sa
ne i qaase tama xõò bam gha tcom sa,’ ta xao mééa, a xao a ncẽem dàòm ka gaxao di cauan cgoa Nqarim dim kg'ui ba káà-hùikagua hãa.
Gaxao qãè khóèan khama ko ma kúrúse xaoè, tseegusem kò ko Isaia porofita gaxao ka, ncẽem kò ko
‘Ncẽe ne khóè ne ko kg'áḿa ne cgoa tcom Te,
igabaga i gane di tcáóan Tíí koe nqúù u,
a ne a ko káà hùise dqo̱m̀ Te.
Gane di zi xgaa-xgaa zia
x'áè-kg'áḿ zi khóè ne di zi i khama,’
témé ka,” tam Jeso ba méé.
A ba a khóè ne Gam koe tciia óá a bìrí ne a máá: “Komsana naka tua kóḿa q'ãa.
Eẽ ko kg'áḿs koe tcãà sa khóè ba cg'uri-cg'uri tama, igaba ẽe ko khóèm kg'áḿ koe tcg'oa sa ko khóè ba cg'uri-cg'uris ga si i,” témé.
Xu nxãaska xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hàà cgae Me a bìrí Me a máá: “A q'ana Tsia, Farasai xua kò xg'aìa hãa sa, ncẽes gúù sa xu kò kóḿ ka?” témé.
Me xo̱a xu a máá: “Wèém hìim Tirim Xõòm nqarikg'ai dim xhárà tama ba gha q'óèa tcg'òóè to̱bea ba cgoa.

Guu xu! Káà-tcgáí xu tcéè-tcuì-kg'ao xu u, káà-tcgáí ne khóè ne di xu ke. Káà-tcgáím khóèm kò c'ẽem khóèm káà-tcgáí ba tcéè-tcuì ne tsara gha wèéa tsara ga ha̱ém q'oo koe cg'áéa tcãà,” tam méé.
Me Petere xo̱a Me a máá: “Ncẽes sere-seres ka bìría tchàno-tchano xae e,” témé.
A ba a máá: “Qanega xao gáé kóḿa q'ãa tama?
Bóò tama xao gáé hãa, dùús wèés ẽe ko kg'áḿs koe tcãà sa ko ncãàs koe qõò, a sa a síí tc'áróm koe tcg'oa sa?
Igaba ẽe kg'áḿs koe guu a tcg'oara hãa sa tcáós koe guua, si ko nxãa sa khóè ba cg'uri-cg'uri.
Tcáós koe i ko cg'ãè tc'ẽean guu a tcg'oa khama, cg'õokuan hẽé, cg'áràn hẽé, xóé cgoakuan hẽé, ts'ãàn hẽé, tshúù-ntcõakagukuan hẽé, naka cóèkuan hẽéthẽé e.
Ncẽea gazi gúù zi khóè ba ko cg'uri-cg'uri zi zi i, igaba cg'uriga tshàuan cgoa tc'õó sa khóè ba cg'uri-cg'uri tama,” tam méé.
Eẽm qgáìm koem ko Jeso ba guu kam kò Ture hẽé naka Sitone hẽéthẽé dim nqõóm koe qõò.

Kas kò gaa x'aè kaga Kanana dis khóès gaam xg'aekum di sa hàà cgae Me, a sa a q'au a máá: “X'aiga Tsi Nqari Tseè, Dafitem ka tsgõose-coa Tseè, thõò-xama máá te, tiris cóá sa ko kaisase dxãwa tc'ẽean ka xgáèè ke,” témé.
Me Jeso ba táá c'ẽem kg'uim ga ba xo̱a si. Xu Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hàà dtcàrà Me, a máá: “Bìrí si nakas qõò, q'auas ko xùri xae e ke,” témé.
Me xo̱a a máá: “Iseraele di ne khóè ne ncẽe ho̱àra ghùuan khama ii ne koe cúíga Ra tsééa óáèa hãa,” témé.
Si khóè sa hàà, a cookg'aia ba koe qúrùa sa cgoa qo̱m̀ a máá: “X'aigaè, hùi te,” témé.
Me xo̱a si a máá: “Qãè tama ia cóán di péréan gha séè a ha̱ghuan xaoa mááè sa,” témé.
Si máá: “Eè X'aigaè, igaba i ko ha̱ghuan igaba qàmà-coa zi péréan di zi q'õòsean di tafolean koe ko guu a tcheè zi tc'õó na,” témé.
Me nxãaska Jeso ba xo̱a si a máá: “Khóè seè, kaisa dtcòm̀an si úúa! Eẽ si ko ma tc'ẽe khamaga ma méé i kúrúse,” témé. Si kò gas dis cóá sa gaam x'aèm ẽem kaga qãè.
Me Jeso ba ẽe koe guu a Galilea dim tshàam qàe koe síí, a ba a xàbì ba q'ábà qaò a síí ntcõó gaa koe.
