Gataga zi kò káí zi khóè zi ẽe koe hàna, a nqúù ka téé a ko bóò. Ncẽe kò Galilea koe guu a Jeso ba còò a hààraa zi, hàà zi gha hùi Me ka.
Gazi xg'aeku koes kò Maria Magatalena sa hãa, naka Jakoboa tsara Josefaa tsara ka xõòs Maria sa hẽé, naka Sebetem ka cóásea tsara ka xõò sa hẽéthẽé e.
Eẽ i ko dqòa kam kò qguùam khóèm Arimatea di ba hàà. Cg'õèa ba kò Josefa a, me kò Jesom dim xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao me e.
Pilatom koem kò síí, a síí Jesom dim tc'áró ba dtcàrà, me Pilato x'áèan tcg'òó máàè mem gha di i.
Me Josefa ba tc'áró ba séè, a q'úúm qgáím q'anom cgoa tcáḿ Me.
A ba a Gam dis tc'ám̀s ka̱bas koe tcãà Me, ncẽe nxõ̱ám koem kò tshàoa sa. A ba a kaiam nxõ̱á ba tc'ám̀s-kg'áḿ koe ghànèa úú, a qõò.
Sara kò Maria Magatalena sa hẽé naka Marias c'ẽe sa hẽéthẽé sara tc'ám̀ sa q'óá-kg'amase ntcõóa-ntcõe.
Xùrikom cáḿ ka,
a xu a máá: “Kaia tseè, ncẽem kàa-kg'aom kò qanega kg'õèa hãa kam kò ko méé sa xae ko tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese, ncẽem kòo máá: ‘Nqoana dim cáḿ kar gha x'ooan koe tẽe,’ témé sa,

ke x'áèan tcg'òó nakas tc'ám̀ sa qarika kòreè nakam nxãakg'aiga síí nqoana dim cáḿ ba tcãà, naka xu nxãasega Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu táá síí Gam dim tc'áró ba ts'ãà guu, naka xua khóè ne bìrí naka máá: ‘X'ooan koem tẽea,’ témé guu. Ncẽes tshúù-ntcõas kháóka ka di sa gha tc'ãà dis ka kaisase cg'ãè sa ii ke,” ta xu méé.
Me Pilato xo̱a xu a máá: “Kòre-kg'aoan xao gha úúa, ke qõò naka síí tc'ám̀ sa kòre ẽe xao ma q'ana khama ma,” témé.
Xu qõò, a síí tc'ám̀ sa kòre, a tc'àmà-tcẽekg'am si, a xu a gaa koe kòre-kg'aoan tòó.
Sabata dim cáḿ qãá q'oo koe, tc'ãà dim cáḿ di ntcùúkg'ai cgoa kas kò Maria Magatalena sa hẽé naka c'ẽes Maria sa hẽéthẽé sara qõò a síí ko tc'ám̀ sa bóò.
Kas kò kúúga kaias cgùrus nqõóm di sa kúrúse, Nqarim dim moengele ba kò nqarikg'ai koe guu a ko xõa khama, a
Gam di bóòse-q'ooa ne kò túú-tebem dian khama ii, i kò gam di qgáían tsõ̱àn khama ma
Xu kò kòre-kg'ao xu káíse q'áò me, a cgùru, a xu a x'óóa khóèan khama ma xgàruku.
Igabam kò moengele ba khóè sara bìrí a máá: “Táá sao q'áò guu, Jesom ncẽe kò xgàuèa hãa ba sao ko qaa sar q'ana ke.
Ncẽe koem káà Me e, ghùièam hãa, ẽem kò mééa khama. Ke sao hàà naka xòóèam kò hãa qgáìan bóò.

Naka saoa ncẽeska qháése qõò naka síí Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu bìrí, x'ooan koem ghùièa hãa sa, a ncẽeska gaxao ka tc'ãà a ko Galilea koe qõò. Gaa koe xao gha sao-xg'ae Me, témé. Bóò, táá sao c'urù guu bìrí saoar hãa sa,” tam méé.
Sara kò q'áòan hẽé naka kaisa qãè-tcaoan hẽéthẽé cgoa tc'ám̀s koe guu a qháése tcg'oa, a qàrò a síí Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu bìrí.
Me Jeso ba gaa x'aè kaga xg'ae cgoa sara a, a máá: “Tsgám̀ saoò!” témé. Sara hàà cgae Me, a nqàrèa ba qgóó, a sara a dqo̱m̀ Me.
Me nxãaska Jeso ba máá: “Táá q'áò guu, qõò naka síí Tíí qõe ga xu bìrí naka xu Galilea koe qõò, gaa koe xu gha sao-xg'ae Te ke,” témé.

Eẽ sara khóè sara dàò q'oo koe hãa ka xu kò gaa x'aè kaga kòre-kg'ao xu ka c'ẽea xu x'áé-dxoom koe síí, a xu a síí wèé zi gúù zi ẽe kò kúrúsea hãa zi kaia xu peresiti xu koe xàà.
Xu kò kaia xu peresiti xu
a bìrí xu a máá: “ ‘Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ncãa ntcùú ka hàà, a hàà ts'ãà Me, ẽe xae ncãa x'óm̀a hãa ka,’ ta méé xao méé.
Ncẽes xààs kò ko tc'ãà-cookg'aim ka kóḿè ne xae gha bìría tchàno-tchano me, a xae a gha qóḿan koe tcg'òó xao o ke,” ta xu méé.
Xu ncõo-kg'ao xu marian séè a xu a ẽe xu kò ma x'áèèa khama ma kúrú. Si kò ncẽes tchõà sa Juta ne koe tsa̱i-tsa̱iè, ncẽes noosega.
Xu 11 xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu Galilea koe síí, ẽem kò Jeso ba bìrí xuam xàbìm koe.
Eẽ xu ko bóò Me ka xu kò dqo̱m̀ Me, igaba xu kò c'ẽe-kg'áía xu káíse tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese.
Me Jeso ba hàà cgae xu a bìrí xu a máá: “Wèé qaria ner nqarikg'ai koe hẽé naka nqõómkg'ai koe hẽéthẽé máàèa hãa,
ke xao qõò naka síí

naka xgaa-xgaa ne naka ne wèé zi gúù zi ẽer x'áè xaoa hãa zi qgóóa qari. Q'ãa méé xao: Tíí ra gha wèé cáḿan ka gaxao cgoa hãa, i gha nxãakg'aiga síí kurian di chõò-q'oo tcãà sa ke,” tam méé.
Jeso Krestem di qãè tchõàn dis tshoa-tshoase sa, Nqarim dim Cóá ba.
Ncẽe i ma porofitim Isaiam
“Bóò, Tirim tchõà xàà-kg'ao bar gha
Tsáá cookg'ai koe tsééa úú,
ncẽe gha síí Tsarim dàò ba kg'ónòa máá Tsi ba.
Tchàa-xgóós koe ko q'au a ko máá:
‘X'aigam
naka Gam di dàòan tchàno-tchanoa máá Me,’
témém dòm̀ ba.”

Me ko nxãaska Johanem tcguù-tcguu-kg'ao ba tchàa-xgóós koe hàà, a khóè ne tcguù-tcguu, a ba a chìbia ne koe ne gha tcóóse a tcguù-tcguuès ka xgaa-xgaa ne, nxãasega ne gha gane di chìbian qgóóa mááè ka.
Me kò wèém nqõóm Jutea di ba hẽé, naka wèé ne khóè ne Jerusalema di ne hẽéthẽé síí cgae me, a ne a gane di chìbian nxàe, a Jorotane dim tshàam koe tcguù-tcguuè.
Johane ba kò nqabè c'õò cgoa kúrúèa qgáían ha̱na, a khòo dim bàne ba kháóa ba koe qáéa, a kòo tcòm̀an hẽé naka qãáka di dènean hẽéthẽé tc'õó.
A ba a ko
Tshàan cgoar tcguù-tcguu tua hãa, igabam gha Gabá Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽem cgoa tcguù-tcguu tu u,” tam méé.
Eẽ xu cáḿ xu kam kò Jeso ba Galilea di Nasareta koe guu, a ba a kò Jorotane dim tshàam koe hàà Johanem ka tcguù-tcguuè.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba tshàan q'oo koe tcg'oa kam ko nqarikg'aian bóò i xgobekg'amse, Me Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽe ba tcíbís khama ii a ko xõa cgae Me.
Me kò dòm̀ ba nqarikg'ai koe guu a máá: “Tsáá Tsia Tiri Tsi Cóá Tsi ncàm̀a Raa Tsi i, Tsáá koe Ra ko qãè-tcao,” témé.
Tc'ẽe ba kò kúúga séè a qãáka úú Me.
Me kò 40 cáḿan qãáka hãa, a ko satanam ka kúrúa bóòè. A ba a kò gataga qãáka di kg'oo-coan cgoa hãa, i kò moengelean hàà hùi Me.
Eẽm ko Johane ba qáé-nquus koe tcãàèa xg'ara kam kò Jeso ba Galilea koe síí, a Nqarim di qãè tchõàn síí xgaa-xgaa,
a máá: “X'aè ba hààraa, i Nqarim di x'aian cúù u, ke tu gatu di chìbian koe tcóóse naka qãè tchõàn koe dtcòm̀,” témé.

Eẽm kòo Jeso ba Galilea dim tshàam qàe koe nqáé, kam ko Simone ba hẽé naka Simonem ka qõesem Anterea ba hẽéthẽé tsara bóò, tsara ko c'uisí sa tshàan q'oo koe xaoa tcãà; x'aù qgóó-kg'ao tsara a kò ii khama.
Me Jeso ba bìrí tsara a a máá: “Xùri Te tsao, kúrú tsao or gha tsao khóè ne qgóó-kg'ao tsao ii ke,” témé.
Tsara kúúga gatsara di c'uisían guu a xùri Me.
Eẽm ko cg'árése còoka qõò kam ko Sebetem ka cóásem Jakobo ba hẽé naka qõesem Johane ba hẽéthẽé tsara bóò, tsara dxòrom q'oo koe hãa a ko gatsara di c'uisían kg'ónò.
Me kò kúúga tcii tsara a, tsara kò gatsara ka xõòm Sebete ba hẽé naka gam koe ko tséé xu khóè xu hẽéthẽé dxòrom q'oo koe qaù, a xùri Me.
Xu kò Kaperenaume koe síí. Me kò kúúga Sabata dim cáḿ ka Jeso ba còrè-nquum koe tcãà, a xgaa-xgaa.
Ne kò Gam di xgaa-xgaa-q'ooan ka area hãa. Qarian úúam khóèm khamam kòo ma xgaa-xgaa ne khama, gane di xu x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu khama tamase.
Gaam x'aèm ẽem kam kò gane dim còrè-nquum q'oo koe c'ẽem khóè ba hãa, cg'ãè tc'ẽean kò úúa ba, me kò q'au a máá:
“Jeso Tsi Nasareta di Tseè, dùú sa Tsi ko gatá cgoa tc'ẽe? Hàà Tsi ko kaàkagu ta a? Q'ana raa dìí Tsi i sa - Nqarim di Tsi Tcom-tcomsa Tsi i,” témé.
Igabam kò Jeso ba
I kò cg'ãè tc'ẽean khóè ba qarika ntcãa-ntcãa, a kaisam q'aum cgoa tcg'oa cgae me.
Ne kò wèé ne khóè ne area hãa, a ne a kò tẽèku a máá: “Dùútsa gúù saa ncẽe sa? Ka̱bas xgaa-xgaa saa - qarian úúa hãasem ko cg'ãè tc'ẽean ga dqàè i komsana Me ka!” témé.
I kò kúúga nxàea ba wèém xg'aekum Galilea dim koe qháésega tsa̱i-tsa̱ise.
Eẽm ko còrè-nquum koe tcg'oa kam kò Simonea tsara Anterea tsara x'áé koe síí tcãà, Jakoboa tsara Johanea tsara cgoa.
Si kò Simonem ka c'uìse sa cgùrukagu si kos tcììs ka qgóóèa, xu kò Jeso ba gaa x'aè kaga gas ka bìrí.
Me kò hàà, a hàà tshàua sa koe séè a ghùi si. Si tcìì sa guu si, si tshoa-tshoa a tsééa máá ne.
Eẽm dqòam ka, cáḿs ko tcãà ka ne kò wèé khóèan tsàako Gam koe óá, dxãwa tc'ẽean úúa hãan ga hẽéthẽé e.
Ne kò wèém x'áé-dxoom di ne khóè ne nquu-kg'áḿ koe xg'aea hãa.
Me kò
Kaisa ntcùúkg'ai cgoa, qanega i ntcùú u kam kò Jeso ba tẽe a c'ẽem qgáìm nqooa hãam koe qõò, a ba a síí gaa koe còrè.
Xu kò Simone ba hẽé naka gam cgoa kò hãa xu khóè xu hẽéthẽé xùri Me.
A xu a ẽe xu ko hòò Me ka bìrí Me a máá: “Wèém khóè ba ko qaa Tsi,” témé.
Me bìrí xu a máá: “Hààn xae cúùse hãa xu x'áé-coa xu koe qõò, nakar gha nxãasega gaa koe thẽé síí xgaa-xgaa; gaan domkagar hààraa hãa ke,” témé.
Me kò wèém Galileam koe qõòa te, a gane di xu còrè-nquu xu koe Nqarim di kg'uian xgaa-xgaa, a dxãwa tc'ẽean xhàiagu.
Me kò lepero dis tcìì sa tsàaram khóè ba hàà cgae Me, a hàà qgom-tsi-quri a còrè Me a máá: “Tc'ẽe Tsi kòo ne, Tsi ga kúrú ter q'ano,” témé.
Me kò Jeso ba thõò-xama máá me, a tchoanà tshàu a qgóó me, a bìrí me a máá: “Gatàr ko ma tc'ẽe, ke q'ano,” témé.
Kas kò tcììs lepero di sa kúúga kaà cgae me, me q'ano.
Me kò Jeso ba qarika x'áè me, a ba a tcg'òó mem qõò,

a bìrí me a máá: “Q'ãa, naka táá cúí khóè ga c'ẽe gúù ga bìrí guu! Igaba méé tsi qõò naka síí peresitim koe x'áíse, naka tsia tsari q'ano-q'anosean domka síí dàòa-mááku zi tcg'òó, ncẽem kò Moshe x'áèa hãa zi, x'áís iise khóè ne koe,” témé.

Igabam kò gaam khóè ba tcg'oa a qõòa te a ba a tshoa-tshoa a wèé za ga nxàe e. Me kò gaas gúùs domka Jeso ba tààè, x'áéan q'oo koem gha kgoarasea hãase qõòa tean ka, igabagam ko nqoo-nqoosa zi qgáì zi koe hãa. Ne kòo khóè ne
Cg'orò xu cáḿ xu qãá q'oo koem kò Jeso ba gaicara Kaperenaume koe síí, ne kò khóè ne x'áé koem hàna hãa sa kóḿ.
Ka ne kò káí ne khóè ne gaa koe xg'aea, i kò kòm̀ ga káà a, nquu-kg'áḿ koe ga igaba, Me kò
Ka xu kò 4 xu khóè xu hàà, khóèm nqo̱ara kò hãa ba ko qgóóa mááku a óágara xu.

Eẽ xu ko Gam koe úúa ba ka tààè, khóè ne di káí-q'ooan ka, ka xu kò nxãaska ẽem kò Jeso ba hànam qgáìm di tchànoan cgoa nquum tco̱be chúrù, a xu a ẽem khóèm nqo̱ara kò hãam kò xòóèam tcoà ba qám̀.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba gaxu di dtcòm̀an bóò kam kò nqo̱ara hãam khóè ba bìrí a máá: “Tiri cóáè, chìbia tsi tsi qgóó mááèa,” témé.
Xu kò x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu gaa koe ntcõóa-ntcõe, a ko tcáóa xu q'oo koe tc'ẽe a ko máá:
“Dùúska ba koáé ncẽem khóè ba ncẽeta mééa máá?
Me kò Jeso ba qháése gatà xu ma tcáóa xu koe tc'ẽea hãa sa bóò, a ba a tẽè xu a máá: “Dùús domka xao ko ẽe zi gúù zi tcáóa xao q'oo koe tc'ẽea máá?
Ndaka nea thamkaà? Khóèm nqo̱ara hãa ba bìrí a máá: ‘Chìbia tsi tsi qgóó mááèa,’ témé, kana máá: ‘Tẽe naka tsarim tcoà ba séè naka tsia qõò,’ témé saa?

Igabar gha x'áí xao o, xao gha nxãasega q'ãa, Khóèm dim Cóá ba nqõókg'ai koe qarian úúa hãa sa, khóèa nem gha chìbian qgóóa máá di i,” témé. A ba a nqo̱ara hãam khóè ba bìrí a máá:
“Bìrí tsir ko a ko máá: tẽe naka tsarim tcoà ba séè naka x'áéa tsi koe dìbi,” témé.
Me
Me Jeso ba gaicara tshàam qàe koe síí, ne kò káí ne khóè ne hàà cgae Me, Me tshoa-tshoa a xgaa-xgaa ne.
Eẽm ko gaa koe guu kam kò Lefi ba bóò, Alefaiom dim cóá ba, me marian ko séèa xg'ae-xg'aeèm nquum koe ntcõóa-ntcõe. Me bìrí me a máá: “Xùri Te,” témé. Me tẽe a xùri Me.

Eẽm Jeso ba hãa a ko Lefim dim nquum koe tc'õó, ka i kò káí mari xg'ae-xg'ae-kg'aoan hẽé naka chìbi-kg'aoan hẽéthẽé tc'õó cgoa Me, Gabá hẽé naka Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé cgoa; káí ne khóè nea kòo xùri Me khama.

Eẽ xu kò x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu Farasai di xu bóò Me mari xg'ae-xg'ae-kg'ao xu hẽé naka chìbi-kg'aoan hẽéthẽé cgoa ko tc'õó, ka xu kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu tẽè a máá: “Dùús domka ba ko mari xg'ae-xg'ae-kg'aoan hẽé naka chìbi-kg'aoan hẽéthẽé cgoa tc'õóa máá?” témé.

Eẽm ko Jeso ba ncẽe sa kóḿ kam kò máá: “Eẽ tsàa tama ne khóè nea naakan qaa tama, igaba ẽe ko tsàa ne ko qaa a. Tchàno ne khóè ner gha hàà tcii kar hàà tama, igabar hààraa, hààr gha chìbi-kg'ao ne tcii ka,” témé.

Nxãaska xu kò Johanem di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hẽé naka Farasai xu di xu hẽéthẽé tc'õoan carase. Ne kò c'ẽe ne khóè ne Jeso ba síí cgae a tẽè Me a máá: “Dùús domka xu ko Johanem di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hẽé naka Farasai xu di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé tc'õoan carasea máá, igaba xu Tsari xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu tc'õoan carase tama?” témé.

Me Jeso ba xo̱a ne a máá: “Séè-kg'aom kò gam di ne cg'áè-kg'ao ne cgoa hãa ne nea gha ntama tc'õoan carase? Eẽm séè-kg'aom ko qanega gane cgoa hãa x'aè ka ne cuiskaga tc'õoan carasea hãa tite.
Igabam gha x'aè ba hàà, ẽem gha ko séè-kg'ao ba gane koe séèa tcg'òóè ba; gaam cáḿ ka ne gha nxãaska tc'õoan carase.
“Cúí khóè ga káà a, ka̱bam qgáí ba gha ncìím cgoa nqàba a; gatà i kòo hẽé nem gha ka̱bam qgáí ba ncìím koe tòàra tcg'oa, si gha tòà sa càùse.

Gataga i khóèan káà a, ka̱ba gõéan gha ncìí zi khòo dtcòbè zi koe qg'oe e. A ncẽè gatà i kòo hẽé ne i gha gõéan dtcòbè zi tòà, i gha gõéan ntcã̱a, zi dtcòbè zi tòàra q'aase. Igaba méé i ka̱ba gõéan ka̱ba zi khòo dtcòbè zi koe qg'oeè,” tam méé.
C'ẽem cáḿ Sabata dim kam kò Jeso ba ko mabere di xu xhárà xu xg'aeku koe qõò, xu Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu tshoa-tshoa a ko maberean di tcúúan tcuù.
Xu Farasai xu bìrí Me a máá: “Bóò, dùúska xu ko Sabata dim cáḿ ka x'áèan koe kgoara mááè tama sa kúrúa máá?” témé.

Me bìrí xu a máá: “Qanega xao gáé nxárá ta ga hãa Dafitem xg'ao kúrús ka? Eẽ xu kò gabá hẽé naka gam ka c'ẽea xu hẽéthẽé xàbà hãa a kòo c'ẽe gúùan tcào ka xu kò kúrú sa.

Nqarim dim nquum koem kò ma tcãà sa, Abitarem kò kaiam peresiti ba ii x'aè ka, a ba a gam ka c'ẽea xu cgoa ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa péréan tc'õó, ncẽe peresiti xu ka cúí ko tc'õóè e, ncẽe gabá hẽé naka ẽe hãa cgoa mea xu hẽéthẽé kò tc'õóan gaan di kgoara mááè tama a,” témé.
A bìrí xu a máá: “Sabata dim cáḿ ba khóèan kúrúa máàèa, i khóèan Sabata dim cáḿ ba kúrú máàè tama.
Khamam Khóèm dim Cóá ba Sabata dim cáḿ koe ga igaba X'aiga Me e,” témé.
Me kò gaicara còrè-nquum koe síí tcãà. Me kò nqo̱ara tshàua hãam khóè ba gaa koe hãa.
Xu kò Farasai xu xaèa kg'ónò Me, a bóò Sabata dim cáḿ kam gha gaam khóèm ẽe nqo̱ara tshàua hãa ba qãèkagu sa, nxãasega xu gha chìbi-chibi Me ka.
Me kò ẽe nqo̱ara tshàua hãam khóè ba bìrí a máá: “Tẽe naka tsia síí khóè ne cookg'ai koe téé,” témé.

Me kò bìrí xu a máá: “Sabata dim cáḿ ka sa kháé ndaka sa kgoaraèa: qãèan kúrú saa kana cg'ãèan kúrú saa, khóè ba kg'õèkagu saa kana cg'õo me saa?” témé. Igaba xu kò kg'ama nqoo.

Me kò xgóàse bóò ne, a ba a gane di qari tcúúan ka thõò-tcaoa hãase khóè ba bìrí a máá: “Tchoanà tshàua tsi,” témé. Me kò khóè ba tshàua ba tchoanà, i tshàua ba ka̱bise a qãè.
Xu kò Farasai xu tcg'oa, a xu a

Jeso ba kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu cgoa tshàam koe síí, ne kò káí ne khóè ne Galilea koe guu a xùri Me. Eẽ ne ko wèé zi ẽem kòo kúrú zi kóḿ, ka ne ko káí ne khóè ne Jutea koe hẽé, naka Jerusalema koe hẽé, naka Itumea koe hẽé, naka Jorotane ka ncìí za hẽé, naka Ture koe hẽé naka Sitone koe hẽéthẽé guu a hàà cgae Me.
Me Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu bìrí xu dxòro ba kg'ónòa máá Me, khóè ne dis xg'aes domka, táá ne gha nxãasega qãea cg'õo Me ka.
Káí ne khóè nem kò kg'õèkagua hãa, khama ne kòo ẽe kò tcììa hãa ne dqùria síí, síí ne gha qgóó Me ka.
Eẽ ne kòo cg'ãè tc'ẽean ka tcãà cgaeèa ne bóò Me ne ne ko cg'áé a q'au a máá: “Nqarim di Tsi Cóá Tsi i,” témé.
Me kaisase dxãwa tc'ẽean dqàè, táá i gha c'ẽe ne bìrí dìím ii sa ka.
Me Jeso ba xàbì ba q'ábà qaò, a ba a Gam ko tc'ẽe xu tcii, xu Gam koe hàà.
Me 12 xu nxárá tcg'òó a x'áè úú-kg'ao
a dxãwa tc'ẽean xu gha xhàiagu di qarian máàè.
Ncẽe xua kò: Simonem ncẽem kò Petere ta ma tcii ba hẽé,

Sebetem ka cóásem Jakobo ba hẽé, naka Jakobom ka qõesem Johane ba hẽé (ncẽem kò Boaneregese dis cg'õè sa máà tsara; ncẽes cg'õè sa kòo máá: ‘Túú-tebean di tsara cóá tsara a,’ témé),

Anterea ba hẽé, naka Filipi ba hẽé, naka Baretolomaio ba hẽé, naka Mataio ba hẽé, naka Tomase ba hẽé, naka Alefaiom ka cóásem Jakobo ba hẽé, naka Tadaio ba hẽé, naka Simonem (ncẽe kò tòókuan x'ãà máá ba) hẽé,
naka Jutase Isekariotem (ncẽe kò khóè ne tshàu q'oo koe tcãà Me ba) hẽéthẽé xu u.
Me nxãaska Jeso ba
Eẽ ne ko Gam x'áé di ne ncẽe sa kóḿ, ka ne ko síí tceea tcg'òó Me, tc'ẽea ba nxana hãa, ta ne kò tc'ẽea hãa khama.
Xu kò x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu Jerusalema koe kò guua hãa xu hàà máá: “Belesebulem kam hãa cgaeèa, a ko dxãwa tc'ẽean dim x'aigam cgoa dxãwa tc'ẽean xhàiagu,” témé.
Me Jeso ba tcii ne, a sere-sere zi cgoa kg'ui cgoa ne, a máá: “Ntama ba ga ma satana ba c'ẽem satana ba xhàiagu?
X'aian kò q'aa-q'aasea hãa ne i cuiskaga ẽe x'aian hãa tite.
X'áém kò gataga q'aara hãa nem cuiskaga ẽem x'áé ba hãa tite.
A ncẽè satanam kò cúía ntcoeku cgoase a q'aara hãa nem cuiskaga tééa hãa tite, igabam ko chõò-q'oos koe síí.

Igabam c'ẽem khóè ba cuiskaga qarim khóèm dim nquum koe tcãà, naka gam di zi gúù zi ts'ãà hãa tite, kg'aia méém ẽem khóèm qari ba qáéa ntcòo. Nxãaska cúígam gha nquua ba q'oo koe tcãà a gam di zi gúù zi ts'ãà.
Tseegukar ko bìrí tu u: Khóè ne gha wèé chìbia ne koe hẽé naka wèé cg'ãè kg'uian kg'áḿ q'ooa ne koe ko tcg'oa koe hẽéthẽé qgóóa mááè.
Igaba ẽe ko Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽem ka cg'ãèse kg'ui nea chõò tamase qgóóa-máákuan hòò tite, igaba ne chõò tamase chìbiga ne e,” tam méé.
“Cg'ãè tc'ẽea nem úúa,” ta ne mééa domkam Jeso ba ncẽeta mééa.
Jesom ka xõò sa hẽé naka qõese ga xu hẽéthẽéa kò hàà, a hàà tchàa koe téé, a c'ẽem khóè ba tséé, me síí Jeso ba tcii.
Ne kò káí ne khóè ne ntcõóa nxa̱ma-nxa̱ma Mea hãa khama ne máá: “Bóò, saò sa hẽé naka Tsáá qõe ga xu hẽéthẽéa tchàa za tẽe a ko dtcàrà kg'ui cgoa Tsi ne gha sa,” témé.
Me xo̱a ne a máá: “Tiris xõò sa dìí saa, xu Tíí qõe ga xu dìí ga xua?” témé.
Me ẽe kò ntcõóa nxa̱ma-nxa̱ma Mea ne ntcáà, a ba a máá: “Ncẽea Tiris xõòs ga si i, a Tíí qõe ga xu xu u.
Wèém khóèm ẽe ko Tirim Nqarim nqarikg'ai koe hànam ko tc'ẽe sa kúrú ba Tíí qõem ga me e, a Tíí qões ga si i, a gataga Tiris xõòs ga si i,” tam méé.

Me gaicara tshoa-tshoa a tshàam qàe koe xgaa-xgaa. Si kò kaias xg'ae sa qàea ba koe hãa, Me dxòrom q'oo koe tcãà a tshàam qàe koe síí ntcõó, si kò wèés xg'ae sa tshàam-kg'áḿ koe góḿankg'ai koe téé-tẽe.
Me káí zi gúù zi xgaa-xgaa ne sere-sere zi cgoa, a ba a Gam di xgaa-xgaan koe máá:
“Komsana méé tu. Xhárà-kg'ao ba kò qõò a síí xhárà.
Eẽm ko xhárà ka i kò c'ẽe cgùrian dàòm qàe koe tcheè, zi tsa̱rá zi hàà tc'õó o.
I c'ẽe cgùrian nxõ̱á-kg'ai di qgáìan koe tcheè, ncẽe káí góḿan kò káà a koe. I kò kúúga qháése tso̱m, góḿa ne kò kaisa tama khama.
Eẽs ko cáḿ sa qaò ka i ko gaa tso̱man dào, a i a kò to̱be ga i kò úú tama khama nqa̱i.
I c'ẽe cgùrian dxàman hàna qgáì koe tcheè, i dxàman kai, a chúú-chuu u, i táá tc'õoan kúrú.
I c'ẽe cgùrian qãè góḿan koe tcheè, a i a tc'õoan kúrú, ẽe i ko qhúí a ko kai ka i c'ẽean 30 khama noo, i c'ẽean 60 khama noo, i c'ẽean 100 khama noo tc'õoan kúrú,” tam méé.
A ba a máá: “Eẽ tceean úúa hãa ba méém kóḿ,” témé.
Eẽm cúía hãa ka xu kò 12 xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hẽé naka c'ẽe ne ẽe kò gaa koe hãa ne hẽéthẽé sere-sere zi ka tẽè Me.
Me kò bìrí ne a máá: “Gatua máàèa, chóm̀sea zi kàa zi Nqarim di x'aian di zi tu gha q'ãa sa. Igaba gane ẽe tchàa za hãa ne koe i ko wèé gúùan ga sere-sere zi cgoa nxárá xg'aeè.
Nxãasega
‘ne gha wèé x'aèan kaga bóò
igaba ne bóòa q'ãa tite ka.
A ne a gha wèé x'aèan kaga kóḿ
igaba ne kóḿa q'ãa tite,
Nqarim koe ne ko ka̱bise
a qgóóa mááè ne cúí ga a gha ii.’ ”
Me bìrí ne a máá: “Ncẽes sere-sere sa tu gáé kóḿa q'ãa tama? Kháé tu gha nxãaska c'ẽe zi sere-sere zi ntama kóḿa q'ãa?
Xhárà-kg'ao ba ko kg'ui ba xhárà.

C'ẽe ne khóè nea dàòm qàe koe kò tcheèa hãa cgùrian khama ii, ncẽe kg'uim xháràèa koe. Eẽ ne ko kóḿ me kagam ko kúúga satana ba hàà, a hàà kg'uim ẽe gane koe xháràèa hãa ba séèa tcg'òó.
Ne c'ẽe ne khóè ne nxõ̱án hàna qgáì koe kò tcheèa hãa cgùrian khama ii. Nxãa nea ncẽe kg'ui ba ne ko kóḿ ne ko kúúga qãè-tcaoan cgoa hààkagu me ne e,
igaba ne káà to̱be ne e
“C'ẽe ne khóè nea ẽe dxàman koe tcheèa hãa cgùrian khama ii. Gane ẽe kg'ui ba kóḿa ne ne e,
igaba kg'õès di zi xháé zi hẽé, naka qguù sa ncàm̀an hẽé, naka c'ẽe zi gúù zi ncóóan hẽéthẽéa kò tcãà cgae ne, a kg'ui ba chúú-chuu, me táá tc'áróan kúrú.

“C'ẽea ne qãè góḿan koe kò xháràèa cgùrian khama ii. Nxãa ne ko kg'ui ba kóḿ a ne a ko dtcòm̀a mááse me, a ne a ko tc'áróan kúrú, i c'ẽean 30, i c'ẽean 60, i c'ẽean 100 ne ne e.”
Me bìrí ne a máá: “Dìína ga x'áà-x'aa-kg'ai cgoa dis gúù sa gàbas cgoa xoaba-kg'ai, kana kgàrom dòm̀ q'oo koe tòó? Tseeguan kagas gha téé-q'ooa sa koe tòóè!
Wèés gúùs ẽe chóm̀sea hãa sa gha x'áíse, si gha ẽe qàbi-kg'aièa hãa sa, xgòre-kg'aiè khama.
Khóèm ẽe tceean úúa hãa ba méém kóḿ,” témé.
Me bìrí ne a máá: “Qãèse tu komsana! Eẽ tsi tcg'òóa hãas tc'ãò-tc'ão sa gaas máàè tsi ghas ga si i, a tsi a gha gataga càùa mááè si.
Wèém khóèm ẽe úúa hãa ba gha káían mááè. Me gha ẽe gúù úú tama ba, ẽem úúa hãa gúù-coan ga séè cgaeè khama,” tam méé.
A ba a máá: “Nqarim di x'aia nea ncẽeta ii: ‘Khóèm góḿan koe cgùri ba xhárà hãam khama i ii,
ncẽe ko ntcùú ka x'óm̀ a ko koaba ka tẽe, me cgùri ba ko cúíaga kai, gam c'úùa hãase.
Góḿ ba kò cúíga kg'ama tc'õoan kúrú: kg'aiam ko tso̱m a qhúí, a ba a kai, a x'õàn kúrú, i x'õàn tc'áróan kúrú.
Eẽ i ko tc'õoan x'ãé kaga i ko tcuùè, tcuù di x'aè ne hààraa khama,’ ” tam méé.
A ba a máá: “Nqarim di x'aia nea gha dùús cgoa nxárá xg'aeè, kana dùútsa sere-seres cgoa ia gha nxárá xg'aeè?
Mosetara
Igaba ẽem kò xháràè nem ko tso̱m, a kaias hìis xhárà di sa kúrú, a kaia nxã̱an kúrú, i gha nqarikg'ai di tsa̱rán hàà gas di sóm̀an koe nquuan kúrú,” tam méé.
Jeso ba kò káí zi sere-sere zi tséékagu, a kg'ui ba bìrí ne tc'ãò-tc'ãos ẽe gane ko kóḿa q'ãas cgoa.
Táám kò cúí gúù ga gane cgoa kg'ui, sere-serean tséékagu tamase, igabam ko Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu cgoam kò cúía hãa ka wèés gúù sa qãèse bìrí xu.
Me gaam cáḿ ẽem dim dqòam ka bìrí xu a máá: “Hàà naka xae c'ẽem xòèm tshàam dim za tchoaba,” témé.
Xu kò khóè ne gaa koe qaù, a xu a ẽem kò hãam dxòrom q'oo koe tcãà, zi kò gataga thẽé c'ẽe zi dxòro zi gaa koe hàna.
Me kò kaiam tc'ãá ba tẽe, i tshàam di qhonèan qùbise a dxòrom q'oo koe tcãà, me dxòro ba cg'oè ka hẽé.
Igabam kò Jeso ba dxòrom kháó koe hàna, a tcgábí ba dcãa a x'óm̀a xõe. Xu ghùi Me, a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, tom̀ xae ko igaba i gáé Tsáá koe gúù méé tama?” témé.
Me tẽe a ba a tc'ãá ba dqàè a tshàa ba bìrí a máá: “Nqoo naka kgàe!” témé. Me tc'ãá ba téé, si kò kaisas nqoo sa xóé.
Me tẽè xu a máá: “Dùús domka xao ma q'aea? Dtcòm̀an xao gáé úú tama?” témé.
Xu kaisase q'áò, a xu a tẽèku a máá: “Dùútsa khóè ba gáé ncẽe ba? Tc'ãán ga hẽé naka tshàan ga hẽéthẽé ka ko komsanaè ba?” témé.
Xu tshàa-dxoom ka c'ẽe xòèa ba za tchoaba, Gerase ne dim nqõóm xòè koe.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba dxòrom koe tcg'oa, kam ko cg'ãè tc'ẽean kò úúa hãam khóèm cgoa xg'ae, tc'ám̀ zi xòè koe kò guua hãa ba.
Tc'ám̀ zi koe kò x'ãèa hãa ba, ncẽe khóè ne kò qáéa ba ka tààèa hãa ba, qano di xu tau xu cgoa ga igaba.

Káí-kg'aisem kò ko tshàua ba koe hẽé naka nqàrèa ba koe hẽéthẽé qano cgoa qáéa ntcòoè, igabam kò ko qhòm m, a ba a nqàrè di qanoan khõà q'aa. Cúí khóè ga kò káà a ncèè me i ga di qarian kò úúa hãa a.
Ntcùú ba hẽé naka koaba ba hẽéthẽém kò ko tc'ám̀ zi hẽé naka xàbì xu koe hẽéthẽé q'aua te, a ko nxõ̱án cgoa thõò-thõose.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba nqúù ga ii a ko bóò, kam kò qgóéa síí, a síí cookg'aia ba koe qo̱m̀,
a kaisase q'au a máá: “Jesoè, kaisase tc'ámáka hànam Nqarim di Tsi Cóá Tseè, dùú sa Tsi ko tíí cgoa tc'ẽe? Nqarim cgoa ra ko gaìse Tsi a ko máá, táá xgàra te guu,” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí me a máá: “Ncẽem khóèm koe tcg'oa, tsáá cg'ãè tc'ẽe tseè!” témé.
Me nxãaska Jeso ba tẽè me a máá: “Cg'õèa tsi dìía?” témé. Me máá: “Cg'õèa te Milione e, káí xae e khama,” témé.
Me kaisase Jeso ba dtcàrà, táám gha ẽem qgáìm koe xhàiagu xu ka.
Káí zi xgùu zia kò xàbìm dxùukg'ai koe hãa a ko dxòó.
Ka i ko dxãwa tc'ẽean Jeso ba dtcàrà a máá: “Xgùuan dis xg'aes koe tsééa úú ta a, kgoara máá ta a naka ta gaan koe tcãà,” témé.
Me cg'ãè tc'ẽean kgoara máá i tcg'oa, a i a síí xgùuan koe tcãà, i ẽe xgùuan ncẽe kò 2,000 khama noo o, kari-karisea xõa a síí tshàam koe tcãà a tom̀.
Eẽ kòo xgùuan kòre xu khóè xua kò bèe a qgóé a síí x'áé-dxooan koe hẽé naka x'áé-coa xu koe hẽéthẽé xàà a. Ne kò khóè ne ẽe kúrúsea hãa sa hàà bóò.
Eẽ ne ko Jesom koe hàà ka ne kò ẽe kò dxãwa tc'ẽean úúa hãam khóè ba bóò, me gaa koe ntcõóa-ntcõe, a qgáían ha̱na, i tc'ẽea ba qãè e, ka ne kò q'áò.
Gane ẽe kò ẽe kúrúsea hãa sa bóò ne kò dxãwa tc'ẽean kò úúam khóèm koe hẽé naka xgùuan koe hẽéthẽé kúrúsea hãa sa khóè ne bìrí.
Ne tshoa-tshoa a Jeso ba dtcàrà, gane dim nqõóm koem gha tcg'oa sa.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba dxòrom koe tcãà kam kò ẽe kò dxãwa tc'ẽean ka tcãàèa hãam khóè ba Gam cgoam gha qõò sa dtcàrà Me.

Igabam kò Jeso ba táá kgoara máá me Gam cgoa qõòa ne, a bìrí me a máá: “Dìbi x'áéa tsi koe, tsari ne khóè ne koe, naka tsia síí X'aigam nta noose kúrú máá tsia hãa sa hẽé naka nta noosem thõò-xama máá tsia hãa sa hẽéthẽé ka bìrí ne,” témé.
Me kò khóè ba wèé xu x'áé-dxoo xu ẽe kò Dekapolise koe hãa xu koe qõòa te a Jesom gam koe kúrúa hãa zi gúù zi kaisa zi ka tshoa-tshoa a khóè ne bìrí, ne wèé ne khóè ne are.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba dxòrom cgoa tshàam ka ncìí za ka xòèa ba koe tchoaba, ka ne kò káí ne khóè ne Gam koe xg'ae, Me kò tshàam dxùukg'ai koe téé-tẽe.
Me kò c'ẽem khóèm, còrè-nquum di xu tc'ãà-cookg'ai xu ka c'ẽe ba hàà, Jairo ta kò ko ma tciiè ba, a ba a ẽem ko Jeso ba bóò ka nqàrè-kg'ama ba koe cg'áé.
A kaisase dtcàrà Me a máá: “Tiris cóás cg'áré sa x'oos qàe koe hãa, ke cgóm̀na hàà naka Tsia tshàua Tsi tòó cgae si nakas gha nxãasega qãè naka kg'õè,” témé.
Me tẽe a qõò cgoa me, ne káí ne khóè ne xùri Me, a ne a nco̱rú Me.
Si kò thẽé c'ẽes khóès 12 kurian kò úúa hãa a ko xòm̀ x'aèse nxoean hòò sa hãa,
ncẽe kò káí kurian séè a ko naakan koe tsoòse sa, a kò wèé gúùan ẽes úúa hãa ga tséékagu, qãèkaguses gha ka, igabagas kò táá qãè, i kò gaas di tcììan càùse.
Eẽs ko Jesom ka kóḿ, kas kò káí ne khóè ne xg'aeku koe guu a hàà Jesom kháó koe tcãà, a sa a ẽem kò ha̱nam qgáím di xgáḿ-kg'aman qgóó.
Gas kas kò bìríse a máá: “Ncẽè Gam dim qgáí bar kòo qgóó ne cúígar gha qãè,” témé.
Si Gam dim qgáí ba qgóó, i kò gaa x'aè kaga gas di tcììan kaà, si cgáé-q'ooa sa koe xám̀ ncãas gas di tcììan koe tsoòè sa.
Me Jeso ba qarian ncãa tcg'oa cgae Me sa qháésega xam̀a q'ãa. A ba a ka̱bise khóè ne koe a máá: “Dìí na ncãa qgáía Te qgóó?” témé.
Xu Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu xo̱a Me a máá: “Khóè ne ma xg'ae cgae Tsia hãa sa Tsi ko bóò, igaba Tsi ko tẽè dìín qgóó Tsia hãa sa!” témé.
Me Jeso ba ntcáà, dìín ẽes gúù sa kúrúa hãa sam gha bóò ka.
Si nxãaska khóè sa ẽe kúrúse cgae sia hãa sa bóòa q'ãa, a sa a hàà nqàrè-kg'ama ba koe cg'áé q'áòan cgoa, a wèé tseeguan bìrí Me.
Me bìrí si a máá: “Tiri si cóá seè, sari dtcòm̀a nea qãèkagu sia, ke tòókuan cgoa qõò naka sia sari xháéan koe tcg'oa,” témé.
Eẽm qanega hãa a ko khóè ne cgoa kg'ui, ka ne kò c'ẽe ne
Igabam kò Jeso ba táá nqábé kg'uian ẽe kòo kg'uiè e, a ba a còrè-nquum dim tc'ãà-cookg'ai ba bìrí a máá: “Táá q'áò guu, kg'amaga méé tsi dtcòm̀,” témé.
A ba a kò táá c'ẽe khóè ga kgoara máá i xùri Me, Petere ba hẽé naka Jakobo ba hẽé naka Johanem Jakobom ka qõese ba hẽéthẽé xu ka oose.
Eẽ xu ko còrè-nquum dim tc'ãà-cookg'aim dim nquum koe síí tcãà, kam ko Jeso ba bóò zi gúù zi qãè tama, ne ko khóè ne q'aua kg'aeku a ko xo̱ò.
Me tcãà a síí bìrí ne a máá: “Dùús domka zia gúù zi qãè tama, tu ko kg'aeku, a ko xo̱ò? Cóá sa x'óó tama a x'óm̀a hãa ka,” témé.

Igaba ne kò kg'ãè Me. Me wèéa ne ga tcg'òó, a ba a cóás ka xõò ba hẽé, naka xõò sa hẽé naka ẽe kò Gam cgoa hãa xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu nqoana xu hẽéthẽé séè a cóás kò hãa koe tcãà cgoa ne.
Me tshàua sa koe qgóó si, a bìrí si a máá: “Talita kumi!” témé. Ncẽe sa ko máá: ‘Cóá seè, tẽe tar ko sáá ka méé,’ témé.
Si gaa x'aè kaga cóá sa tẽe a sa a qõòa te (12 kuri si i kò ii). Eẽs ko ncẽe sa kúrúse ka ne kò kaisase are.
Me Jeso ba qarika q'ãa-q'ãa ne, táá ne gha cúí khóè ga ncẽes gúùs ka q'ãakagu sa. A ba a bìrí ne a máá: “C'ẽe gúù máà si nakas tc'õó,” témé.
Jeso ba kò ẽem qgáì ba tcg'oaragu, a Gam dim x'áé-dxoom koe síí, xu kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu xùri Me.

Me kò Sabata dim cáḿ ka tshoa-tshoa a còrè-nquum koe xgaa-xgaa. Ne kò káí ne ẽe kò kóḿ Me ne kaisase are a máá: “Ncẽem khóè ba wèé zi ncẽe zi nda hòòa? Dùútsa tc'ẽe saa ncẽe Gam máàèa sa, ncẽem ko kaia tsééan are-aresa ga kúrú sa?

Kháé ncẽe ba gáé xom-kg'aom tama baa, Marias ka cóáse ba, Jakobo ba hẽé, Josefa ba hẽé, Jutase ba hẽé, naka Simone ba hẽéthẽé xu ka káímkhoe ba. Gam ka qõesea zi gáé gatá cgoa ncẽe koe hãa tama?” ta ne méé. A ne a bóòa xguì Me.
Me Jeso ba bìrí ne a máá: “Porofiti ba wèé za ga tcommèam khóè me e, gam dim x'áé-dxoom koe hẽé naka gam di x'áéan koe hẽéthẽé cúí oose,” témé.
A ba a kò gaa koe táá are-aresa zi tséé zi kúrú, igabam kò kg'ama cg'orò ne khóè ne tsàà ko ne koe cúíga tshàua ba tòó, a kg'õèkagu ne.
Kaisasem kò area hãa, gane di dtcòm̀an úú tama domka.
A ba a kò x'áé-coa xu koe qõòa te a xgaa-xgaa.
Me kò Jeso ba 12 xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu Gam koe tciia óá, a ba a tshoa-tshoa a cám̀-cám̀ tsééa tcg'òó xu, a cg'ãè tc'ẽean xhàiagu di qarian máà xu.

A ba a x'áè xu a máá: “Táá méé xao cúí gúù dàò q'oo di ga séèa mááse guu, igaba méé xao dqàbi hìim cúím gabá séè, naka táá péré kana dtcòbè ga séè guu, naka táá cúí mari ga qòè guu.
Igaba méé xao nxàbo, naka xaoa táá c'ẽe qgáí ga séèa mááse guu,” témé.
Gatagam kò thẽé bìrí xu a máá: “Eẽ xao ko tcãàm x'áém koe xao kòo qãèse hààkaguè, ne méé xao gaa koe x'ãè, naka xaoa nxãakg'aiga síí ẽem qgáì ba tcg'oara guu.

A ncẽè c'ẽe qgáì gaa kò qãèse hààkagu xao o tama, ne khóè ne komsana xao o tama, ne méé xao ẽem qgáìm koe nqàrèa xao di tsharàn qãè-qãe, naka xaoa tcg'oaragu me, nxãasegas gha ẽe sa ẽe ne khóè ne koe x'áí sa ii ka,” témé.
Xu tcg'oa a xu a síí Nqarim dim kg'ui ba xgaa-xgaa, khóè ne méé ne gane di chìbian koe tcóóse di ba.
A xu a káí dxãwa tc'ẽean khóè ne koe xhàiagu, a káí ne khóè ne tsàako ne nxúìan cgoa tcgáù, a xu a qãèkagu ne.

Me x'aigam Herote ba Jesom ka kóḿ, cg'õèa ba kò q'ãasea hãa khama. C'ẽe ne khóè nea kòo máá: “Johanem tcguù-tcguu-kg'ao Me e. X'ooan koem tẽea! Gaa domka i ko ncẽe qarian are-aresa zi tséé zi di gam koe kúrúse,” témé.
Igaba ne kò c'ẽe ne máá: “Elija Me e,” témé, ne ko c'ẽe ne máá: “Porofiti Me e, c'ẽe xu porofiti xu ncìí x'aè di xu khamaga ma,” témé.
Igaba ẽem ko Herote ncẽe sa kóḿ kam kò máá: “Johanem, ncẽer kò q'ãe tcúúa hãa ba, x'ooan koe tẽèa hãa,” témé.

Herote ba kò gam ka káíkhoem Filipim dis khóès Herotiase sa séèa hãa. Me kò Johane ba Herote ba bìría hãa a máá: “X'áèan koe tsi kgoara mááè tama, tsáá kíím dis khóè sa tsi ga kò séèa hãa sa,” témé. Khamam kò Herote ba
Herotiase sa kò Johane ba hòrea hãa, a kò cg'õo me kg'oana, igabagas kòo tààè.

Herote ba kò Johane ba q'áòa hãa, a kò nqáó-nqao mea hãa, tchàno a tcom-tcomsam khóè me e sam kò q'ana hãa khama. Eẽm kòo Johane ba kóḿ nem kò qãèse hãa tama, igabam kò komsana ba ncàm̀a hãa.

Igabas kò qãèm x'aè ba hòò, me kò Herote ba ábà cáḿa ba ka gam di xu tc'ãà-cookg'ai xu kaia xu hẽé, naka ncõo-kg'ao xu di xu kaia xu hẽé, naka Galilea koe kò tc'ãà-cookg'aia xu khóè xu hẽéthẽé kõ̱è sa kúrúa máá.

Eẽs ko Herotiases ka cóáse sa tcãà a ko Herote ba hẽé naka kõ̱ès di xu cg'áè-khoe xu hẽéthẽé xu ko ntcãà máá kas ko Herote ba kaisase qãè-tcaokagu. Me x'aigam Herote ba cóá sa bìrí a máá: “Wèés gúùs ẽe si ga dtcàrà te sa dtcàrà te, máà si sir gha ke,” témé.
A ba a gaìses cgoa nqòòkagu si a máá: “Dùús wèés ẽe si gha dtcàrà te sar gha máà si, tiri x'aian di xòèan c'ẽea ga ii igaba,” témé.
Si xõòs koe síí a máá: “Dùú sa ra gha dtcàrà?” témé. Si xõò sa máá: “Johanem tcguù-tcguu-kg'aom dis tcúú sa dtcàrà,” témé.
Si kò x'aigam koe kúúga ka̱bise a máá: “Johanem tcguù-tcguu-kg'aom dis tcúú sar ko gàbas q'oo koes tòóèa hãase dtcàrà,” témé.
Me x'aiga ba kaisase tshúù-tcao, igabam kò gaìsean ẽem kò kúrúa hãa hẽé naka cg'áè-khoe ne hẽéthẽé domkam kò gam dim kg'ui ba ntcoean tc'ẽe tama.
A ba a kò cg'õo-kg'ao ba qháése x'áèan cgoa tsééa úú, síím gha Johanem dis tcúú sa óága ka. Me kò qõò a síí Johanem dis tcúú sa q'ãe, qáé-nquus koe.
A ba a gaas tcúú sa gàbas koe tòó a óá, a hàà gaas dxàe-coa sa máà si, si kò cóá sa séè a xõò sa máà si.
Eẽ xu ko gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ẽe sa kóḿ, ka xu kò hàà tc'áróa ba séè, a síí tc'ám̀s koe kg'ónò o.
Xu kò x'áè úú-kg'ao xu Jesom koe ka̱bise, a hàà wèé zi gúù zi ẽe xu kò kúrú zi hẽé naka ẽe xu xgaa-xgaa hãa zi ka hẽéthẽé bìrí Me.

Igaba i kòo nxãaska káí khóèan hààku a ko qõòku, xu kò Jeso ba hẽé naka Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé táá tc'õó di x'aèan ga úú khamam kò bìrí xu a máá: “Hàà xao naka xae nqoo-nqoosam qgáìm koe qõò naka xaea síí cúía hãa naka xao gha nxãasega sãa,” témé.
Xu dxòrom cgoa qõò a xu a cúíaga nqoo-nqoosam qgáìm koe síí hãa.

Ne káí ne khóè ne bóò xu, xu ko tcg'oa, ne dìí ga xu u sa bóòa q'ãa. Ka ne ko x'áé-dxoo xu koe guu a tshàam dxùukg'ai séè, a tc'ãà a nqàrèa ne ka gaa za qgóéa síí, a síí còoka hãa a qãà xu.

Eẽm ko Jeso ba dxòrom koe xõa kam ko kaias xg'ae sa bóò, a ba a thõò-xama máá ne, kòre-kg'ao ba úú tama zi ghùu zi khama ne kò ii khama. Me nxãaska tshoa-tshoa a káí zi gúù zi ka xgaa-xgaa ne.
Eẽs ko cáḿ sa dqòara qõò ka xu ko Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hàà cgae Me, a máá: “Ncẽem qgáì ba cúía hãam qgáì me e, i ncãa gataga dqòa,
ke khóè ne qõòa q'aakagu naka ne nxãasega cúùse nxa̱ma-nxa̱ma hãa xu x'áé xu koe hẽé naka x'áé-coa xu koe hẽéthẽé síí c'ẽe gúùan x'ámá mááse naka tc'õó,” témé.
Igabam kò xo̱a xu a máá: “Gaxao c'ẽe gúùan máà ne naka ne tc'õó,” témé. Xu bìrí Me a máá: “Kháé méé xae síí
Me máá: “Nta noo pérén xao úúa? Qõò naka síí bóò,” témé. Xu síí bóò a máá: “5 xu péré xu hẽé naka cám̀ x'aù tsara hẽéthẽé e,” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí xu xu wèé ne khóè ne xg'ae-coa zi cgoa ntcõókagu, tsã̱a dcãan kg'ai koe.
Ne xg'ae-coa zi 100 ne khóè ne di zi hẽé, naka 50 ne khóè ne di zi hẽéthẽé cgoa ntcõó.
Me
Ne kò wèéa ne ga tc'õó a ne a xg'ãà,
xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ẽe ncãa tc'õóa qaùèan ka 12 xu q'ore xu péré-qàmàn hẽé naka x'aù-qàmàn hẽéthẽé di xu tcãà, xu cg'oè.
Eẽ kò péréan tc'õó xu di xg'ae-q'ooa ne kò 5,000 khama noo xu khóè xu u.
Me Jeso ba qháése Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu chùi, xu dxòrom q'oo koe tcãà, Gam ka xu gha tc'ãà a Betesaida koe qõò ka, Gam qanega qaù a ko khóè ne qõòa q'aakagu ka.
Eẽm ko x'áè nea xg'ara kam ko xàbì ba q'ábà qaò a síí còrè.
Eẽs ko cáḿ sa dqòa kam kò dxòro ba tshàam nqáè koe hàna, Me kò Gabá góḿankg'ai koe cúíse hàna.

Dxòro ba xu kò ko xháé-xháésase qõòkagu sam kò bóò, tc'ãá ba xu kò q'óá-kg'ama khama, kam kò q'uu-kg'ai-q'oo ka hàà cgae xu, tshàam tc'amkg'ai koe náà qõò a, qàea xu koem kò hãa a ko nqáé xu,
igaba ẽe xu kò bóò Me, Me tshàam tc'amkg'ai koe xóé a ko náà qõò, ka xu kò tc'ẽea máá dca̱usoma Me e, ta tc'ẽea hãa, a xu a kaisase q'au.
Wèéa xu ga kò bóò Me khama, a xu a kaisase q'aea. Me gaa x'aè kaga kg'ui cgoa xu a máá: “Tíí Ra a, ke xao tòón tcáó! Táá q'áò guu,” témé.
Eẽm ko dxòrom koe gaxu cgoa q'ábà kam kò tc'ãá ba téé. Xu kò kaisase area.
Pérén kaga xu kò q'ãa tama, i tcáóa xu ga qari-qarièa khama.
Eẽ xu ko tshàa ba tchoaba ka xu kò Genesarete dim nqõóm koe hàà, a xu a gaa koe gaxu dim dxòro ba tòó.
Eẽ xu ko gaxu dim dxòrom koe tcg'oa, ka ne ko khóè ne kúúga Jeso ba bóòa q'ãa.
A ne a wèé x'áéan koe qgóéa te, a tshoa-tshoa a tcìì-khoean gaan di tcoàn koe xòóa hãase séèa úú, ẽe ne ko kóḿ i ko máá hànam hãa téméè qgáì koe.

Me ẽem ko nqõó-coa zi koe hẽé, naka x'áé xu koe hẽé naka nqõóm di c'ẽe xòèan koe hẽéthẽé tcãà ka tsàako khóèan Gam koe séè a úúè, a síí gúù zi ko x'ámáguè qgáì koe xòóè, a dtcàrà Me, kg'amaga ne gha Gam dim qgáím xgáḿ-kg'am qgóó sa, ne kò wèéa ne ẽe ko qgóó Me ne kg'õèkaguè.
Xu Farasai xu hẽé naka Jerusalema koe kò guua hãa xu x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu c'ẽe xu hẽéthẽé Jesom koe hààra xg'ae.
Ka xu ko c'ẽe xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu bóò, xu ko cg'uriga tshàuan cgoa tc'õó, xg'aà tshàu tamase.
(Farasai xu hẽé naka wèé ne Juta ne hẽéthẽéa kò ncìí cauan tsgõosea ne di koe ga guu a xg'aà tshàu tama ne hãas cookg'ai koe tc'õó tama.

Eẽ ne kò x'ámágu dis qgáìs koe guua hãa ne ne tshàua ne xg'aà tamas cookg'ai koe tc'õó tama. Gataga ne kò káí cauan c'ẽe úúa hãa, kubian hẽé naka suuan hẽé naka tc'õó cgoa di zi gàba zi [hẽé naka tcoà xu] hẽéthẽé xg'aà di i.)

Xu nxãaska Farasai xu hẽé naka x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé Jeso ba tẽè a máá: “Dùús domka xu Tsari xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu gatá ka tsgõosea ne di cauan khama ma kg'õè tama, a ko cg'uriga tshàua xu cgoa péréan tc'õó?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Eẽm kò ko Isaia ba porofita kam kòo tseegukaga gaxao qãè khóèan khama ko ma kúrúse xao ka porofita, ncẽe i ma góásea hãa khama a ko máá:
‘Ncẽe ne khóè ne ko kg'áḿa ne cgoa dqo̱m̀ Te,
igaba i tcáóa ne Tíí koe nqúù u.
Káà hùise ne ko dqo̱m̀ Te,
a ko khóè ne di x'áèan xgaa-xgaa,’
témé khama.
Nqarim di x'áè-kg'áḿan xao kúrú tama a xao a khóèan di cauan qgóóa qaria hãa,” tam méé.
A ba a bìrí xu a máá: “Nqarim di x'áè-kg'áḿan xao gha máàa xguì sa xao q'ana hãa, nxãasega xao gha gaxao di cauan di x'áèan qgóóa qari ka.
Moshe ba kò ncẽeta mééa a máá: ‘Saò ba hẽé naka saò sa hẽéthẽé tcom,’ a ba a kò gaia máá: ‘Dìím wèém ẽe ko xõòm ka kana xõòs ka cg'ãèse kg'ui ba méém cg'õoè,’ témé,
igaba ncẽè khóèm kò ko xõòm ka kana xõòs ka máá: ‘Eẽr ga ko hùi cgoa tsia sa, nxãa sa
Gaa koe guus ka xao guu me nakam xõò ba hẽé naka xõò sa hẽéthẽé c'ẽe gúù ga kúrúa máá tama.
Gaxao di cauan ncẽe xao kúrúa máásea hãa koe xao guu a Nqarim dim kg'ui ba káà-hùikagua hãa. A xao a kò ẽeta iim dàòm ka káí zi gúù zi kúrú,” tam
A ba a khóè ne Gam koe gaicara tciia óá, a bìrí ne a máá: “Komsana Te tu wèéa tu ga, naka tua kóḿa q'ãa.
Khóèm ka tchàa koe hãa, a ko gam koe tcãà sa khóè ba cg'uri-cg'uri tama, igaba ẽe ko khóèm koe guu a tcg'oa sa ko khóè ba cg'uri-cg'uris ga si i.
[Dìím wèém ẽe tceean úúa hãa ba méém kóḿ,]” tam méé.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba khóè ne koe guu a ko nquum q'oo koe tcãà, ka xu ko Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ẽes sere-seres ka tẽè Me.
Me bìrí xu a máá: “Qanega xao gáé kóḿa q'ãa tama? Bóò tama xao gáé hãa? Dùús wèés ẽe ko khóèm koe tchàa za guu a tcãà sa cg'uri-cg'uri me tite,
tcáóa ba koes tcãà tama, a ko ncãàa ba koe tcãà, a gatà ma nqáé khama,” témé. (Ncẽeta mééan kam kòo Jeso ba wèé tc'õoa nea ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa sa nxàe.)
Me máá: “Eẽ khóèm
Igaba i ko q'oo koe, tcáós koe guu a cg'ãè tc'ẽean hẽé, xóé cgoakuan hẽé, ts'ãàn hẽé, cg'õokuan hẽé,

cg'áràn hẽé, cg'ãè zi cau zi hẽé, kàa sa hẽé, cẽèan hẽé, qgóóse tama sa hẽé, cg'ãè tcgáí cgoa bóòku sa hẽé, zàróku sa hẽé, tc'amaka bóòse sa hẽé, naka cg'ãè tcáó sa hẽéthẽé tcg'oa khama.
Wèé zi cg'ãè zi ncẽe zia kò q'oo koe guu a tcg'oa a zi a ko khóè ba cg'uri-cg'uri,” tam méé.
Me Jeso ba gaa koem kò guu a tcg'oa ne Ture dim nqõóm koe síí. A gaa koem ko síí ka c'ẽem nquum koe tcãà, a ba a kò tc'ẽe tama c'ẽe khóè gha
Kas ko kúúga khóès gas dis cóás kò cg'ãè tc'ẽean ka tcãàèa hãa sa Jesom ka kóḿ, a sa a hàà a nqàrè-kg'ama ba koe cg'áé.
Khóès ẽe sa kò Gerika si i, a sa a kò Sirofonike dim nqõóm koe ábàèa hãa. A sa a kò Jeso ba dtcàrà, dxãwa tc'ẽea nem gha cóás koe tcg'òó sa.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a si a máá: “Hààn ta kg'aia cóán tc'õókagu, qãè tama i hãa cóán di péréan gha séè a ha̱ghuan xaoa mááè sa ke,” témé.
Igabas kò khóè sa xo̱a Me a máá: “Eè, X'aigaè, ẽe tafolean ka nqãaka hàna hãa ha̱ghuan ga ko cóán di péré qàmàn tc'õó,” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí si a máá: “Eẽm xo̱am domka si gha qõò, saris cóás koe i dxãwa tc'ẽean tcg'oara hãa khama,” témé.
Si x'áéa sa koe dìbi a sa a síí sao-xg'ae, si cóáse sa tcoàm koe xõe i dxãwa tc'ẽean tcg'oa cgae sia.
Me Jeso ba Ture dim nqõóm koe gaicara guu a xgoaba a ba a síí Sitone dim nqõó ba gãá a tshàam Galilea dim koe síí, Dekapolise dim xg'aekum koe.
Ne kò khóèm ncẽe kò q'omase tcee dòm̀a a kg'ui tama ba Gam koe úú, a ne a dtcàrà Me, síím gha tshàua ba gaam khóèm koe tòó sa.
Me Jeso ba khóè ne xg'aeku koe cúía tciia tcg'òó me, a ba a síí gaam khóèm di tcee dòm̀an koe tshàua ba tcãà a ba a tcg'ae a gaam khóèm di ta̱man qgóó.
Me Jeso ba nqarikg'ai koe ghùi-kg'ai a ba a kaisase sónò, a bìrí me a máá: “Efata!”
I khóèm di tcee dòm̀an xgobekg'amse, i ta̱ma ba ga gataga kgoarase, me qãèse kg'ui.
Me Jeso ba khóè ne x'áè, táá ne gha cúí khóè ga bìrí i ka. Igabaga ne kò ẽem ko ma kúrú u khama noose Gam ka kg'ui.
Ne kò khóè ne kaisase are a máá: “Wèé zi gúù zim qãèse kúrúa hãa, kg'ui taman gam kg'uikagua hãa, a ẽe kóḿ taman ga kóḿkagua hãa,” témé.
Eẽ xu cáḿ xu koes kò gaicara kaias xg'aes khóè ne di sa xg'aea, ka ne kò tc'õó ne gha gúù úú tama, Me Jeso ba Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu tciia óá, a bìrí xu a máá:
“Ncẽe ne khóè ner ko thõò-xama máá, ncẽeska ne nqoana cáḿan Tíí cgoa hãa khama, a tc'õó ne gha gúù ga úú tama.
Ncẽè x'áéa ne koer kòo xàbà ne hãase dìbikagu ne, ne ne gha dàòan q'oo koe qgaè-kg'ai a cg'áé; c'ẽe-kg'áía nea nqúù ka guua hãa khama,” tam méé.
Xu Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu xo̱a Me a máá: “Ncẽem tchàa-xgóóm koe nea gha ncẽe ne khóè ne ntama ma péréan xg'ãà?” témé.
Me tẽè xu a máá: “Nta noo péréan xao úúa?” témé. Xu máá: “7 xu péré xu u,” témé.
Me
Xu kò gataga thẽé cg'orò x'aù-coan úúa, Me kò gataga Nqari ba qãè-tcaoa máá, a ba a Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu máà xu, xu khóè ne máà xu.
Ne kò tc'õó a ne a xg'ãà, xu kò xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ẽe kò qaùan ka 7 zi q'ore zi tcana cg'oè-cg'oe.
Gane ẽe kò tc'õóa hãa nea kò 4,000 khama noo. Me kò qõòa q'aakagu ne,
a ba a gaa x'aè kaga dxòrom q'oo koe tcãà, Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu cgoa, a Dalamenuta dim xg'aekum koe qõò.
Farasai xu kò
Me nxãaska kaisase sónò a kg'ui a máá: “Dùús domka sa ko ncẽes qhàò sa
Me guu xu a dxòrom q'oo koe tcãà, a xgoaba a
Xu kò xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu péréan séè c'urùa hãa, a cúím péré ba dxòrom q'oo koe úúa hãa.
Me Jeso ba q'ãa-q'ãa xu a máá: “Q'ãa méé xao, naka kòresea hãa Farasai xu hẽé naka Herotem di péré gãé-gãean hẽéthẽé koe,” témé.
Xu nxãaska kg'ui cgoaku a máá: “Péré cgoa xae hàà tama,” témé.

Me Jeso ba tc'ẽea xu q'oo koe hàna sa q'ana hãase bìrí xu a máá: “Dùús domka xao ko péréan xao úú tamas ka kg'ui cgoakua máá? Qanega xao gáé bóòa q'ãa tama kana kóḿa q'ãa tama? Tcáóa xao gáé tsóágase x'óó-x'ooèa?
Tcgáían xao úúa hãa ka xao gáé bóò tama, a tceean úúa hãa ka xao gáé kóḿ tama? Tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese tama xaoa?

Eẽr kò ko 5 xu péré xu 5,000 ne khóè ne khõá q'aa máá, ka xaoa kò ẽe kò qaùa hãa péréan ka nta noo zi q'ore zi tcana cg'oè-cg'oe?” témé. Xu xo̱a Me a máá: “12 zi q'ore zi i,” témé.
“7 xu péré xu 4,000 ne khóè ner ko khõá q'aa máá xu, ka xaoa kò ẽe kò qaùa hãa péréan ka nta noo zi q'ore zi tcana cg'oè-cg'oe?” témé. Xu xo̱a Me a máá: “7 zi q'ore zi i,” témé.
Me tẽè xu a máá: “Kháé xaoa qanega kóḿa q'ãa tama?” témé.
Ka xu kò Betesaida koe síí. Ne c'ẽe ne khóè ne káà tcgáím khóè ba Gam koe óága, a ne a dtcàrà Me, tshàua bam gha tòó cgae me ka.

Me kò Jeso ba káà tcgáím khóè ba x'õàa ba koe séè, a x'áém ka tchàa za tcg'oa cgoa me. A ba a ẽem ko tcg'ae tcgáí mea xg'ara, ka tshàua ba tòó cgae me, a tẽè me a máá: “C'ẽe gúù ga tsi ko bóò?” témé.
Me ghùi-kg'ai a ba a máá: “
Me Jeso ba gaicara gaam tcgáí koe tshàua ba tòó, me qãèse bóò, i tcgáía ba qãè, me wèés gúù sa qãèse bóò.
Me x'áéa ba koe tsééa úú me a máá: “Táá x'áém q'oo koe tcãà guu,” témé.
Jeso ba kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu cgoa Kaesaream Filipim dim qgáìm qàe koe hàna hãa xu x'áé-coa xu koe tcg'oa a síí.
Eẽ xu dàò q'oo koe hãa kam ko Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu tẽè a máá: “Khóè nea ko máá, dìí Raa témé?” témé.
Xu xo̱a Me a máá: “ ‘Johane Tsi tcguù-tcguu-kg'ao Tsi i,’ ta ne ko méé, ne ko c'ẽe ne máá: ‘Elija Tsi i,’ témé, ne ko c'ẽe ne máá: ‘Porofiti xu ka c'ẽe Tsi i,’ témé,” ta xu méé.
Me gaicara tẽè xu a máá: “Kháé gaxaoa ko máá, dìí Raa?” témé. Me Petere xo̱a Me a máá: “Tsáá Tsia Kreste Tsi i,” témé.
Me Jeso ba qarika x'áè xu, táá xu gha cúí khóè ga Gam ka bìrí sa.
Me nxãaska tshoa-tshoa a xgaa-xgaa, Khóèm dim Cóá ba gha káí zi gúù zi koe xgàrase sa, a gha
Ncẽe sam kò kgoarasease kg'ui, me Petere séèa tcg'òó Me a tshoa-tshoa a dqàè Me.

Igabam kò Jeso ba ẽem ko ntcẽè a ko Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu bóò ka Petere ba dqàè a máá: “Tíí koe tcg'oa, satanaè! Nqarim di zi gúù zi koe tsi tc'ẽea tsi tcãà tama, igaba tsi khóèan di zi gúù zi koe tcãà tc'ẽea ke,” témé.

Kam ko kaias xg'aes khóè ne di sa hẽé naka Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé Gam koe tciia óá, a bìrí ne a máá: “Ncẽè c'ẽem khóèm kò xùri Te kg'oana ne méém bóòa xguìse naka baa gam dim xgàu ba dcẽé naka xùri Te.

Dìím wèém ẽe gam dis kg'õè sa qgóóa qari kg'oana hãa bas gha aaguse cgae, igaba dìím wèém ẽe ko Tíí hẽé naka qãè tchõàn hẽéthẽé domka gam dis kg'õès ka aaguse cgaeè, ba gha hòò si khama.
Dùúska ba gha khóè ba kháé ka̱bisea mááè, ncẽè wèém nqõó bam kòo hòò, a ba a gam dis kg'õès ka aaguse cgaeè ne?
Kana ba gha khóè ba gam dis kg'õès téé-q'oo koe dùútsa gúù sa tcg'òó a máà?

Dìím wèém ẽe ko Tíí hẽé naka Tiri kg'uian hẽéthẽé sau-cgaese ba, ncẽes qhàòs cg'áràn hẽé naka cg'ãèan hẽéthẽé dis koe, ba gha thẽé Khóèm dim Cóám ka sau-cgaeseè, ẽem gha ko tcom-tcomsa xu moengele xu cgoa, Xõòm di x'áàn koe hãase hàà ne,” tam méé.
Me bìrí xu a máá: “Tseegua ner ko bìrí xao o: Ncẽe koe téé-tẽe ne ka c'ẽea nea x'ooan xám̀a hãa tite, Nqarim di x'aia ne ne bóò, i qarian cgoa hàà tamas cookg'ai koe,” témé.

Jeso ba kò 6 cáḿan qãá q'oo koe Petere ba hẽé naka Jakobo ba hẽé naka Johane ba hẽéthẽé xu séè a gaxu cúí xu cgoa kaiam xàbì ba q'ábà qaò; i kò gaa koe ga cookg'aia xu koe bóòse-q'ooa ba ka̱bise a tãá.
Gam di qgáía ne kò ka̱bise a tca̱àkose q'úú, ncẽe cúí khóè ga nqõómkg'ai koe qgáían xg'aà naka i q'úúa hãa titem q'úú ba.
Ka tsara kò kúúga Elija ba hẽé naka Moshe ba hẽéthẽé tsara gaa koe bóòse, a ko Jesom cgoa kg'ui.

Me Petere ba Jeso ba bìrí a máá: “X'aigaè, qãès gúù si i ncẽe xae ncẽe koe hãa sa. Ke hàà naka xae nqoana nquu-coa xu ncẽe koe kúrú, nakam c'ẽe ba Tsari, nakam c'ẽe ba Moshem di, nakam c'ẽe ba Elijam di,” témé.
C'úùam kò hãa dùú sam gha kg'ui sa, kaisase xu kò q'aea hãa khama.
Si kò túú-c'õò sa qàbia tcãà xu, me kò kg'ui ba túú-c'õòs q'oo koe guu a tcg'oa a máá: “Ncẽe ba Tirim Cóá Me e, ncàm̀a Raa ba, komsana Me,” témé.
Eẽ xu ko qháése ntcẽè ka xu kò cúí khóè ga táá bóò, a Jesom cúím Gabá bóò.
Eẽ xu ko xàbìm koe xõa kam kò x'áè xu, táá xu gha ncãa xu ko bóòs gúù sa cúí khóè ga bìrí sa, qaneam Khóèm dim Cóá ba síí x'ooan koe tẽe tamas cookg'ai koe.
Xu gaam kg'ui ba tcáóa xu koe tòóa mááse, a gaxu ka tẽèku: x'ooan koe tẽes ko dùú sa nxàe sa.
Xu nxãaska tẽè Me a máá: “Dùús domka xu ko x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu máá: ‘Elija ba méém kg'aia hàà’?” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí xu a máá: “Elija ba ko kg'aia hàà wèé zi gúù zi kg'ónò; ka i dùús domka góáèa hãa, Khóèm dim Cóá ba méém xgàrase, naka baà khóè ne ka xguìè, ta ma ma?
Igabagar ko Elijam hààraa hãa sa bìrí xao o, ne kò wèés gúùs ẽe ne kò tc'ẽea hãa sa kúrú cgae me, ẽe i kò ma gaam ka ma góásea hãa khamaga ma,” tam méé.
Eẽ xu ko xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu koe hàà, ka xu ko kaias xg'ae sa bóò si nxa̱ma-nxa̱ma xua hãa, xu x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu hãa a ko ntcoeku cgoa xu.
Si kò kúúga wèés xg'ae sa Jeso ba bóò, a sa a kaisase are, a qàròa síí cgae Me a síí tsgám̀ Me.
Me kò tẽè xu a máá: “Dùú sa xao ko ntcoeku cgoa ne?” témé.
Me xg'aes koe kò hãam khóèm c'ẽe ba xo̱a Me a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, tirim cóá bar Tsáá koe óágaraa, kg'uikagu me tamam dxãwa tc'ẽe bam úúa hãa khama.

Wèé x'aèan ẽe i ko qaru cgae me ka i ko qáú me, me kg'áḿ-q'ooa ba koe xùbúan tcg'òó, a xõ̱óa ba gãò, a xgàruku. Ra ncãa Tsari xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu dtcàrà, xhàia xu gha guu u ka, igaba xu ko tààè,” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a ne a máá: “Oo, tsóágase dtcòm̀ úú tamas qhàò sa gáé ncẽe sa! Nta noo x'aèa ne Ra gha gatu cgoa hãa? Nta noose Ra gha qáò-tcaoa máá tu u? Oá me Tíí koe,” témé.
Ne ko cóá ba Gam koe óá. Eẽ i ko gaa dxãwa tc'ẽean Jeso ba bóò kaga i kò cóá ba qarika ntcãa-ntcãa, me góḿankg'ai koe cg'áé a dìbi-dibise, i kg'áḿ-q'ooa ba koe xùbúan tcg'oa.
Me Jeso ba cóám ka xõò ba tẽè a máá: “Nta noo x'aèan ba úúa a ko ncẽeta hẽé?” témé. Me cóám ka xõò ba máá: “Cg'áré-q'ooa ba koe ga i guu a tshoa-tshoa mea hãa.

Káí-kg'aise ẽe i kò ko tshoa-tshoa me ne i ko c'eean q'oo koe xaoa tcãà me naka tshàan q'oo koe hẽéthẽé e, cg'õo me i gha ka, igaba ncẽè c'ẽe gúù tsi ga kòo kúrú ne méé tsi thõò-xama máá ta a naka hùi ta a!” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí me a máá: “A ncẽè dtcòm̀a tsi kò hãa ne i wèé gúùan ga thamka a,” témé.
Kúúgam ko cóám ka xõò ba q'au a máá: “Dtcòm̀ ra ko, ke tiris káà dtcòm̀s koe hùi te!” témé.

Eẽm ko Jeso ba xg'ae sa bóò si ko qàròa síí cgae Me, kam ko cg'ãè tc'ẽean dqàè a máá: “Tsáá tc'ẽe tsi nqóbó a q'omasen tcee dòm̀a tseè, dqàè tsir ko a ko máá, tcg'oa cgae me naka táá gaia gam koe tcãà guu!” témé.

Ka i ko dxãwa tc'ẽean q'au, a ẽe i ko kaisase qgaè-qgae-kg'ai mea xg'ara ka tcg'oaragu me. Me kò cóá ba x'óóam khóèm khama ii, ne káí ne khóè ne tc'ẽea máá, x'óóam hãa, ta tc'ẽea.
Me Jeso ba tshàua ba koe qgóó a ghùi me, me tẽe a nqàrè ka téé.
Eẽm ko nquum q'oo koe tcãà, ka xu kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu dxùukg'ai koe tẽè Me a máá: “Dùús domka xaea kò tààè, a xhàiagu u tama?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Ncẽeta iia nea c'ẽe gúù kaga tcg'òóèa hãa tite, igaba còrèan ka cúíga a,” témé.
Eẽm qgáìm koe xu kò tcg'oa a Galilea dim nqõó ba tchoaba. Jeso ba kò c'ẽe khóèan ga gha hàna xu hãa qgáìan q'ãa sa tc'ẽe tama,

Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xum kòo xgaa-xgaa khama, a ko bìrí xu a máá: “Khóèm dim Cóá ba gha hàà khóè ne tshàu q'oo koe tcãàè, ne gha cg'õo Me, Me gha ẽem cg'õoèa ka nqoana cáḿan qãá q'oo koe tẽe,” témé.
Igaba xu kò ẽem ko méé sa táá kóḿa q'ãa, a xu a kòo gataga thẽé tẽèa ba q'áò.
Xu kò Kaperenaume dim nqõóm koe síí. Me ẽe xu nquum q'oo koe hãa ka tẽè xu a máá: “Dùú sa xao ncãa ko dàòm q'oo koe ntcoekua máá?” témé.
Igaba xu kò nqoo, ncãa xu dàòm q'oo koe kg'ui cgoaku dìína kaia hãas ka khama.

Me ntcõó a ba a 12 xu tciia xg'ae a bìrí xu a máá: “Ncẽè c'ẽem khóèm kò tc'ãà di ba ii kg'oana hãa, ne méém wèé ne ka kháóka ka dis téé-q'oos di ba ii, naka qãà ba ii,” témé.
A ba a cg'árém cóá ba séè a xg'aekua xu koe tòó, a séè a tchàma me, a bìrí xu a máá:

“Dìím wèém ẽe ko ncẽeta iim cóá ba Tiri cg'õèan koe qãèse hààkagu ba ko Tíí tc'áróga qãèse hààkagu; me dìím wèém ẽe ko Tíía qãèse hààkagu Te ba, Tíía qãèse hààkagu Te tama, igabam ko Gam ẽe tséé Tea hãa ba qãèse hààkagu,” témé.

Me Johane ba bìrí Me a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, c'ẽem khóè ba xae kò bóò, me ko Tsari cg'õèan cgoa dxãwa tc'ẽean xhàiagu, xae kò sixae ka c'ẽem tama me e domka gatà hẽéan cara me,” témé.
Igabam kò Jeso ba máá: “Táá cara me guu. C'ẽem khóèm ẽe ko Tíí cg'õè cgoa kaias tséé sa kúrú ba qháése ka̱bise naka Tíí ka cg'ãèse kg'uia hãa tite ke,
ẽe gaxae cgoa ntcoeku tama ba gaxae xòè koe hàna khama.

Tseeguan kagar ko bìrí xao o a ko máá: Dìím wèém ẽe ko Tiri cg'õèan domka qgàisa tshàan dis kubi sa máà xao o, Krestem di xao o domka ba gha tseeguan kaga Gam di surutan hòò,” témé.

“Dìím wèém ẽe ko ncẽe ne cg'áré ne ncẽe ko Tíí koe dtcòm̀ ne ka c'ẽe ba chìbian kúrúkagum ka i gha qãè ii, gáí cgoa dis nxõ̱ás kaias kòo qg'áóa ba koe qáéa tòóè, me kaiam tshàam q'oo koe xaoa tcãàè ne.

“A ncẽè tsarim tshàum kòo chìbi kúrúkagu tsi ne, q'ãea tcg'òó me. Qãèa i máá tsia, nqo̱ara tshàu tsi gha a kg'õès koe tcãà sa, cám̀ x'õà tsi gha a chõò tamas c'ees dxãwam dis q'oo koe tcãàn ka ke.

“A ncẽè nqàrèa tsi kò ko chìbian kúrúkagu tsi ne, q'ãea tcg'òó o. Qãèa i gha máá tsia, cúí c'õá tsi gha a kg'õès koe tcãà sa, cám̀ c'õá a chõò tamas c'ees dxãwam dis q'oo koe tcãàn ka ke.

“A ncẽè tsarim tcgáím kò ko chìbian kúrúkagu tsi ne, ho̱bèa tcg'òó me. Cúí tcgáí a Nqarim di x'aian koe tcãà sa qãè si i, cám̀ tcgáí a chõò tamas c'ees dxãwam dis q'oo koe tcãàn ka ke,
ncẽe
“Wèém khóè ba gha c'eean cgoa tsa̱ubereè, si gha wèés dàòa-mááku sa ta̱bean cgoa tsa̱ubereè.

Ta̱bea ne qãè e, igaba gaan di tsa̱u-q'ooan kòo káà, ne i gha gaicara ntama ma kúrúè a tsa̱u? Gatu xg'aeku koe méé tu ta̱bean khama ii, naka tua tòókuan úúa hãase c'ẽe ne cgoa x'ãè,” tam méé.

Me kò Jeso ba gaa koem ko guu ka Jutea dim xg'aekum koe síí, a Jorotane dim tshàa ba tchòaba, zi kò khóè ne di zi xg'ae zi gaicara xg'ae cgoa Me, Me caua ba a kò ii khama gaicara xgaa-xgaa ne.
Xu kò Farasai xu hàà cgae Me, a xu a kúrúa xu kòo bóò Me khama tẽè Me a máá: “A x'áèan koe ia kgoaraèa khóèm gha gam dis khóè sa aagu sa?” témé.
Me Jeso ba tẽèm cgoa xo̱a xu a máá: “Moshe ba kò ntama ma x'áè xao o?” témé.
Xu máá: “Moshe ba xg'ao khóè ba kgoara máá aagukuan dis tcgãya sam gha góá, a
Me Jeso ba bìrí xu a máá: “Gaxao di qari tcúúan domkam kò Moshe ba ncẽem x'áè ba góá máá xao o.
Igabam xg'ao Nqari ba nqõóm ko tshoa-tshoase koe ga guu a khóè ba hẽé naka khóè sa hẽéthẽé kúrúa.
Gaa domkagam gha khóè ba xõò ba hẽé naka xõò sa hẽéthẽé khara guu, a ba a gha gam dis khóès koe tc'àmàse,
khara gha nxãaska ẽe khara cám̀ khara cúím tc'áró ba kúrú, a gaicara cám̀ ii tite, igaba khara gha cúím tc'áró ba ii.
Gaa domka méés ẽem Nqari ba xg'ae-xg'aeèa hãa sa táá cúí khóè kaga q'aa-q'aaè guu,” tam méé.
Eẽ xu Gam cgoa nquum q'oo koe hãa ka xu ko xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu gaicara ncẽes gúùs ka Jeso ba tẽè.
Me kò bìrí xu a máá: “Dìím wèém ẽe ko gam dis khóè sa aagu, a ko c'ẽes khóè sa séè ba ko cg'áràn kúrú,
a ncẽè gaas igabas kòo gas dim khóè ba aagu, a ko c'ẽem khóè ba séè nes ko cg'áràn kúrú,” témé.
Ne kò khóè ne cóán Gam koe óá, tshàua bam gha tòó cgae e ka, xu kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu dqàè ne.
Igaba ẽem ko Jeso ba ẽe sa bóò kam kò kaisase xgóà, a bìrí xu a máá: “Cóán guu naka i Tíí koe hàà. Táá xgáè-kg'am m guu, Nqarim di x'aia nea gatà ii ne di i ke.
Tseegua ner ko bìrí tu u a ko máá: Dìím wèém ẽe Nqarim di x'aian, cóán ko ma séè e khama ma séè e tama ba cuiskaga gaan koe tcana hãa tite,” témé.
A ba a nxãaska gaa cóán séè a tchàma, a tshàua ba tòó cgae e, a ts'ee-ts'eekg'ai i.

Eẽm ko Jeso ba xgoaba a ko dàòa ba koe qõò, kam kò khóè ba qàròa síí cgae Me, a síí cookg'aia ba koe qhòm tsi qúrùa ntcõó, a tẽè Me a máá: “Qãè Tsi xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, nta ra gha hẽé a nxãasega chõò tamas kg'õè sa hòò?” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí me a máá: “Dùúska tsi ko qãè tsi khóè Tseè ta ma tcii Tea máá? Cúí khóè qãè ga káà a, igaba Nqarim cúí Me e.

X'áèan tsi q'ana hãa: Táá cg'õo guu, táá cg'áràn kúrú guu, táá ts'ãà guu, táá tshúù-ntcõan nxàe guu, táá kàan cgoa gúùan séèa mááse guu, saò ba hẽé naka saò sa hẽéthẽé tcom, ta ko méé e,” tam méé.
Me bìrí Me a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, ncẽe zi gúù zir ncìísega tshoa-tshoa a cóár ii koe ga ko kúrú,” témé.

Me kò Jeso ba ẽem ko bóò me ka ncàm̀ me, a bìrí me a máá: “Cúís gúù sa tsi ko tcào. Qõò naka tsia síí wèés gúùs ẽe tsi úúa hãa sa x'ámágu, naka tsia ẽe dxàua hãa ne khóè ne máà, naka tsia gha nxãasega nqarikg'ai koe qguù sa úúa hãa, naka hàà xùri Te,” témé.
Me kò ncẽes gúùs ka tshúù-tcaokaguè, a kò tshúù-tcaoa hãase qõò, káí zi gúù zim kò q'õòa hãa khama.
Me kò Jeso ba Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ntcáà a ba a máá: “Tsóágase i gáé gha qaria, gane ẽe qguùa hãa ne khóè ne gha Nqarim di x'aian koe tcãà sa,” témé.
Xu kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu Gam di kg'uian ka kaisase area.
Igabam kò Jeso ba gaia bìrí xu a máá: “Cóá xaoè, tsóágase i gáé qaria Nqarim di x'aian koe tcãà sa.
Kameles ga dqààm tcgáí di kòm̀an koe tcãà sa thamka si i, qguùam khóèm gha Nqarim di x'aian koe tcãàs ka,” tam méé.
Xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu kò kaisase are, a xu a tẽè Me a máá: “Kháé ba gha nxãaska dìí ba kgoaraè?” témé.
Me Jeso ba bóò xu a máá: “Khóèa ne ko tààè, igabam Nqari ba tààè tama, wèé gúùa ne Nqarim koe subu u khama,” témé.
Me nxãaska Petere ba tshoa-tshoa a bìrí Me a máá: “Bóò, wèé gúùan ga xae guua hãa a ko xùri Tsi,” témé.

Me Jeso ba máá: “Tseegua ner ko bìrí xao o a ko máá: Wèém khóèm ẽe gha Tíí hẽé naka Tiri qãè tchõàn hẽéthẽé domka x'áéa ba guu, kana káíkhoea ba, kana qõea ba, kana xõò sa, kana xõò ba, kana cóáa ba, kana xháràa ba ga igaba,

nxãa ba gha 100 q'oro noose hòò o: x'áéan ga hẽé, naka káíkhoea ba ga hẽé, naka qõea ba ga hẽé, naka dxàe xõòa ba ga hẽé, naka cóáa ba ga hẽé, naka xháràn ga hẽé, naka xgàrakuan ga hẽéthẽé e, ncẽeta hãa x'aèan kaga, a gataga hààko x'aèan ka chõò tamas kg'õè sa hòò.
Igaba ẽe káí ne còoka hàna nea gha kháóka di ne ii, ne gha ẽe kháóka hãa ne còoka di ne ii,” tam méé.

Xu kò dàòm q'oo koe hãa a ko Jerusalema koe qõò, Me Jeso ba tc'ãà-cookg'ai xua, xu kò xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu kaisase area hãa, ne kò ẽe ko xùri Me ne q'aea hãa. Me kò gaicara 12 xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu séèa tcg'òó, a tshoa-tshoa a dùútsa gúùs gha hàà kúrúse cgae Me sa bìrí xu

a máá: “Bóò, Jerusalema koe xae ko qõò, Me gha Khóèm dim Cóá ba kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé naka x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé tshàu q'oo koe tcãàè. Xu gha x'oos koe chìbi-chibi Me, a gha tãá zi qhàò zi di ne tshàu q'oo koe tcãà Me,
a nco̱i Me, a kg'áḿ tsharàn cgoa tcg'ae cgae Me, a qoa Me, a cg'õo Me. Igabam gha nqoana dim cáḿ ka x'ooan koe tẽe,” tam méé.

Tsara kò nxãaska Jakobo ba hẽé naka Johane ba hẽéthẽé tsara síí cgae Me, ncẽe kò Sebetem ka cóáse ii tsara, a bìrí Me a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, wèés gúùs ẽe tsam ko Tsáá koe tc'óà sa méé Tsi kúrúa máá tsam m sa tsam ko tc'ẽe,” témé.
Me bìrí tsara a a máá: “Dùú sa ra gha kúrúa máá tsao o sa tsao ko tc'ẽe?” témé.

Tsara máá: “Kúrúa Tsi gha máá tsam sa ncẽe si i: Tsari x'áàn koe méé Tsi kgoara máá tsam m nakam c'ẽe ba Tsarim x'õàm kg'áòm xòè za ntcõó nakam c'ẽe ba dxàes x'õàs xòè za ntcõó,” témé.

Igabam kò Jeso ba bìrí tsara a a máá: “Dùú sa tsao ko dtcàrà sa tsao c'úùa hãa! Kgoana tsaoa gha a kubis Tíí ko kg'áà q'oos koe kg'áà kana tsaoa gha ncẽer tcguù-tcguuèa hãas tcguù-tcguuku cgoa tcguù-tcguuè?” témé.

Tsara máá: “Kgoana tsam gha a gatá hẽé,” témé. Me Jeso ba bìrí tsara a, a máá: “Kubis ẽer ko kg'áà q'oos koe tsao gha kg'áà, a tcguù-tcguukus ẽer gha ko tcguù-tcguuès cgoa tcguù-tcguuè,

igabaga ncẽe kg'áò x'õàa Te xòè za ntcõó sa hẽé, naka dxàe x'õàa Te xòè za ntcõó sa hẽéthẽér Tíí kgoara máá tama, igaba i nxãan ẽe i kg'ónòa mááèa hãa ne di i,” tam méé.
Eẽ xu ko c'ẽe xu 10 xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ncẽe sa kóḿ ka xu ko tshoa-tshoa a kaisase Jakoboa tsara Johanea tsara xgóà cgae.

Me Jeso ba Gam koe tciia óá xu a bìrí xu a máá: “Q'ana xao hãa, ẽe tãá zi qhàò zi koe koma x'aiga ii xu ko gaxu di qarian gane koe tséékagu sa, xu ko gane di xu tc'ãà-cookg'ai xu gaxu di qarian gane koe x'áí sa.
Igaba méé i gaxao koe táá gatà ii guu, igaba ẽe ga gaxao ka kaia hãa ba méém gaxao dim tséé-kg'ao ba ii,
nakam dìím wèém ẽe gha gaxao ka tc'ãà-tc'ãase ba wèém khóèm dim qãà ba ii.
Khóèm dim Cóá ba hààraa, hààm gha tsééa mááè ka tamase, igabam hààraa, hààm gha

Xu kò Jeriko koe hàà. Eẽm ko Jeso ba Jeriko koe tcg'oa, Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu cgoa hẽé naka káí ne khóè ne cgoa hẽéthẽé e, kam ko káà tcgáím dtcàrà-kg'aom Baretimaiom, Timaiom ka cóáse ba dàòm qàe koe ntcõóa-ntcõe.
Eẽm ko kóḿ Jesom Nasareta di Me e sa kam ko tshoa-tshoa a q'au a máá: “Jesoè, Dafitem ka tsgõose-coa Tseè, thõò-xama máá te,” témé.
Ne káí ne dqàè me a máá, nqoo méém témé, igabam ko kaisase q'au a máá: “Dafitem ka cóáse Tseè, thõò-xama máá te,” témé.
Me Jeso ba téé a ba a máá: “Tcii me,” témé. Ne ẽe káà tcgáím khóè ba tcii, a bìrí me a máá: “Tòón tcáó naka tsia tẽe, tcii tsim ko ke,” témé.
Me gaam khóè ba gam dim ko̱à ba ncemeagu, a ba a nxàìa tẽe a Jesom koe síí.
Me Jeso ba tẽè me a máá: “Dùú sar gha kúrúa máá tsi sa tsi ko tc'ẽe?” témé. Me káà tcgáím khóè ba bìrí Me a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, bóòr gha sar ko tc'ẽe,” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí me a máá: “Qõò, tsari dtcòm̀a nea qãèkagu tsia hãa ke,” témé. Me kò kúúga bóò, a xùri Me.
Eẽ ne ko Jerusalema koe hẽé naka Betefage koe hẽé naka Betania koe hẽéthẽé cúù, Olife dim xàbìm koe, kam kò Jeso ba Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ka cám̀ tsara tsééa tcg'òó,

a bìrí tsara a, a máá: “Gatsao cgoa q'óá-kg'amkua hãam x'áém koe tsao qõò. Eẽ tsao ko tcãà ne tsao gha qanega cúí khóè kaga qábìè ta ga hãam donghi-coa ba hòò me qáésea tẽe; kgoara naka Tíí koe óága me.
A ncẽè c'ẽe khóè kòo tẽè tsao o, dùúska tsao ko ncẽeta hẽé sa ne méé tsao bìrí i naka máá: ‘X'aiga ba ko qaa me, a ba a gha kúúga ka̱bi me,’ témé.”
Tsara qõò a síí donghi-coa ba sao-xg'ae, me xhàrom-kg'áḿ ka tchàa koe qáéa tòóèa, tsara kgoara me.
Ne kò c'ẽe ne khóè ne gaa koe kò téé-tẽe ne tẽè tsara a, a máá: “Dùú sa tsao ko kúrú, a ko donghi-coa ba kgoara máá?” témé.
Tsara kò ẽem ko ma Jeso ba ma bìrí tsara a khamaga ma bìrí ne, ne guu tsara a, tsara qõò.
A tsara a donghi-coa ba Jesom koe óá, a tsara a kò gatsara di qgáían gam koe tcee, Me qábì me.
Ne kò káí ne khóè ne gane di qgáían dàòm q'oo koe khárà, ne c'ẽe ne hìian di nxã̱án khõá a khárà.
Eẽ kòo cookg'aia ba koe qõò ne hẽé naka kháóa ba koe kòo xùri Me ne hẽéthẽéa kò q'au a máá:
“Hosana!
Ts'ee-ts'eekg'aiè méém
ẽe ko X'aigam
Ts'ee-ts'eekg'aiè méé i x'aian
gatá ka xõòm Dafitem di i, ncẽe kò hàà a,
Hosana, ẽe kaisase tc'amaka hàna ba!”
témé.
Me kò Jerusalema koe tcãà, a tempelem koe síí, a ẽem kò caate a wèé zi gúù zi bóò ka, nxãakamaga i kò dqòara hãa khamam
Q'uu dim cáḿ ka, ẽe xu Betania koe guua hãa kam kò xàbàa hãa.

Khamam kò nqúù ka hãa a faia dis hìi sa bóò, si to̱àràn úúa, kam ko síí cgae si, síím gha c'ẽe gúù ga hòò cgae si ka. Eẽm ko hàà cgae si kam kò cúí gúù ga táá hòò, igaba to̱aran cúí ga a, faia di zi hìi zi gha tc'õoan kúrúm x'aèm tama me e kò ii khama.
Kam kò gaas ka máá: “Táá méé i cúí khóè ga gaicara chõò tamase, sáá koe tc'õoan tc'õó guu,” témé. Xu kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu kóḿ Me.

Xu ko Jerusalema koe hàà tcãà, Me kò Jeso ba tempelem q'oo koe tcãà a tshoa-tshoa a khóè ne ẽe hãa a ko x'ámágu ne hẽé naka ẽe ko hàà x'ámá ne hẽéthẽé xhàiagu, a ba a marin ko xg'áḿa q'aa ne di tafolean hẽé naka ntcõó-q'ooan ẽe ko tcíbían x'ámágu ne di hẽéthẽé xùbuku cgoa.
A kò cúí khóè ga táá kgoara máá i c'ẽe gúù cgoa ga tempelem q'oo koe nqáé.
Me kò khóè ne xgaa-xgaa, a bìrí ne a máá: “Góáse tama i gáé hãa naka máá:
‘Tirim nquu ba gha
wèé zi qhàò zi dim còrè-nquu ba
ta ma tciiè’
téméè tama?
Igaba tu gatu ts'ãà-kg'ao ne di x'ãè-q'ooan kúrú mea!” tam méé.

Xu kò kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé naka x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé gaas gúù sa kóḿ, ka xu kò cg'õo Me xu gham dàò ba qaa; bèe Me xu kò ko khama, wèés xg'aes khóè ne di sa kò Gam di xgaa-xgaan ka area hãa khama.
Eẽ i ko dqòa ka xu kò
Eẽ xu ko ntcùúkg'ai cgoa nqáé ka xu ko faia dis hìis qàe koe nqáé, a bóò si si to̱bea sa cgoa ga c'óòa hãa.
Petere ba kò tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese a bìrí Me a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, bóò! Faia dis hìis ncẽe Tsi ncãa ko cgúí sa ncãa nqa̱i,” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Nqarim koe méé xao dtcòm̀an úú.

Tseegukagar ko bìrí xao o: Dìím wèém ẽe ko ncẽem nxõ̱á xàbì ba bìrí a máá: ‘Tẽe naka tshàam q'oo koe xaoa tcãàè,’ témé, a tcáóa ba q'oo koe káíse tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese tama, igaba ko dtcòm̀, ẽem nxàea hãas gha kúrúse sa, nxãam ka i gha hàà kúrúse.
Gaa domkar ko bìrí xao o a ko máá: Dùús wèés ẽe xao ko còrèan cgoa dtcàràs ka méé xao nxãakamaga xao mááè sia hãa sa dtcòm̀, nxãaskas gha gaxao koe kúrúse.

Gataga méé xao wèé x'aèan ẽe xao téé ko còrè ka qgóóa mááku, c'ẽe gúù xao kò gaxao ka c'ẽean cgoa úúa hãa ne, nakam gha nxãasega gaxao ka Xõòm ncẽe nqarikg'ai koe hãa ba chìbia xao qgóóa máá xao o.
[Igaba ncẽè qgóóa mááku tama xao kò hãa nem cuiskaga gaxao ka Xõòm nqarikg'ai koe hãa ba chìbia xao qgóóa máá xaoa hãa tite,]” tam méé.
Xu gaicara Jerusalema koe hàà. Eẽm ko Jeso ba tempelem q'oo koe tcãà, ka xu kò kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé, naka x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu hẽé, naka
A tẽè Me a máá: “Ndaka qari cgoa Tsi ko ncẽe zi gúù zi kúrú kana ia dìín qarian máà Tsia hãa Tsi ko ncẽe zi gúù zi kúrú?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Cúís gúù sar gha tẽè xao o. Xo̱a Te méé xao, nakar gha nxãasega bìrí xao o, ndaka qarian cgoar ko ncẽe zi gúù zi kúrú sa.
Johanem dis tcguù-tcguukus ka bìrí Te: nqarikg'ai koe sa kò guua hãa, kana sa kò khóèan koe guua hãa? Xo̱a Te,” témé.
Xu kò gaxu ka c'ẽea xu cgoa xóé a tẽèku a máá: “ ‘Nqarikg'ai koe e,’ ta xae kò ko méé, nem gha nxãaska tẽè xae e a máá: ‘Kháé xao nxãaska dùús domka dtcòm̀ me tama?’ témé.
Igaba xae gha máá: ‘Khóèan koe e,’ témé - Khóè ne xu kò ko bèe, Johane ba tseegu dim porofiti me e sa ne kò wèé ne khóè ne q'ana hãa khama.”
Xu kò nxãaska Jeso ba xo̱a a máá: “C'úùa xae hãa,” témé.
Me kò Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Tíí igabar bìrí xao o tite, ndaka qarian cgoar ko ncẽe zi gúù zi kúrú sa,” témé.

Me kò tshoa-tshoa a sere-sere zi cgoa kg'ui cgoa ne a máá: “C'ẽem khóè ba kò kg'om xhárà ba xháràa, a ba a kò xhàro ba gaam koe kúrúa nxa̱ma-nxa̱ma, a ba a gõéan ko kúrúèm ha̱é ba hẽé naka tc'amaka qáòm nquu ba hẽéthẽé gaa koe tshào. A ba a c'ẽe xu xhárà-kg'ao xu cgóbè me, a c'ẽem nqõóm koe qõò.
“Eẽm ko
Xu kò séè a xg'áḿ me, a káà gúùse tsééa ka̱bi me.
“Me gaia c'ẽem qãà ba tsééa úú cgae xu, xu síí tcúúa ba koe thõò-thõo me, a sau-saugase qgóó me.
“Me kò c'ẽe ba tsééa úú, xu nxãa ba cg'õo. A xu a c'ẽe xu káí xu kaga gataga hẽé, c'ẽe xu xu kò xg'áḿ, a c'ẽe xu cg'õo.
“Cúím cóám kaisasem kò ncàm̀a hãa bam kò úúa, a ba a kò gaam gabá tsééa úú cgae xu, a bìríse a máá: ‘Tirim cóá ba xu gha tcom a qgóóse,’ témé.
Igaba xu kò ẽe xu xhárà-kg'ao xu bìríku a máá: ‘Ncẽe ba gúù zi ka q'õòsem ga me e, ke hààn xae cg'õo me, naka zi gha gúù zi gaxae di ii,’ témé.
Xu kò séè a cg'õo me, a kg'om xháràm ka tchàa koe xaoa tcg'òó me,” tam méé.
Qanega xao gáé ncẽes Tcgãyas
‘Nxõ̱ás ẽe kò tshào-kg'ao xu ka bóòa xguìèa hãa sa,
kaisase cgáés nxõ̱á sa kúrúa hãa.
Ncẽea X'aigam
si ncẽe sa tcgáí-q'ooa ta koe t'õè si i,’ ”
témé.
Ka xu ko qáé Me kg'oana, igaba xu kò xg'ae sa bèe, ẽes sere-seres kam kòo gaxua nxàe xu sa xu kò q'ana hãa khama, xu kò guu Me a qõò.
Ka xu ko nxãaska kháóka c'ẽe xu Farasai xu hẽé naka c'ẽe xu Herotem di xu xùri-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé Gam koe tsééa úú, nxãasega xu gha síí kg'uim ko zi gúù zi cgoa qgóó Me ka.

Xu hàà a bìrí Me a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, q'ana xae hãa tseegu di Tsi khóè Tsi i sa, a c'ẽe khóè cgoa ga tchõà úú tama, khóèan di téé-q'ooan Tsi nqábé tama khama. Igaba Tsi ko Nqarim dim kg'ui ba tseeguse xgaa-xgaa. Ka i gáé kgoara mááèa hãa
Igabam kò Jeso ba gaxu dis kàa sa q'ana hãase bìrí xu a máá: “Dùús domka xao ko kúrúa bóò Tea máá? C'ẽem qano mari ba xao máà Te nakar bóò,” témé.
Xu mari ba máà Me, Me bìrí xu a máá: “Dìín dis tcúú sa ncẽe sa, naka gatàa dìín cg'õèa ncẽe e?” témé. Xu máá: “Kaesaram di si i,” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí xu a máá: “Eẽ Kaesaram di ii sa Kaesara ba máà, naka ẽe Nqarim di ii sa Nqari ba máà,” témé. Xu kò kaisase are Me.
Xu kò Saduke xu, ncẽe kò ko máá, x'ooan koe tẽe sa káà si i, témé xu hàà cgae Me, a hàà tẽè Me, a máá:

“Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, Moshe ba xg'ao x'áèan koe góá a máá, ncẽè khóèm kò káà cóáse khóè sa x'óóa guu, ne méém gam ka qõese ba ẽes dxàe-ntcõa sa séè, naka baà gam ka káímkhoe ba cóán ábà máá.
Xu kò 7 xu khóè qõeku xu hàna. Me kò kg'áíaka di ba khóè sa séè a cóán úú tamase x'óó.
Me kò cám̀ di ba gaas dxàe-ntcõa sa séè, a gataga cóán úú tamase x'óó. I kò nqoana dim ka gataga cúí ga thẽé ii.
Xu kò wèéa xu ẽe 7 xu ga cóá úú tamase x'óó. Si kò khóès ga sa thẽé kháóka x'óó.
Eẽ i ko x'ooan koe tẽeè ka sa gha gaxu ka ndakam di saà? Ncẽe wèéa xu 7 xu xg'ao séè sia hãa ka?” ta xu ma tẽè Me.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Dùús domka xao tsa̱a hãa?
Eẽ ne ko khóè ne x'ooan koe tẽe ka ne séèa hãa tite, a ne a séèkuan kgoara mááèa hãa tite, igaba ne gha nqarikg'ai di moengelean khama ii.

A ẽe x'óóa hãa ne ko x'ooan koe ghùiès ka xao gáé qanega Moshem dis Tcgãyas koe nxárá ta ga hãa, hìis di tchõàn dim xg'aekum koem kò Nqari ba nta gam ka méé sa a máá: ‘Tíí Ra Abrahamam dir Nqari Ra a, a Isakam dir Nqari Ra a, a Jakobem dir Nqari Ra a,’ tam mééa koe?
Eẽ x'óóa hãa ne dim Nqarim tama Me e, igabagam ẽe kg'õèa hãa ne di Me e; khama xao kaisase tsa̱a hãa,” tam méé.

Me kò c'ẽem x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao ba hàà, a kóḿ xu xu hãa a ko ntcoeku. Me ẽem ko Jeso ba qãèm xo̱a ba máà xua hãa sa bóòa q'ãa ka tẽè Me a máá: “Ndakam x'áè-kg'áḿ ba wèé xu ka tc'ãà di baa?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Wèé xu x'áè-kg'áḿ xu ka tc'ãà di ba ncẽe me e:
‘Oo, Iseraeleè, komsana,
gatá dim X'aigam Nqari ba,
X'aigam Nqari ba cúí Me e,
naka tsia gha X'aigam tsarim Nqari ba
wèé tcáóa tsi cgoa hẽé,
wèé kg'õèa tsi cgoa hẽé,
wèé tc'ẽea tsi cgoa hẽé,
naka wèé qaria tsi cgoa hẽéthẽé ncàm̀,’
témé,
me ko cám̀ di ba máá:
‘Eẽ tsi ma ncàm̀sea hãa khamaga ma
méé tsi tsáá ka c'ẽe ba ncàm̀,’
témé. C'ẽe x'áè-kg'áḿ ga káà a, ncẽem x'áè-kg'áḿ ka kaia a,” tam méé.
Me kò x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao ba bìrí Me a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, tseegu Tsi ko, c'ẽean ga káà a, igaba gaam cúí Me e,

gataga i cgáé e, Nqari ba tsi ga wèé tcáóa tsi cgoa hẽé, naka wèé kóḿa q'ãa tsi cgoa hẽé, naka wèé qaria tsi cgoa hẽéthẽé ncàm̀ sa, naka ẽe tsi ma ncàm̀sea hãa khamaga ma tsáá ka c'ẽe ba ncàm̀an hẽéthẽé e. A wèé zi dàòa-mááku zi hẽé naka qhàea-mááku zi ka hẽéthẽé cgáé e,” témé.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba bóò, tc'ẽegasem ncãa xo̱a sa kam kò bìrí me a máá: “Nqarim di x'aian ka tsi nqúù tama,” témé. I kò gaa koe guus ka khóèan bèe, c'ẽe tẽè ga i gha tẽè Me sa.
Eẽm Jeso ba tempelem q'oo koe hãa a ko xgaa-xgaa kam kò tẽè ne a máá: “Nta hẽés ka xu ko x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu máá, Kreste ba Dafitem ka Tsgõose-coa Me e, témé?
Dafitem tc'áró-tc'aroa kò Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽem ka kg'uikaguè, a máá:
‘X'aiga ba ko Tirim X'aiga ba bìrí a máá:
‘Kg'áò x'õàa Te xòè za ntcõó
nakar nxãakg'aiga síí Tsari cg'õo-kg'aoan
nqàrè-kg'ama Tsi koe tòó,’
témé.’
Dafitem ga ba ko ‘X'aiga’ ta ma tcii Me, ka ba gha nxãaska ntama gam ka Tsgõose-coa ba ii?” témé.
Si kò kaias xg'ae sa qãè-tcaoan cgoa komsana Me.
Eẽm ko xgaa-xgaa kam kò Jeso ba máá: “X'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu koe méé tu q'õésea hãa, ncẽe ko qáò qgáí-dxooan hã̱a, a x'ámágu di zi qgáì zi koe tsgám̀kagukuan qaa xu,
a ko kaia zi ntcõó-q'oo zi còrè-nquu xu koe qaa xu, naka tcom-tcomsa zi ntcõó-q'oo zi hẽéthẽé e kõ̱èan di zi qgáì zi koe.
Ncẽe ko dxàe-ntcõa zi di nquuan tc'õóa xgãá, a ko x'áíse xu gha ka qáòse còrè xu. Eẽta ii khóèa ne gha kaisase thõòkase xgàraè,” tam méé.

Me kò Jeso ba aban ko tòóèm qgáì ba q'óá-kg'ama hãase ntcõó, a ntcõó a ko xg'aes ko ma gaas di marian tempelean di ma tcãà sa bóò. Ne kòo káí ne khóè ne qguùa hãa ne káí marian tcãà.
Si kò dxàua hãas dxàe-ntcõa sa hàà cám̀ qano mari tsara ncemea tcãà, xg'ae-q'ooa tsara kòo thebe dim mari ba kúrú tsara.

Me kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu Gam koe tciia óá, a bìrí xu a máá: “Tseegua ner ko bìrí xao o: Ncẽes dxàe-ntcõas dxàua hãa sa ncãa wèé ne khóè ne nqáéa hãase aban ko tòóèm qgáìm koe marian tcana.
Wèé ne khóè nea kò gane di qguùan koe guu a tcg'òó, igabas kò gaa sa gas di dxàuan koe guu a wèéan ẽes kò úúa hãa ga tcg'òó khama,” témé.

Eẽm ko Jeso ba tempelem koe guu a tcg'oa, kam ko Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ka c'ẽe ba bìrí Me a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, tsóágase t'õè xu nxõ̱á xu hẽé naka nquu xu hẽéthẽéa gáé ncẽe e,” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí me a máá: “Ncẽe xu nquu xu kaia xu tsi ko bóò? Cuiskagas ncẽe koe cúís nxõ̱ás ga sa c'ẽes tc'amkg'ai koe guuèa hãa tite, wèéa zi ga gha xòóa qàrìè,” témé.

Me ẽem kò qanega Olife dim xàbìm tc'amkg'ai koe q'ábà ntcõe, a tempele ba q'óá-kg'ama hãa, ka xu ko Petere ba hẽé, Jakobo ba hẽé, Johane ba hẽé naka Anterea ba hẽéthẽé xu dxùukg'ai koe tẽè Me a máá:
“Bìrí xae e, n-cáḿa i gha ncẽe gúùan kúrúse sa, naka gataga ncẽe gúùan wèé ga gha hàà kúrúse dis x'áís gha dùú sa ii sa thẽé?” témé.
Me Jeso ba tshoa-tshoa a kg'ui cgoa xu a máá: “Q'ãa xao, naka i táá cúí khóè ga ho̱àkagu xao o guu.
Káí ne gha Tíí cg'õè ka hàà a gha máá, ganea Tíí ga Ra a, témé, a ne a gha káí khóèan ho̱àkagu.
