Naka ẽe tu kòo ncõoan hẽé naka gaan di nxàean hẽéthẽé kóḿ ne méé tu táá q'ae guu. Ncẽe gúùa ne gha kúrúse, igaba i qanega chõò-q'ooan hàà tama ke.

qhàò zi gha c'ẽe zi qhàò zi cgoa x'ãàku, i gha x'aian x'aian cgoa x'ãàku. Me gha nqõó ba gataga cgùru tãáka zi qgáì zi koe, xàbà ne gha nqõómkg'ai koe tcãà. Zi gha ncẽe zi gúù zi ábàn di thõòan di zi tshoa-tshoase-q'oo zi khamaga xám̀.

“Igabaga méé tu gatu q'õése, séèè tu gha a qhàìs cookg'ai koe úúè, a tu a gha síí còrè-nquuan koe qoaè, a gha Tíí domka tc'ãà còo-kg'ao xu hẽé naka x'aiga xu hẽéthẽé cookg'ai koe tòóè. Gatà hẽéan ka tu gha Tíí ka nxàea tseegukagu.
Kg'aia méé i qãè tchõàn

Naka ẽe xu kòo séè a ko qhàìs cookg'ai koe úú tu u ne, táá ẽe tu ga kg'ui kg'oana hãas gúùs ka q'áò guu, igaba tu wèés gúùs ẽe tu gha ẽem x'aèm ka máàè sa kg'ui. Gatu tama tu u ẽe gha ko kg'ui tu ke, igaba Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽe Me e gha ii.
“Khóè ba gha qõese ba x'oos koe tcãà, me gha xõò ba gam dim cóám ka gataga hẽé, i gha cóán gaan di xõòan ntcoe, a gha cg'õo o.
Tu gha Tiri cg'õèan domka wèé khóèan ka hòreè. Igaba gaam ẽe gha qarika téé a chõò-q'oos koe síí ba gha kgoaraè.

“Igaba ẽe tu ko q'áò-q'aosas gúù sa bóò si ẽes ga kò téé tama qgáì koe tẽe (ẽe ko nxárá ba méém kóḿa q'ãa!), ne méé ne nxãaska ẽe Jutea koe hàna ne xàbìan koe qgóéa síí,
nakam ẽe nquuan tco̱be koe hãa ba táá xõa, naka gam dim nquum q'oo koe tcãà guu, naka síí gaa koe hãa sa séè,
nakam ẽe xháràn koe hãa ba táá ka̱bise naka síí gam di qgáían séè guu.
Haò, cg'ãè i gha ii, ẽe zi cáḿ zi ka ẽe ncãàa zi koe cóán úúa zi khóè zi ka hẽé naka ẽe gha ko comkagu zi ka hẽéthẽé e.
Ke tu còrè naka i gha táá saò di x'aè ka kúrúse guu.
Eẽ xu cáḿ xu ka i gha gatà ii xgàrakuan hãa, ncẽe nqõóm dis tshoa-tshoases koe guu a qanega hãa tama a, ncẽem kò Nqari ba kúrú ba, ncẽes noose ga, a i a gaicara hãa tite.
A ncẽè X'aigam
“A ncẽè ẽem x'aèm kam kò c'ẽem khóè ba bìrí tu u a ko máá: ‘Bóò, ncẽe ga Me e Kreste ba,’ kana ko máá: ‘Bóò, ẽe gam síí hãa,’ témé ne méé tu táá dtcòm̀ m guu.

Tshúù-ntcõan di xu Kreste xu hẽé naka tshúù-ntcõan di xu porofiti xu hẽéthẽéa gha x'áíse, a gha x'áí zi hẽé naka are-aresa zi gúù zi hẽéthẽé kúrú, ẽe nxárá tcg'òóèa ne xu gha ho̱àkagu ka, kgoanase i kòo ne.
Ke méé tu gatu q'õésea hãa, x'aèan cookg'ai koer kò bìrí tu ua hãa ke.
“Igabagas gha ẽe xu cáḿ xu di xgàrakuan qãá q'oo koe
‘cáḿ sa ntcùú-ntcuuè,
me nxoe ba x'áà tite,
tco̱nò zi gha nqarikg'ai koe guu a tcheè,
i gha nqarikg'aian di qarian ntcãa-ntcãaè.’
Ne gha ẽe x'aè ka Khóèm dim Cóá ba bóò, Me túú-c'õòan q'oo koe guu a ko hàà, kaia qarian hẽé naka x'áàn hẽéthẽé cgoa.

Me gha nxãaska moengele xu tsééa tcg'òó, a ba a gha Gam di ne ẽe nxárá tcg'òóèa hãa ne wèé xòèan ẽe tc'ãán ko guu za xg'ae-xg'ae, a ba a gha nqõóm di chõò-q'ooan koe guu a síí nqarikg'ai di chõò-q'ooan ko chõò koe guu a Nqarim di ne ẽe nxárá tcg'òóèa hãa ne xg'ae-xg'ae.
“Ke tu faia dis hìis koe xgaa-xgaase: Eẽ i ko gas di nxã̱àn tshoa-tshoa a ko tso̱m, i ko to̱ara sa tso̱m, ne tu q'ana hãa qhóóa ne tcana hãa sa.
Gataga ẽe tu kòo ncẽe zi gúù zi bóò zi ko kúrúse, ne tu q'ana hãa cúù me e sa, a nquu-kg'áḿan koe hãa sa.
Tseegukar ko bìrí tu u a ko máá: Ncẽes qhàò sa kaà tite, ncẽe gúùan wèé ga kúrúse tamas cookg'ai koe.
Nqarikg'aian hẽé naka nqõókg'aian hẽéthẽéa gha chõò, igaba i Tiri kg'uian chõò tite.
“Igabaga i cúí khóè ga ẽem cáḿ ba, kana ẽem x'aèm gabá q'ãa tama, moengele xu nqarikg'ai koe hàna xua ga igaba, kana Cóásem ga igaba, Xõòm cúím ka oose.
Q'õésea méé tu hãa, naka kókòa hãa, c'úùa tu hãa n-cámám gha ẽem x'aè ba hàà sa ke.

Khóèm x'áéa ba koe ko guu a tãám nqõóm koe dàram khama i gha ii: gam dim nquu ba ko guu a qãà xu qarian máà ba, a wèém khóè ba gam di tsééan máà, a ba a nquu-kg'áḿ ba ko kòre ba x'áè, q'õé mem gha sa.
“Gaa domka méé tu kòresea hãa, n-cámám ko nquum ka q'õòse ba hàà sa tu c'úùa hãa ke, dqòa kaa, kana ntcùú nqáé kaa, kana ghòròan ko kg'ae x'aè kaa, kana ntcùúkg'ai cgoaa.
A ncẽè qháésem kòo hàà ne méém táá hàà sao-xg'ae tu u, naka tu x'óm̀a hãa guu.
Ncẽer ko bìrí xao o sar ko wèéa tu ga bìrí a ko máá: ‘Q'õése méé tu!’ témé.”

I kò ncẽeska cám̀ cáḿan qaùa hãa Pasekan hẽé naka péré gãé-gãe úú tamas pérés dis kõ̱è sa hẽéthẽé gha kúrúès cookg'ai koe, xu kò kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé naka x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé kàan qaa, Jeso ba xu gha qgóó a cg'õo di i,
a xu a kò máá: “Kõ̱ès di x'aè ka tamase, nxãaskas gha kaias xg'ore sa khóè ne xg'aeku koe hãa khama,” ta xu méé.

Jeso ba kò Betania koe hãa, Simonem ncẽe kò lepero dis tcìì sa úúa hãam dim nquum koe. Eẽm gaa koe hãa a ntcõó a ko tc'õó koes kò khóès alabasetere di nxõ̱án cgoa kúrúèam ts'óó-c'õám koe kò qãè hm̀m xg'ãòm tshãám, kaisa marian di ba qgóóa hãa sa hàà, a hàà alabasetere di nxõ̱án cgoa kúrúèam ts'óó-c'õá ba óè, a
Ne kò c'ẽe ne khóè ne ẽe kò gaa koe hãa ne xgóà a máá: “Dùús domka ba koáé ncẽem tshãá ba ncẽeta ma kõ̱è cgoaèa máá?
Ncẽe tshãá nea ga kò x'ámáguèa, kurim di marian di tc'ãò-tc'ãoan cgoa, i ga kò gaan di marian dxàua ne khóè ne máàèa hãa,” ta ne méé. A ne a kaisase mẽé si.
Igabam kò Jeso ba máá: “Guu si tu, dùús ka tu ko xgáè sia máá? T'õès tséé sas Tíí koe kúrúa hãa.
Dxàua ne khóè ne cgoa tu wèé x'aè ka hãa, a tu a gha ẽe tu ko tc'ẽe x'aè ka qãè zi gúù zi kúrúa máá a, igaba tu wèé x'aè ka Tíí cgoa hãa tite.
Eẽs ga kò kúrúa sas kúrúa hãa. Kg'ónòè tamar hãas cookg'ai koes tc'áróa Te tshãán cgoa ntcã̱á hãa khama.
Tseegukar ko bìrí tu a ko máá: Wèém nqõóm ẽe i ko ncẽe qãè tchõàn xgaa-xgaaèm koe, i gha ẽes kúrúa hãa gúùan nxàeè, tc'ẽe-tc'ẽeseès gha ka,” tam méé.
Me kò nxãaska Jutase Isekariote ba, 12 xu ka c'ẽe ba, kaia xu peresiti xu koe síí, nxãasegam gha síí
Eẽ xu ko ẽe sa kóḿ ka xu ko kaisase qãè-tcao, a bìrí me mari xu gha máà me sa. Me nxãaska qãèm x'aè ba qaa, Jeso bam gha tshàu q'ooa xu koe tcãà di ba.

Tc'ãà dim cáḿ péré gãé-gãe úú tamas pérés di kõ̱èan dim ka, ẽe xu ko ghùu-coam Paseka di ba cg'õo, ka xu ko Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu bìrí Me a máá: “Nda koe xae gha kg'ónòa máá Tsi, naka Tsi síí gaa koe Paseka di tc'õoan tc'õó sa Tsi ko tc'ẽe?” témé.

Me Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu koe cám̀ tsara tsééa tcg'òó a bìrí tsara a, a máá: “Qõò naka x'áé-dxoom koe síí, c'ẽem khóèm tshàa gàba ba qgóóa hãa ba tsao gha xg'ae cgoa. Xùri me,

naka ẽem kòo nquum ka q'õòse ba tcãà ne bìrí me naka máá: ‘Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao ba ko máá, cg'áè-nquum Tiri xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu cgoar gha hàà Paseka di tc'õoan tc'õó ba nda hãa sa?’ témé.
Me gha tc'amaka hãam nquum kaia, a wèé zi gúù zi tc'ẽeseko zi úúa hãam, nxãakamaga kg'ónòa xg'araèa ba x'áí tsao o, gaa koe tsao kg'ónòa máá xae e,” témé.
Tsara kò xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao tsara tcg'oa a x'áé-dxoom koe qõò, a síí ẽem kò ma bìrí tsara a hãa khamaga ma sao-xg'ae i ii, tsara ko Pasekan kg'ónòa máá Me.
Eẽ i ko dqòa kam kò 12 xu cgoa hàà.
Eẽ xu hãa a ko tc'õó kam ko Jeso ba máá: “Tseegukar ko bìrí xao o, gaxao ka c'ẽe ba gha khóè ne tshàu q'oo koe tcãà Te, ncẽe
Xu tshoa-tshoa a tshúù-tcaoa, a wèéa xu cúí mana cúí tẽè Me a máá: “A tíí tama raa?” témé.
Me xo̱a xu a máá: “Eẽ gaxao 12 xao ka c'ẽe me e, ncẽe ko Tíí cgoa gàbas koe péréan tcguù-tcguu ba.

Eẽ i ma Khóèm dim Cóám ka ma góásea khamaga i gha ii, igaba haò, cg'ãè i gha ii, ẽe ko Khóèm dim Cóá ba khóè ne tshàu q'oo koe tcãàm ka! Qãèa i ga kò máá mea hãa, táám ga kò ábàèa hãa sa,” tam méé.
Eẽ xu hãa a ko tc'õó, kam ko Jeso ba péré sa séè, a ts'ee-ts'eekg'ai si, a khõá q'aa si, a máà xu si, a ba a máá: “Séè, ncẽea Tirim cgàa me e,” témé.
A ba a kubi sa séè, a ts'ee-ts'eekg'ai si, a máà xu si, xu wèé xu ga gaas q'oo koe kg'áà.
Me bìrí xu a máá: “Ncẽe nea Tiri c'áò o, qáé-xg'aes di i, ncẽe ko káí ne khóè ne di iise ntcã̱águè e.

Tseegua ner ko bìrí xao a ko máá: Cuiskaga Ra gaicara kg'om dis hìis di gõéan kg'áàa hãa tite, me gha nxãakg'aiga síí ẽem cáḿ Nqarim di x'aian di ba tcãà, gaicara Ra gha ka̱base kg'áà a di ba,” tam méé.
Eẽ xu ko cii ba nxáèa xg'ara, ka xu ko tcg'oa a Olife dim xàbìm koe qõò.
Me Jeso ba bìrí xu a máá: “Wèéa xao ga gha khuùagu Te, góásea i hãa a ko máá:
‘Kòre-kg'ao bar gha xg'áḿ,
si gha ghùuan dis xg'ae sa qgóéa q'aa,’
téméè khama.
Igaba ẽer ko x'ooan koe ghùièa xg'ara ner gha tc'ãà-cookg'ai xao o, a Galilea koe qõò,” témé.
Me Petere ba bìrí Me a máá: “Eẽta xu ga ko ma wèéa xu ga khuùagu Tsi, igabar tíí cuiskaga gatà hẽé tite,” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí me a máá: “Tseegukar ko bìrí tsi: Ncẽem ntcùúm ka, qanegam ghòrò ba cám̀ q'oro kg'ae tamas cookg'ai koe tsi gha nqoana q'oro xo̱ase Te,” témé.
Igabam kò Petere tcana hãa tcáó cgoa kg'ui a máá: “Tsáá cgoar ga ko x'óó igabagar cuiskaga xo̱ase Tsia hãa tite,” témé. Xu kò wèé xu gatà méé.
Xu Getesemane ta ko ma tciièm qgáìm koe qõò.
Kam ko Petere ba hẽé, naka Jakobo ba hẽé, naka Johane ba hẽéthẽé xu séè, si kò tshoa-tshoa a kaisas tshúù-tcao sa hẽé nakas nxùrù-tcao sa hẽéthẽé tcãà Me.
Me bìrí xu a máá: “Tc'ẽea Tea kaisase thõòan xám̀a hãa, x'óór ga khama noose. Ncẽe koe xao qaù naka q'õé,” témé.
Me cg'árése còoka síí a góḿankg'ai koe cg'áé, a ba a còrè, ncẽè kgoanase i kò nem ga ẽem x'aè ba nqáé Me sa,
a ba a máá: “Aboè, Tiri Tsi Xõò Tseè, wèé zi gúù zia Tsáá koe tàà tama, ncẽes kubis

A ba a ka̱bise a síí cgae xu, a síí sao-xg'ae xu xu x'óm̀a hãa, Me Petere ba bìrí a máá: “Simoneè, x'óm̀a tsi gáé hãa? Táá tsi gáé ga kò kg'ama cúím aoaram ga ba kókòa ntcõó a q'õé?
Q'õésea méé xao hãa naka còrè, naka xaoa gha nxãasega táá kúrúa bóòkuan koe tcãà guu. Tc'ẽe ba
Me gaicara ka̱bise a qõò, a síí ẽem ncãa ko ma còrè khamaga ma còrè.
Eẽm ko gaicara ka̱bise a ko hàà kam kò sao-xg'ae xu xu x'óm̀a hãa, tcgáía xu kò ntcàma hãa khama. Xu kò táá q'ãa nta xu gha ma xo̱a Me sa.

Me gaicara nqoana dis ka hàà, a máá: “Qanega xao gáé x'óm̀a hãa, a ko sãa? Ncãa i tc'ãò ncẽeska, x'aè ba ncãa hàà. Bóò, Khóèm dim Cóá ba ko hàà chìbi-kg'ao ne tshàu q'oo koe tcãàè.
Tẽe xao, naka xae qõò. Eẽ khóè ne tshàu q'oo koe tcãà Team khóè ba cúùse hàna ke,” tam méé.

Eẽm Jeso ba qanega hãa a ko kg'ui kam ko kúúga Jutase ba hàà, 12 xu ka c'ẽe ba, a káí xu khóè xu cgoa hãa, ntcàuan hẽé naka dxòman hẽéthẽé kò qgóóa hãa xu, a kaia xu peresiti xu koe hẽé, naka x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu koe hẽé naka

Me kò nxãaska ẽe kò khóè ne tshàu q'oo koe tcãà Me ba x'áí sa máà xua hãa a ko máá: “Eẽr gha ko x'obè ba Gaam ga Me e, ke xao qgóó Me naka xaoa q'õé Mea hãase úúa tcg'òó Me,” témé.
Me Jutase ẽem ko hàà ka gaa x'aè kaga Jesom koe síí a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè,” témé. A x'obè Me.
Xu khóè xu Jeso ba séè a qgóó Me.
Igabam kò ẽe kò cúùse tẽe xu ka c'ẽe ba gam dim ntcàu ba tsgúùa tcg'òó, a kaiam peresitim dim qãàm dim tcee ba xg'aoa qhòm.
Me Jeso ba bìrí xu a máá: “Ts'ãà-kg'ao ba tsãá hààraa khama xao gáé ntcàuan hẽé naka dxòman hẽéthẽé cgoa hààraa, hàà xao gha qgóó Te ka?
Wèé cáḿ kar kò tempelem koe gaxao cgoa hãa a ko xgaa-xgaa, igaba xao kò gaa koe síí táá qgóó Te. Igaba méés
Xu kò nxãaska wèé xu
Me c'ẽem qárí-kg'ao-coa ba xùri Me, gúù ga kò hã̱a tama, a kò q'úúm qgáím cgoa tcáḿsea hãa ba, xu ntcàù me ka hẽé, igabam tshàu q'ooa xu koe nxàia tcg'oa,
a qgáí ba tshàu q'ooa xu koe qaù, a ba a hã̱a tamase qgóé.
Ka xu kò Jeso ba kaiam peresitim koe úú. Xu kò nxãaska wèé xu kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé, naka
Me Petere ba kháóka téé a còò Me, a síí nxãakg'aiga kaiam peresitim dim xhàrom q'oo koe tcãà, a ba a síí kòre-kg'ao xu cgoa c'ees-kg'áḿ koe ntcõó a kùru-kuruse.
Xu kò kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé naka wèé xu tc'ãà-cookg'ai xu hẽéthẽé Jeso ba xu gha chìbi-chibi a cg'õom dàò ba qaa, igaba xu kò táá hòò kòm̀ Me.
Káí xu khóè xu kò ko Gam ka tshúù-ntcõan nxàea tseegukagu khama, igaba zi kò ẽe xu ko nxàe zi gúù zi táá qõòa mááku.
Tsara c'ẽe tsara tẽea-téé a tshúù-ntcõan Gam ka nxàe a máá:
“Sitsama kò kóḿ Mea Me ko máá: ‘Tíí Ra gha ncẽem tempelem
Igabagas kò ẽe tsara ko nxàea tcg'òó sa táá qõòa mááku.
Me kaiam peresiti ba hàà a gaxu xg'aeku koe téé, a Jeso ba tẽè a máá: “C'ẽe gúù ga Tsi gáé xo̱a tama? Ncẽe tsara khóè tsara ko Tsáá ka nxàe sa gáé dùú saà?” témé.
Igabam kò nqoo a táá cúím tẽèm ga ba xo̱a.
Me gaicara kaiam peresiti ba tẽè Me a máá: “Kreste Tsi Tsia, Gam ncẽe ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa hãam di Tsi Cóá Tsi?” témé.

Me Jeso ba máá: “Tíí ga Ra a. Khóèm dim Cóá ba tu gha bóò, Me Gaam ẽe wèé qarian úúa hãam dim kg'áòm x'õàm xòè za ntcõóa-ntcõe, a ko nqarikg'ai di túú-c'õòan cgoa xõa,” témé.
Me kaiam peresiti ba qgáía ba tòàra q'aa a máá: “Dùú di nxàea tseegukagu-kg'ao xae gáé ko qanega qaa?
Ncãa xao kóḿ kaisas cóèkus ncẽe sa! Gaxaoa ko ntama ma tc'ẽe?” témé.
Xu wèéa xu ga xgàra Me a máá, x'oos kam kg'anoèa, témé.
Xu c'ẽea xu tshoa-tshoa a tcg'ae cgae Me, a qáé tcgáí Me, a xu a xg'áḿku cgoa Me, a bìrí Me a máá: “Porofita
Eẽm kò Petere ba nqãaka qanega xhàrom koe hãa kas kò kaiam peresitim di zi qãà zi ka c'ẽe sa hàà cgae me,
a ẽes ko Petere ba bóò me hãa a ko kùru-kuruse, kas kò qãèse bóò me a máá: “Tsáá igaba tsi kò thẽé Nasareta dim Jesom cgoa hãa!” témé.
Igabam kò xo̱ase e a máá: “C'úùar hãa, a ra a kóḿa q'ãa tama, dùús ka si ko kg'ui sa,” témé. A ba a xhàros-kg'áḿ koe síí tcg'oa, [me ghòrò ba kg'ae].
Si kò qãà sa gaa koe bóò me, a tshoa-tshoa a gaicara ẽe kò gaa koe téé-tẽe ne khóè ne bìrí a máá: “Ncẽem khóè ba gaxu ka c'ẽem ga me e!” témé.
Igabam kò gaicara xo̱ase e.
X'aè-coam qãá q'oo koe ne ko ẽe kò téé-tẽe ne Petere ba bìrí a máá: “Tseeguan kaga tsi gaxu ka c'ẽe tsi i, Galilea di tsi khóè tsi i thẽé khama,” témé.
Me kò tshoa-tshoa a cgúíse a gaìse a máá: “Khóèm ncẽe bar c'úùa hãa, ncẽe tu ko Gam ka kg'ui ba,” témé.

Me kò kúúga ghòrò ba cám̀ di sa kg'ae. Me Petere ba Jesom kò bìrí mea hãa kg'uian tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese, ncẽem kò máá: “Ghòròm qanega cám̀ q'oro kg'ae tamas cookg'ai koe tsi gha nqoana q'oro xo̱ase Te,” témé e. Kagam ko qhuìa óè a kg'ae.
Kaisa ntcùúkg'ai cgoa xu kò kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé, naka
Me Pilato ba tẽè Me a máá: “A Tsáá ga Tsia Juta ne di Tsi X'aiga Tsi?” témé. Me xo̱a me a máá: “Eẽ tsi ko méé khamaga i ii,” témé.
Xu kò kaia xu peresiti xu káí zi gúù zi koe chìbi-chibi Me.
Me Pilato ba gaicara tẽè Me a máá: “Kháé Tsi c'ẽe xo̱a ga úú tama? Bóò, nta noo zi chìbi zi ka xu ko chìbi-chibi Tsi sa,” témé.
Igabam kò Jeso ba táá cúí xo̱a ga kúrú, me Pilato ba are.
Me kò Pilato ba wèés kõ̱ès koe c'ẽem khóèm qáé-nquum koe tcãàèa ba kgoara, ncẽe khóè ne kò ko dtcàrà mááse ba.
Eẽ x'aè kam kò Barabase ta ko ma tciièm khóè ba qáé-nquum koe hãa, ncẽe kò xg'ae sa kúrúa hãa a ko khóè ne cg'õo xu khóè xu cgoa kò xg'ae a qáéèa hãa ba.
Ne khóè ne hààraa xg'aeku a ne a tshoa-tshoa a Pilato ba dtcàrà ẽem ko kg'aiga ma kúrúa máá ne khama méém ma kúrúa máá ne sa.
Me Pilato ba xo̱a ne a máá: “Juta ne dim X'aiga bar gha kgoara máá tu u sa tu ko tc'ẽe?” témé.
Kaia xu peresiti xu kò tauan xu úú cgoa Mea hãa domka gam koe óága Mea hãa sam kò q'ana hãa khama.
Igaba xu kò kaia xu peresiti xu khóè ne qg'áì, Barabase ba méé ne dtcàrà mááse naka nea nxãa ba kgoara mááè sa.
Me kò Pilato ba gaicara tẽè ne a máá: “Kháé ra gha Juta ne dim X'aiga Me e ta tu ko méém ka dùú sa kúrú sa tu ko tc'ẽe?” témé.
Ne q'au a máá: “Xgàu Me!” témé.
Me Pilato ba tẽè ne a máá: “Dùútsa gúùs cg'ãè sa ba kúrúa hãa?” témé. Igaba ne kò kaisase q'au a máá: “Xgàu Me!” témé.
Me kò Pilato ba khóè ne qãè-tcaokagu kg'oana hãa khamam kò Barabase ba kgoara máá ne. A ba a Jeso ba qoara xg'ara a tcg'òó Me, síím gha xgàuè ka.
Xu kò ncõo-kg'ao xu Jeso ba x'aigam dim nquum q'oo koe tcãà (Peretoriume ta ko ma tciiè ba), a xu a wèés xg'aes ncõo-kg'ao xu di sa tciia xg'ae.
A xu a nco̱àm qgáí ba hã̱akagu Me, a dxàman cgoa kúrúèas cábá sa kabea xg'ae a cábákagu Me,
a xu a tshoa-tshoa a tsgám̀ Me a máá: “Tcgáío, Juta ne di Tsi X'aiga Tseè!” témé.
A xu a kò tcúúa ba koe tc'áà dim hìim cgoa xg'áḿ Me, a tcg'ae Me, a xu a qhòm tsi qúrù a nco̱ia ba ka dqo̱m̀ Me.
Eẽ xu ko gatà ma nco̱i Mea xg'ara ka xu kò nco̱àm qgáí ba nxõ̱o cgae Me, a nxãaska séè a úú Me, síí xu gha xgàu Me ka.

Eẽ xu xóé a ko qõò ka xu kò c'ẽem khóèm Simone ta ko ma tciièm, Kurene dim, Alekesantere tsara Rufasea tsara ka xõòm cgoa xg'ae, me xháràm koe guu a ko x'áé-dxoom koe qõò, ka xu kò chùi mem Gam dis xgàu sa dcẽé.
Xu kò Jeso ba Gologota ta ko ma tciièm qgáìm koe úú (ncẽe sa ko máá: ‘Tcúú c'õás dim qgáì ba,’ témé),
a xu a mira ta ko ma tciièm tsóòm cgoa tcg'ome-xg'aeèa gõéan máà Me kg'áàm gha ka, igabam kò táá séè e.
Xu kò xgàu Me, a xu a Gam di qgáían cgúúan ntcòó a q'aa-q'aaku.
Eẽ xu ko xgàu Me ka i kò 9 di x'aè e, ntcùúkg'ai cgoa di i.
Eẽm kò chìbi-chibi cgoaèa hãas tcgãya sa kò ‘JUTA NE DIM X'AIGA BA’ ta ma góásea hãa.
Xu kò cám̀ tsara ts'ãà-kg'ao tsara Gam cgoa xgàu, c'ẽe ba xu kò kg'áò xòèa ba za xgàua hãa, a c'ẽe ba dxàe xòèa ba za xgàua hãa.
Ne ẽe kò ko dàòm cgoa nqáé ne khóè ne cóè Me, a ne a nxa̱a-nxa̱na tcúú a máá: “Eheè, Tsáá koma ko tempele ba ko̱be, a nqoana cáḿan q'oo koe tshào me Tsi Tsia,
kgoarase naka Tsia xgàu hìis koe xõa,” témé.
Gataga xu kò ma kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé, naka x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé xu ma nco̱i Me thẽé, a máá: “C'ẽe ne khóè nem kgoara hãa, igabam ko kgoarasean ka tààè.
Ncẽem Kreste ba, ncẽe Iseraele dim x'aiga ba méém xgàu hìis koe xõa, naka ta gha nxãasega bóò naka dtcòm̀,” ta xu méé.
Tsara ẽe kò Gam cgoa xgàuèa tsara gataga thẽé nco̱i Me.
Koaba di x'aèan 12 di ko tcãà kas kò ntcùú sa wèém nqõóm koe xóé, a síí dqòa di x'aèan nqoana di koe téé.
Me kò Jeso ba nqoana dim x'aèm ka kaiam dòm̀ cgoa q'au a máá: “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakatani?” témé. Ncẽe sa ko máá: “Tiri Nqariè, Tiri Nqariè, dùús domka Tsi aagu Tea?” témé.
Ne ẽe kò gaa koe téé-tẽe ne ka c'ẽe ne kóḿ Me a máá: “Kóḿ, ncẽe ba ko Elija ba tcii,” témé.

Me kò c'ẽe ba qgóé, a síí x'úrúan koe tsa̱u tshàan ntcã̱á, a tc'áàm koe qhàea tòó, a hàà máà Me, kg'áàm gha ka, a máá: “Qãà naka ta bóò Elija ba gha hàà xòó Me sa,” témé.
Me kò Jeso ba kaiam dòm̀ cgoa q'au, a ba a còo di sa sónòa tcg'òó.
Me kò tempelem dim qgáí ba cám̀ xòè tsara cgoa tòàra q'aase, a tc'amaka guu a síí nqãaka téé.
Eẽm ko ncõo-kg'ao xu dim kaiam ncẽe kò

Gataga zi kò c'ẽe zi khóè zi nqúù ka téé a ko bóò. Gazi xg'aeku koes kò Maria Magatalena sa hãa, naka Jakobom cg'áré ba hẽé naka Josefa ba hẽéthẽé tsara ka xõòs Maria sa hẽé, naka Salome sa hẽéthẽé zi.
Eẽm kò Jeso ba qanega Galilea koe hàna ka kòo còò Me, a ko hùi Me zi khóè zi i kò ii. Káí zi khóè zi ẽe kò Jerusalema koe síí cgoa Mea hãa zi kò thẽé hàna.
Eẽ i ko dqòa, kg'ónòsean dim cáḿ me e kò ii khama, Sabata cookg'ai di ba,

kam kò Josefam Arimatea di ba hàà, tcommèa kò hãam khóè me e kò ii, kaia xu dis xg'aes di ba, ncẽe gam tc'áró ga kò thẽé Nqarim di x'aian qãà hãa ba. A ba a kò kgoarasea hãase Pilatom koe síí, a síí Jesom dim tc'áró ba dtcàrà.
Jesom nxãakamaga x'óóa hãa sam ko Pilato kóḿ kam kò are. A ncõo-kg'ao xu dim kaia ba tcii, a tẽè me Jesom ncãa ncìíse x'óó sa.
Eẽm ko ncõo-kg'ao xu dim kaiam koe kóḿ gatà i ii sa, kam ko Josefa ba tc'áró ba máà.

Me Josefa ba q'úúm qgáí ba x'ámá, a tc'áró ba xòó a gaam qgáím cgoa tcáḿ, a ba a síí qarim nxõ̱ám koe tshàoèa hãas tc'ám̀s koe xòó Me. A nxõ̱á-dxoo sa gaas tc'ám̀s kg'áḿ koe ghànèa tcẽekg'am cgoa.
Sara kò Maria Magatalena sa hẽé naka Marias Josefam ka xõò sa hẽéthẽé sara Jesom dim tc'áróm xòóèa hãa qgáìan bóò.
Eẽm ko Sabata dim cáḿ ba nqáé ka zi kò Maria Magatalena sa hẽé, naka Marias Jakobom ka
Tc'ãà dim cáḿ bekem dim di kaisa ntcùúkg'ai cgoa zi kò cáḿs tcg'oara hãa ka xgoaba a tc'ám̀s koe qõò.
A ko tẽèku a ko máá: “Dìí na gha nxõ̱á sa tc'ám̀s-kg'áḿ koe ghànèa tcg'òóa máá se e?” témé.
Igaba ẽe zi ko ghùi-kg'ai ka zi kò nxõ̱á sa bóò si téé-q'ooa sa koe ghànèa tcg'òóèa hãa, kaisases ko kaia khama.
Zi kò nxãaska ẽe zi ko tc'ám̀s koe tcãà ka q'úúm qgáí ba ha̱nam qárí-kg'ao ba bóò me kg'áò xòè koe ntcõóa-ntcõe, ka zi kò area.
Me bìrí zi a máá: “Táá sao q'áò guu, Jesom Nasareta di ba sao ko qaa, ncẽe kò xgàuèa hãa ba. Ghùièam hãa, a ncẽe koe káà Me e; bóò, ncẽea xòóèam kò hãa qgáìan ga a.

Igabaga méé sao qõò, naka síí Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu bìrí - naka Petere ba hẽéthẽé e - naka máá, gaxao kam gha tc'ãà a Galilea koe qõò. Gaa koe xao gha sao-xg'ae Me, ẽem ma bìrí xaoa hãa khamaga ma, témé,” tam méé.
Zi kò
Eẽm ko tc'ãà dim cáḿ bekem dim ka Jeso ba x'ooan koe ntcùúkg'ai cgoa tẽe kam kò Maria Magatalenas koe tc'ãà a x'áíse, ncẽem kò gaas koe 7 dxãwa tc'ẽean xhàiagua hãa sa.
Si kò qõò a sa a síí ẽem kò ko hẽé cgoa ne bìrí, ẽe ne hãa a tshúù-tcaoa hãa, a ko kg'ae ka.
Igaba ẽe ne ko kg'õèam hãa, a ba a Maria Magatalenas ka bóòèa hãa sa kóḿ, ka ne kò táá dtcòm̀.
Ncẽes gúùs qãá q'oo koem kò Jeso ba tãám dàòm ka gane ka c'ẽe tsara koe x'áíse, ẽe tsara xóé a ko c'ẽem qgáìm koe qõò ka.
Tsara ka̱bise a tsara a síí c'ẽe ne koe xàà a, igabaga ne kò táá dtcòm̀.

Me gaa koe guus ka Jeso ba 11 xu koe x'áíse, ẽe xu hãa a ko tc'õó ka, a ba a gaxu di dtcòm̀ taman ka hẽé, naka gaxu di qari tcáóan ka hẽéthẽé dqàè xu, ẽem x'ooan koe tẽea hãa ka bóò Mea hãa ne xu kò táá dtcòm̀ khama.
A ba a bìrí xu a máá: “Wèém nqõóm ncẽe ba xao qõò, naka xaoa wèé ne khóè ne Nqarim di qãè tchõàn ka xgaa-xgaa.
Dìím wèém ẽe ko dtcòm̀ a ko tcguù-tcguuè ba gha kgoaraè, igaba dìím wèém ẽe dtcòm̀ tama ba gha xgàraè.
Zi gha ncẽe zi x'áí zi gane ẽe dtcòm̀a hãa ne koe tséé: dxãwa tc'ẽean ne ne gha Tiri cg'õèan cgoa xhàiagu, a ne a gha ka̱ba xu ta̱m xu cgoa kg'ui.

Tshàua ne cgoa ne gha cg'aoan qgóóa ghùi, a ne a gha ẽe ne dqãèan kg'áà hãa igabaga i cuiskaga thõò-thõo nea hãa tite. A ne a gha tsàako ne khóè ne koe gane di tshàuan tòó, ne gha qãè,” tam méé.
Me kò nxãaska X'aigam Jeso ba ẽem ko kg'ui cgoa xua xg'ara, ka séèa ghùi a nqarikg'ai koe qaòkaguè, a ba a síí Nqarim dim kg'áòm x'õàm xòè koe ntcõó.
Xu nxãaska xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu tcg'oa a síí Nqarim dim kg'ui ba wèém nqõóm koe xgaa-xgaa. Me kò X'aiga ba gaxu cgoa tsééa xg'ae, a kò Gam dim kg'ui ba x'áí zi cgoa tseegukagu. Amen.]
Káí ne khóè nea xg'ao xg'aekua ta koe xg'ao ko kúrúse zi gúù zi bóò a góá.
Khóè ne ncẽe tshoa-tshoas ka kò gane tcgáí ka ncẽe zi gúù zi bóòa ne, a ne a kò hàà Nqarim dim kg'uim di ne xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao ne ii nea ncẽe zi gúù zi máà taa hãa.

Tíí igabar kò wèé zi gúù zi tshoa-tshoas koe qãèse tẽèa xám̀, i ncẽeska qãèa máá tea, ẽe zi ma kúrúsea xùrikua hãas kar ga góá máá tsi sa, tsáá Teofila tsi tcom-tcomsa tsi,
nxãasega tsi gha wèé tseeguan ncẽe tsi xgaa-xgaaèa ka q'ãa ka.
I kúrúse Herotem xg'ao x'aigam Jutea di ba ii x'aè ka, me kò Sakaria ta ko ma tciièm peresiti ba hàna, Abiam dis xg'aes di xu peresiti xu di ba. Gam dis khóès Elisabete sa kò
Sakaria khara Elisabetea khara kò Nqarim cookg'ai koe tchàno khara khóè khara a, a wèé x'áè-kg'áḿan X'aigam Nqarim di ko kúrú, a chìbi úú tama.
Elisabete sa kò ábà tamas khóè si i khama khara kò káà cóá khara a. A kò gataga wèéa khara ga gàeasea hãa.
I kúrúse me x'aè ba hàà Sakariam dis xg'aes di xu gha tempelem koe síí tséé di ba, me kò Sakaria ba síí peresitim di tsééan Nqarim cookg'ai koe kúrú.

Peresiti xu di cauan ka xu xg'ao ko cúím khóè ba nxárá tcg'òó, tempelem q'oo koe gha tcãà a qãè hm̀m̀ xg'ãò gúùan Nqari ba dàòa máá ba. Gaam cáḿ kam kò Sakaria ba nxárá tcg'òóè.
Eẽm tempelem q'oo koe hãa a ko qãè hm̀m̀ xg'ãò gúùan Nqari ba dàòa máá ka ne kò wèé ne khóè ne tempelem ka tchàa koe hãa a ko còrè.
Me moengelem Nqarim di ba qhúí-kg'ai me, a ba a kg'áòm x'õàm xòè za téé, ẽem gabá hãa a ko ẽes qãè hm̀m̀ xg'ãòs gúù sa altaram koe Nqari ba dàòa máá koe.
Eẽm ko Sakaria ba moengele ba bóò kam kò q'ae a q'áòs ka tcãàè.
Me moengele ba bìrí me a máá: “Táá q'áò guu, Sakariaè. Còrèa tsi komsanaèa, si gha tsaris khóès Elisabete sa cóá ba ábà, tsi gha Johane ta ma tcii me ke.
A tsi a gha kaisase qãè-tcao, i gha gataga káí khóèan gaam di ábà x'aèan ka qãè-tcao.
X'aigam
a ba a gha káí ne khóè ne Iseraele di ne X'aigam gane dim Nqarim koe ka̱bi.
Elijam di tc'ẽean hẽé naka qarian hẽéthẽé cgoam gha
Me Sakaria ba moengele ba tẽè a máá: “Nta ra gha ma q'ãa ncẽe zi gúù zi gha kúrúse sa? Gàeasea raa, si tiris khóès igaba gàeasea hãa ka,” témé.
Me moengele ba xo̱a me a máá: “Tíí ra Gabariele ra a, a ra a Nqarim cookg'ai koe tẽe. Gaam ga ba tséé tea, hààr gha kg'ui cgoa tsi, a qãè zi tchõà zi ncẽe zi óágara máá tsi ka.
Bóò, dtcòm̀ tama tsia domka tsi gha ncẽe koe guus ka nqooa hãa, a kg'ui tite, me gha nxãakg'aiga síí x'aè ba hàà ncẽe zi gúù zi gha hàà kúrúse ba,” tam méé.
Nxãaska i ko káí khóèan tchàa koe téé-tẽe a ko Sakaria ba qãà, a area hãa, dùús domkam tempelem q'oo koe ncẽeta noose ãoa hãa sa.
Eẽm ko tcg'oa kam kò gane cgoa kg'uian ka tààè, ne kò bóòa q'ãa tempelem q'oo koem kò x'áí sa bóòa hãa sa. Me kò nqoo-nqoosase nxàem ko sa tshàua ba cgoa x'áí ne.
A ba a kò ẽe xu cáḿ xu kam ko tempelem koe tsééa xg'ara ka x'áéa ba koe ka̱bise.
Ncẽe zi gúù zi qãá q'oo koes kò gam dis khóès Elisabete sa ncãàn úú, a sa a 5 nxoean séè a nquum q'oo koe cúía hãa, khóè ne gha táá bóò si ka. Si bìríse a máá:
“X'aigam
Me kò moengelem Gabariele ba 6 dim nxoem ka Galilea dim x'áé-dxoom Nasareta dim koe Nqarim ka tsééa úúè,
dxàe-coas koe, ncẽe kò Josefa ta ko ma tciièm qárí-kg'aom ka séèkuan tòóa mááèa hãa sa. Josefa ba kò Dafitem dis qhàòs dim khóè me e, i gaas dxàe-coas di cg'õèan kò Maria a.
Moengelem ko Marias koe hàà kam kò hàà tsgám̀kagu si a máá: “X'aigam
Si Maria sa ẽem ko gatà méé ka kaisas q'áòs ka tcãàè, a sa a kò tẽèse dùús domkam ko gatà ma tsgám̀kagu si sa.
Me moengele ba bìrí si a máá:
“Táá q'áò guu, Mariaè,
Nqarim koe si cgóm̀kuan hòòa hãa ke.
Bóò, ncãà si gha úú, a kg'áòm cóá ba ábà,
a si a gha Jeso ta ma tcii Me.
Tcom-tcomsam khóè Me e gha ii,
a ba a gha tc'amaka hãam Nqarim dim Cóá ba iise tciiè,
Me gha X'aigam Nqari ba x'aian dis ntcõó-q'oo sa máà Me,
Gam ka xõò-dxoom Dafitem khamaga ma.
Jakobem dis qhàòs koem gha chõò tamase x'aiga ii,
si Gam dis x'ai sa cuiskaga chõò tite,”
tam moengele ba méé.
Si Maria sa moengele ba bìrí a máá: “Nta i gha ii, qane cgoar kg'áò-khoe cgoa xóé tama ka?” témé.
Me moengele ba xo̱a si a máá:
“Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽe ba gha sáá koe hàà,
kaisase Tc'amaka hànam di qaria nea gha qàbi si,
Me gha gaa domka
Gaam ẽe gha ko ábàè ba tcom-tcomsa ii,
a ba a gha Nqarim dim Cóá ba ta ma tciiè.
Bóò kg'ama, ncẽe Elisabetes koe kúrúsea sa.
Wèé khóèa ne kò q'ana hãa cóás úú tite sa,
a sa a ábà tamas khóè si i sa,
igaba ncẽes gàeasea hãa kas kg'áòm cóá ba qóḿa hãa,
i nxoea sa ncẽeska 6 i.
Cúí gúù ga káà a, Nqarim ka kúrúè tite e khama,”
tam méé.
Si Maria sa xo̱a me a máá: “Ncãa ga ra a, X'aigam
Gaa x'aè kas kò Maria xgoaba a sa a qháése c'ẽem x'áé-dxoom xàbìan dim koe síí, Juta ne di ba.
A sa a Sakariam x'áé koe tcãà a Elisabete sa tsgám̀kagu.
Eẽs ko Elisabete sa kóḿs ko Maria tsgám̀ sia ts'oo kam ko cóá ba ncãàa sa q'oo koe ko̱ri, si Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽem ka cg'oè cgaeè,
a sa a tc'amaka kg'ui a máá:
“Wèé zi khóè zi cookg'ai koe si sáá ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa. Me gataga sarim cóá ba thẽé ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa.
Dùútsa gúùs kaia sa ko ncẽe cáḿ ka tíí koe kúrúse, ncẽe tirim X'aigam
Eẽr ko kóḿ si ko ma tsgám̀ tea ts'oo sa kam ko gaa x'aè kaga cóá ba ncãàa te q'oo koe qãè-tcaoan ka ko̱ri khama.
Ncẽem X'aigam
Si Maria sa máá:
“X'aigam
i tc'ẽea te Nqarim Kgoara-kg'aom Tirim koe
qãè-tcaoan ka cg'oèa hãa,
Gam dis qãàs di nqãaka hãa nem bóòa hãa khama.
Bóò, ncẽe koe guus ka zi gha wèé zi qhàò zi nxàe
ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièar hãa sa.
Qarian úúa hãa ba kaisa zi gúù zi kúrúa máá tea hãa khama,
i cg'õèa ba tcom-tcomsa a.
Gam di thõò-xama-máákua nem ko
ẽe ko q'áò Me ne koe x'áí
ẽe zi ko ma qhàò zi hàà khama.
a ba a ẽe tc'ẽega ne e,
ta tcáóa ne q'oo koe tc'ẽea hãa ne khóè ne
tsa̱i-tsa̱ia q'ara hãa.
Kaia x'aiga nem
gaan di ntcõó-q'ooan x'aian di koe guu a xòoa hãa,
a ẽe nqãaka hàna khóèan ghùia hãa.
Xàbàa khóèa nem xg'ãàkagua hãa
qãè zi gúù zi cgoa,
a ba a ẽe qguùa hãa khóèan
káà gúù tshàu-q'oose tcg'òóa hãa.
Gam dim qãàm Iseraele bam hùia,
thõò-xama-máákuan Gam dim ko tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese khama.
Ncẽem ma gatá ka xõò ga ne nqòòkagua hãa khama,
Abrahamam ka hẽé
naka qhàòa ba ka hẽéthẽé e,
chõò tamase,”
tas Maria méé.
Si kò Maria sa nqoana khama noo nxoean Elisabetes cgoa síí hãa, a sa a nxãwa ka̱bise a x'áéa sa koe dìbi.
Me kò Elisabetes gha ábàm x'aè ba hàà, si kò kg'áòm cóá ba ábà.
Ne kò cúùse x'ãèa ne khóè ne hẽé naka gas di qhàòan hẽéthẽé kóḿ X'aigam
A ne a 8 cáḿa nem cóá ba úúa ka hàà, hàà ne gha q'ãe nqãa-qgai khòo me ka, a ne a Sakaria ta ma tcii me kg'oana, xõòm cg'õè cgoa.
Si gam ka xõò sa xo̱a a máá: “Eẽ ẽe, Johane tam gha ma tciiè,” témé.
Ne khóè ne bìrí si a máá: “Eẽta xam̀s cg'õès kò qhàòa si di ne koe káà si i ná,” témé.
Ne tshàua ne cgoa sere-sere a xõò ba tẽè, ntam ko cóám di cg'õèan ka méé sa.
Me góám gha gúùan tca̱ba dtcàrà, a góá a máá: “Cg'õèa ba Johane e,” témé. Ne wèéa ne are.
Me kò gaa x'aè kaga Sakaria gaicara tshoa-tshoa a kg'ui, a Nqari ba dqo̱m̀.
Ne kò ẽem qgáìm di ne khóè ne wèé ne q'áòs ka tcãàè, ne kò Jutea di xu xàbì xu wèé xu di ne khóè ne ncẽe ko kúrúse zi gúù zi wèé zi ka kg'ui.
Ne kò wèé ne ẽe kò kóḿ ne are a tẽèse a máá: “Dùútsa cóá ba gáé ncẽe ba?” témé. X'aigam
Me kò cóám ka xõòm Sakaria ba Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽem ka cg'oè cgaeè, a ba a porofita a máá:
“Dqo̱m̀mè méém X'aigam Nqarim Iseraele di ba,
Gam di ne khóè ne koem hààraa
a ba a ko hàà kgoara ne ke.
Kgoarakuan dim nxãà bam tc'amaka ghùia máá ta a hãa.
Gam dim qãàm Dafitem di ne qhàò ne koe.
Ncẽem ko ma ncìísega
Gam di xu porofiti xu tcom-tcomsa xu koe ma kg'uia hãa khama,
a ba a ko máá,
hààm gha gatá di ne cg'õo-kg'ao ne koe hẽé
naka wèé ne ẽe hòre taa ne
di tshàu-q'ooan koe hẽéthẽé kgoara ta a.
Ncẽem dàòm kam ko
gatá di xõòan koe thõò-xama-máákuan x'áí,
ncẽem kò nqòòkagu nea hãa a,
naka Gam dis qáé-xg'aes tcom-tcomsa sa tc'ẽe-tc'ẽesean hẽéthẽé e,
gaìses ncẽem gatá ka xõòm Abrahamam koe gaìsea sa,
gatá di ne cg'õo-kg'ao ne koem gha tcg'òó ta a ka,
ta gha nxãasega q'áò tamase hẽé,
tcom-tcomsase hẽé
naka tchànose hẽéthẽé
cookg'aia ba koe tsééa máá Me,
wèé kg'õèa ta q'oo koe.
Tsáá tiri tsi cóá tsi,
di tsi porofiti tsi iise tsi gha tciiè,
a tsi a gha hààm gha xu dàò xu kg'ónòa máá Me.
Gam di ne khóè ne tsi gha bìrí
nta ne gha ma q'ãan di tc'ẽean di kgoarasean hòò sa,
gane di chìbian di qgóóa-máákuan koe guu a.
Gatá dim Nqari ba ko tcáóa ba q'oo koe thõòan xám̀,
gaa domkam gha cáḿs ko tcg'oa xòè koe guuam x'áàm
ncẽe tc'amaka guuam cgoa x'áà-x'aa ta a.
Wèém khóèm ẽe
ntcùús q'oo koe hẽé
naka x'ooan di sóm̀an koe hẽéthẽé hànam
koem gha x'áà ba óága,
a ba a gha dàòa ta tchàno-tchano
tòókuan dim dàòm koe,”
tam méé.
Me kò cóá ba kai a tc'ẽean koe qari, a ba a kò tchàa-xgóós koe hàna, me síí hààm gha Iseraele di ne khóè ne cookg'ai koe x'áísem x'aè ba hàà.
Eẽm x'aèm kam xg'ao
Ncẽes nxárákus kg'áíka di sa xg'ao Kurinem kò Siria koe x'aiga ii x'aè ka kúrúse.
Me kò wèém khóè ba nxãaska gam dim x'áé-dxoom koe síí góáse.
Me Josefa thẽé Nasareta dim x'áé-dxoom Galilea dim koe guu a síí Jutea dim x'áé-dxoom koe tcãà, Betelehema ta ko ma tciiè ba,
Gaa koem kò síí Marias cgoa góáse, ncẽem kò séèkuan tòóa máána hãa sa, si kò gataga qóḿ ii.
khara Betelehema koe hãa kam kò cóá bas gha ábà dim x'aè ba hàà.
Si kò qgáé-kg'ai dim cóám gas di ba ábà, a sa a qgáían cgoa tcáḿ Me, a dxòrom q'oo koe xòó Me, cg'áè-nquum koe i kò x'óm̀-q'ooan káà a khama.
Xu kò c'ẽe xu ghùu kòre-kg'ao xu qãáka hãa a tééa q'uu a ko ghùu zi kòre.
Me kúúga moengelem X'aigam di ba hàà qàea xu koe téé, me X'aigam dim x'áà ba x'áà-x'aa xu, xu kò kaisase q'áò.
Me kò moengele ba bìrí xu a máá: “Táá q'áò guu! Bóò, qãè tchõà ner ko óága máá xao o, ncẽe gha hàà wèé khóèan kaisa qãè-tcaoan máà a ke.
Ncẽem cáḿ ka tu Dafitem dim x'áé-dxoom koe Kgoara-kg'ao ba ábà mááèa - X'aigam Kreste ba!
Si gha ncẽes gúù sa gaxao koe x'áí sa ii: cóá-coam qgáían ka tcáḿ a dxòrom q'oo koe xòóèa ba xao gha hòò,” tam méé.
Si kò kúúga moengele xu dis xg'aes nqarikg'ai di sa qhúí a gaam moengelem cgoa hàna hãase Nqari ba dqo̱m̀, a máá:
“Dqo̱m̀kuan méé i kaisase tc'amaka hànam Nqarim koe hãa,
naka tòókuan hẽéthẽé e nqõómkg'ai koe,
khóè ne ẽem ncàm̀a hãa ne koe,”
témé.
Eẽ xu ko moengele xu guu xu a ko nqarikg'ai koe ka̱bise, ka xu kò kòre-kg'ao xu bìríku a máá: “Hààn xae Betelehema koe qõò naka síí ncẽes gúùs kúrúsea sa bóò, ncẽe X'aigam
A xu a qháése xgoaba a qõò, a síí Maria khara Josefa khara hẽé naka Cóá-coa ba hẽéthẽé hòò, Me dxòrom q'oo koe xõe.
Eẽ xu ko kòre-kg'ao xu hòò ne ka xu kò ncãa i Cóám ka mééè sa bìrí khara a.
Ne kò wèé ne ẽe kòre-kg'ao xu ko bìrí ne sa ko kóḿ ne are.
Si Maria sa wèé zi gúù zi ncẽe zi tcáóa sa koe tòó, a sa a gazi ka kaisase tc'ẽe.
Xu ghùu kòre-kg'ao xu ka̱bise, a xu a Nqari ba dqo̱m̀ a koa Me, wèé zi gúù zi ẽe xu kò kóḿa zi ka hẽé naka ẽe xu kò bóòa zi ka hẽéthẽé e; ẽe xu kò ma bìríèa khama i kò ii.
8 cáḿan qãá q'oo koem kò Cóá ba q'ãe nqãa-qgai khòoè, a ba a Jeso ta ma tciiè, qóḿmè tamam hãa cookg'ai koem kò moengelem ka máàèa hãas cg'õè sa.
Eẽm ko x'aè ba hàà
Eẽ i kò ma X'aigam
Gataga khara kò dàòa-mááku sa

Gaa x'aè kagam kò Jerusalema koe Simone ta ko ma tciièm khóè ba x'ãèa. Tchàno, a Nqari-tcáóa hãam khóè me e kò ii, Nqarim gha Iseraele ne qgài-qgai tcáó dim x'aè ba kò tééa máána hãa ba, me kò Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽe ba gam koe hãa,
me kò Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽem ka x'áíèa hãa, X'aigam
Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽem kam kò tempelem koe óágaè. Khara kò Jesom ka xõò ga khara thẽé gakhara dim Cóám Jeso ba tempelem koe óá, hàà khara gha x'áèan ko méé sa kúrúa máá Me ka,
me kò Simone ba gaam Cóám Jeso ba séè a x'õàa ba koe tchàma a ba a Nqari ba dqo̱m̀, a máá:
“Tíí Q'õòè, ẽe Tsi ma bìrí tea khama
Tsi gha ncẽeska Tsarir qãà ra
tòókuan cgoa dàò ba xgobekg'ama máá.
Tiri tcgáía nea Tsari kgoarakuan bóòa hãa khama,
ncẽe Tsi wèé zi qhàò zi tcgáí q'oo koe kg'ónòa a,
tãá zi qhàò zi gha xgobekg'am tc'ẽem x'áà Me e gha ii,
a ba a gha Tsaris qhàòs Iseraele di sa x'áàkagu,”
tam méé.
Khara kò Cóám ka xõò ga khara Simonem ko Cóám ka méé gúùan are.

Me kò Simone ba ts'ee-ts'eekg'ai ne, a ba a Marias Cóám ka xõò sa bìrí a máá: “Bóò, Nqari ba ncẽem Cóá ba qaara máásea, káí ne khóè nem gha kúrú ne cg'áé, a ba a gha káí ne khóè ne Iseraele koe tẽekagu ka. X'áí Me e gha ii ntcoeku cgoaè gha ba,
nxãasega zi gha káí ne khóè ne di zi tc'ẽe zi tcg'oa a x'áíse ka, me gha ntcàu ba qhàe tcáó si,” témé.

Si kò gataga Anna ta ko ma tciiès porofiti sa hànaa, Fanulem ka cóáse sa, Asere dis qhàòs di ba. Kaisases kò gàeasea hãa, ncẽe ko ẽes ko séèèa xg'ara ka 7 kurian gas dim khóèm cgoa x'ãèa hãa sa.

A sa a kò dxàe-ntcõa sa kúrú, a nxãakg'aiga síí 84 kuri, a kò wèé x'aè ka tempelem koe hàna, a ko ntcùú ba hẽé naka koaba ba hẽéthẽé Nqari ba dqo̱m̀, tc'õoan carasean hẽé naka còrèan hẽéthẽé cgoa.
Gaam x'aèm ẽem kagas kò hàà cgae ne, a hàà Nqari ba qãè-tcaoa máá, a sa a wèéa ne ẽe kò Nqarim gha Jerusalema ba kgoara sa qãà hãa ne Cóám ka kg'ui cgoa.
Eẽ khara ko wèé zi gúù zi X'aigam
Eẽm ko Cóá ba kai kam kò qari, a tc'ẽega, i Nqarim di cgóm̀kuan Gam cgoa hãa.
Wèém kurim q'oo koe khara kò ko
Eẽm
Eẽs ko kõ̱è sa xg'ara ka khara kò x'áéa khara koe ka̱bise, igabam kò Jeso ba Jerusalema koe qaù, khara kò Gam ka xõò ga khara ncẽes gúù sa c'úùa.
Khóè ne xg'aeku koem kò hàna, ta khara kò tc'ẽea, khama khara kò tc'ãà dim cáḿ ba qõò, a khara a gakhara di qhàòan hẽé naka khóè ne ẽe khara kò q'ana ne hẽéthẽé koe qaa Me.
Táá khara kò hòò Me khama khara kò Jerusalema koe ka̱bise a síí qaa Me.
Nqoana cáḿan qãá q'oo koe khara kò tempelem q'oo koe hòò Me, Me xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu xg'aeku koe ntcõe, a ntcõó a ko komsana xu, a ko tẽè-kg'áḿ zi tẽè xu.
Xu kò wèé xu ẽe kò kóḿ Me xu Gam di kóḿa q'ãan hẽé naka xo̱a-kg'áḿa ba ka hẽéthẽé arekaguè.

Gam ka xõò ga khara ko bóò Me ka khara kò kaisase are, si Gam ka xõò sa máá: “Tiri Tsi Cóá Tseè, dùús domka Tsi kò ncẽeta hẽéa máá? Bóò, saò ba hẽé naka tíí hẽéthẽé khama ncãa ko thõò-tcaoase qaa Tsi,” témé.
Me xo̱a khara a, a máá: “Dùús domka khaoa kò ko qaa Te? C'úùa khaoa kò hãa, Abom Tirim Xõòm di zi gúù zi koe méér ga hãa sa?” témé.
Khara kò dùú sam ko méé sa táá koma q'ãa.
Me Nasareta koe ka̱bise cgoa khara a, komsana khara am kò ko. Si kò Gam ka xõò sa ncẽes gúù sa tcáóa sa q'oo koe tòó.
I ko Jesom di tc'ẽean hẽé naka qaria ba hẽéthẽé kai a càùse, i kò Nqari ba hẽé naka khóè ne hẽéthẽé di tòókuan càùse cgae Me.
15 dim kuri me e kò ii

Gaa x'aè ka tsara kò Anase ba hẽé naka Kaifase ba hẽéthẽé tsara kò kaia tsara peresiti tsara ii. Kam kò Nqarim dim kg'ui ba Sakariam dim cóám Johanem koe hàà, tchàa-xgóóm koem hãase.

Me Jorotane dim tshàa ba nxa̱ma-nxa̱ma xu nqõó xu wèé xu koe qõòa te, a ba a chìbia ne koe ne gha tcóóse a tcguù-tcguuès ka xgaa-xgaa ne, nxãasega ne gha gane di chìbian qgóóa mááè ka,
ẽe i ma porofitim Isaiam dis Tcgãyas koe ma góásea hãa khama a ko máá:
“C'ẽem dòm̀ ba ko tchàa-xgóós koe guu a q'au a ko máá:
‘X'aigam
naka Gam di dàòan tchàno-tchanoa máá Me.
Wèé qgáìan ẽe qàm gha cg'oè-cg'oeè,
i gha wèé xàbìan hẽé naka nxõ̱á xàbìan hẽéthẽé
nqãaka qám̀mè,
i gha kàma dàòan tchàno-tchanoè,
i gha xgárá dàòan tcgàriè.
Ne gha wèé ne khóè ne
Nqarim di kgoarakuan hòò a bóò,’ ”
témé ba.
Me kò Johane ba tcguù-tcguukuan domka gam koe hààraa zi xg'ae zi bìrí a máá: “Gatu cg'aoan di tu cóá tuè, dìín ka tua q'ãà-q'ãàèa hãa a ko hààko xgóàn

Nxãaska méé tu chìbian koe tu tcóósea hãa sa gha x'áí tc'áróan kúrú, naka tua táá tshoa-tshoa naka bìríse naka máá: ‘Abrahama ba ta úúa hãa, sita ka tsgõose ba,’ témé guu. Bìrí tu ur ko a ko máá: Nqari ba tààè tama ncẽe zi nxõ̱á zi séè a Abrahama ba tsgõo-coan kúrúa máán ka ke.
Si gataga bòó sa nxãakamaga hìi zi di to̱bean kg'ónòa tòóa mááèa, si gha wèés hìis ẽe qãè tc'áróan kúrú tama sa xg'aoa tcg'òó a c'eean q'oo koe xaoa tcãàè,” témé.
Ne xg'ae zi di ne khóè ne tẽè me a máá: “Kháé nxãata i kò ii ne ta gha dùú sa kúrú?” témé.
Me xo̱a ne a máá: “Dìím wèém ẽe cám̀ qgáían úúa hãa ba méém ẽe cúís ga sa úú tama ba c'ẽe sa máà, nakam dìím wèém ẽe tc'õoan úúa hãa ba gataga thẽé hẽé,” témé.
Xu c'ẽe xu mari xg'ae-xg'ae-kg'ao xu hàà, tcguù-tcguuè xu gha ka. A tẽè me a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao tseè, dùú sa xae gha
Me xo̱a xu a máá: “Táá méé xao qaaseko marian nqáéa hãan séè cgae ne guu,” témé.

Xu gataga ncõo-kg'ao xu hàà a tẽè me a máá: “Kháé nxãaska sixae ka, dùú sa méé xae kúrú?” témé. Me Johane xo̱a xu a máá: “Táá cúí khóè koe ga qari cgoa marian séè guu, naka táá khóèan gaan di tama chìbian hã̱akagu guu. Naka xaoa gaxao di surutan qãè-tcaoa máá,” témé.
Khóè ne kò nqòòa hãase qãà a ne a ko wèéa ne ga tcáóa ne q'oo koe tẽèse a ko máá, Johane ba gha c'ẽedaoka Krestem ga me e, ta tc'ẽea.

Me Johane wèéa ne ga xo̱a a máá: “Tíí ra ko tshàan cgoa tcguù-tcguu tu u, igabam ko Gaam ẽe tíí ka qari ba hàà, ncẽe Gam di nxàbo tca̱ian kgoara ner kg'ano tama ba. Gaa ba gha hàà Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽem cgoa hẽé naka c'eem cgoa hẽéthẽé tcguù-tcguu tu u.

Mabere tsoroan ko dqòrò cgoaèm hìi ba tshàua ba koe hãa, Me gha maberean ko dqòròès qgáìs koe wèé maberean ga dqòrò, a gha Gam di maberean Gam dis nxàés koe xg'ae-xg'ae, igabam gha tsoroan ts'irì tamam c'eem koe dàò,” témé.
Johane ba kò káí zi dàò zi tãáka zi cgoa khóè ne koe qãè tchõàn óá.

Igabam kò Herotem tc'ãà-cookg'ai ba tãás gúù sa kúrú a gam di chìbian càù, Johane ba qáé-nquus koe tcãàn ka. Johane ba kò chìbi-chibi mea, Herotiases gam ka káíkhoem dis khóès cgoam kò xóéa hãa, a ba a kò gataga káí zi gúù zi cg'ãè zi kúrúa hãa khama.
Khóè ne wèé ne ko tcguù-tcguuè kam kò Jeso ba thẽé tcguù-tcguuè. Eẽm hãa a ko còrè ka i kò nqarikg'aian xgobekg'amse,
Me kò Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽe ba tcíbís khama ii a xõa cgae Me. Me kg'ui ba nqarikg'ai koe guu a tcg'oa, a máá: “Tiri Tsi Cóá Tsi ncàm̀a Ra hãa Tsi i. Tsáá koe Ra ko qãè-tcao,” témé.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba Gam dis tséé sa tshoa-tshoa kam kò 30 kuri Me e, ncẽe khóè ne kò ko máá,
Josefam ka cóáse Me e, témé ba,
Josefam Elim ka cóáse ba,
Elim Matatem ka cóáse ba,
Matatem Lefim ka cóáse ba,
Lefim Melekim ka cóáse ba,
Melekim Janaim ka cóáse ba,
Janaim Josefam ka cóáse ba.
Josefam Matatisim ka cóáse ba,
Matatisim Amosem ka cóáse ba,
Amosem Naumem ka cóáse ba,
Naumem Eselim ka cóáse ba,
Eselim Nagaim ka cóáse ba,
Nagaim Matam ka cóáse ba,
Matam Matatisim ka cóáse ba,
Matatisim Seminem ka cóáse ba,
Seminem Josekim ka cóáse ba,
Josekim Jodam ka cóáse ba,
Jodam Joanam ka cóáse ba,
Joanam Resam ka cóáse ba,
Resam Serobabelem ka cóáse ba,
Serobabelem Salatielem ka cóáse ba,
Salatielem Nerim ka cóáse ba,
Nerim Melekim ka cóáse ba,
Melekim Adim ka cóáse ba,
Adim Kosam ka cóáse ba,
Kosam Elemadam ka cóáse ba,
Elemadam Erem ka cóáse ba,
Erem Joshuam ka cóáse ba,
Joshuam Elieserem ka cóáse ba,
Elieserem Jorim ka cóáse ba,
Jorim Matatem ka cóáse ba,
Matatem Lefim ka cóáse ba,
Lefim Simonem ka cóáse ba,
Simonem Jutam ka cóáse ba,
Jutam Josefam ka cóáse ba,
Josefam Jonam ka cóáse ba,
Jonam Eliakim ka cóáse ba,
Eliakim Meleam ka cóáse ba,
Meleam Menam ka cóáse ba,
Menam Matatem ka cóáse ba,
Matatem Natanem ka cóáse ba,
Natanem Dafitem ka cóáse ba,
Dafitem Jesem ka cóáse ba,
Jesem Obetem ka cóáse ba,
Obetem Boasem ka cóáse ba,
Boasem Salemonem ka cóáse ba,
Salemonem Nasonem ka cóáse ba,
Nasonem Aminadabem ka cóáse ba,
Aminadabem Ademinem ka cóáse ba,
Ademinem Arenim ka cóáse ba,
Arenim Heseronem ka cóáse ba,
Heseronem Peresem ka cóáse ba,
Peresem Jutam ka cóáse ba,
Jutam Jakobem ka cóáse ba,
Jakobem Isakam ka cóáse ba,
Isakam Abrahamam ka cóáse ba,
Abrahamam Teram ka cóáse ba,
Teram Nahorem ka cóáse ba,
Nahorem Serugem ka cóáse ba,
Serugem Regum ka cóáse ba,
Regum Pelegem ka cóáse ba,
Pelegem Eberem ka cóáse ba,
Eberem Selam ka cóáse ba,
Selam Kainanem ka cóáse ba,
Kainanem Arefekesatem ka cóáse ba,
Arefekesatem Shem ka cóáse ba,
Shem Nowam ka cóáse ba,
Nowam Lamekem ka cóáse ba,
Lamekem Methuselam ka cóáse ba,
Methuselam Enokem ka cóáse ba,
Enokem Jaretem ka cóáse ba,
Jaretem Mahalalem ka cóáse ba,
Mahalalem Kainanem ka cóáse ba,
Kainanem Enosem ka cóáse ba,
Enosem Setem ka cóáse ba,
Setem Adam ka cóáse ba,
Adam Nqarim ka cóáse ba.
Jeso ba kò Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽem ka cg'oè cgaeèa, a ba a kò Jorotane dim tshàam koe guu a ka̱bise. A ba a kò Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽem ka séè a qãáka úúè.
Gaa koem kò dxãwa ba 40 cáḿan Jeso ba kúrúa bóò. Jeso ba kò ẽe xu cáḿ xu ka táá cúí gúù ga tc'õó, khamam kò gaa koe guus ka xàbàa hãa.
Me dxãwa ba bìrí Me a máá: “Nqarim di Tsi Cóá Tsi kò ii ne, nxõ̱ás ncẽe sa bìrí nakas péréan kúrúse,” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Góásea i hãa a ko máá: ‘Khóèa nea péréan ka cúí kg'õè tama,’ témé,” tam méé.
Me kò dxãwa ba séè a kaisase tc'amaka hãam qgáìm koe úú Me, a ba a kò ẽem x'aèm ka wèé x'aian nqõómkg'ai di hẽé naka gaan di ka̱rean hẽéthẽé x'áí Me.
A ba a bìrí Me a máá: “Ncẽe gúùan di qarian wèé hẽé naka x'aian di x'áàn hẽéthẽé ra gha máà Tsi, máàè ana raa, a ra a ko tc'ẽer kom khóè ba máà a khama.
A ncẽè cookg'aia te koe Tsi ko dqo̱m̀ ne i gha wèéan ncẽe ga Tsari ii,” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Góásea i hãa a ko máá: ‘X'aigam Nqarim tsari ba dqo̱m̀, naka Gaam cúí ba tsééa máá,’ téméè,” tam méé.
Me kò
Góásea i hãa ke a ko máá:
‘Gam di xu moengele xum gha x'áèan máà,
xu gha kòre Tsi,’
téméè khama.
Gataga i góásea a ko máá:
‘Tshàua xu cgoa xu gha qgóóa ghùi tsi,
táá tsi gha nxãasega nqàrèa tsi nxõ̱án koe xg'áḿa tòó ka,’
téméè,” tam méé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Góásea i hãa a ko máá: ‘Táá méé tsi X'aigam tsarim Nqari ba kúrúa bóò guu,’ téméè,” tam méé.
Eẽm ko dxãwa ba gam di kúrúa bóòkuan wèé cgoa xg'ara kam kò gaa koe guu Me a qãèm x'aè ba qãà.
Me kò Jeso ba
Me kò gane di còrè-nquuan koe xgaa-xgaa, i wèé khóèan dqo̱m̀ Me.
Me kò Nasareta koe qõò, ncẽem xg'ao kaikaguè koe. A kg'aigam ko hẽé khama Sabata dim cáḿ ka còrè-nquum koe síí.
a ba a porofitim Isaiam dis Tcgãya sa máàè, a xgobekg'am si, a ba a ncẽeta i ma góáèa qgáìan koe síí:
“X'AIGAM
ẽe dxàua ne koer gha qãè tchõàn óága ka.
Tsééam óá Tea,
ẽe qáéèa ner gha hàà bìrí, kgoaraè ne gha sa,
a ẽe bóò tama ne, xgobekg'am tcgáíè ne gha sa,
a Ra a gha ẽe nqãaka hàna ne hàà kgoara sa ka,
a Ra a gha khóè ne bìrí, x'aè ba hààra sa,
X'aigam
Gam di cgóm̀kuan x'áí di ba,”
tam ma nxárá.
Jeso ba kò tcgãya sa tcẽekg'am, a ba a qãàm koe úúa ka̱bi si, a ntcõó. I kò còrè-nquum koe ko hãa ne khóè ne wèé ne di tcgáían Gam koe qãesea tẽe.
Me tshoa-tshoa a bìrí ne a máá: “Ncẽe cáḿ kas ncãa ncẽes qgáìs
Ne kò wèé ne khóè ne Gam ka qãèse kg'ui, a ne a kò ka̱re kg'uian ncẽe kg'áḿa ba koe ko tcg'oa ka arekaguè, a ne a máá: “A ncẽe ba gáé Josefam dim Cóám tama baa?” témé.

Me Jeso ba bìrí ne a máá: “Tseeguan kaga tu gha ncẽes sere-sere sa nxàea máá Te a máá: ‘Naaka Tseè, Tsáá ka qãèkaguse! Ncẽe ta ko kóḿ Tsi Kaperenaume koe kúrúa zi gúù zi ncẽe nqõóa Tsi koe kúrú,’ ” témé.
A ba a bìrí ne a máá: “Tseegua ner ko bìrí tu u a ko máá: Porofiti ba x'áéa ba koe dtcòm̀mè tamam khóè me e.

“Tseeguan kar ko bìrí tu u: Elijam di x'aèan ka, ẽe i ko nqarikg'aian nqoana kurian hẽé naka 6 nxoean hẽéthẽé tcẽekg'amsea kas kò thõòs xàbà sa nqõómkg'ai koe hãa, zi kò káí zi dxàe-ntcõa zi Iseraele koe hàna,
igabam kò Elija ba c'ẽe zi koe ga tsééa úúè tama, a kò Sarefata dim qgáì-coam koe hànas dxàe-ntcõas koe tsééa úúèa, Sitone dim nqõóm koe.

Ne kò porofitim Elisham di x'aè ka káí ne lepero dis tcìì sa kò tsàara hãa ne Iseraele koe hàna, igaba ne kò táá cúía ne ga q'ano-q'anoè, Namanem ncẽe Siria dim cúím ga me e kò ii,” tam méé.
Ncẽes gúù sa ne ko kóḿ ka ne kò wèé ne khóè ne còrè-nquum koe kò hàna ne kaisase xgóà.
Nxàìa ne kò tẽe a ne a x'áé-dxoom xg'aeku koe xàbùa tcg'òó Me, a xàbìm gane dim x'áé-dxoom tshàoèam tc'amkg'ai koe tceea úú Me, gaa koe ne gha síí guu a xaoa xòó Me ka.
Igabam kò Jeso ba kg'ama xg'aekua ne koe nqáé a qõò.
A ba a nxãaska Kaperenaume koe síí, Galilea dim x'áé-dxoom koe, a ba a kòo Sabata dim cáḿ ka khóè ne xgaa-xgaa.
Ne kò Gam di xgaa-xgaa-q'ooan ka area hãa, Gam dim kg'ui ba kò qarian úúa hãa khama.
Me kò còrè-nquum koe dxãwa tc'ẽean úúam khóè ba hãa, a kò kaisam dòm̀ cgoa q'au a máá:
“Ha̱aà! Jeso Tsi Nasareta di Tseè, dùú sa Tsi ko gatá cgoa tc'ẽe? Hàà Tsi ko kaàkagu ta a? Q'ana raa dìí Tsi i sa, Nqarim di Tsi Tcom-tcomsa Tsi i,” témé.

Igabam kò Jeso ba dxãwa tc'ẽean dqàè a máá: “Nqoo, naka tcg'oa cgae me!” témé. I kò dxãwa tc'ẽean khóè ba qarika ntcãa-ntcãa a khóè ne xg'aeku koe xaoa xòó me, a i a thõò-thõo me tamase tcg'oa cgae me.
Ne kò wèé ne khóè ne area hãa, a ne a c'ẽe ne bìrí a máá: “Dùútsa gúù saa ncẽe sa? Qarian úúa hãasem ko dxãwa tc'ẽean ga dqàè i tcg'oa ka!” témé.
I kò kúúga nxàea ba ẽem xg'aekum koe hàna xu qgáì xu wèé xu koe qháése qõò.
Me kò Jeso ba gaam còrè-nquum koe tcg'oa, a síí Simonem dim nquum koe tcãà. Si kò Simonem ka c'uìse sa cgùrukagu si kos tcììs kaias ka qgóóèa, ne Jeso ba gas ka bìrí.
Me Jeso ba gas koe qám̀se, a ba a ẽes tcìì sa dqàè, si guu si, si kò kúúga tẽe a sa a tshoa-tshoa a tsééa máá ne.
Eẽs ko cáḿ sa tcãà ka ne kò wèé ne khóè ne gane di tcìì-khoean tãáka zi tcìì zi ko tsàaraa hãa a Jesom koe óá. Me kò wèém khóèm koe tshàua ba tòó, a kg'õèkagu me.

I kò gataga dxãwa tc'ẽean káí ne khóè ne koe guu a q'aua tcg'oa, a ko máá: “Tsáá Tsia Nqarim di Tsi Cóá Tsi i!” témé. Igabam kò dqàè e, a táá kgoara máá a i kg'ui, q'ana i ko hãa Kreste Me e sa khama.
Eẽ i ko q'uu kam kò Jeso ba c'ẽem qgáìm nqooako hãam koe qõò. Ne kò káí ne khóè ne qaa Me. Eẽ ne ko hàà sao-xg'ae Me ka ne ko xgáèa tòó Me, táám gha qõòa guu ne ka.
Igabam kò bìrí ne a máá: “Qãè tchõàn Nqarim di x'aian di méér c'ẽe xu x'áé-dxoo xu koe thẽé xgaa-xgaa, gaan domkagar tsééa óáèa hãa ke,” témé.
A ba a kò Jutea ne di xu còrè-nquu xu koe xgaa-xgaa.
C'ẽem cáḿ ka ne kò khóè ne Jeso ba Genesarete dim tshàam-kg'áḿ koe nxa̱ma-nxa̱maa a ko Nqarim dim kg'ui ba komsana. Jesom gaa koe téé-tẽe
kam kò cám̀ dxòro tsara bóò, tsara tshàam dxùukg'ai koe téé-tẽe, x'aù qgóó-kg'ao xu ka xoana guuèa hãa tsara, ncẽe kò síí hãa a ko gaxu di c'uisían xg'aà xu.
Me Jeso ba c'ẽem dxòrom Simonem di kò iim koe tcãà, a ba a dtcàrà me, dxòro bam gha cg'árése tshàan q'oo koe ghànèa tcãà sa. Me kò gaam q'oo koe ntcõó a khóè ne xgaa-xgaa.
Eẽm ko kg'uia xg'ara kam kò Simone ba bìrí a máá: “Tshàam nqáè koe ncẽem dxòro ba úú, naka xaoa gaxao di c'uisían tcãà naka x'aùan qgóó,” témé.
Me Simone xo̱a a máá: “X'aigaè, ncãa xae wèém ntcùú ba qarika tséé, a xae a táá cúí gúù ga qgóó. Igabaga ncãaga Tsi ko ncẽeta méé khamar gha c'uisían tcãà,” témé.
Gatà xu kò hẽé a xu a káí x'aùan qgóó, i gaxu di c'uisían tòà gha khama ii.

Ka xu ko c'ẽem dxòrom koe kò hàna xu x'aù qgóó-kg'ao xu dtcàrà, hàà xu gha hùi xu ka. Xu hàà a ẽe tsara dxòro tsara wèéa tsara ga cg'oè-cg'oe, tsara tshoa-tshoa a tom̀ gha khama ma kúrúse.
Eẽm ko Simone Petere ncẽe sa bóò kam kò Jesom nqàrè-kg'am koe qáúse, a máá: “X'aigaè, tcg'oara guu te, chìbi-kg'aor khóè ra a ke,” témé.
Gabá hẽé naka wèé xu ẽe kò gam cgoa hàna xu hẽéthẽéa kò kaisas ares ka tcãàèa khama, x'aùan ẽe xu kò qgóóa hãa ka.

Sebetem ka cóásea tsara, Jakoboa tsara Johanea tsara kò gataga area hãa thẽé, ncẽe kòo Simonem cgoa tsééa xg'ae tsara. Me Jeso ba Simone ba bìrí a máá: “Táá q'áò guu; ncẽem cáḿ koe tsi gha guu a tshoa-tshoa a khóè ne di tsi qgóó-kg'ao tsi i ke,” témé.
Xu kò ẽe xu ko gaxu di dxòroan tshàam-kg'áḿ koe tòó, kaga wèé zi gúù zi guu, a xùri Me.

Eẽm Jeso ba c'ẽem x'áé-dxoom koe hàna kam kò lepero dis tcìì sa tsàaraa hãam khóè ba hàà. Eẽm ko Jeso ba bóò kam kò kg'áía ba cgoa góḿankg'ai koe cg'áé a còrè Me a máá: “X'aigaè, tc'ẽe Tsi kòo ne Tsi ga kúrú ter q'ano,” témé.
Me Jeso ba tchoanà tshàu, a ba a khóè ba qgóó, a máá: “Gatà Ra ko ma tc'ẽe, ke q'ano!” témé. Kas ko lepero dis tcìì sa kúúga kaà cgae me.

Me kò Jeso ba qarika x'áè me a máá: “Táá méé tsi cúí khóè ga síí chóà máá guu, igaba méé tsi qõò naka tsia tsari q'ano-q'anosean domka síí peresitim koe x'áíse, naka dàòa-mááku sa x'áís iise tcg'òó, ẽem ma Moshe x'áèa hãa khamaga ma,” témé.
Igabas kò Jesom dis tchõà sa kaisase tsa̱i-tsa̱ise, zi khóè ne di zi xg'ae zi káí zi hààku, hàà zi gha komsana Me a zi a thẽé gazi di tcììan koe qãèkaguè ka.
Me Jeso ba tcg'oara guu ne, a nqooa hãa xu qgáì xu koe qõò, a síí gaa koe còrè.

C'ẽe cáḿ kam hãa a ko xgaa-xgaa ka xu kò Farasai xu hẽé naka x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé xu gaa koe ntcõe, ncẽe kò wèé xu x'áé xu Galilea di xu koe hẽé naka Jutea di xu koe hẽé naka Jerusalema di xu koe hẽéthẽé guua hãa xu. I kò X'aigam di qarian Gam cgoa hãa, gaan cgoam gha khóè ne qãèkagu ka.
Bóò, ka xu kò c'ẽe xu khóè xu kúúga khóèm nqo̱ara hãa ba óága, gam dim tcoàm koe xòó mea hãase, a xu a kò dàò ba qaa, tcãà me xu gha a síí cookg'aia ba koe xòó me ba.

Igaba ẽe xu ko bóò, khóè ne di káí-q'ooan ka xu ko xháé, nta xu gha ma nquum q'oo koe ma tcãà me sa, ka xu kò nquum tco̱be koe chúrù a tcãà, a xu a nquum nqáè koe gam dim tcoàm cgoa xòó me, Jesom cookg'ai koe.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba gaxu di dtcòm̀an bóò kam kò máá: “Khóè tseè, tsari chìbian tsi qgóóa mááèa hãa,” témé.

Ka xu ko x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu hẽé naka Farasai xu hẽéthẽé tshoa-tshoa a tẽèse a máá: “Dìí ba gáé ncẽe ba, ncẽe Nqari ba ko cóè khama ko ma kg'ui ba? Nqarim cúí ba khóèan gaan di chìbian qgóóa máá di qarin úúa hãa ka, c'ẽe khóè ka oose!” ta xu méé.
Jeso ba ko tc'ẽea xu hãa sa q'ana hãa khamam kò tẽè xu a máá: “Dùús domka xao ko ma tcáóa xao q'oo koe ma tc'ẽea ẽe e?
Ndaka nea thamkaà? ‘Chìbia tsi tsi qgóóa mááèa,’ témé nea kana máá: ‘Tẽe naka qõò,’ témé nea?”
“Igaba
Gaa x'aè kagam kò gane cookg'ai koe tẽe, a ba a ẽem kò gam tc'amkg'ai koe xõem tcoà ba séè, a x'áéa ba koe Nqari ba dqo̱m̀a máásea dìbi.
Si are sa wèéa ne ga tcãà, ne Nqari ba dqo̱m̀, a ne a q'áòs ka tcãàè, a máá: “Are-aresa zi gúù zi ta ncẽem cáḿ ka bóòa hãa!” témé.

Ncẽe zi gúù zi qãá q'oo koem kò Jeso ba tcg'oa, a mari xg'ae-xg'ae-kg'aom c'ẽem Lefi ta ko ma tciiè ba bóò, me marian ko séèa xg'ae-xg'aeèm nquum koe ntcõóa-ntcõe. Me bìrí me a máá: “Xùri Te,” témé.
Me kò Lefi ba wèé gúùan guu a xùri Me.
A ba a x'áéa ba koe síí Jeso ba kaias kõ̱è sa kúrúa máá. Si kò kaias xg'aes mari xg'ae-xg'ae-kg'ao xu di sa hẽé, naka c'ẽe xu hẽéthẽé di sa gam cgoa tc'õó.

Xu kò Farasai xu hẽé naka gaxu di xu x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu cgoa mẽéku a máá: “Dùús domka xao ko mari xg'ae-xg'ae-kg'aoan hẽé naka chìbi-kg'aoan hẽéthẽé cgoa tc'õó a kg'áà máá?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Eẽ tsàa tama khóèa ne naakan qaa tama, igaba ẽe ko tsàa ne ko qaa a.
Tchàno ne khóè ner gha hàà tcii kar hàà tama, igabar hààraa, hààr gha chìbi-kg'ao ne tcii ne tcóóse ka,” témé.
Xu kò bìrí Me a máá: “Johanem di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ko káíse tc'õoan carase a ko còrè, khamaga xu ko Farasai di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hẽé; igaba xu ko Tsari xu
Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “A séè-kg'aom di cg'áè-kg'aoan xao ga tc'õoan cara, qanegam gane cgoa hãa koe? Cuiskaga a!
Igabam gha x'aè ba hàà, séè-kg'aom gha gane koe guu a séèa tcg'òóè ba; ne gha ẽe xu cáḿ xu ka tc'õoan carase,” tam méé.

A ba a gataga ncẽes sere-sere sa bìrí ne a máá: “Cúí khóè ga káà a, ka̱bam qgáí ba gha tòà, a ncìím qgáím koe qgãéa ntcòo me e. Gatà i kò hẽé nem gha ka̱bam qgáí ba tòà, me gataga ka̱bam qgáí ba ncìím cgoa qõòa mááku tite.

Gataga i khóèan káà a, ka̱ba gõéan gha ncìí zi khòo dtcòbè zi koe qg'oe e. A ncẽè gatà i kò hẽé ne i gha ka̱ba gõéan dtcòbè zi tòà, a i a gha ntcã̱a, zi gha dtcòbè zi tòàra q'aase.
Igaba méé i ka̱ba gõéan ka̱ba zi khòo dtcòbè zi koe qg'oeè.
Me gataga cuiskaga c'ẽem khóè ba ncìí gõéan kg'áà xg'ara naka ka̱ban tc'ẽea hãa tite; ‘Ncìía nea qãè e,’ tam gha méé khama,” tam Jeso ba méé.
C'ẽem Sabatam kam kò Jeso ba maberean dim xháràm koe xóé a ko qõò, ka xu kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu gaan di tc'áróan khõá, a ko tshàu q'ooa xu koe ncóbéa tc'õó.
Igaba xu kò c'ẽe xu Farasai xu bìrí Me a máá: “Dùús domka xao ko Sabata dim cáḿ ka x'áèan koe kgoara mááè tama sa kúrúa máá?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Qanega xao gáé nxárá ta ga hãa
Nqarim dim nquum koem kò tcãà, a ba a ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa péréan séè, ncẽe peresiti xu ka cúí ko tc'õóè e, a tc'õó a ba a gam ka c'ẽea xu au,” témé.
A ba a bìrí xu a máá: “Khóèm dim Cóá ba Sabata dim X'aiga Me e,” témé.
I kúrúse Me c'ẽem cáḿ Sabata dim ka còrè-nquum koe síí tcãà, a xgaa-xgaa. Me kò kg'áò xòè di tshàua ba nqo̱ara hãam khóè ba gaa koe hãa.
Xu kò Farasai xu hẽé naka x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé xu xaèa kg'ónò Me, Sabata dim cáḿ kam gha qãèkagu sa xu kò bóò kg'oana khama, nxãasega xu gha chìbi-chibi Me ka.

Igabam ko Jeso ba ẽe xu tc'ẽea hãa zi wèé zi q'ana khamam kò nqo̱ara tshàua hãam khóè ba bìrí a máá: “Tẽe naka tsia wèé ne khóè ne ncẽe koe hãa ne cookg'ai koe téé,” témé. Me tẽe a síí gaa koe téé.

Me Jeso ba bìrí xu a máá: “Tẽè xao or ko a ko máá: Sabata dim cáḿ ka sa kháé ndaka sa kgoaraèa: qãèan kúrú saa kana cg'ãèan kúrú saa, khóè ba kg'õèkagu saa kana cg'õo me saa?” témé.
A ba a wèéa ne ga bóò a gaam khóè ba bìrí a máá: “Tshàua tsi tchoanà,” témé. Me gatà hẽé, i tshàua ba ka̱bise a qãè.
Igaba xu kò kaisase xgóà a xu a tshoa-tshoa a nxàe cgoaku, dùú sa xu gha Jeso ba kúrú sa.
Gaa xu cáḿ xu kam kò Jeso ba xàbìm koe síí, a ko síí còrè, a wèém ntcùú ba hãa a Nqari ba còrè.
Eẽ i ko q'uu kam kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu Gam koe tciia xg'ae, a ba a 12 xu nxárá tcg'òó, a x'áè úú-kg'ao
Simonem ncẽe kòo Petere ta ma tciiè ba hẽé, naka gam ka qõesem Anterea ba hẽé, naka Jakobo ba hẽé, naka Johane ba hẽé, naka Filipi ba hẽé, naka Baretolomaio ba hẽé,
naka Mataio ba hẽé, naka Tomase ba hẽé naka Alefaiom ka cóásem Jakobo ba hẽé, naka Simonem ncẽe kò tòókuan x'ãà máá ta ko ma tciiè ba hẽé,
naka Jutasem Jakobom ka cóáse ba hẽé, naka Jutasem Isekariotem ncẽe kò khóè ne tshàu q'oo koe tcãà Mea ba hẽéthẽé e.

Me kò xàbìm koe xõa cgoa xu a síí nqáḿan koe téé. Si ko gaa koe kaias xg'aes Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu di sa hẽé, naka khóè ne di sa hẽéthẽé hàna, wèém nqõóm Jutea di ba hẽé, naka Jerusalema di ba hẽé naka tshàam qàe di tsara x'áé-dxoo tsara Ture ba hẽé naka Sitone ba hẽéthẽé tsara koe guua ne khóè ne di sa.
Hàà ne gha komsana Me ka kò hààraa ne, a gataga thẽé tcììa ne koe kg'õèkaguè ka. Ne kò ẽe cg'ãè tc'ẽean ka kòo xgáèè ne thẽé qãèkaguè.
Wèé ne khóè nea kò qgóó Me ne gha sa tc'ẽe, qaria ne kò Gam koe guu a ko wèéa ne
Xgaa-xgaase-kg'aoa nem téé a ko ntcáà koem kò máá:
“Ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa tua gatu ẽe dxàua hãa tu,
Nqarim di x'aia nea gatu di i khama.
Ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa tua
gatu ẽe ncẽeska ko xàbàn ka cg'õoè tu,
xg'ãàkaguè tu gha khama.
Ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa tua gatu ẽe ko kg'ae tu,
kg'ãè tu gha khama.
Ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa tua, ncẽè khóèan kò hòre tua hãa ne,
a ko gaan xg'aeku koe xhàiagu tu u ne,
a ko cóè tu u ne,
i ko Khóèm dim Cóám domka cg'õèa tu cg'ãès gúùs khama ma aaguè ne.
“Eẽm cáḿ ka qãè-tcao, naka tua nxàì-nxaise qãè-tcaoan ka, gatu di surutan nqarikg'ai dia kaia hãa ke. Gaxu ka xõò ga xu xg'ao ma porofiti xu ma qgóóa hãa ga a ke.
Igaba haò, cg'ãè i gha ii gatu ncẽe qguùa hãa tu ka,
nxãakamaga tu gatu di qgài-qgai-tcáókuan hòòa hãa khama.
Haò, cg'ãè i gha ii gatu ncẽeska qãèse xg'ãà tu ka,
xàbàn ka tu gha cg'õoè khama.
Haò, cg'ãè i gha ii gatu ncẽeska ko kg'ãè tu ka,
tshúù-tcao tu gha a kg'ae khama.
Haò, cg'ãè i gha ii gatu ncẽe wèé khóèan ga ko qãèse kg'ui gatu ka tu,
ẽea gane ka xõò ga xu xg'ao ma
tshúù-ntcõa di xu porofiti xu ma qgóóa hãa ga a khama.
“Igabar ko bìrí tu u gatu kóḿ Te ko tu a ko máá: Gatu di cg'õo-kg'aoan méé tu ncàm̀, naka qãèan kúrúa máá ẽe hòre tua ne.
Ts'ee-ts'eekg'ai ẽe ko cgúí tu u ne, naka ẽe ko xgàra tu u ne còrèa máá.

Ncẽè c'ẽem khóèm kò kg'áò xòè di góóa tsi x'ábú ne, nxãa ba c'ẽem góó ba máà thẽé nakam x'ábú. A ncẽè c'ẽem khóèm kòo tc'amaka tsi ha̱na qgáían nxõ̱o cgae tsi, ne táá c'ẽean nxõ̱o cgaea tsi cara me guu.
Máà dìím wèém ẽe ko dtcàrà tsi ba, naka khóèm kò q'õòa tsi hãas gúù sa séè cgae tsia hãa ne táá séèa ka̱bi si guu.
Eẽ tu ko tc'ẽe, khóè ne méé ne gatu koe kúrú, nxãa zi méé tu thẽé gane koe kúrú.
“Eẽ ncàm̀ tua hãa ne tu kò ncàm̀a hãa ne sa gha dùú sa ka̱bisea máá tu u? Ncẽe chìbi-kg'ao ne ne ko thẽé gatà hẽé a ko ẽe ncàm̀ nea hãa ne thẽé ncàm̀ ka.
A ncẽè ẽe ko qãèan kúrúa máá tu u ne tu kòo qãèan kúrúa máá, ne sa gha dùú sa ka̱bisea máá tu u? Ncẽe chìbi-kg'ao ne ne ko thẽé gataga hẽé ka.

A ncẽè nxãakamaga tu q'ana hãa suruta tu u gha ne tu kòo cgóbè, ne ba gha Nqari ba gaan domka qãè-tcaoa máá tu u? Ncẽe chìbi-kg'ao ne ne ko thẽé gane ka c'ẽe ne chìbi-kg'ao ne cgóbè, nxãasega ne gha surutaè domka ka.

Igaba méé tu gatu di cg'õo-kg'aoan ncàm̀, naka tua qãèan kúrú máá a, naka cgóbè e, surutakuan qaa tamase. Nxãaska i gha gatu di surutan kaisa ii, tu gha gataga Kaisase Tc'amaka hãam di tu cóá tu ii, ẽe qãè-tcaoa-máákuan úú tama ne hẽé naka ẽe cg'ãè cau ne hẽéthẽé koem qãè Me e khama.
Thõò-xama-mááku di méé tu ii, ncẽem ma gatu ka Xõò ba ma thõò-xama-mááku di ii khamaga ma.

“Táá xgàra guu naka tua gha nxãasega táá xgàraè. Gataga táá chìbi-chibi naka xgàra guu, naka tua gha nxãasega táá chìbi-chibi naka xgàraè. Qgóóa máá, naka tua gha nxãasega chìbia tu qgóóa mááè.
Máà naka tua gha nxãasega
Gatagam kò thẽé sere-sere sa bìrí xu a máá: “A káà tcgáím khóè ba ga c'ẽem khóèm káà tcgáí ba tcéè tcuì? A wèéa tsara ga ha̱ém q'oo koe cg'áéa tcãà tite?
Xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao ba gam dim xgaa-xgaa-kg'aom ka tc'amaka hãa tama, igaba wèém ẽe qãèse xgaa-xgaasea xg'ara ba gha gam dim xgaa-xgaa-kg'aom khama ii.
“Dùús domka tsi ko tsáá ka c'ẽem tcgáí q'oo koe hãam tcg'óbé ba hòòa máá, igaba tsi tsáá tcgáí q'oo koe hãam hìi-dxoo ba hòò tama?

Nta tsi gha ma tsáá ka c'ẽe ba bìrí a máá: ‘Tíí tcáràè, hàà nakar tcgáí q'ooa tsi koe tcg'óbé ba tcg'òó,’ témé, ncẽe tsáá tcgáí q'oo koe hãam hìi-dxoo ba tsi hòò tama koe. Tsáá qãè khóèan khama ko ma kúrúse tseè! Kg'áíka tcgáí q'ooa tsi koe hànam hìi-dxoo ba tcg'òó, naka tsia qãèse bóò naka nxãwa tsáá ka c'ẽem tcgáí q'oo koe hàna tcg'óbéan tcg'òó,” tam méé.
Wèés hìi sa tc'áróa sa ka q'ãaèa khama. Dxàman úúa zi hìi-coa zi koe i faia di tc'áróan tcuùè tama, kana i xg'óà di zi hìi zi koe kg'oman tcuùè tama khama.

Qãèm khóè ba ko gam di tcáóan di qãèan koe guu a qãè zi gúù zi tcg'òó, me ko cg'ãè caum khóè ba gam di cg'ãè cauan koe guu a cg'ãè zi gúù zi tcg'òó. Kg'áḿ sa ko tcáós koe cg'oèa a ko ntcã̱a zi gúù zi nxàe khama,” tam méé.
“Dìím wèém ẽe ko Tíí koe hàà, a Tiri kg'uian kóḿ, a i ko méé sa kúrú bar gha x'áí tu u ntam ii sa.

Khóèm ncẽe gam dim nquu ba ko tshoa-tshoa a tshàom khamam ii, ncẽe ko kaisase nqãaka tshào, a tshoa-tshoa sa nxõ̱án koe tshào ba. A ẽe i ko tòèko tshàan hàà, a ko hàà ẽem nquu ba tcãò igabam ko̱ri tite ba, qãèsem tshàoèa hãa khama.

“Igaba dìím wèém ẽe ko Tiri kg'uian kóḿ, igaba kúrú u tama baà khóèm ncẽe ko gam dim nquu ba tshoa-tshoa úú tamase góḿankg'ai koe tshàom khama ii; tòèko tshàan kò gaam nquu ba tcãò ne kò gaa x'aè kaga cg'áé ba - si kò ẽem nquum dis cg'áé sa cg'ãè ii,” tam méé.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba wèé zi gúù zi ncẽe zi khóè ne cgoa kg'uia xg'ara kam kò Kaperenaume koe síí tcãà.
Gaa koem kò ncõo-kg'ao xu dim kaiam dim qãàm kaisasem kò ncàm̀a hãa ba hàna, a ba a kòo x'oos qàe koe tsàa.
Eẽm ko Jesom ka kóḿ kam kò kaia xu Juta di xu Gam koe tsééa úú, xu síí dtcàrà Me hààm gha gam dim qãà ba kg'õèkagu ka.
Xu kò Jesom koe síí a síí qarika còrè Me a máá: “Ncẽem khóè ba tsari hùikuan ka kg'anoèa.
Gaxae di ne khóè nem ncàm̀a, a ba a gataga còrè-nquu ba tshàoa máá taa khama,” témé.
Me Jeso ba qõò cgoa xu.

Eẽ xu qanega gaam khóèm dim nquum koe cúù tama kam kò ncõo-kg'ao xu dim kaia ba tcáràsea xu tsééa tcg'òóa máá Me, síí xu gha bìrí Me a máá: “X'aigaè, táá xhõe-xhõese guu, dìí cgáér tama ra a ke, nquua te tco̱be dòm̀ q'oo koe Tsi ga tcãà ra.
Cgáéser bóòse tama, gaa domkaga ra kò táá tíía hàà a hùikuan dtcàrà Tsi, ke kg'amaga kg'ui ba tcg'òó nakam gha tirim qãà ba qãè.

Tíí igabar kaia xu dòm̀-q'oo koe hànar khóè ra a, xu gataga ncõo-kg'ao xu tíí dòm̀-q'oo koe hàna ke. Ra ko ncẽe ba bìrí a máá: ‘Qõò,’ témé, me qõò, ra c'ẽe ba bìrí a máá: ‘Hàà,’ témé, me hàà. Ra tirim qãà ba bìrí a máá: ‘Ncẽe sa kúrú,’ témé, me kúrú si ke,” tam méé.

Eẽm ko Jeso ba ncẽe sa kóḿ kam kò kaisase are, a ba a ka̱bise cgae ẽe kò xùri Mes xg'ae sa a máá: “Bìrí tu ur ko a ko máá: Qanegar cúí khóè ga Iseraele koe hòò ta ga hãa, ncẽeta ma kaias dtcòm̀ sa úúa hãa a,” témé.
Xu tchõà xàà-kg'ao xu gaxu dim kaiam dim nquum koe ka̱bise, a síí qãà ba sao-xg'ae me qãè me e.
Gaa koe guus kam kò Jeso ba x'áé-dxoom Naine ta ko ma tciièm koe síí, xu Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hẽé naka khóè ne dis xg'aes kaia sa hẽéthẽé xùri Me.

Eẽm ko heke-kg'áḿs x'áé-dxoom dis koe cúù kam kò kúúga x'óóam cóá ba tchàa koe tcg'oa cgoaè, síím gha kg'ónòè ka. C'ẽes khóès dim cóám cúí me e kò ii, ncẽe kò dxàe-ntcõa ii sa. Si kò kaias xg'aes x'áé-dxoom di ne khóè ne di sa gas cgoa hãa.
Eẽm ko X'aigam Jeso ba bóò si kam kò kaisase thõò-xama máá si, a ba a bìrí si a máá: “Táá kg'ae guu,” témé.
Me còoka nqáé a síí káá ba qgóó, xu kò khóè xu ẽe kò káá ba qgóóa xu téé. Me kg'ui a máá: “Cóá tseè, tẽe, tar ko tsáá ka méé,” témé.
Me kò x'óóam cóá ba tẽe a ntcõó, a ba a tshoa-tshoa a kg'ui, Me Jeso ba síí xõò sa máà me.
Si kò q'áò sa wèéa ne ga tcãà, ne Nqari ba dqo̱m̀ a máá: “Kaiam porofiti ba hàà cgae taa,” témé, a ne a máá: “Nqari ba hààraa a ko hàà Gam di ne khóè ne kabi!” témé.
Si ncẽes tchõàs Jesom di sa wèém Juteam koe tsa̱i-tsa̱ise naka wèé xu qgáì xu nxa̱ma-nxa̱ma mea hãa xu koe hẽéthẽé e.
Johanem di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu kò ncẽe zi gúù zi wèé zi ka bìrí me. Me gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ka cám̀ tsara tcii,
a X'aigam Jesom koe tsééa úú tsara a, a máá: “A Tsáá ga Tsia ncẽe ga koma hàà Tsi, kana méé xae c'ẽem khóè ba nqòò?” témé.

Eẽ tsara ko ncẽe tsara khóè tsara Jesom koe síí ka tsara kò máá: “Johanem tcguù-tcguu-kg'ao ba Tsáá koe tséé tsama, a ba a ko máá, hàà méé tsam tẽè Tsi, Tsáá ga Tsia sa ncẽe ga koma hàà Tsi, kana méé xae c'ẽem khóè ba nqòò?” témé.
Gaa x'aè ẽe kam kò Jeso ba káí ne khóè ne gane di tcììan koe hẽé naka cg'ãè tc'ẽean koe hẽéthẽé qãèkagu, a ba a khóè ne ẽe káà tcgáí ne kúrú ne bóò.
Me kò xo̱a tsara a, a máá: “Qõò naka síí Johane ba bìrí ẽe tsao ko kóḿ a ko bóò sa:
‘Ncẽe káà tcgáí ne ko bóò,
ne ko ẽe kò qõò tama ne qõò,
ne kò lepero dis tcììs di ne qãèkaguè,
ne ẽe kóḿ tama ne ko kóḿ,
ne ẽe kò x'óóa hãa ne ghùiè,
i kò qãè tchõàn ẽe dxàua hãa ne xgaa-xgaaè.
Ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa baa khóèm ẽe gam di dtcòm̀an Tíí koe tcgàba hãa tite ba,’ ” tam méé.

Eẽ tsara ko Johanem di tsara tchõà xàà-kg'ao tsara qõò kam ko Jeso ba tshoa-tshoa a xg'ae zi bìrí Johanem ka a máá: “Tchàa-xgóós koe tu kò ko qõò ka tu kò síí dùú sa bóò? Tc'ãán ka ko ntcãa-ntcãaèm tc'áà baa kò ii?
Nxãas tamas kò ii ne tua kòo síí dùú sa bóò? Khóèm xaam qgáí ba ha̱na baa? Eẽ-ẽe, khóè ne ẽe káí mari qgáían ko hã̱a, a ka̱rese x'ãèa hãa nea x'aigan di nquuan koe hãa.
Kháé dùú sa tu kò nxãaska síí ko bóò? A porofiti baa? Eè, bìrí tu ur ko, porofitim ka tc'amaka hãa me e.
Ncẽe ba gam ka i góáèa hãam ga me e, a ko máá:
‘Bóò, Tirim tséé-kg'ao bar gha
Tsáá cookg'ai koe tsééa úú,
ncẽe gha Tsarim dàò ba
kg'ónòa máá Tsi ba,’
ta mééèa ba.
Bìrí tu ur ko a ko máá: Eẽ khóè zi ka ábàèa ne ka Johanem ka kaia hãa ba káà me e, igaba gaam ẽe Nqarim di x'aian koe cg'áré ii ba gam ka kaia hãam ga me e.”
(Ne kò wèé ne khóè ne komsana me, xu kò gataga mari xg'ae-xg'ae-kg'ao xu Nqarim di tchànoan dqo̱m̀, ne kò Johanem ka tcguù-tcguuè.
Igabaga xu kò Farasai xu hẽé naka x'áè q'ãa-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé xu Nqarim tc'ẽea máá xua hãa sa xguì, a táá Johanem ka tcguù-tcguuè.)
“Kháé Ra gha nxãaska ncẽem x'aèm di ne khóè ne dùús cgoa nxárá xg'ae? Dùús khama ne ii?
Cg'áré cóán khama ne ii, ncẽe gúùan ko x'ámáguè qgáì koe hãa a ko tciiku u, a ko máá:
‘Fulutuan ta kò ciia máá tu u,
tu kò táá ntcãà;
ta kò gataga x'ooan di ciian nxáè,
tu kò táá kg'ae,’
témé e.
Johanem tcguù-tcguu-kg'ao ba kò hàà, a péré tc'õó tama, a gõé kg'áà tama, igabaga tu kò máá: ‘Dxãwa tc'ẽea nem úúa hãa,’ témé.

Igabam kò Khóèm dim Cóá ba hàà, a ko tc'õó a ba a ko kg'áà, tu kò máá: ‘Bóò, tc'õó-kg'aom ncẽe ba, a kg'áà-kg'aom gõéan di ba, mari xg'ae-xg'ae-kg'aoan hẽé naka chìbi-kg'aoan hẽéthẽé dim tcárà ba,’ ta méé.
Igaba i ko q'ãan di tc'ẽean gaan di cóán wèé koe guu a tchàno o sa x'áíse,” tam méé.
C'ẽem Farasai ba kò Jeso ba dtcàrà, síím gha tc'õó cgoa me ka. Me kò Jeso ba nquum q'oo koe síí tcãà, a ba a ntcõó a tc'õó.

Si kò gaam x'áé-dxoom koe c'ẽes khóès chìbi-kg'ao sa hàna. Eẽs ko kóḿ, Jeso ba Farasaim x'áé koe hãa a ko tc'õó sa, kas kò alabasetere di nxõ̱án cgoa kúrúèam ts'óó-c'õám koe hãa qãè hm̀m̀ xg'ãò tshãán cgoa síí,

a sa a Jesom nqàrè-kg'am koe hàà téé, a kg'ae, a tshoa-tshoa a tcgáí-tshàra sa cgoa nqàrèa ba cg'ãà-cg'ãa, a sa a c'õòa sa cgoa tchùu u, a x'obè nqàrè Me, a sa a tshãán cgoa ntcã̱á nqàrè Me.

Eẽm ko Farasaim ncẽe kò tcii Mea ba ncẽes gúù sa bóò kam ko bìríse a máá: “Ncẽem khóèm kò tseegukaga porofiti ba ii nem ga kò q'ana hãa ncẽe ko qgóó Me sa dùútsa khóè si i sa, chìbi-kg'ao si i,” témé.
Me kò Jeso ba bìrí me a máá: “Simoneè, c'ẽes gúù sar chóà cgoa tsi kg'oana,” témé. Me máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'aoè, bìrí te si,” témé.
Me máá: “C'ẽe x'aè ka tsara kò cám̀ khóè tsara hàna, marian kò c'ẽem khóèm koe cgóbèa tsara. C'ẽe ba kò 500 khama noo marian qano di cgóbèa, me c'ẽe ba 50 khama nooan cgóbèa.
Cúí gúù ga tsara kò úú tama, suruta ka̱bi cgoa me tsara gha a, khamam kò wèéa tsara ga qgóóa máá. Ke ncẽeska bìrí Te, ndaka ba gha kaisase gatsara ka ncàm̀ me sa?” tam ma tẽè me.
Me Simone xo̱a a máá: “Bóòr ko ka ẽe kaisa marian cgóbèa me e,” témé. Me Jeso ba máá: “Qãèse tsi bóòa,” témé.

A ba a nxãaska khóès koe ka̱bise a Simone ba bìrí a máá: “Ncẽes khóè sa tsia ko bóò? Tsarim nquum koer ncãa hàà, igabaga tsi ncãa xg'aà nqàrèr ko tshàan táá máà Te, igabagas ncãa tcgáí-tshàraa sa cgoa nqàrèa Te cg'ãà-cg'ãa, a c'õòa sa cgoa tchùu u.
Ncãa tsi táá x'obè Te, igabas ncãar hààm x'aèm koe guu a nqàrèa Te x'obèan chõòkagu tama.
Ncãa tsi táá tcúúa Te ga nxúìan cgoa tcgáù, igabagas ncãa qãè hm̀m̀ xg'ãò tshãán ka nqàrèa Te tcgáù.

Gaa domkar ko bìrí tsi, gas di káí chìbian kas qgóóa mááèa. Kaisa ncàm̀kua nes x'áía hãa khama. Igabaga ẽe cg'áré chìbian ka qgóóa máàèa ba ko cg'áré ncàm̀kuan x'áí,” tam méé.
Me kò nxãaska Jeso ba bìrí si a máá: “Sari chìbian koe si qgóóa mááèa,” témé.
Xu kò cg'áè-kg'ao xu tshoa-tshoa a tẽèse a máá: “Dìí ba gáé ncẽe ba, ncẽe ko khóèan chìbian gaan di qgóóa máá ba?” témé.
Igabagam ko Jeso ba khóè sa bìrí a máá: “Sari dtcòm̀a nea kgoara sia, ke tòókuan cgoa qõò,” témé.
Ncẽe zi gúù zi qãá q'oo koem kò Jeso ba x'áé-dxoo xu koe hẽé naka x'áé-coa xu koe hẽéthẽé qõòa te, a ko Nqarim di x'aian di qãè tchõàn khóè ne xgaa-xgaa. Xu kò 12 xu

naka gataga c'ẽe zi khóè zi hẽéthẽé e, ncẽe kò cg'ãè tc'ẽean koe hẽé naka tcììan koe hẽéthẽé kg'õèkaguè zi. Ncẽe zia kò Marias Magatalena ta ko ma tciiè sa hẽé, ncẽe i kò 7 dxãwa tc'ẽean gas koe tcg'òóèa sa,
naka Herotem dim nquu kòre-kg'aom Gusam dis khóès Joana sa hẽé, naka Susana sa hẽé, naka c'ẽe zi khóè zi káí zi, ncẽe kò ko gazi di gúùan cgoa hùi xu zi hẽéthẽé e.
Ne kò khóè ne tãáka xu x'áé-dxoo xu koe guu a Jesom koe hàà. Eẽs ko kaias xg'ae sa xg'ae kam kò Jeso ba sere-seres ka kg'ui a máá:
“C'ẽe x'aè kam xg'ao xhárà-kg'ao ba qõò a síí xhárà.
A ẽem ko xhárà ka i c'ẽe cgùrian dàòm qàe koe tcheè, a i a nqàrèan cgoa náà tcãàè, zi tsa̱rá zi hàà tc'õó o.
I c'ẽean tcheè nxõ̱á-kg'ai di qgáìan koe. Eẽ i ko qhúí ka i ko dào, tchàua ne ko káà a khama.
I c'ẽe cgùrian dxàman hàna qgáì koe tcheè, i dxàman kai, a chúú-chuu u.
I c'ẽe cgùrian qãè góḿan koe tcheè, a káí tc'õoan 100 kúrú,” tam méé.
Eẽm ko ncẽe zi gúù zi kg'uia xg'ara kam kò máá: “Eẽ tceean úúa hãa ba méém kóḿ,” témé.
Xu Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu tẽè Me, dùú sas ko ncẽes sere-sere sa nxàe sa.
Me máá: “Gaxaoa máàèa, chóm̀sea zi kàa zi Nqarim di x'aian di zi xao gha q'ãa sa, igabar ko c'ẽe ne khóè ne cgoa sere-sere zi cgoa kg'ui:
‘nxãasega ne gha bóò, a táá bóò
a nxãasega kóḿ a táá kóḿa q'ãa ka.’
“Si ncẽe sa xhárà-kg'aom dis sere-seres ko nxàes ga si i: Cgùri nea Nqarim dim kg'ui me e.
Dàòm q'oo di nea ẽe kg'ui ba ko kóḿ ne ne e, igabam ko dxãwa ba hàà a kg'ui ba tcáóa ne koe séèa tcg'òó, nxãasega ne gha táá dtcòm̀ a kgoaraè ka.

Eẽ nxõ̱án koe kò xháràè nea gane ẽe kg'ui ba ne ko kóḿ, ne ko kúúga qãè-tcaoan cgoa hààkagu me ne ne e, igaba ne káà to̱be ne e, a ko cg'orò x'aè-coan q'oo koe dtcòm̀. A ko kúrúa bóòkuan di x'aèan ka qháésega cg'áé.

Eẽ dxàman za tcheèa nea, gane ẽe kóḿa ne ne e, igaba gane di kg'õèan q'oo koe ne ko tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese zi hẽé, qguùan hẽé naka kg'õèan di ka̱rean hẽéthẽé ka chúú-chuuè, a ne a kai tama.
Eẽ qãè góḿan koe tcheèa nea, gane ẽe kg'ui ba kóḿa, a qãè zi tcáó zi cgoa qgóóa qari mea ne ne e, a ne a ko qáò tcáó cgoa me, a nxãakg'aiga síí tc'áróan kúrú,” tam méé.
Dùús wèés ẽe chóm̀sea sa gha tchàa koe tcg'òóè, si gha dùús wèés qàbi-kg'aièa hãa sa q'ãaè, a sa a gha x'áàn koe óágaè khama.

Ke méé tu nxãaska q'ãa, nta tu ko ma komsana sa. Wèém khóèm ẽe gúù úúa hãa ba gha káían máàè, igaba wèém ẽe gúù úú tama ba gha ẽem úúa hãa gúù-coan ga séè cgaeè khama,” tam méé.
Jesom ka xõò sa hẽé naka qõese ga xu hẽéthẽéa kò hàà cgae Me, igaba ne kò khóèan di káí-q'ooan ka tààè, a táá Gam koe cúù.
Me kò bìríè a máá: “Saò sa hẽé naka Tsáá qõe ga xu hẽéthẽéa tchàa za tẽe, a bóò Tsi kg'oana,” téméè.
Igabam kò xo̱a a máá: “Tiris xõò sa hẽé naka Tíí qõe ga xu hẽéthẽéa Nqarim di kg'uian ko kóḿ a ko kúrú u ne khóè ne e,” témé.
C'ẽem cáḿ kam kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu cgoa dxòrom q'oo koe tcãà a bìrí xu a máá: “Hààn xae c'ẽem xòèm tshàam dim koe qõò,” témé, xu xgoaba.
Eẽ xu xóé a ko qõò kam kò x'óm̀.
Me kúúga kaiam tc'ãá ba tshàam tc'amkg'ai koe xgoaba, me dxòro ba tshàan ka cg'oè, xu kaias cg'ãès koe hãa.
Xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu síí ghùi Me a máá: “X'aigaè, X'aigaè, tom̀ xae ko!” témé.
Me tẽe a tc'ãá ba hẽé naka tshàam di tcẽe-tcẽean hẽéthẽé dqàè, i téé, si kò kaisas nqoo sa xóé.
