Me tẽè xu a máá: “Gaxao di dtcòm̀a nea ndaa?” témé.
Igaba xu kò q'áò, a area khama xu kò tẽèku a máá: “Dùútsa khóè ba gáé ncẽe ba? Tc'ãán ga hẽé naka tshàan ga hẽéthẽé ko kg'ui cgoa i komsana Me ba,” témé.
Xu tshàam tc'amkg'ai koe qõò a síí Gerase ne dim nqõóm koe tcãà, Galilea dim cgoa q'óá-kg'amkua hãa ba.

Eẽm ko Jeso ba dxòrom koe xõa a ko gaam nqõóm koe tcãà kam kò c'ẽem khóèm x'áé-dxoom koe guua hãam cgoa xg'ae. Gaam khóè ba kò dxãwa tc'ẽean úúa, a kò qgáí hã̱a tamase qáò x'aèan hãa, a nquuan koe ga x'ãè tama, a tc'ám̀an koe cúí ga ko x'ãèa te.

Eẽm ko Jeso ba bóò kam kò kaisase q'au a ba a cookg'aia ba koe cg'áé, a kaiam dòm̀ cgoa máá: “Dùú sa Tsi ko tíí koe qaa, Jesoè, Nqarim tc'amaka hãam di Tsi Cóá Tseè? Dtcàrà Tsir ko, táá xgàra te guu,” témé.

Jeso ba kò dxãwa tc'ẽean bìrí i ẽem khóèm koe tcg'oa, gaa domkam kò khóè ba gatà méé. Káí q'oro i kò qgóó mea, me kò q'óḿa ba koe hẽé naka nqàrèa ba koe hẽéthẽé táùan cgoa qáéèa, a kòreèa, igabam xg'ao gaa táùan qhòma tcg'òó, a kò dxãwa tc'ẽean ka séèa tcg'òó a qãáka úúèa hãa.
Me Jeso ba tẽè me a máá: “Cg'õèa tsi dìía?” témé. Me xo̱a Me a máá: “Milone ra a,” témé. Káí dxãwa tc'ẽe nea kò tcãà mea hãa khama.
I kò qarika dtcàrà Me, táám gha x'áèan tcg'òó, i chõò-q'oo úú tamam ha̱ém koe tcãà sa.
Zi kò káí zi xgùu zi xàbìm dxùukg'ai koe hãa a ko dxòó. Ka i kò dxãwa tc'ẽean Jeso ba dtcàrà, xgùu zi koe i gha tcãà sa, Me kgoara máá a.
I khóèm koe dxãwa tc'ẽean tcg'oa a i a síí xgùuan koe tcãà, zi xgùu zi xàbìm tc'amkg'ai koe guu a kari-karisea xõa a zi a tshàam koe cg'áéa tcãà, a tom̀.
Eẽ xu ko xgùuan ko kòre xu khóè xu ẽe kúrúsea hãa sa bóò ka xu kò bèe a qgóé, a síí x'áé-dxoom koe hẽé naka xháràn koe hẽéthẽé xàà a.

Ne kò khóè ne tcg'oa a síí ẽe kúrúsea hãa sa bóò. Eẽ ne ko Jesom koe hàà ka ne kò dxãwa tc'ẽean kò úúa hãam khóè ba sao-xg'ae, me Jesom nqàrè-kg'am koe ntcõe, a qgáían ha̱na, i tc'ẽea ba qãè e, ne kò q'áò.
Gane ẽe kò ẽe kúrúsea hãa sa bóò nea kò chóà a, ntam kò ma ẽe dxãwa tc'ẽean ka tcãàèam khóè ba ma qãèkaguè sa.
Ne wèé ne khóè ne Gerase dim xg'aekum di ne dtcàrà Me, gane koem gha tcg'oa sa, kaisa q'áòa nea kò tcãà nea hãa khama.
Me kò dxòrom koe tcãà a ba a ka̱bise,
kam ko ẽe kò dxãwa tc'ẽean ka tcg'oa cgaeèam khóè ba dtcàrà Me, Gam cgoam gha qõò sa. Igabam kò Jeso ba tsééa ka̱bi me a máá:
“Ka̱bise x'áéa tsi koe naka síí nxàe, nta noosem Nqari ba kúrúa máá tsia hãa sa,” témé.
Me khóè ba ka̱bise a síí wèém x'áé-dxoom koe qõòa te a khóè ne bìrí, Jesom nta noose kúrúa máá mea hãa sa.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba

Kam kò gaa x'aè kaga c'ẽem khóèm Jairo ta ko ma tciièm ncẽe kò còrè-nquum dim tc'ãà-cookg'ai ii ba gaa koe hàà, a hàà Jesom nqàrè-kg'am koe cg'áé, a còrè Me, gam dim x'áém koem gha síí cgoa me sa.
Cúís cóá sam kò úúa hãa, ncẽe kò 12 kuri ii sa, si kò x'oos qàe koe hãa khama.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba gaa koe qõò ka i kò káí khóèan nco̱rú Me.
Gane xg'aeku koes kò 12 kurian kò úúa a ko xòm̀ x'aèse nxoean hòòs khóè sa hàna, [a sa a kò wèé gúùan ẽes kòo kg'õè cgoa, naakan koe xgãá hãa]
Si Jesom qãá koe guu a hàà, a hàà Gam dim qgáím c'am qgóó, i ko c'áòan kúúga téé.
Me Jeso ba tẽè a máá: “Dìína qgóó tea?” témé. Eẽ ne ko wèé ne xo̱ase kam ko Petere ba máá: “Aboè, khóè nea káí ne e, a nxa̱ma-nxa̱ma Tsia, a ko tcãò Tsi,” témé.
Igabam kò Jeso ba máá: “C'ẽe khóèa nea qgóó Tea, xám̀ Ra ko i kò qaria Te tcg'oa cgae Te khama,” témé.

Eẽs ko khóè sa bóò, xàì tamas kò hãa sa kas ko cgùrukose hàà, a sa a hàà Jesom nqàrè-kg'am koe cg'áé, a wèé ne khóè ne cookg'ai koe bìrí Me, dùús domkas qgóó Mea hãa sa, naka si kò ma kúúga qãèkaguè sa hẽéthẽé e.
Me bìrí si a máá: “Tiri si cóá seè, sari dtcòm̀a nea qãèkagu sia, ke tòókuan cgoa qõò,” témé.

Qanegam Jeso ba téé a ko kg'ui kam kò c'ẽem khóè ba hàà, còrè-nquum dim tc'ãà-cookg'aim dim nquum koe guua ba, a bìrí me a máá: “Tsáá xuù sa ncãa x'óó, ke táá xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao ba xhõe-xhõe guu,” témé.
Igabam kò Jeso ba ẽe sam ko kóḿ ka Jairo ba bìrí a máá: “Táá q'áò guu, kg'amaga méé tsi dtcòm̀, qãès gha ke,” témé.

Eẽm ko Jairom dim x'áém koe tcãà kam kò táá c'ẽe khóè ga guu i Gam cgoa nquum q'oo koe tcãà, Petere ba hẽé naka Johane ba hẽé naka Jakobo ba hẽé, naka cóás ka xõò ba hẽé naka xõò sa hẽéthẽé cúí ga a kò ii.
Ne kò wèé ne khóè ne kg'ae, a ko cóá sa kg'ae cgae, Me Jeso ba máá: “Táá tu kg'ae guu, x'óó tamas hãa a sa a x'óm̀a hãa ke,” témé.
Ne kò wèéa ne kg'ãè Me, x'óóas hãa sa ne kò q'ana hãa khama.
Igabam ko Jeso ba x'õàa sa koe qgóó si, a máá: “Tiri si cóá seè, tẽe,” témé.
I kg'õèa sa ka̱bise, si kúúga tẽe, Me Jeso ba máá, c'ẽe gúù méés máàè naka tc'õó, témé.
Khara kò gas ka xõò ga khara kaisase are. Me bìrí khara a, táá méé khara cúí khóè ga dùús kúrúsea sa bìrí guu sa.
Me kò Jeso ba 12 xu tciia xg'ae a ba a qarian máà xu, wèé dxãwa tc'ẽean xu gha xhàiagu, a wèé tcììan thẽé tsoò di i.
A ba a tsééa tcg'òó xu, síí xu gha Nqarim di x'aian ka xgaa-xgaa, a xu a tsàako ne khóè ne kg'õèkagu ka.
A ba a bìrí xu a máá: “Táá méé xao qõò xao ko ka cúí gúù ga séè guu, dqàbi hìim ga igaba, dtcòbè ga igaba, péré ga igaba, mari ga igaba, kana cám̀ di qgáían ga igabaga.
Eẽ xao ko tcãàm nquu ba, ndakam ga igaba, gaam koe méé xao hãa naka nxãakg'aiga síí ẽem x'áé-dxoom koe tcg'oa.
A ncẽè khóèan kò qãèse hààkagu xao o tama ne méé xao nqàrèa xao di tsharàn qãè-qãe, ẽe xao ko gaam x'áé-dxoom koe tcg'oa ne, nakas gha nxãasega gane koe x'áí sa ii,” témé.
Xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu xgoaba a wèé xu x'áé xu koe qõòa te, a xu a ko qãè tchõàn xgaa-xgaa a ko wèé za ga khóèan kg'õèkagu.
Eẽm ko Galilea dim x'aigam Herote ba wèé zi gúù zi kúrúse ko zi ka kóḿ kam kò táá q'ãa. C'ẽe ne khóè nea kòo máá, Johanem
ne ko c'ẽe ne máá, Elija ba hòòsea, témé, ne ko c'ẽe ne máá, c'ẽe xu porofiti xu ncìí x'aè di xu ka c'ẽe ba x'ooan koe tẽea, témé.
Me Herote máá: “Johane bar kò q'ãe tcúúa hãa, ka ncẽe zi gúù zi gam kar ko kóḿ ba dìí baà?” témé. A ba a kò bóò mem gha sa tc'ẽe.
X'áè úú-kg'ao xu kò ka̱bise a hàà wèé zi gúù zi ẽe xu kò kúrú zi ka bìrí Me. Me séè xu, xu Gam cgoa cúía síí hãa Betesaida ta ko ma tciièm x'áé-dxoom koe.
Ncẽes gúù sa ne ko kóḿ kas kò xg'ae sa xùri Me, Me qãèse hààkagu ne, a ba a Nqarim di x'aian ka kg'ui cgoa ne, a ẽe kò ko kg'õèkagukuan qaa ne qãèkagu.

Nxãaskas cáḿ sa tshoa-tshoa a ko dqòara qõò ka xu kò 12 xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu Gam koe hàà a máá: “Khóè ne qõòa q'aakagu, naka ne nxãasega nxa̱ma-nxa̱ma hãa xu x'áé xu koe hẽé naka xhárà xu koe hẽéthẽé síí, naka nea síí x'óm̀-q'ooan hẽé naka tc'õoan hẽéthẽé qaara mááse, cúía hãam qgáìm koe ta hãa ke” témé.

Igabam kò bìrí xu a máá: “Gaxao c'ẽe gúùan máà ne naka ne tc'õó,” témé. Xu máá: “5 xu péré xu cúí xu xae úúa naka cám̀ x'aù tsara hẽéthẽé e, kana méé xae síí khóè ne wèé ne tc'õoan x'ámá máá?” témé.
5,000 khama noo xu khóè xu kò ẽe koe hàna domka.
Me kò Jeso ba Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu bìrí a máá: “Khóè ne bìrí naka ne wèés xg'aes koe 50 khama noose ntcõó,” témé.
Xu gataga hẽé, i wèé khóèan ntcõó.

Me Jeso ba 5 xu péré xu hẽé naka cám̀ x'aù tsara hẽéthẽé séè, a ba a nqarikg'ai koe ghùi-kg'ai, a ts'ee-ts'eekg'ai i, a péréan khõá q'aa, a xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu máà a, xu khóè ne q'aa-q'aa máá a.
Ne kò wèéa ne ga tc'õó, a ne a xg'ãà, xu ẽe kò qaùan xg'ae-xg'ae a 12 xu q'ore xu tcãà, xu cg'oè.
Eẽm cúíse hãa a ko còrè ka xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu síí cgae Me. Me tẽè xu a máá: “Dìí Raà, ta zi ko xg'ae zi méé?” témé.
Xu xo̱a Me a máá: “
Me tẽè xu a máá: “Kháé xaoa ko gaxao máá, dìí Raa, témé?” Me Petere xo̱a a máá: “
Me Jeso ba qarika x'áè xu, táá xu gha ncẽes gúù sa cúí khóè ga bìrí sa.
A ba a máá: “Khóèm dim Cóá ba gha káí zi gúù zi koe xgàrase, a gha
Nxãaskam kò Jeso ba Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu bìrí a máá: “Ncẽè c'ẽem khóèm kò xùri Te kg'oana ne méém bóòa xguìse naka baa gam dim xgàu hìi ba dcẽé, naka xùri Te.
Dìím wèém ẽe gam dis kg'õè sa qgóóa qaria hãa bas gha aaguse cgae, igaba wèém ẽe ko Tíí domka gam dis kg'õès ka aaguse cgaeè ba gha hòò si khama.

Dùús ka ba gha khóè ba ka̱bisea mááè, ncẽè wèém nqõó bam kòo hòò, a ba a gam dis kg'õès ka aaguse cgaeè ne, kana ba gha khóè ba dùútsa gúù sa gam di kg'õèan téé-q'oo koe tcg'òó a máà?

Dìím wèém ẽe ko Tíí hẽé naka Tiri kg'uian hẽéthẽé sau-cgaese ba gha thẽé Khóèm dim Cóám ka sau-cgaeseè, ẽem gha ko Gam di x'áàn koe hẽé naka Xõòm di x'áàn koe hẽé naka tcom-tcomsa xu moengele xu di x'áàn koe hẽéthẽé hãase ko hàà ne.
Igabar ko tseeguan bìrí tu u: Ncẽe koe téé-tẽe ne ka c'ẽea ne x'ooan xám̀a hãa tite, Nqarim di x'aia ne ne ko bóò i hàà tama cookg'ai koe,” tam méé.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba ncẽe zi gúù zi nxàea xg'ara kam kò 8 khama noo cáḿan qãá q'oo koe Peterea xu, Johanea xu, Jakoboa xu séè, a ba a xàbìm koe qõò cgoa xu a síí còrè.
Eẽm hãa a ko còrè ka i kò kg'áía ba ka̱bise a tãá, i Gam di qgáían ka̱bise a tca̱àkose q'úú.
Ka tsara ko kúúga cám̀ tsara khóè tsara kg'ui cgoa Me, Moshe ba hẽé naka Elija ba hẽéthẽé tsara,
ncẽe kò nqarikg'ai di x'áàn koe qhúí tsara, a ko Jesom cgoa kg'ui, a ko Gam di x'ooan hààko ka kg'ui, kháóa cgae ga ko Jerusalema koe kúrúse e.

Xu kò Petere ba hẽé naka gam ka c'ẽea tsara hẽéthẽé xu qarika x'óm̀a cg'áé. Eẽ xu ko kókò ka xu kò Gam dim x'áà ba bóò, naka gaa tsara khóè tsara hẽéthẽé e, ẽe ko Gam cgoa tẽe tsara.

Eẽ tsara ko khóè tsara Jeso ba guu a ko qõò kam kò Petere ba bìrí Me a máá: “X'aigaè, tsóágase i gáé qãèa, ncẽe koe xae ga hãa sa! Nqoana xu nquu-coa xu xae gha tshào, me c'ẽe ba Tsari, me c'ẽe ba Moshem di, me c'ẽe ba Elijam di,” tam méé. (C'úùam ko hãa dùú sam ko kg'ui sa.)
Qanegam hãa a ko kg'ui kas kò túú-c'õò sa qàbia tcãà xu, a sa a gas di sóm̀an cgoa qàbi xu. Eẽ xu ko xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu túú-c'õòs koe tcãà ka xu kò q'áò.
Me kò kg'ui ba túú-c'õòs koe guu a máá: “Ncẽe ba Tirim Cóá Me e, nxárár tcg'òóa ba, ke komsana Me,” témé.
Eẽm ko kg'ui ba xg'ara kam kò Jeso ba cúíse hãa. Xu kò xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ncẽes gúùs cgoa nqoo, a xu a gaa xu cáḿ xu ka táá cúí khóè ga bìrí dùú sa xu bóòa hãa sa.
Xùrikom cáḿ kam ko Jeso ba hẽé naka xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé xàbìm koe guu a ka̱bise, si kaias xg'ae sa Jesom cgoa xg'ae.
Kam kò gaa x'aè kaga c'ẽem khóè ba ẽes xg'aes q'oo koe q'au a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, dtcàrà Tsir ko Tsi tirim cóá ba bóò, nooam cóám ga me e khama.
Dxãwa tc'ẽean kòo tcãà cgae me ne i ko kúúga q'aukagu me, a qgaè-kg'aikagu me, a kg'áḿa ba koe xùbúan tcg'òókagu me, a ko khõá tòm̀-tom me, a qháése guu me tama.
Ra kò Tsari xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu dtcàrà, xhàia xu gha guu u ka, igaba xu kò tààè,” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a a máá: “Oo, tsóágase dtcòm̀ úú tamas qhàò sa gáé ncẽe sa! Nta noo x'aèa ne Ra gha gaxao cgoa hãa a qáò-tcaoa máá tu u? Tsarim cóá ba ncẽe koe óá!” témé.

Cóám ko hàà koe ga i ko dxãwa tc'ẽean góḿankg'ai koe xàbùa qáú me, a i a qgaè-qgae-kg'ai me. Kam ko nxãaska Jeso ba dxãwa tc'ẽean dqàè, a cóá ba qãèkagu, a ba a xõò ba máà me.
Ne kò wèé ne khóè ne Nqarim di kaian ka area.
Eẽ ne wèéa ne qanega ẽem Jeso ba kúrúa zi gúù zi wèé zi ka area kam kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu bìrí a máá:
“Qãèse dxãà tcee ncẽer ko bìrí xao o kg'uia ne: Khóèm dim Cóá ba gha hàà khóè ne tshàu q'oo koe tcãàè,” témé.
Igaba xu kò ẽem ko méé sa táá kóḿa q'ãa, gaxu koe i kò chóm̀sea, táá xu gha kóḿa q'ãa a ka khama. A xu a kò ẽe kg'uia ne ko dùú sa méé sa tẽèan bèe.
Si kò gaxu xg'aeku koe ntcoeku sa tẽe, dìína gaxu xg'aeku koe kaia hãa di sa.
Igabam kò Jeso ba tcáóa xu q'oo koe xu tc'ẽea hãa sa q'anaa, khamam kò cg'árém cóá ba séè, a Gam qàe koe tòó,

a ba a bìrí xu a máá: “Dìím wèém ẽe ko ncẽem cóá ba Tiri cg'õèan koe qãèse hààkagu ba ko Tíí tc'áró ga qãèse hààkagu. Me ko dìím wèém ẽe ko Tíía qãèse hààkagu Te ba ẽe tséé Tea ba qãèse hààkagu. Eẽ gaxao koe kaisase cg'áré ba gaxao ka kaiam ga me e khama,” témé.
Me Johane xo̱a a máá: “Kaia Tseè, c'ẽem khóè ba xae kò bóò me ko Tsari cg'õèan cgoa dxãwa tc'ẽean xhàiagu, xae kò sixae ka c'ẽem tama me e domka gatà hẽéan cara me,” témé.
Igabam kò Jeso ba gam ka máá: “Táá cara me guu, ẽe gaxao cgoa ntcoeku tama ba gaxao xòè koe hàna ke,” témé.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba nqarikg'ai koe séè a úúèm x'aèm ko cúù kam kò bìríse a Jerusalema koe qõò.
A ba a tséé-kg'ao xu tc'ãà a tsééa tcg'òó. Xu Samaria ne dim x'áé-coam koe síí tcãà, gúù zi xu gha kg'ónòa máá Me ka.
Igaba ne kò gaa koe hãa ne khóè ne táá qãèse hààkagu Me, Jerusalema koem kò úú-kg'aia khama.

Eẽ tsara ko xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao tsara Jakoboa tsara Johanea tsara ncẽes gúù sa bóò ka tsara ko máá: “X'aigaè, nqarikg'ai koe guuam c'ee ba tsam gha tcii, me hàà cg'õo ne sa Tsi ko tc'ẽe?” témé.
Me Jeso ba ntcẽè a dqàè tsara a.
Xu kò
Eẽ xu dàòm q'oo koe hãa a ko qõò kam ko c'ẽem khóè ba bìrí Me a máá: “Eẽ Tsi ko síí qgáì wèé koer gha xùri Tsi,” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Círí nea gaan di ha̱éan úúa, i tsa̱rán gaan di nquuan úúa, igabagam Khóèm dim Cóá ba tòó tcúúm gha qgáì úú tama,” témé.
Me kò Jeso ba c'ẽem khóè ba bìrí a máá: “Xùri te,” témé. Igabam ko gaam khóè ba máá: “X'aigaè, kg'aia qãà te nakar síí tirim xõò ba kg'ónò,” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí me a máá: “Eẽ x'óóa hãa ne guu naka ne gane dian ẽe x'óóa hãa kg'ónò, igaba tsáá qõò naka tsia síí Nqarim di x'aian ka xgaa-xgaa,” témé.
Me kò c'ẽem khóè ba gataga máá: “Xùri Tsir gha, X'aigaè, igaba qãà te nakar kg'aia síí x'áéa te di ne khóè ne x'áè,” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Eẽm tshoa-tshoa a ko xhárà koe gha ka̱bise a kháóka bóòm khóè ba Nqarim di x'aian kg'ano tama,” témé.
Ncẽe zi gúù zi qãá q'oo koem kò X'aigam
A ba a bìrí xu a máá: “Tcuùè gha gúùa ne káí i, igaba i tséé-kg'aoan cg'orò o. Ke xao
Qõò xao.
Táá méé xao qgóá ga kana dtcòbèan ga kana nxàboan ga igaba séè guu, naka táá cúí khóè ga dàòan q'oo koe tsgám̀ guu.
“Nquum ẽe xao ga ko gaam q'oo koe tcãà ba, ndakam ga igaba, méé xao kg'aia máá: ‘Tòókuan méé i ncẽem nquum cgoa hãa,’ témé.
Tòókuan dim khóèm kò gaam nquum q'oo koe x'ãèa ne i gha gaxao di tòókuan gam cgoa hãa. Eẽta i kò ii tama ne i gha gaxao di tòókuan ka̱bise cgae xao o.

Eẽm nquum koe méé xao hãa, naka xaoa wèés tc'õos ẽe ne ko máà xao o sa tc'õó naka kg'áà, tséé-kg'ao ba gam di tsééan di surutan ka kg'anoèa hãa ke. Táá méé xao nquu xu koe kg'ama qõòa te guu.
“X'áé-dxoom ẽe xao ga ko tcãàm koe, ndakam ga igaba, ne ko qãèse séè xao o ne méé xao ẽe ko cookg'aia xao koe tòóès wèé sa kg'ama tc'õó.
Tsàako ne méé xao kg'õèkagu, naka xaoa khóè ne bìrí naka máá: ‘Nqarim di x'aia nea cúù cgae tua,’ témé.
Igaba x'áé-dxoom wèém ẽe xao ko tcãàm koe ne kò khóè ne qãèse séè xao o tama ne méé xao x'áéan xg'aeku koe tcãà naka máá:
‘Gatu dim x'áé-dxoom di tsharà a ncẽe nqàrèa xae koe hãa a, xae ko qãè-qãe cgae tu u, igaba méé tu q'ana, Nqarim di x'aia nea cúù cgae tua sa,’ témé.
Bìrí xao or ko, xgàrakuan dim cáḿ kam gha ncẽem x'áé-dxoo ba Sodomam ka kaisa xgàrakuan hòò.

“Cg'ãè i gha ii tsáá ka Korasineè! Cg'ãè i gha ii tsáá ka Betesaidaè! Are-aresa zi x'áí zi ncẽe ko gatu koe kúrúèa zi kò Ture hẽé naka Sitone hẽéthẽé koe kúrúèa hãa ne ne ga kò ncìíse gane di chìbian koe tcóósea, a saka di qgáían hã̱a, a tháúan tcgáùsea hãa.
Igabar ko bìrí tu u a ko máá: Xgàrakuan dim cáḿ ka i gha Ture hẽé naka Sitone hẽéthẽé gatu ka subuse xgàraè, témé.
“A ncẽe tsáá ka, Kaperenaume tseè, nqarikg'ai koe tsi gha ghùi a úúè,
Xu gaxu khóè xu 72 xu qãè-tcaoase ka̱bise a máá: “X'aigaè, dxãwa tc'ẽean igaba i ko komsana xae e, Tsari cg'õèan cgoa xae kò ko dqàè e ne,” témé.
Me xo̱a xu a máá: “Satana bar kò bóòa me kò túú-tebem khama ma nqarikg'ai koe guu a ko tcheè.
Bóò, qaria ner máà xaoa, cg'aoan hẽé naka xg'árìan hẽéthẽé xao gha náà cgoa di i. A Ra a gataga qarian máà xaoa hãa,
Cg'ãè tc'ẽean ko komsana xao o domka méé xao táá qãè-tcao guu, igaba méé xao gaxao di cg'õèa nea nqarikg'ai koe góáèa domka qãè-tcao,” témé.

Eẽm x'aèm kam kò Jeso ba Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽem di qãè-tcaoan ka cg'oè cgaeèa, a máá: “Dqo̱m̀ Tsir ko, Aboè, X'aiga Tsi nqarikg'ai hẽé naka nqõómkg'ai hẽéthẽé di Tsi, ncẽe zi gúù zi Tsi kò tc'ẽega ne hẽé naka xgaa-xgaasea hãa ne hẽéthẽé chóm̀-kg'aia hãa, a Tsi a kò cg'áré ne cóá ne x'áí zia hãa khama. Eè, Aboè, ncẽea Tsi kò ma ncàm̀a hãa ga a khama.

“Wèé zi gúù zi Ra Tirim Abom ka máàèa, i cúí khóè ga Cóám dìí ii sa c'úùa hãa, Xõòm oose, kana i cúí khóè ga Xõòm dìí ii sa c'úùa hãa, Cóásem oose, naka wèém ẽe Cóám ka nxárá tcg'òóèa ba hẽéthẽé e,” témé.
Me Jeso ba Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu koe ka̱bise a dxùukg'ai za bìrí xu a máá: “Ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa ia tcgáían ẽe ko gaxao ko bóò zi gúù zi bóò o,

bìrí xao or ko khama, káí porofitian hẽé naka x'aiga xu hẽéthẽéa kò bóò kg'oana ẽe xao ko gaxao bóò sa, igaba i kò táá bóò si; a kò kóḿ kg'oana ẽe xao ko gaxao kóḿ sa, igaba i kò táá kóḿ si,” témé.
Me kò gaa x'aè kaga c'ẽem x'áè q'ãa-kg'ao ba tẽe a Jeso bam kúrúa bóò kg'oana khama máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, dùú sa ra gha kúrú a chõò tamas kg'õè sa hòò?” témé.
Me Jeso ba tẽè me a máá: “Dùú sa
Me gaam khóè ba xo̱a Me a máá:
“X'aigam tsarim Nqari ba méé tsi
wèé tcáóa tsi cgoa hẽé,
naka wèé kg'õèa tsi cgoa hẽé,
naka wèé qaria tsi cgoa hẽé,
naka wèé tc'ẽea tsi cgoa hẽéthẽé
ncàm̀,
naka tsia gataga thẽé
ẽe tsi ma ncàm̀sea hãa khamaga ma
tsáá ka c'ẽe ba
ncàm̀,”
témé.
Me bìrí me a máá: “Qãèse tsi xo̱ara hãa. Kúrú ncẽe gúùa ne naka tsia gha kg'õèan hòò,” témé.
Igabam kò gabá tchànom iise bóòè kg'oana khamam kò Jeso ba tẽè a máá: “Kháé tíí ka c'ẽe ba dìí ba?” témé.

Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “C'ẽem khóè ba kò Jerusalema koe guu a ko Jeriko koe qõò, a ba a kò ts'ãà-kg'ao xu cgoa qõòa xg'ae, xu qgáía ba xhùu me, a xg'áḿa cg'õos q'oo koe xg'áḿ me, a xu a guu me a qõò.
“I kò kúrúse me c'ẽem peresiti ba c'úùase ko gaam dàòm cgoa hàà. Eẽm ko gaam khóè ba bóò kam kò nxãa a c'ẽe xòèan dàòm di séè a nqáé.
“Me kò gatà thẽé tempelem koe ko hùim khóè ba
“Igabam kò Samaria dim khóèm c'ẽe ba gaam dàòm ga ba séè a ko qõò, a gaam khóè ba hàà sao-xg'ae. A ẽem ko bóò me ka thõò-xama máá me,

a ba a síí cgae me a gaa zi chìbi zi nxúìan hẽé naka gõéan hẽéthẽé ka ntcã̱á cgae a tcáḿ zi, a ba a gam dim donghim koe qábìkagu me, a cg'áè-nquum koe úú me, a ba a síí gaa koe q'õé me.

“Eẽ i ko q'uu kam kò qano mari tsara tcg'òó a cg'áè-nquu-kg'ao ba máà, a máá: ‘Q'õé me, kháóar ko síí ka̱bise ner gha wèé gúùan ẽe tsi tsééa máá mea koe hàà suruta tsi ke,’ témé.”
Me máá: “Eẽ thõò-xama máá mea me e,” témé.
Kam ko Jeso ba bìrí me a máá: “Qõò naka tsia síí gatà hẽé thẽé,” témé.

Jeso ba hẽé naka Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽéa ko dàòm koe hàna a ko qõò kam kò c'ẽem x'áé-coam koe hàà, si kò Mareta ta ko ma tciiès khóè sa gas dim nquum koe qãèse hààkagu Me.
Mareta sa kò qõe sa úúa Maria ta ko ma tciiè sa. Si kò Maria X'aigam

Igabagas kò Mareta sa káí tsééan ka xáèèa, khamas kò Jesom koe hàà a máá: “X'aigaè, tíí qões ka Tsi gáé c'ẽe gúù méé ta ga hãa? Guu tes ko ra ko cúísega tsééa máá tu u ka. Bìrí si nakas hàà hùi te,” témé.
Me X'aigam
igabas ko cúís gúù sa qaase, si Maria sa qãès gúù sa nxárá tcg'òóa máásea hãa, si ncẽes gúù sa gas koe séèa ka̱biè tite,” témé.

C'ẽem cáḿ kam kò Jeso ba c'ẽem qgáìm koe hãa a ko còrè. Eẽm ko còrèa xg'ara kam kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ka c'ẽe ba bìrí Me a máá: “X'aigaè, xgaa-xgaa xae e còrèa ne, ẽem ko ma gataga Johane gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ma xgaa-xgaa a khamaga ma,” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí xu a máá: “Còrè xao kò ne méé xao máá:
‘Sita ka Xõò Tseè,
Tsari cg'õèan méé i dqo̱m̀mè.
Tsari x'aian méé i hàà.
Sita dis tc'õos wèé cáḿ di sa
wèé cáḿ ka máà ta a.
Naka qgóóa máá ta a chìbia ta,
sita igaba ta ko wèém
ẽe sita koe chìbian kúrúa hãa ba qgóóa máá ke.
Naka Tsia táá kúrúa bóòkuan koe tcéèa úú ta a guu,’ témé,” tam méé.

Me gaa koe guus ka Jeso ba bìrí xu a máá: “C'ẽem-kg'áḿ kam gaxao ka c'ẽe ba tcárà ba úúa, a ba a ntcùú nqáè ka síí cgae me, a bìrí me a máá: ‘Tíí tcáràè, nqoana xu péré xu cgóbè te,
tíí tcáràm dàò koe hàna ba ncãa hàà cgae te, ra cúí gúù ga úú tama máà mer gham tc'õó o ke,’ témé.

Me nxãaska ẽe nquum q'oo koe hàna ba xo̱a a máá: ‘Táá xhõekagu te guu, nquu-kg'áḿ ba tcẽekg'amsea, ra x'óm̀a cóáa te cgoa, khama ra cuiskaga tẽe naka máà tsi xua hãa tite ke,’ témé.
Bìrí xao or ko, tẽem gha a tcg'òó xu, gam dim tcárà me e domka. Nxãa tama ko ii nem gha tẽe a ẽem dtcàràèa hãa sa kúrú,
“Ra ko bìrí tu u a ko máá: Dtcàrà tu, máàè tu gha ke, qaa tu, hòò tu gha ke,
Dìím wèém ẽe ko dtcàrà ba ko máàè, me ko wèém ẽe ko qaa ba hòò, me gha wèém ẽe ko nquu-kg'áḿ ba xg'áḿ-xg'am ba xgobekg'ama mááè khama.
“Ndakam xõò ba gha gam dim cóám kòo x'aù ba dtcàrà me ne, x'aùm téé-q'oo koe cg'ao ba máà me?
Kana xg'árì ba máà me, tc'ubi bam kò dtcàrà me koe?
A ncẽè gatu ncẽe cg'ãè tc'ẽe ii tu kò qãè aban gatu di cóán máà q'ana hãa ne ba gha nxãaska
Jeso ba kò nqóbóm khóèm koe dxãwa tc'ẽean xhàiagu. Eẽ i ko dxãwa tc'ẽean tcg'oa kam kò gaam khóèm ẽe kò kg'ui tama ba kg'ui, zi xg'ae zi gaa koe kò hàna zi kaisase are.
Igaba ne kò c'ẽe ne máá: “Dxãwa tc'ẽean dim x'aigam Belesebulem di qarian cgoam ko dxãwa tc'ẽean xhàiagu,” témé.
Ne c'ẽe ne qgóó Me ne gha qgáìan qaa ka dtcàrà Me,
Jeso ba kò gane di tc'ẽean q'ana khamam kò bìrí ne a máá: “Eẽ q'aara hãas x'ais wèé sa gha kaà, me ẽe q'aa-q'aasea hãam x'áé ba gaicara hãa tite.
A ncẽè satanam kò gaam ka q'aara hãa ne i gha kháé nxãaska ntama x'aian hãa? Ncẽè gatu ko máá, Belesebule ba qarian máà Tea ra ko dxãwa tc'ẽean gaan cgoa xhàiagu, témé ne.

A ncẽè Tíí kòo Belesebulem di qarian cgoa dxãwa tc'ẽean xhàiagu, ne ia ko gatu di khóèan dìím cgoa xhàiagu u? Gaa domkaga ne gha gaxao di ne khóè ne x'áí, ẽe xao ko kg'ui sa tseegu tama sa.
Igaba ncẽè Tíí kò ko dxãwa tc'ẽean Nqarim dim tshàum cgoa xhàiagu, nes ko nxãa sa x'áí, Nqarim di x'aia nea gatu koe hààraa sa.
“Ncẽè qarim khóèm ncõo gàba zi úúam kò ko gam dim nquu ba kòre ne i ko gam di gúùan qãè qgáì koe hãa.

Igaba qarian ka tàà meam káí zi ncõo gàba zi dim kò ko hàà a ko x'ãà me nem ko tàà me, a gam di zi ncõo gàba zi ẽem kò dtcãàsea hãa zi xhùu me, a ba a ẽem ko séè cgae mea zi gúù zi q'aa-q'aa.
Eẽ Tíí cgoa hãa tama ba, Tíí cgoa tééa q'aumanakua, me gataga ẽem Tíí cgoa xg'ae-xg'ae tama ba ko tsa̱i-tsa̱ia q'aa.

“Eẽ i ko dxãwa tc'ẽean khóèm koe tcg'oa ne i ko c'óòa qgáìan koe qõò, a sãa i gha qgáìan qaa, a ncẽè hòò o tama i kò hãa ne i ko nxãaska bìríse a máá: ‘Tirim nquum ẽer guua hãam koer gha ka̱bise,’ témé,
a ẽe i kò hàà nquu ba bóò me káà gúù ii, a xgàia q'ano-q'anoèa, a qãèse kg'ónòèa,

ne i ko nxãaska qõò a síí 7 tc'ẽean séè a hàà cgoa, gaan nqáéase cg'ãè e, i hàà tcãà a i a gaa koe x'ãè. Si ẽem khóèm dis téé-q'oo sa hàà kaisase cg'ãè kg'aiaka dis ka,” tam méé.

Eẽm ko Jeso ba ncẽeta mééa xg'ara kas ko khóè sa xg'aes q'oo koe guu a q'aua kg'ui a Jeso ba bìrí a máá: “Ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa saa khóès ẽe ábà Tsia sa, naka bíìan ẽe Tsi coma hãa hẽéthẽé e,” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a si a máá: “Tseegukaga, igaba ẽe Nqarim di kg'uian ko kóḿ a ko ẽe i ko méé khama hẽé nea kaisase ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa ne ne e,” témé.
Eẽ zi ko khóè ne di zi xg'ae zi càùse kam ko Jeso ba tshoa-tshoa a máá: “Ncẽes qhàò sa cg'ãè cau si i, a ko
Eẽm xg'ao ma Jona ma Ninefe di ne khóè ne koe ma x'áí sa ii, khamagam gha ma khóèm dim Cóá ba ma ncẽes qhàòs koe x'áí sa ii khama.

X'aigas Sheba di sa gha xgàrakuan dim cáḿ ka ncẽes qhàòs di khóèan cgoa tẽe a téé, a gha chìbi-chibi a xgàra si, nqõóm chõò-q'oo koes kò guu a ko hàà Solomonem di tc'ẽegan komsana khama. Igaba bóò, Solomonem ka kaia hãa ba ncẽeska ncẽe koe hàna.

Xgàrakuan dim cáḿ ka xu gha khóè xu Ninefe di xu tẽe a téé, a gha ncẽes qhàò sa chìbi-chibi a xgàra. Jonam di xgaa-xgaan koe xu kò guu a gaxu di chìbian koe tcóóse khama. Me ncẽeska Jonam ka kaia hãa ba ncẽe koe hàna,” tam méé.
Tsarim tcgáí ba tsarim tc'áróm dim x'áà me e. Tsarim tcgáím kò qãè e, nem wèém tc'áróm tsari ba x'áàn ka cg'oèa.
Gaa domka méé tsi bóò naka i tsáá koe hàna x'áàn táá ntcùú sa ii guu.

Khama nxãaska ncẽè wèé cgáé-q'ooa tsi kò x'áàn ka cg'oè cgaea, i cúí xòèa tsi ga ntcùús q'oo koe hãa tama, nem wèém cgáé-q'oo ba x'áàn úúa, ncẽes ko ma x'áà-x'aa-kg'ai cgoa dis gúù sa ma tsáá koe ma kaisase ma x'áà khamaga ma,” tam méé.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba kg'uia xg'ara kam ko c'ẽem Farasai ba dtcàrà Me, síím gha tc'õó cgoa me ka. Me kò Jeso ba tcãà a síí tafolem koe ntcõó cgoa me, tc'õó cgoa mem gha ka.
Igaba ẽem ko Farasai ba bóòa q'ãa, Jesom ko xg'aà tshàu tamase tc'õó sa kam kò are.
Me X'aigam
Gaxao káà tc'ẽe xaoè, ẽe qãá sa kúrúa ba gáé gam q'ooa sa thẽé kúrúa hãam tama baà?
Igaba dùús wèés gàbas q'oo koe hàna sa ẽe dxàua ne khóè ne máà, naka xaoa gha nxãasega tchàa za hẽé naka q'oo za hẽéthẽé q'ano ii.
“Haò, cg'ãè i gha ii gaxao Farasai xao ka! Nqari ba xao ko tc'õoan ko xg'ãò-xg'ão zi gúù zi
“Haò, cg'ãè i gha ii gaxao Farasai xao koe! Còrè-nquuan koe xao kaia zi ntcõó-q'oo zi ncàm̀a hãa, naka x'ámágu di zi qgáì zi koe tsgám̀ku sa hẽéthẽé e.
“Haò, cg'ãè i gha ii gaxao koe, x'áíse tama zi tc'ám̀ zi khama xao ii, ncẽe khóèan ko kg'ama tc'amkg'aia zi koe, bóòa q'ãa zi tamase gãá zi,” tam méé.
Me kò x'áè q'ãa-kg'aom c'ẽe ba xo̱a Me a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, ẽeta Tsi kòo méé ne Tsi ko sixae igaba cóè xae e thẽé,” témé.

Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Gaxao x'áè q'ãa-kg'ao xao igaba: Haò, cg'ãè i gha ii gaxao koe, qóḿse xao ko khóèan qóḿ gúùan dcẽékagu, igaba xao gaxao cúím tshàum gaxao dim kaga qgóó o tama.
“Haò, cg'ãè i gha ii gatu koe. Porofiti xu di zi tc'ám̀ zi koe tu kò dqo̱m̀ cgoaè xu gha zi gúù zi tshàoa tòó, ncẽe gatu ka tsgõose ga xu ka cg'õoèa xu.
Ncẽes gúù sa xao ko nxàea tseegukagu, gaxao ka tsgõose ga xu kúrúa hãa tsééa ne. Porofiti xu xu kò cg'õo khama, xao kò gaxu di tc'ám̀an tshào.
Ncẽes gúùs domkam kò Nqari ba Gam di tc'ẽegan koe máá: “Porofiti xu hẽé naka x'áè úú-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽér gha gane koe tsééa úú, ne gha c'ẽe-kg'áía xu cg'õo, a c'ẽea xu xgàra.
Gaa domkas gha ncẽes qhàò sa nqõóm tshoa-tshoasea koe guu a ntcã̱àguèa c'áòan wèé xu porofiti xu di xo̱ara máá,

Abelem di c'áòan koe guu a síí Sakariam dian koe tcãà. Sakariam ncẽe kò altara ba hẽé naka còrè-nquu ba hẽéthẽé xg'aeku koe cg'õoè ba. Eè, bìrí tu ur ko, qhàòs ncẽe sa gha wèéan ncẽe ga xo̱ara máá.

“Haò, cg'ãè i gha ii gaxao x'áè q'ãa-kg'ao xao koe, q'ãan di tc'ẽean dim xgobekg'am ba xao séèa máásea. Gaxaoa kò gaxao ka táá tcãà, a xao a kò ẽe ko tcãà ne xgáè-kg'am,” tam méé.

Eẽm ko Jeso ba ẽem qgáìm koe tcg'oa a ko qõò ka xu kò x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu hẽé naka Farasai xu hẽéthẽé xu tshoa-tshoa a xgáèa tòó Me, a káí zi tẽè-kg'áḿ zi qaa tcáó Me ko zi tẽè Me,
Nxãasegam gha tshúù gúùan kg'ui xu chìbi-chibi Me ka.
Gaa koes kò kaias xg'aes tcám̀-tcám̀s khóè ne di sa xg'aea hãa, ne kò xáèkua hãa i kòm̀ ga káà a, kam kò
Wèés gúùs ẽe chóm̀sea hãa sa gha xgòre-kg'aiè, si gha wèés tchõàs ẽe chóm̀sea hãa sa q'ãase.
Eẽ xao ko ntcùúan q'oo koe kg'ui sa gha x'áàn q'oo koe kóḿse, si gha gataga ẽe xao kòo nquuan q'oo koe c'am̀ sa thẽé nquuan tco̱be koe nxàese.
“Tíí ka c'ẽea tuè, bìrí tu ur ko, a ko máá: Táá
Igabar gha bìrí tu u dìí ba méé tu q'áò sa:
A 5 tsa̱rá zia gáé mari-coa tsara cgoa x'ámáguè tama? Igabas cúís ga sa Nqarim ka c'urùèa hãa tite.
I gataga wèé c'õòan tcúúa tu di ga nxáráèa. Ke táá q'áò guu, káí zi tsa̱rá zi ka tu kaisase cgáé tu u ke.
“Bìrí tu ur ko a ko máá: Dìím wèém ẽe gha khóè ne cookg'ai koe Tíí ka nxàese bam gha Khóèm dim Cóá ba thẽé Nqarim di xu moengele xu cookg'ai koe nxàea tcg'òó.
Igaba dìím wèém ẽe gha khóè ne cookg'ai koe xo̱ase Te ba gha Nqarim di xu moengele xu cookg'ai koe xo̱aseè.
Me gha wèém khóèm ẽe ko Khóèm dim Cóám ka cg'ãèse kg'ui ba qgóóa mááè, igaba ẽe gha Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽem ka cg'ãè kg'uian kg'ui ba cuiskaga qgóóa mááèa hãa tite.

“Igaba ẽe ne kòo còrè-nquu xu koe hẽé naka x'áèan di xu kaia xu koe hẽé naka tc'ãà-cookg'ai xu koe hẽéthẽé xo̱ara máásean ka tcãà tu u, ne méé tu táá káíse tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese guu, dùú sa tu gha nxàe sa, kana nta tu gha ma nxàe e sa, ncẽem x'aèm kòo hàà ne tu gha nxàe tu gha sa máàè ke,
Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽe ba gha ẽem x'aèm ka xgaa-xgaa tu u, dùú sa méé tu nxàe sa ke,” tam méé.

C'ẽem khóè ba kò ẽes xg'aes q'oo koe guu a Jeso ba bìrí a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, tíí kíím cgoa kg'ui nakam sitsam ka xõòm x'óóa guua zi gúù zi tíí cgoa q'aa-q'aaku,” témé.
Igabam kò Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Khóè tseè, dìí na qarian máà Tea, gúùa ner gha q'aa-q'aa tsao o di i?” témé.
Me
A ba a ncẽes sere-sere sa bìrí ne a máá: “C'ẽem khóèm qguùa kò hãa ba xg'ao hàna, gam dim xháràm kòo káí tc'õoan kúrú ba.
Me tcáóa ba koe tẽèse a máá: ‘Dùú ra gha kúrú? C'ẽe qgáì gar úú tama ka, tiri tc'õoa ner gha tòóa mááse e,’ témé.
Kam ko máá: ‘Ncẽea ra gha hẽé ga a: Tòóa máásean di xu nquu xu tiri xur gha ko̱be a ra a kaia xu tshào, a tiri mabere cãan hẽé naka tiri zi gúù zi c'ẽe zi hẽéthẽé gaa koe tòó.
Ra gha

Igabagam ko Nqari ba bìrí me a máá: ‘Tsáá khóè tsi káà tc'ẽe tseè, ncẽem ntcùúm ka tsi gha kg'õèa tsi séè cgaeè, ka zia gha nxãaska ẽe tsi kúrúa máásea hãa zi gúù zi dìín di ii?’ témé.
Ncẽea i gha ii ga a, dìím wèém ẽe ko x'aia ba tòóa mááse ba Nqarim cookg'ai koe qguù tama,” tam

Me Jeso ba Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu bìrí a máá: “Gaa domkar ko bìrí xao o, a ko máá: Táá gaxao di kg'õèan ka káíse tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese guu, dùú xao gha tc'õó kana dùú xao gha cgáé-q'ooa xao koe hã̱a sa. Kg'õè sa tc'õoan ka cgáé si i, me tc'áró ba qgáían ka cgáé me e ke.
Kg'õè sa tc'õoan ka kaisase cgáé si i, me cgáé-q'oo ba qgáían ka kaisase cgáé me e.
Ho̱aran bóò, xhárà tama i hãa, a tcuù tama, a tc'õoan i gha tòóa mááse nquuan úú tama, gabàm ko Nqari ba xárò o. Tu gatu tsa̱rán ka kaisase cgáé tu u.
A gatu ka c'ẽem dìí ba gha kg'õèa ba di cáḿan koe káíse tc'ẽe-tc'ẽesean ka cáḿ ba càù?
Ncẽes gúùs cg'árés kúrú kaga tu ko tààè, ka tu koáé nxãaska dùúska c'ẽe zi ka káíse tc'ẽe-tc'ẽesea máá?
Bóò, nta zi qãáka di zi x'aa zi ii sa, zi ko ma tso̱m sa; tséé tama zi hãa, a zi a gataga qgáían qgãéa mááse tama. Igabar ko bìrí tu u,

A ncẽè Nqarim kòo qãáka di dcãan ncẽe ko ncẽe cáḿ ka hãa, a q'uu ka c'eean q'oo koe xaoa tcãàè, nxãan ncẽeta ma hã̱akagu, nem gha tseegukaga cgáése gatua hã̱akagu tu u, oo, gatu ncẽe cg'áré dtcòm̀an úúa tuè?
“Ke tu táá dùú sa tu gha tc'õó kana kg'áà sa qaa guu, naka káíse tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese guu.
Tãá zi qhàò zi di nea ko wèé gúùan ncẽe ga qaa, Me gatu ka Xõòm ga ba ncẽe gúùan tu ko qaa sa q'ana hãa.
Igabaga méé tu kg'aika X'aigam Nqarim di x'aian qaa, naka tua gha ncẽe zi gúù zi wèé zi thẽé máàè.
“Ghùu-coa tuè, táá tu q'áò guu, qãè-tcaokagu i ko gatu ka Xõò ba, Me gha ntcõó-q'ooan máà tu u ke.
Eẽ tu úúa hãa zi tu x'ámágu, naka tua gazi di marian dxàua ne khóè ne máà. Cg'ãa-cg'anase tama qgóán tu kúrúa mááse,
Eẽ tsari qguùan hãa koe i gha gataga thẽé tsari tcáóan hãa khama.
“Tséé sa méé tu kg'ónòsea máána hãa, naka i gatu di x'áà-x'aa-kg'ai cgoa di gúùan ko ka̱ru.
Gane ka q'õòse ba qãà hãa ne tséé-kg'ao ne khama ma, séèkuan dis kõ̱ès koe kò qõòa hãa ba. Eẽm ko hàà a ko nquu-kg'áḿ ba xg'áḿ-xg'am, ne gha kúúga xgobekg'ama máá me ne.

Eẽ xu qãà xu, ncẽe gaxu ka q'õòsem ko hàà a hàà sao-xg'ae xu kókòa hãa xu ka i gha kaisase cgáé ii. Tseegukar ko bìrí tu u: Tsééam gha máá xu sam kg'ónòsea máána hãa, a gha tafolem koe ntcòo xu, a tsééa máá xu.
Eẽ gaxu ka q'õòsem kòo ntcùú ka hàà kana ntcùú nqáè ka igaba gha kókòa hãa xu qãà xua ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa.
Igaba méé xao ncẽe sa q'ana hãa: Ncẽè nquu ba kàoa hãam khóèm kò q'ana hãa ts'ãà-kg'aom ko dùútsa x'aè ka tcãà sa, nem ga kò táá gam dim nquu ba guu me khõaèa hãa.
Ke méé tu gatu igaba kg'ónòsea hãa, Khóèm dim Cóá ba gha tcom tama tu hãam cáḿ ka hàà cgae tu u ke,” tam méé.
Petere ba kò máá: “X'aigaè, ncẽes sere-seres ncẽe Tsi ko nxàe sa koáé sixae cgoa kg'ui, kana saa ko wèém khóèm cgoa kg'ui?” témé.
Me X'aigam
Ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa baa ẽem qãà ba, ncẽe gam ka q'õòsem ko hàà nem ko hàà sao-xg'ae me ko gatà hẽé ba.
Tseegukar ko bìrí tu u a ko máá: wèé zi gúù zi ẽem úúa hãa zi di qaria nem gha gam koe tòó.

Igabaga ncẽè ẽem qãàm ko tcáóa ba q'oo koe bìríse a máá: ‘Tíí q'õò ba ãoa hãa a qháése hàà tite,’ témé, a ba a tshoa-tshoa a c'ẽe ne qãà ne xg'áḿku cgoa, a tc'õó a kg'áà a tshoa-tshoa a nqàre,
nem gha ẽem qãàm ka q'õòse ba tcom tamam hãam cáḿ ka hàà, c'úùam hãa x'aè ka, a ba a gha hàà xgàra me, a ẽe tcom-tcomsa tama ne cgoa xg'ae-xg'ae me.
“Qãàm ẽe gam ka q'õòsem ko qaa sa q'ana hãa, igaba kg'ónòse naka kúrú si tama ba gha káí
Igaba ẽem kúrúa hãas domkam ko xgàraè sa c'úùa hãam qãà ba gha cg'orò
“Nqõómkg'ai koer gha hàà c'eean óá kar hààra, a kò gataga káíse ncàm̀aa, nxãakamaga i ga kò ka̱rukaguèa sa!
Tcguù-tcguuku sa hàna tcguù-tcguuèr gha ko sa, gaas kar qgóóèa si gha nxãakg'aiga síí xg'ara.
Nqõómkg'ai koer ko hàà tòókuan óá, ta tu gáé tc'ẽea? Bìrí tu ur ko: nxãas tama si i, igabar ko q'aa-q'aase sa óága.
Ncẽe koe guus ka ne gha 5 ne khóè ne cúím x'áém di ne q'aa-q'aaè, ne gha nqoana ne cám̀an cgoa táá kóḿku, i cám̀an táá nqoanan cgoa kóḿku.

Q'aa-q'aaè ne gha, me xõò ba cóám cgoa táá kóḿku, me cóá ba xõòm cgoa táá kóḿku, si xõò sa cóás cgoa táá kóḿku, si cóá sa gaas ka xõòs cgoa táá kóḿku, si c'uì sa c'uìse-coas cgoa táá kóḿku, si c'uìse-coa sa c'uìses cgoa táá kóḿku,” tam méé.
A ba a xg'ae zi bìrí a máá: “Túú-c'õò sa tu kò bóò si ko cáḿs ko tcãà xòè za guu a ko qaò ne tu ko kúúga máá: ‘Tuu i ko sene,’ témé, i gataga ii.
Dtcẽè xòè za guuam tc'ãá ba tu kòo bóò ne, tu ko máá: ‘Sene i gha kaisase kùrusa a,’ témé, i gataga ii.

Gatu khóè tu qãè khóèan khama ko ma kúrúse tuè! Nqõómkg'ai hẽé naka nqarikg'ai hẽéthẽé koe gha kúrúse zi gúù zi nxàe tu q'ana hãa, igaba tu dùús domka x'aèan di zi x'áí zi nxàean c'úùa hãa?
“Dùús domka tu cúíaga bóòa tcg'òóa mááse tama qãè gúùan kúrúè gha a?

Eẽ ko chìbi-chibi tsim cgoa, méé tsi wèé qaria tsi kúrú naka tsao xg'aen ntcõó naka ẽes chìbi sa nxàe nakas qanega tsao dàòm q'oo koe hãa a xgàrakuan dis qhàìs koe síí ta ga hãase chõò. Nxãa tama kò ii nem gha xgàra-kg'aom tshàu q'oo koe tcãà tsi, me gha xgàra-kg'ao ba qáé-kg'aom tshàu q'oo koe tcãà tsi, tsi gha qáé-nquus koe tcãàè.
Bìrí tsir ko a ko máá: Cuiskaga tsi gaa koe tcg'oara hãa tite, a gha nxãakg'aiga síí ẽe qaùa hãam mari-coa ba suruta,” tam méé.
Gaa x'aè ka ne kò c'ẽe ne khóè ne gaa koe hàna, ncẽe kò Jeso ba Galilea di ne khóè ne ka bìrí ne, ncẽem kò Pilato cg'õoa hãa ne, ẽe ne kò ko dàòa-mááku zi kúrú x'aè ka.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a ne a máá: “Gatu ko bóò ka nea kò ncẽe ne Galilea ne, wèé ne Galilea ne c'ẽe ne ka tshúù ne chìbi-kg'ao nea, ncẽeta ne kò ma xgàrase ka?
Bìrí tu ur ko, gatà i ii tama, igaba tu kò gatu di chìbian koe tcóóse tama ne tu gha wèéa tu ga gataga ma kaàkaguè.

Kana tua ko ntama ma tc'ẽe 18 ne khóè ne ncẽe kò Siloame koe qáòm nxõ̱á nquum ka cg'áé cgaeè ne ka, a cg'õoè ne, gatu ko bóò ka nea kò wèé khóèan ẽe Jerusalema koe x'ãèa hãa ka chìbiga nea?
Bìrí tu ur ko, gatà i ii tama, igaba tu kò gatu di chìbian koe tcóóse tama ne tu gha wèéa tu ga gataga ma kaàkaguè,” tam méé.

Jeso ba kò nxãaska ncẽes sere-seres ka bìrí ne a máá: “Khóè ba kò hàna a ba a faia dis hìi sa úúa, gam dim kg'om xháràm q'oo koe kò xháràèa sa. Gaa koem kò síí ko tc'áróa sa qaa, igabam ko táá cúían ga hòò.

Me nxãaska khóèm gam dim xhárà ba ko kòre ba bìrí a máá: ‘Bóò, nqoana xu kuri xu ra úúa a ko ncẽe koe hàà a ko hàà ncẽes hìis faia dis di tc'áróan qaa, igabagar cúían ga hòò tama. Ke xg'aoa tcg'òó si! Kg'amagas téé a ko góḿan tséékagu ke!’ témé.
Igabam kò khóè ba xo̱a a máá: ‘Tíí q'õòè, guu si gaicara cúím kuri ba nakar tshào qaò si naka c'aruan máà si.
Ncẽeko hààm kurim kas kò tc'áró kúrú ne i gha qãè e, igabagas kò kúrú u tama ne tsi gha nxãaska xg'aoa tcg'òó si,’ témé.”
Sabata dim cáḿ kam kò Jeso ba hãa a ko c'ẽem còrè-nquum koe xgaa-xgaa.
Igabagas ko gaa koe khóè sa hàna, 18 kurian ko dxãwa tc'ẽean ka nqo̱arakaguèa hãa sa, a sa a kò qhúùsea, a cg'árés kaga tchoanàse tama.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba bóò si kam kò Gam koe tciia óá si a máá: “Khóè seè, tcììa si koe si kgoaraèa,” témé.
A ba tshàua ba tòó cgae si, si gaa x'aè kaga tchoanàse a sa a Nqari ba dqo̱m̀.

Jesom ko Sabata di cáḿ ka kg'õèkagus gúùs domkam kò còrè-nquum dim tc'ãà-cookg'ai ba xgóà, a ba a khóè ne bìrí a máá: “6 cáḿa ne hàna khóèan ga tséé e, ke méé ne gaa cáḿan ka hàà naka nea hàà kg'õèkaguse, Sabata dim cáḿ ka tamase,” témé.
Me kò X'aiga

Ka sa gáé ga ncẽes khóès Abrahamam ka cóáses, ncẽe kò ncẽeta noo kurian 18 séè a satanam ka qáéèa hãa sa, Sabata dim cáḿ ka táá kgoaraè ẽe kò qáé sia hãas gúùs koe?” tam méé.
Eẽm ko ncẽes gúù sa nxàe ka i kò Gam di ntcoe-kg'aoan saucgae, igabas kò wèés xg'aes ẽe sa wèé zi gúù zi cgáé zi ẽem kúrúa hãa zi qãè-tcaoa máá.
Me Jeso ba tẽè
Mosetara
Me gaicara tẽè a máá: “Dùús cgoa Ra gha Nqarim di x'aian nxárá xg'ae?
Péré gãé-gãean khama i ii, ncẽes ko dxàes khóè sa séè a káí péréan cgoa xg'ae-xg'ae e, i wèés pérés koe tséé, si gãe e,” tam méé.
Eẽm kò Jeso ba Jerusalema koe qõò kam kò x'áé-dxoo xu hẽé naka x'áé-coa xu koe hẽéthẽé tcãà, a ba a ẽem ko ma qõò khama ma xgaa-xgaa.
C'ẽem khóè ba kò tẽè Me a máá: “X'aigaè, a cg'orò ne khóè ne cúí ne ko hàà kgoaraè?” témé.
Me bìrí ne a máá:
“Wèé qaria tsi ga tséékagu naka tsia xgam-xgam nquu-kg'áḿ koe tcãà. Bìrí tu ur ko a ko máá: káí nea gha tcãà ne gha sa tc'ẽe igaba ne gha tààè.

Eẽm ko nquu-kg'ao ba tẽe a ko nquu-kg'áḿ ba tcẽekg'am x'aè ka tu gha tchàa za hãa, a tu a gha tshoa-tshoa a nquu-kg'áḿ ba xg'áḿ-xg'am, a kg'aea mááse a máá: ‘X'aigaè, nquu-kg'áḿ ba xgobekg'ama máá ta a,’ témé, igabam gha xo̱a tu u a máá: ‘C'úù tua raa ke tu tíí koe tcg'oa, gatu cg'ãè kúrú-kg'ao tuè!’ témé.
Tu gha tshoa-tshoa a máá: ‘Tsáá cgoa ta kò ko tc'õó a ko kg'áà, tsi kò ko gatá di x'áéan koe ga thẽé xgaa-xgaa,’ témé.
Igabagam gha xo̱a a máá: ‘C'úù tua ra hãa, a guua tu hãa qgáì ga c'úùa, ke tu tíí koe tcg'oa, gatu wèé tu cg'ãè kúrú-kg'ao tuè,’ témé.

Abrahama ba hẽé, Isaka ba hẽé, naka Jakobe ba hẽé, naka wèé porofitian Nqarim di x'aian koe hàna hẽéthẽé tu kò ko bóò nes gha kg'ae sa hẽé nakas gãò xõ̱ó sa hẽéthẽé hãa, igabaga tu gha gatu tchàa za xaoa tcg'òóèa hãa.
Igaba ne gha khóè ne cáḿs ko tcg'oa xòè koe guu, ne c'ẽe ne cáḿs ko tcheè xòè koe guu, ne c'ẽe ne c'ẽe xòèan nqõóm di koe guu, a hàà x'aian Nqarim di koe ntcõó.
Igabaga méé tu q'ãa, c'ẽe ne ẽe kháóka kò hãa nea gha tc'ãà di ne ii, ne gha c'ẽe ne ẽe tc'ãà di kò ii ne kháóka di ne ii,” tam méé.
Eẽm x'aèm ka xu kò c'ẽe xu Farasai xu Jeso ba hàà cgae, a bìrí Me a máá: “Ncẽem qgáì ba tcg'oara guu naka Tsia c'ẽe za qõò, Herote ba cg'õo Tsi kg'oana ke,” témé.

Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Qõò naka síí ẽem círí ba bìrí naka máá: ‘Dxãwa tc'ẽea ner ko xhàiagu, a Ra a ko khóè ne ncẽem cáḿ ka hẽé naka q'uu dim cáḿ ka hẽéthẽé qãèkagu, a Ra a gha Tiri tsééan nqoana dim cáḿ ka xg'ara-xg'ara,’ témé.

Gatà i ii igaba méér dàòa te koe hãa ncẽem cáḿ ka hẽé, q'uu dim cáḿ ka hẽé, naka q'uu dim cáḿ qãá q'oo dim cáḿ ka hẽéthẽé e. Porofitim ga Jerusalema ka tchàa za cg'õoè sa qãè tama khama.

“Oo! Jerusalemaè, Jerusalemaè. Tsáá porofitian ko cg'õo tsi, a ẽe tsáá koe i kò tsééa óáèa hãa ne ko nxõ̱án cgoa xao o tsi. Nta noose ra kò tc'ẽea hãa, tsari cóá ner ga cúí koe xg'ae-xg'aea hãa sa, ẽes ko ma ghòrò sa tcgàmà sa dòm̀ q'oo koe ma gas di ghòrò-coan ma xg'ae-xg'ae khama. Igabaga tu ko tc'ẽe e tama.

Q'ãa méé tu, Nqari ba gha Gam dim nquu ba guua máá tu u sa. Bìrí tu ur ko, gaicara tu bóò Tea hãa tite a tu a gha nxãakg'aiga máá: ‘Eẽ ko X'aigam dim cg'õèm cgoa hàà ba ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa hãa,’ témé,” tam méé.
C'ẽem cáḿ Sabata dim kam kò Jeso ba Farasai xu dim tc'ãà-cookg'aim x'áé koe hàna, a ko tc'õó, ka ne kò khóè ne
Me kò kúúga x'õàa ba hẽé naka c'õáa ba hẽéthẽé kò gãéa hãam khóè ba Jesom koe hàà.
Me kò Jeso ba x'áè q'ãa-kg'ao xu hẽé naka Farasai xu hẽéthẽé tẽè a máá: “Sabata dim cáḿ ka khóèan qãèkagua nea
Igaba xu kò táá cúí gúù ga nxàe. Me kò Jeso ba khóè ba séè, a qãèkagu, a guu mem qõò.
Kam ko bìrí xu a máá: “Ncẽè gaxao ka c'ẽem kò cóá ba úúa kana ghòè ba, me Sabata dim cáḿ ka tsàùm q'oo koe cg'áéa tcãà, ne ba síí tcg'òó mea hãa tite?” témé.
Igaba xu kò ncẽes gúùs ka táá kgoana a xo̱a Me.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba bóòa q'ãa, cg'áè-kg'ao ne ko ma kaia zi ntcõó-q'oo zi koe ma ntcõó sa, kam kò ncẽes sere-sere sa bìrí ne a máá:

“Eẽ tsi kò c'ẽem khóèm ka séèkuan dis kõ̱ès koe tciièa hãa ne táá kaia zi ntcõó-q'oo zi koe ntcõó guu, c'ẽedaokam gha c'ẽem khóèm tsáá ka kaisase tcom-tcomsa ba thẽé tciièa hãa ke.

Gatà i kò ii nem gha ẽe tcii tsaoa hãa ba hàà, a bìrí tsi a máá: ‘Ncẽem khóè ba tsaris ntcõó-q'oo sa máà,’ témé, tsi gha saucgae, a gha nxãaska tshoa-tshoa a cg'árés ntcõó-q'oos koe síí ntcõó.

Igaba ẽe tsi kò tciièa hãa ne, cg'árés ntcõó-q'oos koe ntcõó, nakam gha nxãasega ẽe tcii tsia hãam kò ko hàà ne bìrí tsi naka máá: ‘Tíí tcáràè, còoka hànas ntcõó-q'oos koe ntcõó,’ témé, naka tsi gha nxãasega cg'áè-kg'ao ne tsáá ka c'ẽe ne cookg'ai koe tcom-tcomsakaguè.
Wèém ẽe ko kaikaguse ba gha cg'áré-cg'areè, me gha ẽe ko cg'áré-cg'arese ba kaikaguè khama,” tam méé.

Me Jeso ba nxãaska ẽe kò tcii mea hãam khóè ba bìrí a máá: “Eẽ tsi kò dòàs koaba, kana dqòa di tc'õoan di sa ko kúrú, ne méé tsi táá tsáá tcárà ne, kana tsáá qõe ga ne, kana tsari ne qhàò ne, kana tsáá ka c'ẽea ne ẽe qguùa ne igaba tcii guu. Gatà tsi kò ko hẽé ne, ne gha gane igaba thẽé dòàn kúrú a gha tciia úú tsi, a síí ẽe tsi kúrúa máá nea hãa sa suruta ka̱bi tsi ke.
Igaba ncẽè dòà sa tsi kò kúrúa hãa ne méé tsi dxàua ne khóè ne hẽé, nqo̱ara ne hẽé, ts'íìko ne hẽé naka káà tcgáí ne hẽéthẽé tciia óá,
naka tsia gha nxãasega ts'eekg'ai ii, c'ẽe gúù gaan cgoa ne gha suruta ka̱bi tsi ne úú tama khama, a tsi a gha tchàno ne khóè ne ko x'ooan koe ghùiè x'aè ka suruta ka̱biè,” tam méé.
Eẽ kò Gam cgoa ntcõe xu ka c'ẽem ko ncẽes gúù sa kóḿ kam kò Jeso ba bìrí a máá: “Ts'eekg'ai me e gha ii, ẽe gha ko dòàs Nqarim di x'aian dis koe tc'õó ba!” témé.
Me
“Eẽs dòàs di x'aè kam ko gam dim qãà ba tsééa úú, síím gha ẽe kò tciièa hãa ne bìrí a máá: ‘Wèé zi gúù zia kg'ónòèa hãa ke tu hàà,’ témé ka.

Igabaga ne ko wèéa ne ga cúíta méé a tshoa-tshoa a c'ẽe zi tséé zi ka ne ma qgóóa tòóèa sa nxàe. Tc'ãà di ba kò máá: ‘Ncãar xhárà ba x'ámá, qõò méér naka síí bóò mes gúù si i, ke cgóm̀na kg'aika qãà te,’ témé.
Me c'ẽe ba máá: ‘Ncãar 5 xu ghòè xu jokoan di xu x'ámá, a ncẽer ii ka ko síí kúrúa bóò xu, ke cgóm̀na kg'aika qãà te,’ témé.
C'ẽem igabam kò máá: ‘Khóè sar ka̱basega séèa hãa, khamar síí tite,’ témé.

“Me qãà ba ka̱bise a hàà ncẽe zi gúù zi gam ka q'õòsem koe xàà. Me kò x'áé-kg'ao ba xgóà, a gam dim qãà ba bìrí a máá: ‘Qháé naka tsia x'áé xu koe hẽé, naka x'áé tcúú xu koe hẽéthẽé síí, naka tsia síí ẽe dxàua ne hẽé, ẽe nqo̱ara ne hẽé, ẽe káà tcgáí ne hẽé, naka ts'íìko ne hẽéthẽé, séè naka ncẽe koe óá,’ témé.
Me

“Me nxãaska qãàm ka q'õòse ba bìrí me a máá: ‘Dàò xu koe hẽé naka x'áéan xg'aeku di xu dàò-coa xu koe hẽéthẽé qõò naka tsia kúrú ne naka ne hàà, nakam gha nxãasega tirim nquu ba cg'oè.
Bìrí tu ur ko, ẽe kò tciièa hãa xu khóè xu ka cúím ga ba tiris dòàs di tc'õoan xám̀a hãa tite!’ témé,” tam Jeso ba méé.
Zi kò kaia zi xg'ae zi Jesom cgoa qõò. Me ka̱bise a bìrí ne a máá:
“Ncẽè c'ẽem
Dìím wèém ẽe gam dim xgàu hìi ba dcẽé naka xùri Te tama ba Tirim xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao ba ii tite.
“C'ẽedaokam gaxao ka c'ẽe ba qáòm nquu ba tshào kg'oana, ka ba gáé kg'aika ntcõó naka tc'ẽe-tc'ẽesea hãa tite, nta noo marian ko qaase sa, gaas tséé sam ga xg'ara-xg'ara cgoa a?
Eẽm ko tshoa-tshoa sa kúrú, a kò xg'ara-xg'ara sa ka tààè, nem gha wèém khóèm ẽe ko bóò me ba kg'ãè me khama,
a kg'ui a máá: ‘Ncẽem khóè ba tshoa-tshoa a ko tshào, igabam xg'ara-xg'aran ka tààèa hãa,’ témé.

“A ncẽè c'ẽem x'aigam kò 10,000 xu ncõo-kg'ao xu úúa hãa, a ko síí c'ẽem x'aigam 20,000 xu ncõo-kg'ao xu úúa hãam cgoa x'ãàku, ne ba gáé kg'aika ntcõó naka tc'ẽe naka bóò tama, tc'ãòa hãa qaria nem úúa hãa sa, síím ga c'ẽem x'aiga ba x'ãà cgoa a?
A ncẽè gatàm kò hẽé tama, nem gha tchõà xàà-kg'ao xu tsééa úú, c'ẽem qanega nqúù ii koe, xu síí tòókuan dtcàrà.
Gatà iim dàòm kam, dìím wèém ẽe gatu xg'aeku koe hãa ba, a gam di zi gúù zi wèé zi ẽem úúa hãa zi aagu tama ba Tirim xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao ba ii tite.
“Ta̱bea ne qãè e, igaba i kò ta̱bean gaan di tsa̱u-q'ooan ka kaà cgaeè, ne i gha gaicara ntama ma kúrúè a tsa̱u?
Góḿan koe ga hẽé naka cg'urian ẽe tcheèguèa koe ga hẽéthẽé i káà tséé e, a ko khóèan ka tchàa za aaguè. Eẽ tceean úúa hãa ba méém kóḿ,” tam méé.
C'ẽem cáḿ ka i kò wèé mari xg'ae-xg'ae-kg'aoan hẽé naka chìbi-kg'aoan hẽéthẽé Jesom koe cúù-cuuse, hàà ne gha komsana Me ka.
Xu Farasai xu hẽé naka x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé tshoa-tshoa a kg'uia mááse a máá: “Ncẽem khóè ba ko chìbi-kg'ao ne qãèse hààkagu, a ko gane cgoa tc'õó,” témé.
Me nxãaska Jeso ba ncẽes sere-sere sa bìrí xu a máá:

“C'ẽem-kg'áḿ kam gatu ka c'ẽe ba 100 zi ghùu zi úúa, si gazi xg'aeku koe cúí sa ho̱à, ne ba cuiskaga ẽe zi 99 zi qãáka guu, naka ẽe ho̱àra hãa sa síí qaa, naka ba nxãakg'aiga síí hòò si tite?
A ẽem kòo hòò si, nem gha kaisase qãè-tcao a ba a gha nxa̱ra ba koe dcẽé si.
Eẽm ko x'áé koe hàà nem gha gam ka tcáràse ga xu xg'ae-xg'ae gam di qhàòan cgoa, a bìrí ne a máá: ‘Tiris ghùus ncẽe ko ho̱àra hãa sar hòòa ke tu tíí cgoa qãè-tcao,’ témé.
Bìrí tu ur ko a ko máá: gatà iim dàòm cúím ka i gha nqarikg'ai koe qãè-tcaoan hãa, cúím chìbi-kg'aom ẽe ko chìbian koe tcóósem domka, 99 ne khóè ne ẽe tchàno ne e

“Kanas kò c'ẽem-kg'áḿ ka khóès 10 qano mari xu úúa hãa sa, c'ẽem ka aaguse cgaeè, ne sa gáé ga táá x'áà-x'aa-kg'ai cgoa dis gúù sa dàò, naka nquu ba xgài q'oo, naka qãèse ẽem mari ba qaa, naka nxãakg'aiga síí hòò me tite?
Eẽs kò hòò me nes gha gas di tcáràn hẽé naka gas di qhàòan hẽéthẽé tciia xg'ae, a máá: ‘Marim ẽe kò aagusea hãa bar hòòa hãa ke tu tíí cgoa qãè-tcao,’ témé.
Bìrí tu ur ko a ko máá: gatà iim dàòm cúím ka i gha Nqarim di xu moengele xu cookg'ai koe qãè-tcaoan hãa, cúím chìbi-kg'aom ẽe gha gam di chìbian koe tcóósem domka,” tam méé.
Me Jeso ba nxãaska máá: “Khóèm cám̀ cóá tsara kò úúa hãa ba kò hãa.
Me cg'áré ba xõò ba bìrí a máá: ‘Aboè, tsari zi gúù zi q'aa-q'aa máá tsam m, naka tiri gha ii zi máà te,’ témé. Me kò gam di gúùan gam di tsara cóá tsara q'aa-q'aa máá.

“Me cg'áré ba cg'orò xu cáḿ xu qãá q'oo koe gam di zi gúù zi wèé zi x'ámágu, a ba a marian séè, a x'áéa ba guu, a nqúùm nqõóm koe qõò, a síí gaa koe gam di marian x'ãè a cg'ãè zi gúù zi koe xgãá.
Eẽm ko gam di zi gúù zi wèé zi tséékagua xg'ara kas kò gaam nqõóm koe qhóó sa tcãà, me tshoa-tshoa a
Kam ko c'ẽem khóèm gaam nqõóm dim koe síí a síí tsééan dtcàrà, me nxãa ba gam dim xháràm koe tsééa úú me, síím gha xgùuan kòre ka.
Me kò káíse tc'ẽea hãa, xgùuan di tc'õoan cgoam ga kg'õèkaguse sa, i kò táá cúí khóè ga c'ẽe gúù tc'õó di ga máà me.
“Me ẽem ko ẽe sa bóòa q'ãa ka bìríse a máá: ‘Nta noo tséé-kg'aoan àbom dia káí tc'õoan úúa, ra ko tíí ncẽe koe xàbàn ka cg'õoè.
Xgoabar gha a àbom koe síí, a ra a gha síí bìrí me a máá: ‘Aboè, nqarikg'aian hẽé naka tsáá cookg'ai koe hẽéthẽé ra chìbian kúrúa hãa.
Tsarir cóá ra a tar ga ma tciiè sar kg'ano tama; ke tsari xu tséé-kg'ao xu khama ma qgóó te,’ tam méé.
A ba a xgoaba, a xõòm koe qõò.
“Eẽm qanega nqúù ii kam kò xõò ba bóò me, a thõò-xama máá me, a qàròa síí cgae me, a síí xgábé me, a x'obè me.
Me cóáse ba bìrí me a máá: ‘Aboè, nqarikg'aian hẽé naka tsáá cookg'ai koe hẽéthẽé ra chìbian kúrúa hãa. Tsarim cóá ba tar gha ma tciiè sar kg'ano tama,’ témé.
Me xõò ba gam di xu qãà xu bìrí a máá: ‘Qháése xao t'õèm qgáí ba óá, na hàà hã̱akagu me, naka xaoa tcãà tshàu sa tcãà tshàu me, naka xaoa nxàbokagu me.
Naka xaoa síí tsauam ghòè-coa ba séè na cg'õo, naka ta kg'oo na dòà sa kúrú.
Ncẽem cóám tiri ba kò x'óóa hãa, igabam ncẽeska kg'õèa hãa; ho̱àram kò hãa igabam hòòsea hãa ke,’ tam méé. Ne tshoa-tshoa a dòà sa kúrú.
“Gaa x'aè kam kò gam ka cóásem kaia ba xhárà-kg'ai za hãa. Síím ka̱bise a x'áéan qàe koe hãa kam ko khóè ne kóḿ ne ko nxáè a ko ntcãà.
Kam kò c'ẽem qãà ba tcii a tẽè, dùús ko kúrúse sa.
Me nxãa ba xo̱a me a máá: ‘Tsáá qõe ba ka̱bisea hãa, me saò ba qãèsem ka̱bisea hãas gúùs domka tsauam ghòè-coa ba qhàea hãa,’ témé.
Me káímkhoe ba kaisase xgóà a ba a nquum q'oo koe tcãàn xguì.
“Me kò xõò ba tcg'oa a hàà dàna me.

Me xo̱a me a máá: ‘Bóò, káí kurian ncẽeta noor qãàm khama ma tsééa máá tsia hãa, a qanega tsari x'áè-kg'áḿan ntcoe ta ga hãa. Igaba tsi qanega piri-coas ga sa máà te, nakar gha nxãasega tíí tcárà ne cgoa dòà sa kúrú ta ga hãa.
Igaba ẽem ko ncẽem cóám tsari ba ka̱bise, ncẽe kò tsari zi gúù zi cg'áràn koe kõ̱è cgoa ba, ka tsi kò tsauam ghòè-coa ba cg'õoa máá me,’ témé.
Me xõò ba bìrí me a máá: ‘Tiri cóáè, tsáá tsi wèé x'aè ka tíí cgoa hãa, i tiri gúùan wèé ga tsari i.
Gaa domka méé ta kõ̱è naka qãè-tcao, tsáá qõem ncẽe ba kò x'óóa hãa, igabam ncẽeska kg'õèa hãa; ho̱àram kò hãa, igabam hòòsea hãa domka,’ témé.”

Jeso ba kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu bìrí a máá: “C'ẽem khóè ba kò hãa qguùa ba, a ba a kò nquu kòre-kg'ao ba úúa hãa, ncẽe gam di zi gúù zi kò ko kòre ba. I ko xààn hààra hãa, gaam nquu kòre-kg'ao ba ko gam di zi gúù zim ko ma tc'ẽe khama ma tséékagu sa.

Me nxãaska gam ka q'õòse ba tciia tcãà me a máá: ‘Dùú sa ncẽer ko tsáá ka kóḿ sa? Tsari tséé-q'ooan dis tcgãya sa máà te, gaicara tsi cuiskaga nquu kòre-kg'ao ba kúrúa hãa tite ke,’ témé.
“Me nquu kòre-kg'ao ba bìríse a máá: ‘Dùú sa ra gha kúrú, ncẽe tíí q'õòm ko tsééa te xhùu cgae te ka? Tshào cgoar gha qarian tc'ãòa hãar úú tama, a ra a ko gataga dtcàràn ka
Ncẽeskar q'ana hãa dùú sar gha kúrú sa, nxãasega ne gha khóè ne x'áéa ne koe qãèse hààkagu te ka, ncẽe koer ko tsééan koe tcg'òóè ne,’ tam méé.
“Kam ko wèé ne khóè ne ẽe kò gam ka q'õòse ba chìbian kúrú cgaea ne cúí cúí tcii, a tc'ãà di ba bìrí a máá: ‘Tíí q'õòm koe tsi nta noo chìbian úúa?’ témé.
Me xo̱a me a máá: ‘100 xu gàba xu

Me nxãaska cám̀ di ba bìrí a máá: ‘Kháé tsáá ka, nta noo chìbian tsi úúa?’ témé. Me máá: ‘100 xu cãa xu maberean di xu u,’ témé. Me bìrí me a máá: ‘Tsaris tcgãya sa séè naka 80 xu góá tòó,’ témé.
“Me kò gam ka q'õòse ba gam dim nquu kòre-kg'aom tcom-tcomsa tama ba dqo̱m̀, tc'ẽegasem tsééa hãa khama. Ncẽem kámám di ne khóè nea gane ka c'ẽea ne cgoa
Tíí ra ko bìrí tu u a ko máá: Nqõómkg'ai di x'aian cgoa tcáràn kúrú, naka tua gha nxãasega ẽe i kò x'aian kaà ne, chõò tamam x'áém koe qãèse hààkaguè.
Dìím wèém ẽe cg'áré gúùan koe tcommèa hãa ba gha thẽé kaian koe ga tcommè. Dìím wèém ẽe cg'áréan koe tcommè tama ba gha thẽé ẽe kaian koe ga táá tcommè.
Kháé nxãaska ncẽè nqõóm di zi qguù zi qgóó koe tu kò tcom-tcomsa tama, ne tua gha ntama ma tseeguan di qguùan qgóó koe tcommè?
Khama ncẽè c'ẽem khóèm di zi gúù zi ka tu kò tcom-tcomsa tama ne, tu gha nxãaska gatu di zi dìín ka máàè?

“Cám̀ x'aigan gha tsééa máám qãà ba káà me e. C'ẽe bam gha hòre, a c'ẽe ba ncàm̀ khama, kanam gha c'ẽem koe dtcãàse, a c'ẽe ba ntcoe khama. Cuiskaga tu Nqari ba hẽé naka x'aian dim nqárì ba hẽéthẽé tsara cúí x'aè ka tsééa máána hãa tite,” tam méé.
Eẽ xu ko Farasai xu, ncẽe marian ncàm̀a hãa xu wèé gúùan ncẽe kóḿ, ka xu kò kg'ãèa nco̱i Me.

Igabam kò Jeso ba bìrí xu a máá: “Khóè ne cookg'ai koe xao ko tchàno iise bóòse, igabagam Nqari ba tcáóa xao q'ana hãa. Eẽ ko khóèm ka cgáé iise bóòè sam ko Nqari ba tcgáí-q'ooa ba koe cg'ãa-cg'ana iise bóò khama.

“X'áèan hẽé naka porofiti xu hẽéthẽéa kò hãa i nxãakg'aiga síí Johanem di x'aèan tcãà, i kò gaa koe guus ka nxãaska Nqarim di x'aian di qãè tchõàn xgaa-xgaaè, i kò wèé khóèan ghùi tcáó a tcana máá a.
Nqarikg'aian hẽé naka nqõómkg'ai hẽéthẽéa gha kaà sa thamka si i, igaba cg'áré xòè-coan x'áèan di ga kaà sa thamka tama.
“Wèém khóèm ẽe ko gam dis khóè sa aagu, a c'ẽes khóè sa séè ba ko cg'áràn kúrú, me gataga ẽe aaguèa hãas khóè sa ko séèm khóè ba thẽé ko cg'áràn kúrú,” tam méé.
Me kò gataga c'ẽem khóèm Lasaro ta ko ma tciièm dxàua hãa ba hãa, ncẽe kòo gam dis xhàros-kg'áḿ koe káíse xóé ba, a kò cgáé-q'ooa ba koe káí chìbian úúa hãa.
A kò káíse ncóóa hãa ẽem khóèm qguùa hãam dim tafolem koe ko guu a tcheè tc'õoan cgoam gha kg'õèkaguse sa. Gataga i kòo ha̱ghuan igabaga hàà a hàà gam di zi chìbi zi tshãà.
“Me x'aè ba hàà me ẽem dtcàrà-kg'aom dxàua kò hãa ba x'óó, xu moengele xu séè a síí Abrahamam qàe koe ntcòó me, me ẽe kò qguùa hãa ba thẽé x'óó, a síí kg'ónòè.
Igabam kò x'óóa ne khóè ne dim qgáìm xgàrakuan dim koe kaisas thõòs koe hãase, ghùi-kg'ai a Abrahama ba bóò, me nqúù ii, me Lasaro ba qàea ba koe ntcõe,

kam ko q'au a máá: ‘Abrahama, àboè, thõò-xama máá te, naka tsia Lasaro ba tsééa óá, nakam gha hàà nxãasega tshàu c'ama ba tshàan q'oo koe tcãà naka ta̱ma te qgài-qgai, kaisas thõòs koer hãa ke,’ témé.

“Me kò Abrahama ba xo̱a me a máá: ‘Tiri cóáè, tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese, kg'õèa tsi q'oo koe tsi kò tsáá qãè gúùan máàèa, me kò Lasaro ba tshúù zi gúù zi máàè, igabam ko ncẽeska qgài-qgai tcáóè, tsi ko tsáá thõòan xám̀kaguè.

Me gataga, wèé zi gúù zi ncẽe zi oose, sitsam hẽé naka tsáá hẽéthẽé xae xg'aeku koe kaiam qàm ba kúrúèa hãa, q'oòè tite ba, nxãasega ne gha ncẽe koe guu a ẽe koe síí kg'oana ne hẽé naka ẽe koe guu a q'oase hàà kg'oana ne hẽéthẽé tààè ka,’ tam méé.
Me máá: ‘Aboè, nxãaskar ko dtcàrà tsi, tirim xõòm dim nquum koe tsi gha Lasaro ba tsééa úú sa,
nakam síí tíí qõe ga xu 5 xu gaa koe hãa xu q'ãa-q'ãa, naka xu gha nxãasega táá gataga thẽé ncẽer hànam qgáìm xgàrakuan dim koe hàà guu,’ témé.
“Me kò Abrahama ba xo̱a me a máá: ‘Tsáá qõe ga xua Moshe ba hẽé naka porofiti xu hẽéthẽé di zi Tcgãya zi úúa, ke méé xu komsana zi,’ témé.
Me máá: ‘Nxãan tama a, àbo tsi Abrahama tseè, igaba ncẽè c'ẽem khóèm kò x'ooan koe guu a síí cgae xu, ne xu gha gaxu di chìbian koe tcóóse,’ tam méé.
“Me Abrahama ba bìrí me a máá: ‘Moshe ba hẽé naka porofiti xu hẽéthẽé xu kò komsana tama, ne xu cuiskaga khóèm ẽe x'ooan koe tẽeam

Jeso ba kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu bìrí a máá: “Eẽ ko khóèan chìbian kúrúkagu gúùan méé i hãas gúù si i, igaba i gáé tsóágase ẽe ko gaa cg'ãè-kg'ooan kúrú ba cg'ãèa máána hãa!

Gam ka i gha qãè e, gáí cgoa dis nxõ̱ás kaias kòo qg'áóa ba koe qáéa tòóè, me kaiam tshàam q'oo koe xaoa tcãàè ne, guuè naka ncẽe ne cg'áré ne ka c'ẽe ba chìbian kúrúkagu tamase.
Ke méé tu kòresea hãa.
“Tsáá qõem kòo chìbian kúrú, ne méé tsi dqàè me, naka ẽem kòo chìbi bóòse ne qgóóa máá me.
Eẽm kòo cáḿ q'oo koe 7 q'oro chìbian kúrú cgae tsi, a ba a 7 q'oro ka̱bise a hàà cgae tsi, a hàà chìbi bóòse ne méé tsi qgóóa máá me,” tam méé.
Xu x'áè úú-kg'ao xu X'aigam

Me X'aiga ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Dtcòm̀an xao kò úúa hãa, mosetara dis hìis dim tc'ubim khama noo o, ne xao ga ncẽes hìis kaias faia di sa bìrí a máá: ‘To̱bea si cgoa q'óè naka síí tshàam q'oo koe xháràse,’ témé, nes ga komsana xao o.

“C'ẽedaokam gaxao ka c'ẽe ba xháràko máá me kana ghùuan ko kòrea máá mem qãà ba úúa, ne ba gha ẽem qãáka guua hãa ne bìrí a máá: ‘Qháé naka hàà ntcõón tsam tc'õó?’ témé.

Kana ba cuiskaga bìrí me naka máá: ‘Dqòa di tc'õoan tsãàgua máá te, naka tsia ẽer hãa a ko tc'õó a ko kg'áà x'aè ka kg'ónòse naka qãà te, ẽer kòo xg'ara ne tsi gha tsáá igaba thẽé tc'õó a kg'áà ke,’ téméa hãa tite?
Gam dim qãà ba ba gha qãè-tcaoa máá, ẽem kò bìrí me sam kúrúa hãa domka?

Gaxao ka igaba i gha thẽé gatà ii: wèés gúùs ẽe xao kúrú si xao gha ka máàèa hãa sa xao kò kúrúa xg'ara ne xao gha máá: ‘Cg'ãa-cg'ana di xae qãà xae e, sixae ga kò kúrúa hãa tsééan cúí ga xae kúrúa hãa khama,’ témé,” tam Jeso ba méé.
Eẽm dàòm koe hãa a ko Jerusalema koe qõò, kam kò Jeso ba Samaria hẽé naka Galilea hẽéthẽé xg'aeku koe ko nqáé.
Eẽm ko c'ẽem x'áé-coam koe tcãà, ka xu kò 10 xu khóè xu lepero dis tcìì sa kò tsàara hãa xu xg'ae cgoa Me. A xu a kò nqúù ka téé
a q'au a máá: “Jesoè, X'aigaè, thõò-xama máá xae e!” témé.
Eẽm ko bóò xu kam kò bìrí xu a máá: “Qõò xao peresiti xu koe naka xu síí bóò xao o,” témé.
Eẽ xu ko qõò ka xu kò q'ano-q'anoè.
Eẽm ko gaxu ka c'ẽe ba bóòse a qãèkaguèa kam kò ka̱bise a q'aua Nqari ba dqo̱m̀.
Góḿankg'ai koem kò qám̀se Jesom nqàrè-kg'am koe, a ba a qãè-tcaoa máá Me. Ncẽem khóè ba kò Samaria dim khóè me e.
Me kò Jeso ba tẽèm cgoa xo̱a a máá: “10 xu khóè xu gáé kò qãèkaguè tama, xu c'ẽe xu 9 xu ndaa?
Dùús domka ba ncẽem khóèm tãá za guuam cúí ba hàà ko Nqari ba dqo̱m̀?” témé.
A ba a bìrí me a máá: “Tẽe naka tsia qõò, tsari dtcòm̀a nea kg'õèkagu tsia hãa ke,” témé.
Eẽ xu ko Farasai xu tẽè Me, n-cáḿa i ko Nqarim di x'aian hàà sa, kam ko xo̱a xu a máá: “Nqarim di x'aia nea qãèse ko bóòèkose hààs gúùs tama si i,
kana i cuiskaga khóèan máá: ‘Bóò, ncãa ga ia,’ kana: ‘Eẽ ga ia,’ téméa hãa tite, Nqarim di x'aia nea gatu xg'aeku koe hãa khama,” tam méé.
A ba a Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu bìrí a máá: “X'aè ba ko hàà, hàà xao gha Khóèm dim Cóám di xu cáḿ xu ka c'ẽe ba bóòan xgónè ba, igaba xao cuiskaga bóò mea hãa tite.
Bìrí xao o ne gha a máá: ‘Eẽ síí hãa koe bóò!’ kana ‘Ncẽe koe bóò!’ témé, igaba táá qõò kana xùri ne guu.
Eẽm ko ma túú-tebe ba x'áà, a ko c'ẽem xòèm koe guu a síí c'ẽem xòèm koe nqarikg'aian x'áà-x'aa khama i gha ma Khóèm dim Cóám ka ii, Gam dim cáḿ ka.
Igaba méém kg'aia káí zi gúù zi koe xgàrase, naka baa ncẽes qhàòs ka bóòa xguìè.
“Ncẽe i kò Nowam di cáḿan ka ii khamaga i gha Khóèm dim Cóám di cáḿan ka ii.

Khóè ne kòo tc'õó, a kòo kg'áà, a kòo séèku, a kòo séèkuan bìríku, me nxãakg'aiga Nowam ko arakam koe tcãàm cáḿ ba síí hàà, me kò tshàa-dxoo ba hàà, a hàà wèé ne ne kaàkagu.
“Lotem di cáḿan cgoa i ko cúí ii, khóè ne kòo tc'õó, a kòo kg'áà, a kòo x'ámá, a kòo x'ámágu, a kòo xhárà, a kòo tshào.
Igabaga ẽem ko Lote ba Sodoma koe guu a qõòm cáḿ kam kòo c'ee ba hẽé naka dàokom nxúì ba hẽéthẽé nqarikg'ai koe guu a hàà wèéa ne ga kaàkagu.
“Ncẽeta cgáéga i gha ii, Khóèm dim Cóám ko hàà x'áísem cáḿ ka.
Gaam ẽe nquuan tco̱be koe hãa, i gam di gúùan nquuan q'oo koe hãa ba méém táá xõa naka síí séè e guu; gataga méém xháràn koe hãa ba táá ka̱bise guu.
Lotem dis khóè sa tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese.
Dìím wèém ẽe ko gam dis kg'õè sa qgóóa qari bas gha aaguse cgae, igaba dìím wèém ẽe ko
Bìrí tu ur ko a ko máá: Eẽm ntcùúm ka i gha cám̀ khóèan cúím tcoàm koe x'óm̀a hãa, me gha cúí ba séèè, me cúí ba guuè.
Cám̀ khóè sara gha xg'ae a ko maberean táó, si gha c'ẽe sa séèè, si c'ẽe sa guuè,” tam méé.
Xu kò
Jeso ba kò
a ba a máá: “C'ẽem x'áé-dxoom koem kò bóòa-tcg'òó-kg'ao ba hãa, Nqari ba kò q'áò tama ba, a khóè ga tchõà úú cgoa tama.
Si kò gataga dxàe-ntcõa sa ẽem x'áé-dxoom koe hãa, wèé x'aè ka kò ko hàà cgae me, a ko máá: ‘Tchànose bóòa tcg'òó naka tiri cg'õo-kg'aoan x'áí tchàno ra ii sa,’ témé sa.
Me kò
igabas ko ncẽes dxàe-ntcõa sa xhõé-xhõe te domkar gha kg'uia máá si. Gatàr kò hẽé tama nes gha wèé x'aè ka qõòa máá te ka xhõe-xhõe te khama,’ témé,”
Kam kò X'aiga ba máá: “Tchàno úú tamam xgàra-kg'aom ko méé sa kóḿ.

Kháé ba gáé Nqari ba cuiskaga Gam di ne khóè ne ẽem nxárá tcg'òóa hãa ne tchànoan máàna hãa tite, ncẽe ko ntcùú ba hẽé naka koaba ba hẽéthẽé Gam koe kg'ae ne? Kana ba gha hùia ne ka nqúù tcáó ii?
Bìrí tu ur ko a ko máá: qháésem gha tchànoan máà ne, témé. Gatà i ga ii igaba ba gha Khóèm dim Cóá ba ẽem kòo nqõómkg'ai koe hàà ne hàà ẽe dtcòm̀a hãa ne hòò?” témé.
Jeso ba kò gataga thẽé ncẽes sere-sere sa khóè ne ncẽe gane cúí ne tcomsea hãa, a c'ẽe khóèan ntcoea hãa ne bìrí,
a ba a máá: “Cám̀ khóè tsara kò còrè-nquum koe qõò a ko síí còrè, c'ẽe ba kò Farasai me e, me c'ẽe ba mari xg'ae-xg'ae-kg'ao me e.

“Farasai ba kò tẽe a còrèa mááse a máá: ‘Nqariè, qãè-tcaoar ko máá Tsi, c'ẽe ne khóè ne khamar ii tama khama, ts'ãà-kg'ao ne, cg'ãè cau ne, cg'árà-kg'ao ne, kana ncẽem mari xg'ae-xg'ae-kg'aom khamaga igaba,
a ra a ko cám̀ q'oro bekem ka tc'õoan carase, a ko wèéan ẽer ko hòò koe cúís tshàu-q'oos dian tcg'òó a máà,’ témé.
“Igabam kò mari xg'ae-xg'ae-kg'ao ba nqúù ka téé, a ba a táá nqarikg'ai koe ga ghùi-kg'ai, a dxùua ba xg'áḿ a máá: ‘Nqariè, tíí chìbi-kg'ao ra thõò-xama máá,’ témé.”
C'ẽe ne khóè nea kòo cóán Gam koe óá, nxãasegam gha hàà tshàua ba tòó cgae e ka. Eẽ xu ko xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ncẽe sa bóò, ka xu kò dqàè ne.
Igabam kò Jeso ba cóán Gam koe tciia óá a máá: “Cóán guu naka i Tíí koe hàà. Táá xgáè-kg'am m guu! Nqarim di x'aia nea gatà ii ne di i ke.
Tseegua ner ko bìrí tu u: Dìím wèém ẽe Nqarim di x'aian cóám ko ma séè e khama ma séè e tama ba cuiskaga gaan koe tcana hãa tite,” témé.
Me kò c'ẽem tc'ãà-cookg'ai ba Jeso ba tẽè a máá: “Qãè Tsi xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, dùú sa ra gha kúrú a chõò tamas kg'õè sa hòò?” témé.
Me Jeso ba máá: “Dùúska tsi ko ‘Qãè Tseè’ ta ma tcii Tea máá? Cúí khóè ga qãè tama igaba Nqarim cúí Me e ka.
X'áèan tsi q'ana: ‘Táá cg'áràn kúrú guu, táá cg'õo guu, táá ts'ãà guu, táá tshúù-ntcõan nxàe guu. Saò ba hẽé naka saò sa hẽéthẽé tcom,’ ta ko méé e,” témé.
Me xo̱a a máá: “Cg'áré-q'ooa te koe gar guu a ko ncẽe x'áèan wèé ga komsana,” témé.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba ncẽes gúù sa kóḿ kam kò bìrí me a máá: “Cúís gúùs qanega tsi tcàoa sa
Igaba ẽem ko ncẽe sa kóḿ kam kò kaisase tshúù-tcao, kaisase qguùam khóè me e kò ii khama.
Me kò Jeso ba bóò me, a máá: “Tsóágase i gáé qaria, ẽe káí mari a qguùa hãa ne gha Nqarim di x'aian koe tcãà sa.
Thamka a kameles gha dqààm tcgáí dim kòm̀ koe tcg'oa sa, qguùam khóèm gha Nqarim di x'aian koe tcãàn ka,” témé.
Ne kò ẽe ko kóḿ m ne tẽè a máá: “Kháé ba gha nxãaska dìí ba kgoaraè?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a a máá: “Gúù zi ncẽe khóè ne ko tàà zia Nqari ba tàà tama,” témé.
Me Petere ba máá: “Bóò, sixaea x'áéa xae guu a ko xùri Tsi,” témé.

Me Jeso ba bìrí xu a máá: “Tseegua ner ko bìrí xao o: Khóèm ẽe Nqarim di x'aian domka x'áéa ba, kana gam dis khóè sa, kana qõea ba, kana gam ka xõò ga ne, kana cóáa ba guua hãa ba káà me e,
ncẽe gha ncẽem x'aèm ka káían máàè tamase kg'ama tcg'oa ba, naka hààkos kg'õès chõò tamas koe hẽéthẽé e,” témé.

Jeso ba kò 12 xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu cúía séèa tcg'òó a bìrí xu a máá: “Bóò! Jerusalema koe xae ko qõò, si gha wèés gúùs ẽe porofiti xu ka Khóèm dim Cóám ka góáèa hãa sa tseegukaguè.
Tãá zi qhàò zi tshàu q'oo koem gha tcãàè, ne gha nco̱i Me, a cóè Me, a tcg'ae cgae Me,
a qoa Me, a cg'õo Me, Me gha nqoana dim cáḿ ka x'ooan koe tẽe,” témé.
Igaba xu kò xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu táá cúí gúù ga kóḿa q'ãa, ncẽe zi kg'ui zi ko nxàe sa kò gaxu koe chóm̀sea hãa khama, xu kò c'úùa hãa dùútsa gúùs kam ko kg'ui sa.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba Jeriko sao-xg'ae kam kò káà tcgáím khóè ba dàòm dxùukg'ai koe ntcõóa-ntcõe a ko dtcàrà.
Eẽm ko xg'ae sa kóḿ si ko nqáé kam ko tẽè, dùús ko kúrúse sa.
Ne bìrí me a máá: “Jesom Nasareta di ba ko nqáé,” témé.
Me q'au a máá: “Jesoè, Dafitem ka tsgõose-coa Tseè, thõò-xama máá te,” témé.
Ne kò khóè ne ẽe ko còoka hãa ne dqàè me a máá, nqoo méém, témé, igabam kò kaisase q'au a máá: “Dafitem ka tsgõose-coa Tseè, thõò-xama máá te,” témé.
Me kò Jeso ba téé, a ba a x'áèan tcg'òó, káà tcgáím khóèm gha Gam koe óágaè sa. Eẽm ko Gam koe cúù kam ko Jeso ba tẽè me a máá:
“Dùú sar gha kúrúa máá tsi sa tsi ko tc'ẽe?” témé, me máá: “X'aigaè, bóòr gha sar ko tc'ẽe,” ta ma xo̱a.
Me Jeso ba bìrí me a máá: “Xgobekg'amsen tcgáí, tsari dtcòm̀a nea qãèkagu tsia hãa ke,” témé.
Me kò kúúga bóò, a ba a xùri Me, a Nqari ba dqo̱m̀. Ne kò wèé ne khóè ne ncẽes gúù sa ne ko bóò ka Nqari ba dqo̱m̀.
Me kò Jeso ba Jeriko koe tcãà, a ba a ko nqáé.
Gaa x'aè kagam kò c'ẽem khóèm Sakaio ta kò ma tciiè ba hãa; kaiam mari xg'ae-xg'ae-kg'ao me e kò ii, a ko gataga qguùa hãa.
Bóò kg'oanam kò hãa Jeso ba dìí Me e sa, igabam kò kaisase xòm̀ me e khama táá bóò Me, khóè nea kò káí ne e khama.
Kam ko còoka qàròa síí, a ba a síí faia dis hìi sa q'ábà, nxãasegam gha Jeso ba bóò ka, gaa xòè koe méém hàà nqáé khama.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba gaam qgáìm koe hàà kam ko ghùi-kg'ai a bìrí me a máá: “Sakaioè, qháése xõa, tsarim nquum koe méér ncẽem cáḿ ka hãas gúù si i ke,” témé.
Me kò qháése xõa, a qãè-tcaoase Jeso ba qãèse hààkagu.
Wèé ne khóè ne ko ncẽes gúù sa bóò ka ne ko kg'ui a máá: “Kaiam chìbi-kg'aom dim dàra-kg'ao bam kúrúa hãa,” témé.

Igabam kò Sakaio ba tẽe a X'aiga ba bìrí a máá: “Bóò, X'aigaè; tiri zi gúù zi di c'ẽe xòèa ner ko dxàua ne khóè ne máà, a ncẽè c'ẽe khóèa ner kò kàaraa hãa ner gha gaan di zi gúù zi 4 q'oro suruta ka̱bi,” témé.
Me kò Jeso ba bìrí me a máá: “Ncẽem cáḿ ka i kgoarasean ncẽem nquum koe hãa, ncẽem khóèm igabam thẽé Abrahamam ka cóáse me e khama.
Khóèm dim Cóá ba hààraa, hààm gha ẽe aagusea hãa ne qaa a kgoara ka,” témé.
Khóè ne hãa a ko ncẽe zi gúù zi komsana kam kò Jeso ba sere-seres
Gaa domkam kò máá: “C'ẽem khóèm x'aigan x'áé di ba kò nqúùm nqõóm koe qõò, síím gha x'aiga ba kúrúè, a

Qõòm ko cookg'ai koem kò 10 qãà xu gam di xu tcii, a wèém khóè ba qano dim marim gautan di ba máà, a bìrí xu a máá: ‘Tseekagu ncẽe maria ne naka i káí nakar nxãakg'aiga síí ka̱bise na hàà,’ témé.
“Igabaga ne kò gam nqõóm di ne khóè ne hòre mea hãa, khama ne kò khóèan tsééa tcg'òó i còò me a síí máá: ‘Ncẽem khóèm gha sita dim x'aiga ba ii sa ta tc'ẽe tama,’ témé.

Me kò gaam khóè ba síí x'aiga ba kúrúè a ba a x'áéan koe ka̱bise. Kam kò x'áèan tsééa tcg'òó, qãà xu ẽem kò marian máàna hãa xum gha tciia mááè di i, nxãasegam gha q'ãa, marian cgoa xu ma tsééa i ma càùsea hãa sa ka.
“Me kò kg'aika di ba tc'ãà a hàà, a hàà máá: ‘X'aigaè, tsarim mari ba 10 xu mari xu cgoa càùsea hãa,’ témé.
Me bìrí me a máá: ‘Qãèse tsi kúrúa, qãè tsi qãà tseè, cg'áré gúùan koe tsi tcom-tcomsa tsi qãà tsi i domkar gha 10 xu x'áé-dxoo xu máà tsi tsi tc'ãà-cookg'ai,’ témé.
“Me kò cám̀ di ba hàà a ba a máá: ‘X'aigaè, cúím marim ẽe tsi kò máà tea ba 5 mari xu cgoa càùsea hãa,’ témé.
Me bìrí me a máá: ‘Tsáá tsia gha 5 xu x'áé-dxoo xu tc'ãà-cookg'ai,’ témé.
“Me kò c'ẽem qãà ba hàà a máá: ‘X'aigaè, bóò, ncãa ga me e tsarim marim qano di ba; lapim koer kò tcáḿ a chóm̀a tòó mea,
xgóà tsi khóè tsi i khama, ra kò ko bèe tsi domka. Eẽ tsi tòó tama sa tsi ko séè, a tsi a ko xhárà tama tsia koe ga tcuù,’ témé.

Me kò bìrí me a máá: ‘Tsari kg'uian cgoar gha xgàra tsi, tsáá cg'ãè cau tsi qãà tsi. Q'ana tsi kò hãa xgóàr khóè ra a, a ko ẽer tòó tama sa séè, a ra a ko ẽer xhárà tama koe ga tcuù sa,
ka tsi kò kháé nxãaska dùús domka tiri marian síí marian ko tòóè qgáì koe tcãà tama? Nakar gha ẽer ko ka̱bise ka hàà càùsea i hãa koe séè e?’ témé.
Me kò nxãaska ẽe cúùse tẽe ne bìrí a máá: ‘Mari ba séè cgae me, naka ẽe 10 xu mari xu úúa hãa ba máà me,’ témé.
Ka ne ko bìrí me a máá: ‘X'aigaè, 10 xu mari xum nxãakamaga úúa!’ témé.
Igaba ncẽeska tiri ne cg'õo-kg'ao ne ẽe kò tc'ẽe tama gane dim x'aiga bar gha ii sa ne ncẽe koe óága, naka cookg'aia te koe cg'õo ne,’ tam méé.”
Jesom ko ncẽe zi gúù zi kg'uia xg'ara kam ko tc'ãà-cookg'ai xu, a Jerusalema koe qõò.
Eẽm ko Betefage hẽé naka Betania hẽéthẽé koe cúù, Olife ta ko ma tciièm xàbìm koe, kam kò Jeso ba cám̀ tsara xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao tsara tsééa tcg'òó a máá:

“Qõò tsao gatsao cgoa q'óá-kg'amkuam x'áém koe. Eẽ tsao ko gaa koe tcãà ne tsao gha donghi-coa ba bóò, me gaa koe qáésea tẽe, ncẽe cúí khóè ga qanega qábì tama ba. Kgoara naka Tíí koe óá me.
A ncẽè c'ẽe khóè kòo tẽè tsao o, dùúska tsao ko kgoara me sa ne méé tsao bìrí i naka máá: ‘X'aiga ba ko qaa me,’ témé,” tam méé.
Eẽ kò tsééèa hãa tsara kò qõò a síí ẽem kò ma bìrí tsara hãa khamaga ma sao-xg'ae me.
Eẽ tsara hãa a ko donghi-coa ba kgoara ka ne kò gam ka q'õòse ga ne tẽè tsara a, a máá: “Dùús domka tsao ko ẽem donghi-coa ba kgoara máá?” témé.
Tsara xo̱a a máá: “X'aiga ba ko qaa me,” témé.
A tsara a Jesom koe óá me, a gatsara di qgáían donghi-coam koe tcee, Me Jeso ba qábì.
Eẽm ko qábì a ko qõò ka ne kò khóè ne qgáía ne dàòm q'oo koe khárà.

Eẽm ko dàòm ko nqãaka xõam qgáìm koe cúù, Olife dim xàbìm koe kas ko wèés xg'aes xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao ne di sa qãè-tcaoase tshoa-tshoa a kaiam dòm̀ cgoa Nqari ba dqo̱m̀, are-aresa zi x'áí zi wèé zi ẽe ne bóòa hãa zi domka.
A ne a máá:
“Ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa baa, X'aigam
ẽe ko X'aigam
Tòókuan méé i nqarikg'ai koe hãa
naka i x'áàn kaisase tc'amaka hãa,”
témé.
Xu kò c'ẽe xu Farasai xu xg'aes koe kò hãa xu Jeso ba bìrí a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, Tsari ne xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao ne dqàè,” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Bìrí xao or ko: ncẽè nqoo ne kòo, ne zi gha nxõ̱á zi tshoa-tshoa a q'au,” témé.
Eẽm ko Jerusalema dim x'áé-dxoom koe cúù a ko bóò me, kam kò kg'ae-kg'ai me
a máá: “Tsóágaser gáé ko tc'ẽe, tòókuan ko óá zi gúù zi tsi gha ncẽe cáḿ ka q'ana hãa sa! Igaba zi ncẽeska tcgáí-q'ooa tsi koe chóm̀sea hãa.
Cáḿ ba gha hàà cgae tsi, tsari ne cg'õo-kg'ao ne gha xhàro ba kúrúa nxa̱ma-nxa̱ma tsi ba, a xg'aekua ne koe tcãà tsi, wèé xòèa tsi koe guu a.

Góḿankg'ai koe ne gha xàbùa qáú tsi, tsáá hẽé naka cóáa tsi hẽéthẽé e. A ne a tsáá koe cúís nxõ̱ás ga sa c'ẽes tc'amkg'ai koe guua hãa tite, táá tsi kò Nqarim ko hàà cgae tsim x'aè ba bóòa tcg'òó khama,” tam méé.
Kam ko tempelem q'oo koe tcãà, a ba a ẽe ko x'ámágu ne tshoa-tshoa a tchàa za xhàia tcg'òó.
A ba a bìrí ne a máá: “Góásea i hãa a ko máá: ‘Tirim nquu ba gha còrèan dim nquu ba ii,’ téméè, igaba tu gatu ts'ãà-kg'ao ne di x'ãè-q'ooan kúrú mea,” tam méé.

Wèé cáḿ kam kòo Jeso ba tempelem koe xgaa-xgaa. Xu kò kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé naka x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu hẽé, naka tc'ãà-cookg'ai-kg'ao xu khóè ne di xu hẽéthẽé cg'õo Me kg'oana.
Igaba xu kò cúím dàòm cg'õo cgoa Me xu gham ga ba hòò tama, wèé ne khóè nea kò Gam di kg'uian qarika komsana khama.
C'ẽe cáḿ kam kò Jeso ba tempelem koe hàna a ko xgaa-xgaa, a ko qãè tchõàn chóà máá ne, ka xu kò kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé naka x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu hẽé naka
A xu a bìrí Me a máá: “Bìrí xae e, dùútsa qari cgoa Tsi ko ncẽe zi gúù zi kúrú sa, kana dìí na ncẽe qarian máà Tsia hãa ncẽe zi gúù zi kúrú di i sa?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Tíí igabar gha tẽè xao o. Ke bìrí Te,
Johanem dis tcguù-tcguuku sa kò nqarikg'ai koe guua kana khóèan koea?” témé.
Ka xu ko tshoa-tshoa a chóà mááku a máá: “ ‘Nqarikg'ai koe e,’ ta xae kòo méé nem gha máá: ‘Dùúska xao kháé nxãaska dtcòm̀ me tama?’ témé.
Igaba xae kò ko máá: ‘Khóèan koe e,’ témé ne ne gha wèé ne khóè ne nxõ̱án cgoa xg'áḿa cg'õo xae e, Johane ba kò porofiti me e sa ne kò tcoma hãa khama,” ta xu méé.
Ka xu ko xo̱a a máá: “C'úùa xae hãa nda koe i guua sa,” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí xu a máá: “Tíí igabar nxãaska bìrí xao o tite, dùútsa qaris cgoar ko ncẽe zi gúù zi kúrú sa,” témé.
Me kò tshoa-tshoa a ncẽes sere-sere sa khóè ne bìrí a máá: “C'ẽem khóè ba kò kg'om xhárà ba xháràa, a ba a c'ẽe xu xhárà-kg'ao xu cgóbè me, a c'ẽem nqõóm koe qõò.

“Eẽm ko x'aè ba hàà kam kò xhárà-kg'ao xu koe qãà ba tsééa úú, nxãasega xu gha kg'om xháràm di tc'õoan c'ẽe máà me ka. Igaba xu kò xhárà-kg'ao xu xg'áḿ me, a káà gúùse tsééa ka̱bi me.
“Me gaia c'ẽem qãà ba tsééa úú cgae xu, xu síí xg'áḿ me, a sau-saugase qgóó me, a xu a káà gúùse tsééa ka̱bi me.
“Kam ko nqoana dim qãà ba tsééa úú. Xu nxãa ba thõò-thõo, a xu a tchàa za xaoa tcg'òó me.
“Kam kò kg'om xháràm ka q'õòse ba máá: ‘Dùú sa ra gha kúrú? Tirim cóám ncàm̀a ra hãa bar gha tsééa úú, c'ẽedaoka xu gha tcom me khama,’ témé.
Igaba ẽe xu ko xhárà-kg'ao xu bóò me ka xu ko bìríku a máá: ‘Ncẽe ba xháràm ka q'õòsem ka cóáse me e! Ke hààn xae cg'õo me, naka zi gha nxãasega gúù zi sixae di ii,’ témé.
Xu kò kg'om xháràm ka tchàa koe xaoa tcg'òó me, a cg'õo me.
“Kháé ba gha nxãaska xháràm ka q'õòse ba dùú sa kúrú xu?
Hààm gha a ba a ẽe xu khóè xu cg'õo, a ba a kg'om xhárà ba c'ẽe xu xhárà-kg'ao xu máà,” tam Jeso ba méé.
Khóè ne ko ncẽes gúù sa kóḿ, ka ne kò máá: “Táá méés ncẽes gúù sa kúrúse guu!” témé.
