Igabam kò Jeso ba bóò ne a máá: “Kháé nxãaska ncẽe
‘Nxõ̱ás ncẽe tshào-kg'ao xu ka bóòa xguìèa hãa sa
ncẽeska ka̱bise a cgáés nxõ̱á sa kúrúa hãa,’
témé sa?
Wèém khóèm ẽe gha gaas nxõ̱ás koe cg'áé ba gha khoana tòm̀-tomse, igaba ẽes kòo c'ẽe khóèan koe cg'áé nes gha tòm̀-tom m,” tam Jeso ba méé.

Xu kò x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu hẽé naka kaia xu peresiti xu hẽéthẽé xu gaa x'aè kaga Jeso ba qáé kg'oana, ẽes sere-seres kam kòo gaxua nxàe xu sa xu kò q'ana hãa khama, igabaga xu kò ko khóè ne bèe.

A kòo dàòan qaa, qgóó cgoa Me xu gha a, a xu a kò khóè xu dtcòm̀-kg'aoan khama ko ma qgóóse xu Gam koe tsééa úú, síí xu gha Jeso ba ẽem kg'uia hãa kg'uian cgoa qgóó ka, nxãasega xu gha x'áé-dxoom dim kaiam koe séè a úú Me ka.

Xu Jeso ba tẽè a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, q'ana xae hãa, tseeguse Tsi ko xgaa-xgaa a ko tseegu sa kg'ui sa, a Tsi a khóèan tãákase qgóó tama, igabaga Tsi ko tseeguse Nqarim dim dàò ba xgaa-xgaa.
Bìrí xae e,
Me Jeso ba gaxu dis kàa sa bóòa q'ana hãase bìrí xu a máá:
“X'aigam ko suruta cgoaèm qano mari ba x'áí Te. Dìín dis tcúú sa ncẽe sa, naka gatàa dìín di cg'õèa ncẽe e?” témé. Xu máá: “Kaesaram di si i,” témé.
Me bìrí xu a máá: “Nxãaska xao ẽe Kaesaram di ii sa Kaesara ba máà, naka ẽe Nqarim di ii sa Nqari ba máà,” témé.
Xu kò khóè ne cookg'ai koe xu gha ma ẽem ko méé gúùan ka qgóóa ba ka tààè, igaba xu kò Gam di xo̱an ka arekaguè a nqoo.
C'ẽe xu Saduke xu, khóèan x'ooan koe tẽe tamas koe dtcòm̀a hãa, xua ko Jesom koe hàà, a hàà tẽè Me a máá:

“Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, Moshe ba ko x'áèan ncẽe góá máá ta a a ko máá: ẽem ko khóè ba káà cóáse dxàese sa guu a x'óó, ne méém ẽem khóèm ka qõese ba gaas dxàe-ntcõa sa séè naka káímkhoem ẽe x'óóa hãa ba cóán ábà máá.
Nxãaska xu kò 7 xu khóè qõeku xu hãa. Kaia ba kò séèa hãa a ba a cóá úú tamase x'óó.
Me cám̀ di ba gaas khóè sa séè, a x'óó thẽé,
me nqoana di ba séè si, xu kò wèéa xu ga cúí ta ga ma táá cóán ábà, a xu a x'óó.
Si ko thẽé khóès ga sa x'óó.
Ka sa gha nxãaska x'ooan koe ne ko tẽe ne ndakam di sa ii? Wèéa xu 7 xu kò séè sia hãa ka,” ta xu méé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Khóè xu ncẽem x'aèm di xua ko séè, a séèkuan máàèa.
Igaba khóè ne ncẽe hààkom x'aèm koe gha kg'õè ne hẽé, naka x'ooan koe gha tẽe ne hẽéthẽéa séèku tite, a séèkuan koe tcãà tite.
Gaicara ne x'óó tite khama, moengelean cgoa ne cúíta noo, a ne a Nqarim di ne cóá ne e khama, a x'ooan koe tẽea ne cóá ne e khama.

Igaba x'óóan koe i ko khóèan ghùiè sam kò Moshem ga ba x'áía hãa, ẽem kò c'eean dis xg'aekus koe X'AIGAM Nqarim Abrahamam di ba hẽé, naka Isakam di ba hẽé, naka Jakobem di ba hẽéthẽé tcii me koe.
Eẽ x'óóa hãa ne dim Nqarim tama Me e, igabam ẽe kg'õèa hãa ne di Me e, wèéa ne ga ko Gam koe kg'õè khama,” tam méé.
Xu kò c'ẽe xu x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu xo̱a a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, qãèse Tsi xo̱ara hãa,” témé.
Khóè nea kò bèe, c'ẽe tẽè ga ne gha tẽè Me sa khama.
Me Jeso ba tẽè ne a máá: “Dùúska ne ko khóè ne máá, Kreste ba Dafitem dim Tsgõose-coa Me e, témé?
Dafite ba ko Pesalema zi dis Tcgãyas koe bìrí me a máá:
‘X'aiga ba ko Tirim X'aiga ba bìrí a máá:
‘Kg'áò xòèa Te za ntcõó,
nakar nxãakg'aiga síí Tsari cg'õo-kg'aoan kúrú
naka i nqàrè-kg'ama Tsi koe ntcõó,’
témé.’
Dafite ba ko X'aiga ta ma tcii Me, ka ba kháé nxãaska ntama ma Gam dim tsgõose-coa ba ii?” tam ma tẽè ne.
Wèé ne khóè ne ko komsana Me koem ko Jeso ba Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu bìrí a máá:

“X'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu koe méé xao q'õésea hãa, ncẽe ko qáò qgáí-dxooan hã̱a a caatean ncàm̀aa hãa xu, a x'ámágu di zi qgáì zi koe tsgám̀kuan hẽé naka kaia zi ntcõó-q'oo zi còrè-nquu xu koe hàna zi ncàm̀a hãa xu, naka cgáé zi ntcõó-q'oo zi hẽéthẽé e kõ̱èan di qgáìan koe.
Ncẽe ko dxàe-ntcõa zi di nquuan kaàkagu xu, a ko qáòse còrèan ka x'áíse tu u xu. Gaxu di xgàraè-q'ooa ne gha kaisase cg'ãè ii,” tam méé.
Jeso ba kò ghùi-kg'ai a tempelem koe qguùa ne khóè ne bóò ne ko aban dis gàbas koe aban tòó.
Kam kò kaisase dxàua hãas dxàe-ntcõa sa bóò si hàà cám̀ qano mari tsara tòó.
Kam ko máá: “Tseegua ner ko bìrí tu u: Ncẽes dxàe-ntcõas dxàua hãa sa wèé ne khóè ne nqáéa hãase marian tcana.
Wèé ne khóè nea kò gane di qguùan koe guu a gane di aban tcg'òó, igabas kò gaa sa gas di dxàuan koe guu a wèéan ẽes úúa hãa ga tcg'òó khama,” tam méé.

Eẽ xu c'ẽe xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hãa a ko tempelem ka kg'ui, a ko me ma t'õè nxõ̱án ka hẽé naka khóè ne koe guua hãa zi aba zi, Nqari ba ne tcg'òóa máána hãa zi ka hẽéthẽé ma t'õè-t'õeèa hãa sa nxàe, kam ko Jeso ba máá:
“Gúù zi ncẽe tu ko ncẽe koe bóò zi ka: x'aè ba gha hàà, cúís nxõ̱ás ga sa c'ẽes tc'amkg'ai koe guuèa hãa tite ba, wèéa zi ga gha xòóa qàrìè,” témé.
Xu

Me xo̱a a máá: “Q'õésea méé tu hãa, naka tua táá ho̱àkaguè guu, káí ne gha Tíí cg'õè cgoa hàà ke, a gha khóè ne bìrí a máá: ‘Tíí ra Krester ga ra a,’ témé, a ne a gha máá: ‘X'aèa nea cúù u,’ témé, igaba méé tu táá komsana ne guu.

Igaba ẽe tu kò ko ncõoan hẽé naka kóḿku taman hẽéthẽé ko kóḿ ne méé tu táá q'ae guu. Ncẽe zi gúù zi méé zi kg'aika kúrúses gúù si i ke, igaba i chõò-q'ooan kúúga hàà tite,” tam méé.
Me gaicara bìrí xu a máá: “

Kaisasem gha nqõó ba cgùru, i gha kaisa xàbàn hẽé naka tcììan hẽéthẽé káí xu nqõó xu koe hãa, q'áò-q'áòsa zi gúù zi hẽé naka kaia zi x'áí zi are-aresa zi hẽéthẽéa gha nqarikg'ai koe guu a kúrúse.

“Igaba ncẽe zi gúù zi wèé zi cookg'ai koe, ne gha tshàua ne cgoa qgóó tu u, a gha xgàra tu u, a gha còrè-nquuan koe úú tu u qhàìan koe, a ne a gha qáé-nquuan koe tcãà tu u, tu gha x'aigan hẽé, naka tc'ãà-cookg'ai xu koe hẽéthẽé úúè, i gha wèéan ncẽe ga Tiri cg'õèan domka kúrúse.
Ncẽe ba gha x'aè ba ii ncẽe gatu gha Nqarim di kg'uian nxàea tseegukagu di ba.
Igaba méé tu x'aèan cookg'ai koe ga tc'ẽea ka̱bi naka gha nxãasega táá káíse tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese guu nta tu gha ma xo̱ara mááse sa.
Kg'uian hẽé naka tc'ẽean hẽéthẽér gha máà tu u khama, i gha wèé cg'õo-kg'aoan gatu di táá qarian hòò a xguì kana ntcoe tu u.
Gatu di ne khóè ne, ncẽe gatu di qõe ii ne hẽé, naka gatu di ne qhàò ne hẽé, naka gatu di ne tcárà ne hẽéthẽéa gha qáé tu u, a gha gatu ka c'ẽea tu x'ooan koe tcãà.
Tu gha Tiri cg'õèan domka wèé khóèan ka hòreè.
Igabam cúím c'õòm tcúúa tu dim ga ba kaà tite.
Gatu di qarika tééan ka tu gha kg'õèan hòò.
“Eẽ tu kòo Jerusalema ba bóò, me ncõo-kg'aoan ka nxa̱ma-nxa̱maèa, ne méé tu q'ãa, gam di x'aèan kaàkaguèm koa cúù u sa.
Ke méé ne ẽe Jutea koe hàna ne xàbìan koe qgóéa síí, naka ne ẽe Jerusalema koe hàna ne tcg'oa naka nea táá hẽé naka ne ẽe x'áé-coa xu koe hàna ne Jerusalemam koe tcãà guu.
Ncẽe ba gha xgàrakus dim x'aè me e, wèés gúùs ẽe
Haò, cg'ãè i gha ii, ẽe zi cáḿ zi ka ẽe ncãà zi koe cóán úúa zi khóè zi ka hẽé naka ẽe gha ko comkagu zi ka hẽéthẽé e. Kaias thõò-tcao sa hẽé naka

Ntcàum cgoa ne gha cg'õoè, a ne a gha qáé-nquuan di ne khóè ne iise séèè, a wèé zi qhàò zi koe úúè, Jerusalema ba gha tãá zi qhàò zi ka náà c'ãa-c'anaè, i gha nxãakg'aiga síí x'aèan tãá zi qhàò zi di xg'ara.

“X'áí zi tãá zia gha cáḿs koe hẽé naka nxoem koe hẽé, naka tco̱nòan koe hẽéthẽé kúrúse. Zi gha kaiam tshàam di ts'oo-q'ooan hẽé naka qhonèan hẽéthẽé ka nqõómkg'ai di zi qhàò zi qóḿ ba hẽé naka arean hẽéthẽé ka tcãà cgaeè.

Khóè nea gha q'aean hẽé naka tc'ẽea ne ko máá zi gúù zi ka hẽéthẽé x'óóa qae, nqõómkg'ai koe ko hàà kúrúse zi gúù zi domka, nqarikg'aian di qaria ne gha ko hàà ntcãa-ntcãaè khama.
Eẽm x'aèm ka ne gha Khóèm dim Cóá ba bóò Me túú-c'õòs q'oo koe guu a ko qarian hẽé naka kaia x'áàn hẽéthẽé cgoa hàà.
Ncẽe zi gúù zi ko hàà tshoa-tshoa a ko kúrúse ne, tẽea-téé naka ghùi-kg'ai, gatu di kgoarasea nea cúù u ke,” tam méé.
Me kò Jeso ba ncẽes sere-sere sa bìrí xu a máá: “Faia dis hìi sa hẽé naka c'ẽe zi hìi zi wèé zi hẽéthẽé bóò.
Eẽ i ko gazi di to̱aran tso̱m, ne tu ko bóòa mááse a q'ãa qhóóa ne tcana hãa sa.
Gataga ẽe xao kòo ncẽe zi gúù zi bóò zi ko kúrúse ne xao q'ana hãa, Nqarim di x'aia ne cúù u sa.
“Tseegukar ko bìrí tu u a ko máá: Ncẽes qhàò sa kaà tite, i gha nxãakg'aiga síí ncẽe gúùan wèé ga kúrúse.
Nqarikg'aian hẽé naka nqõókg'aian hẽéthẽéa gha chõò, igaba i Tiri kg'uian chõò tite.

“Q'õése méé tu, naka i tcáóa tu táá ka̱rean nqõóm di ka tààè guu, kana qgarìan nqàre ka igaba, kana kg'õèan di zi tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese-kg'áḿ zi ka igaba, tcom tama tu hãa koem gha ẽem cáḿ ba hàà cgae tu u ke,
a gha wèé ne khóè ne, ncẽe wèém nqõómkg'ai koe x'ãèa hãa ne koe ntcóm̀mèa ne hãa khama ma hàà cgae.

Wèé x'aè ka méé tu kókòa hãa, naka tua còrèa mááse, naka tua gha nxãasega qarian úúa hãa wèé gúùan ẽe gha ko hàà kúrúse koe tu gha nxana mááse di i, naka tua gha nxãasega Khóèm dim Cóám cookg'ai koe hàà téé,” tam méé.
Wèém koaba bam kòo Jeso ba tempelem koe xgaa-xgaa, a kòo wèé dqòa ka Olife dim xàbìm koe síí hãa.
I kòo wèé khóèan ntcùúkg'ai cgoa tempelem koe hàà cgae Me, a hàà komsana Me.
Paseka ta ko ma tciièm x'aèm, péré gãé-gãe úú tamas pérés dis kõ̱ès di ba kò cúù me e,
xu kò kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé naka x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé xu kàan qaa, xu ga ma cg'õo Me di i, khóè ne xu kòo q'áò khama.
Kam ko nxãaska satana ba Jutase Isekariote ta ko ma tciièm, 12 xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ka c'ẽem koe tcãà.
Me Jutase ba tẽe a ba a síí kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé naka, tempele ba ko kòre xu x'aiga xu hẽéthẽé cgoa chóà xg'ae, Jeso bam ga ntama ma tshàu q'ooa xu koe tcãàs ka.
Xu kò qãè-tcao a xu a marin xu gha máà me sa dtcòm̀ku.
Me kò Jutase gaxu cgoa dtcòm̀ku, a ba a tshoa-tshoa a qãèm x'aè ba qaa, khóè ne c'úùasem gha Jeso ba gaxu tshàu q'oo koe tcãà di ba.
Me kò péré gãé-gãe úú tamas pérés di kõ̱èan dim cáḿ ba hàà, Paseka dim ghùu-coam ko cg'õoèm x'aè ba.

Me nxãaska Jeso ba Petere ba hẽé naka Johane ba hẽéthẽé tsara tsééa úú ncẽe x'áè-kg'áḿan cgoa a máá: “Qõò naka síí Paseka di tc'õoan kg'ónòa máá xae e naka xae nxãasega tc'õó,” témé.
Tsara tẽè Me a máá: “Nda koe xae gha kg'ónòa máá Tsi i sa Tsi ko tc'ẽe?” témé.
Me xo̱a tsara a, a máá: “Bóò, ẽe tsao ko x'áé-dxoom koe tcãà ne tsao gha c'ẽem khóèm tshàa gàba ba qgóóa hãam cgoa xg'ae. Xùri me tsao naka ẽem ko tcãàm nquum koe síí tcãà.
Naka nquum ka q'õòse ba bìrí naka máá: ‘Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao ba ko máá, cg'áè-nquum Tiri xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu cgoar gha hàà Paseka di tc'õoan tc'õó ba nda hãa?’ témé.
Nakam gha tc'amaka hãam nquum kaia, a wèé zi gúù zi tc'ẽese ko zi úúa hãam, nxãakamaga kg'ónòa xg'araèa ba x'áí tsao o, tsao gha gaa koe hãas wèé sa kg'ónò,” tam méé.
Tsara kò qõò, a síí ẽem kò ma bìrí tsara a hãa khamaga ma sao-xg'ae i ii, tsara kò Pasekan kg'ónòa máá Me.
Eẽm ko x'aè ba hàà kam kò Jeso ba x'áè úú-kg'ao xu cgoa qa̱òa.
A ba a bìrí xu a máá: “Kaisaser kò tc'ẽea hãa, ncẽes Pasekas di tc'õoa ner gha gaxao cgoa tc'õó sa, qanega Ra xgàraè tamas cookg'ai koe.
Bìrí xao or ko, cuiskaga Ra tc'õó si tite, si gha nxãakg'aiga síí ẽes tc'õos ko nxàe sa Nqarim di x'aian koe tseegukaguè,” tam méé.
A ba a kubi ba séè a Nqari ba qãè-tcao máá, a ba a máá: “Séè xao naka xaoa kg'áà.
Bìrí xao or ko, Nqarim di x'aian hàà tamas cookg'ai koer cuiskaga kg'om dis hìis di gõéan ncẽe kg'áà hãa tite,” témé.

Kam ko péré qàmà sa séè, a ba a Nqari ba qãè-tcaoa máá, a khõá q'aa si, a máà xu si, a ba a máá: “Ncẽea cgàaa Te ga a, gatu ko máàè e. Ncẽes gúù sa tu kúrú naka tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese Te,” témé.
Gaam dàòm cúím kam kò tc'õoan qãá q'oo koe kubi sa máà xu, a máá: “Ncẽes kubi sa Nqarim dis qáé-xg'aes ka̱ba si i, c'áòa Te koe, ncẽe gatu ntcã̱água mááèa hãa a.
“Igaba méé xao q'ãa, gaam ẽe ko khóè ne tshàu q'oo koe tcãà Te ba ncẽe koe Tíí cgoa ntcõóa-ntcõe sa.
Eẽ i ma Khóèm dim Cóám ka mééèa hãa khamaga i gha ii, igaba haò, cg'ãè i gha ii ẽe ko khóè ne tshàu q'oo koe tcãà Mem ka,” tam méé.
Xu tshoa-tshoa a gaxu xg'aeku koe tẽèku, dìí ba gha ẽeta iis gúù sa kúrú sa.
Si kò kaias kg'ui sa gaxu xg'aeku koe tẽe, dìím kaia hãa di sa.
Me Jeso ba bìrí xu a máá: “X'aiga xu tãá zi qhàò zi di xu ko tc'ãà-cookg'ai ne, xu ko ẽe qarian úúa hãa xu khóè xu qãè xu ta ma tciiè.
Igaba méé i gaxao ka táá gatà ii guu. Eẽ gaxao wèé xao ka kaia hãa ba méém cg'áré ba ii, nakam ẽe ko tc'ãà-cookg'ai xao o ba qãà ba ii.
Ka ba ndaka ba gatsara xg'aeku koe kaia: ẽe ntcõó a ko tc'õó baa, kana qãà baa? Tseeguan kaga, ẽe ntcõó a ko tc'õo me e. Igabar Tíía gaxao xg'aeku koe qãàm khama ma hãa.
Igaba xao kò gaxao wèé zi kúrúa bóòku zi Tiri zi koe Tíí cgoa hãa.
Ncẽem ma Abo ba ma qarian tc'ãà-cookg'ai di máà Tea hãa, khamagar gha ma qarian máà xao o.

Tiri x'aian koer ko Tíí ntcõó a tc'õóm qgáìm koe xao gha nxãasega Tíí cgoa ntcõó a tc'õó, a kg'áà, a xao a gha x'aian dis ntcõó-q'oos koe ntcõó, a gha 12 zi qhàò zi Iseraele di zi bóò a xgàra ka,” tam méé.

A ba a máá: “Simoneè, Simoneè, q'ãa méé tsi, satana ba dtcàrà mááse xaoa hãa, séèam gha mááse xao o ka, q'aa-q'aa xaom gha ka, ẽe i ko maberean ma dqòròè i gaan di tsoroan gaan cgoa ma q'aa-q'aaè khamaga ma.
Igabar còrèa máá tsia Simoneè, táá i gha tsari dtcòm̀an kaà ka. Nxãasega tsi gha, ẽe tsi kòo
Me Petere ba xo̱a Me a máá: “X'aigaè, Tsáá cgoa qáé-nquus koe síían ga hẽé, naka x'óóan ga hẽéthẽér kg'ónòsea máána hãa!” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí me a máá: “Petereè, bìrí tsir ko, ncẽem cáḿ kam ghòrò ba kg'aea hãa tite, tsi gha nxãakg'aiga síí nqoana q'oro xo̱ase Te, c'úù Tea tsi hãa sa,” témé.

Me nxãaska Jeso ba Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu tẽè a máá: “Eẽr xg'ao káà qgóáse hẽé, naka káà dtcòbèse hẽé, naka káà nxàbose hẽéthẽé, tsééa úú xaoa hãa ka xaoa xg'ao dùú cúí ga tcào?” témé. Xu máá: “C'ẽe gúù tama a,” témé.

Me Jeso ba bìrí xu a máá: “Igaba Ra ko ncẽeska bìrí xao o a ko máá: Dìím wèém ẽe qgóá sa hẽé naka dtcòbè sa hẽéthẽé úúa hãa ba méém séè sara a, nakam ẽe ntcàu ba úú tama ba gam di qgáían x'ámágu, naka c'ẽe ba x'ámá.
Bìrí xao or ko khama a ko máá: Ncẽe Tíí ka
Xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu máá: “Bóò, cám̀ ntcàuan xae úúa, X'aigaè!” témé. Me xo̱a xu a máá: “Qãè e,” témé.
Me Jeso ba ẽem x'áé-dxoom koe guu a tcg'oa, a ba a Olife dim xàbìm koe qõò ẽem ko kg'aiga hẽé khama, xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu xùri Me.
Eẽm ko gaam qgáìm koe tcãà kam ko bìrí xu a máá: “Còrè xao naka xao nxãasega táá kúrúa bóòkuan koe tcãà guu,” témé.
Me gaa koe guu a tcg'oa a ba a gaxu ka cg'árése nqúù ka síí hãa, nxõ̱ás ga xaoè a síí tcheè khama noo di nqúù-q'ooa koe, a ba a síí gaa koe qhòm tsi qúrù a còrè,
a máá: “Aboè, tc'ẽe Tsi kò ko ne, ncẽes kubis
[Me moengelem nqarikg'ai koe guua ba Gam koe x'áíse, a qari-qari Me.
Me kò kaias q'áòs arekagu me kos koe hàna, khamam kò kaisase qarika còrè. I kò Gam di khùbuan c'áòan khama ma góḿankg'ai koe ntcã̱a.]
Eẽm Gam di còrèan koe guu a ko tẽe kam kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu koe ka̱bise, a ba a sao-xg'ae xu xu tshúù-tcaoa hãase x'óm̀a.
Me bìrí xu a máá: “Dùús domka xao x'óm̀a hãa? Tẽe xao naka xaoa còrè, naka xaoa gha nxãasega táá kúrúa bóòkuan koe tcãà guu,” témé.
Eẽm
Igabam kò Jeso ba gam ka máá: “Jutaseè, a Khóèm dim Cóá ba tsi gáé ko khóè ne tshàu q'oo koe tcãà x'obèkus cgoa?” témé.
Eẽ xu ko Gam cgoa kò hãa xu dùús ko kúrúse sa bóòa q'ãa, ka xu kò máá: “X'aigaè, sixae di ntcàuan xae gha tséékagu?” témé.
Me kò gaxu ka c'ẽe ba kaiam peresitim dim qãàm dim tceem kg'áò xòè di ba xg'aoa qhòm.
Me Jeso ba máá: “
Me kò nxãaska Jeso ba kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé, naka tc'ãà-cookg'ai xu tempelem di xu hẽé, naka
Wèé cáḿ kar kò tempelem q'oo koe gaxao cgoa hãa, igaba xao kò gaa koe táá síí qgóó Te. Igabam ncẽe ba gaxao dim x'aè me e, naka ntcùús di qarian di ba hẽéthẽé e,” tam méé.
Jeso ba xu kò qgóó, a xu a séè a kaiam peresitim dim nquum koe úú Me. Me kò Petere kháóka téé a còò xu.
Eẽ xu xhàrom nqáè koe c'ee sa dxùu a ntcõóa-ntcõe, kam kò Petere gaxu xg'aeku koe ntcõe.
Si kò c'ẽes qãà sa bóò me me c'ees x'áà koe ntcõe, si qãèse bóò me, a sa a máá: “Ncẽem khóè ba kò thẽé Gam cgoa hãa,” témé.
Igabam kò Petere xo̱ase a máá: “Khóè seè, c'úù Mea raa,” témé.
X'aè-coam qãá q'oo koem kò c'ẽem khóè ba thẽé bóò me a máá: “Tsáá igaba tsi thẽé gaxu ka c'ẽe tsi i,” témé. Igabam kò Petere máá: “Khóè tseè, tíí tama ra a,” témé.

Qáòm x'aè-coam qãá q'oo koem kò gaicara c'ẽem khóè ba kaisa tcoman úúa hãase kg'ui a máá: “Tseeguan kagam kò thẽé ncẽem khóè ba Gam cgoa hãa, Galilea dim khóè me e khama,” témé.
Me Petere xo̱a a máá: “Khóè tseè, c'úùa ra hãa dùús ka tsi ko kg'ui sa!” témé. Me kò kúúga ẽem qanega hãa a ko kg'ui ka ghòrò ba kg'ae.

Me kò X'aiga ba ka̱bise a Petere ba bóò. Me Petere ba X'aigam di kg'uian tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese, ncẽem kò máá: “Ncẽe cáḿ kam ghòrò ba qanega kg'ae tama cookg'ai koe tsi gha sene nqoana q'oro xo̱ase Te,” témé e.
Me kò Petere tchàa koe tcg'oa, a síí thõòkase kg'ae.
Xu kò ẽe kò Jeso ba qgóóa xu khóè xu nco̱i Me, a xu a xg'áḿ Me,
a xu a qáé tcgáí Me, a tẽè Me a máá: “Porofita naka bìrí xae e, dìína ko xg'áḿ Tsi sa?” témé.
A káí zi gúù zi c'ẽe zi cóèkuan di zi Gam ka nxàe.
Eẽ i ko q'uu ka xu kò khóè ne di xu kaia xu hẽé, naka kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé, naka x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé xg'ae, a Jeso ba séè a cookg'aia xu koe úú.
Xu síí máá: “Kreste Tsi kò ii ne méé Tsi bìrí xae e,” témé. Me xo̱a a máá: “Ncẽè bìrí xaor kò ko ne xao dtcòm̀ tite.
A gataga ncẽè tẽè xaor kò ko ne xao xo̱a Te tite.
Igabagam gha ncẽe koe guus ka Khóèm dim Cóá ba Nqarim dim x'õàm kg'áòm xòè za síí ntcõó, ncẽe qariga ba,” tam méé.
Xu wèéa xu ga máá: “Kháé Tsi gáé nxãaska Nqarim di Tsi Cóá Tsia?” témé. Me xo̱a xu a máá: “Gaxaoa ko máá, Gar ga Ra a, témé,” tam méé.
Xu máá: “Dùútsa gúùs tseeguan gha x'áí sa xae ko qanega qaa? Gam kg'áḿ koe ga xae guu a kóḿ ana ka!” témé.
Si nxãaska wèés xg'ae sa tẽe, a sa a Jeso ba Pilatom cookg'ai koe úú.
Xu kò gaa koe tshoa-tshoa a chìbi-chibi Me, a xu a máá: “Ncẽem khóè ba xae sao-xg'aea, me ko sixae di ne khóè ne tãám dàòm koe tceea úú, a ko khóè ne xgáè-kg'am, táá ne gha
Me Pilato ba tẽè Me a máá: “A tsáá ga tsia Juta ne di tsi x'aiga tsi?” témé. Me xo̱a me a máá: “Eẽ tsi ko méé khamaga i ii,” témé.
Me Pilato kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé naka kaias xg'aes khóè ne dis gaa koe kò hàna hãa sa hẽéthẽé bìrí a máá: “Khóèm ncẽem koer cúí chìbi ga hòò tama,” témé.
Igaba xu kò Gam ka qarika nxàe a máá: “Wèém Juteam koem ko khóè ne xgaa-xgaa, a ko khóè ne tcg'ome tcúú, Galilea koem tshoa-tshoaa, a ba a ncẽe koe hàà tcana hãa,” ta xu méé.
Eẽm ko Pilato ncẽe sa kóḿ, kam kò tẽè gaam Khóè ba Galilea dis qhàòs di Me e sa.
A ba a ẽem ko bóòa q'ãa, Herotem dim nqõóm di x'áèan dòm̀ q'oo koem hãa sa, kam ko Herotem koe úú Me, ncẽe kò ẽe x'aè ka Jerusalema koe hãa ba.

Eẽm ko Herote ba Jeso ba bóò kam kò kaisase qãè-tcao, ncìísem kò bóòa ba tc'ẽea hãa khama, a ba a kò Gam ka kóḿa hãa, a kò nqòòan úúa hãa, are-aresa zi x'áí zim gha kúrú me bóò di i.
Me Herote káí zi tẽè-kg'áḿ zi tẽè Me, igabam kò Jeso ba táá xo̱a me.
Xu kò kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé naka x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé xu qarika chìbi-chibi Me.
Herote ba hẽé naka gam di xu ncõo-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽéa kò ntcoe Me, a nco̱i Me, a t'õèm qgáí ba hã̱akagu Me, a Pilatom koe gaia tsééa ka̱bi Me.
Gaam cáḿ ẽem ka tsara kò Herotea tsara Pilatoa tsara kg'aiga tsara kò hòrekua hãa igaba tcáràku.
Pilato ba kò kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé, naka tc'ãà-cookg'ai xu hẽé, naka khóè ne hẽéthẽé tciia xg'ae,

a bìrí ne a máá: “Ncẽem Khóè ba tu kò tíí koe óá, tãám dàòm koe ko xg'ae sa tceea úúm khóèm khama ma, igaba bóò, cookg'aia tu koer ncãa tẽèa xam̀ Me, a ra a ncãa ncẽem Khóèm koe cúí chìbi ga táá hòò, ẽe tu kò chìbi-chibi Mea hãa zi gúù zi koe.

Herotem igabam cúí chìbi ga hòò cgae Me ta ga hãa, gaa domkam kò gatá koe tsééa ka̱bi Me, ncẽe tu ko ma bóò khamaga ma, cúí gúù tshúù kúrúam hãa ga káà a, gaan domka ta ga cg'õo Me e.
Gaa domkar gha kg'ama tsa̱man cgoa xg'áḿ Me, a ra a gha kgoara Me, Me qõò,” témé.
[Kõ̱ès domka méém ga kòo c'ẽem khóè ba kgoara máá nes gúù si i.]
Si kò wèés xg'ae sa q'au a máá: “Cg'õo Me, naka Barabase ba kgoara máá ta a,” témé.
Barabase ba kò ncõoan x'áé-dxoom koe kúrúsea ka hẽé, naka khóè ne cg'õoan domka hẽéthẽé qáé-nquus koe tcãàèa.
Me kò Pilato ba Jeso ba kgoara kg'oana hãa, khamam kò gaia kg'ui cgoa ne.
Igaba ne kò kaisase q'au a máá: “Xgàu Me! Xgàu Me!” témé.
Me nqoana dis ka gaia máá: “Kháé ba gáé dùútsa cg'ãè sa kúrúa hãa? Cúí gúù gar hòò tama x'oo sam gha xgàra mááè di i ka. Ra gha xg'áḿ Me, a kgoara Mem qõò,” témé.
Igaba ne kò qanega kaisase q'au Jesom gha xgàuès ka, i kò gane di q'au-q'ooan tàà.
Me kò Pilato ba nxàe, ẽe ne tc'ẽea hãa sa gha kúrúè sa:

gaam khóèm ẽe gane kò tc'ẽea hãa kgoaraèm gha sa bam kò kgoara, ncẽe kò ncõoan x'áé-dxoom koe kúrúsea ka hẽé, naka khóè ne cg'õoan domka hẽéthẽé qáé-nquus koe tcãàèa hãa ba, a ba a Jeso ba
Eẽ xu ko ncõo-kg'ao xu Jeso ba úú ka xu kò Kurene dim khóèm cgoa xg'ae, Simone ta ko ma tciiè ba, me qãáka guua hãa, xu kò xgàu sa dcẽékagu me, me Jesom qãá koe téé a xùri Me.
Si kò kaias xg'aes khóè ne di sa còò Me, zi kò gaas xg'aes q'oo koe c'ẽe zi khóè zi hàna, tshúù-tcaoase kò ko kg'ae cgae Me zi.
Me kò Jeso ba gazi koe ka̱bise a máá: “Jerusalema di sao khóè saoè! Táá sao Tíía kg'ae cgae Te guu, igaba sao gasao hẽé naka cóáa sao hẽéthẽé kg'ae cgae.

X'aè ba gha hàà khama, khóè ne gha máá: ‘Tsóágase zi gáé khóè zi ncẽe cóán úú tama zi ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa hãa, naka tchòoan ncẽe cóán úú tama hẽé, naka bíìan ncẽe qanega comkagu tama hẽéthẽé e,’ témé ba.
Nxãaska ne gha tshoa-tshoa a xàbìan ka máá: ‘Cg'áé cgae ta a,’ témé, a nxõ̱án ka máá: ‘Qàbia tcãà ta a,’ témé.
Ncẽè hìian tsã̱á ii koe ne kòo ncẽe zi gúù zi kúrú ne, ne gha ẽe i xgóòa hãa koe dùú sa kúrú?” tam méé.
Tsara kò cám̀ tsara khóè tsara c'ẽe tsara chìbi-kg'ao tsara a, tsara kò gatsara igaba úúè, síí tsara gha Jesom cgoa cg'õoè ka.

‘Tcúú-c'õá’ ta ko ma tciièm qgáìm koe xu ko hàà ka xu kò gaa koe Jeso ba xgàu, gaa tsara chìbi-kg'ao tsara cgoa, c'ẽe ba kò kg'áò xòèa ba za xgàuè, me c'ẽe ba dxàe xòèa ba za xgàuè.
[Me kò Jeso ba máá: “Aboè, qgóóa máá ne, c'úùa ne hãa dùú sa ne ko kúrú sa ke,” témé.] Gam di qgáía ne xu kò cgúúan ntcòo ka q'aa-q'aaku.

Ne kò khóè ne téé a ko xaè, ẽe xu kòo tc'ãà-cookg'ai xu zàro Me ka, a ko máá: “C'ẽe nem kò kgoara hãa, ke méém kgoarase, ncẽe nxárá tcg'òóèa hãam Krestem Nqarim dim Cóám kò ii ne,” témé.
Xu kò ncõo-kg'ao xu thẽé nco̱i Me, a kò tsa̱u tshàan cgoa hàà a hàà kg'áàkagu Me,
a máá: “Juta ne di Tsi X'aiga Tsi kò ii ne, Tsáá ka kgoarase,” témé.
Gam tc'amkg'ai koe i ko ncẽeta ma góásea hãa: ‘NCẼEA JUTA NE DIM X'AIGA ME E,’ ta ma ma.
Khóè tsara ẽe kò Gam cgoa xgàuèa hãa tsara ka c'ẽe ba kò dcàro Me a máá: “Kreste Tsi tama Tsia gáé? Tsáá ka kgoaraseò, naka kgoara tsam m thẽé!” témé.
Me c'ẽe ba xo̱a me a dqàè me a máá: “Nqarim igaba tsi gáé q'áò Me tama? Tsáá igaba tsi gatà iis xgàrakus koe hàna!
Gatsama ko tchànose xgàraè, gatsam kúrúa hãas tséés di surutan tsam hòòa khama, igabagam Gabá cúí gúù kàma ga kúrú ta ga hãa,” témé.
A ba a máá: “Jesoè, tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese te, Tsari x'aian koe Tsi kòo tcãà ne,” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí me a máá: “Tseegua ner ko bìrí tsi: Ncẽe cáḿ ka tsi gha sene Tíí cgoa paradaisi koe hãa!” témé.
Koaba di x'aèan 12 di i kò ii, si kò wèém nqõóm koe ntcùú sa xóé, a síí dqòa di x'aèan nqoana di koe téé.
Eẽ i ko cáḿs di x'áàn kaà kam kò tempelem koe tceeèam qgáí ba tòàra q'aase cám̀ qàmà tsara cgoa.
Me kò Jeso ba kaiam dòm̀ cgoa q'au a máá: “Aboè! Tiri tc'ẽea ner ko tshàu q'ooa Tsi koe tcãà,” témé. A ba a ncẽe sam ko kg'uia xg'ara ka còo di sa sónòa tcg'òó.
Eẽm ko ncõo-kg'ao xu dim kaia ba ẽe kúrúsea sa bóò, kam kò Nqari ba dqo̱m̀ a máá: “Tseegukagam kò ncẽem khóè ba tchànom khóè Me e,” témé.
Wèé ne khóè ne ẽe kò gaa koe xg'aea hãa, a ko xaè ne kò ẽe zi gúù zi bóò zi ko kúrúse ka ne kò tshúù-tcaoa hãase dìbi.
Wèé ne ẽe kò q'ãa Mea ne hẽé, naka Galilea koe guu a còò Mea hãa zi khóè zi hẽéthẽé kò nqúù ka téé a ko bóò Me.

Kam kò gaa x'aè kaga c'ẽem khóèm Josefa ta ko ma tciiè ba hàna, Juta ne dim x'áé-dxoom Arimateam koe kò guua ba. Qãèm khóèm, tchàno me e kò ii, Nqarim di x'aian di hàà-q'ooan kò qãà hãa ba, tc'ãà-cookg'ai xu ka c'ẽe me e kò ii, igabam kò táá c'ẽe xu di tc'ẽean cgoa dtcòm̀ku.
Pilatom koem kò síí, a Jesom dim tc'áró ba dtcàrà.
Me gaam tc'áró ba xòó, a q'úúm qgáím cgoa tcáḿ, a ba a tshàoèa hãam nxõ̱ám dis tc'ám̀s koe síí tcãà Me, ncẽe c'ẽe khóè ga kò qanega gas koe kg'ónòè tama sa.
Me kò ẽem cáḿ ba kg'ónòsean dim cáḿ me e, Sabata dim cáḿ ba kò ko tshoa-tshoase khama.
Zi kò khóè zi ẽe kò Jesom cgoa Galilea koe guua hãa zi Josefam cgoa qõò, a zi a síí Jesom dis tc'ám̀ sa bóò, a síí Jesom dim tc'áróm ma xòóèa hãa sa bóò thẽé.
Ka zi ko x'áéa zi koe ka̱bise, a zi a síí Jesom dim tc'áró ba qãè-hm̀m̀ xg'ãò tshãán kg'ónòa máá. Sabata dim cáḿ ka zi kò sãa, ẽe i ko ma x'áèèa hãa khamaga ma.
Tc'ãà dim cáḿ bekem dim di ntcùúkg'ai cgoa zi kò ẽe zi kúrúa hãa tshãán séè a tc'ám̀s koe qõò.
A zi a kò nxõ̱á sa bóò si tc'ám̀s-kg'áḿ koe ghànèa tcg'òóèa.
Igaba ẽe zi ko tcãà ka zi kò X'aigam Jesom dim tc'áró ba táá hòò.
Eẽ zi qanega ncẽes gúùs ka area hãa, ka tsara kò cám̀ khóè tsara qáò qgáían x'áàko ha̱na tsara qàea zi koe téé.
Zi kò q'áòan ka górò a góḿankg'ai koe qám̀-kg'ai. Tsara kò khóè tsara gazi ka máá: “Dùús domka sao ko kg'õèa hãam khóè ba x'óóa hãa ne
Ncẽe koem káà Me e, igabagam tẽea hãa. Eẽm kò qanega Galilea koe hãa kam kò bìrí tu u sa tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese, ncẽem kò máá,
Khóèm dim Cóá ba méém cg'ãè ne khóè ne tshàu q'oo koe tcãàè, naka baa xgàuè, naka nqoana dim cáḿ ka x'ooan koe tẽe, ta mééa hãa ka,” ta tsara méé.
Ka zi kò Gam di kg'uian tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese,
a zi a tc'ám̀s koe zi guu a ko ka̱bise ka síí wèé gúùan ncẽe ga Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu 11 xu hẽé, naka wèé ne c'ẽe ne hẽéthẽé bìrí.
Maria Magatalena sa hẽé, naka Joana sa hẽé, naka Marias Jakobom ka xõò sa hẽé, naka c'ẽe zi khóè zi hẽéthẽéa kò x'áè úú-kg'ao xu ncẽe gúùan bìrí,
igaba xu kò ncẽe zi khóè zi táá dtcòm̀, gazi di kg'uia ne kò gaxu koe huwan khama xam̀ khama.
Igabam kò Petere ba tẽe a tc'ám̀s koe qgóéa síí, qám̀sem ko a ko bóò kam kò q'úú qgáí cgoa kúrúèa ko̱àn

Gaam cáḿ cúím kaga tsara kò cám̀ xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao tsara xóé ko Emause ta ko ma tciièm x'áém koe qõò, Jerusalema koe tsi kò guu a ko gaa koe síí, ne 11 kilomitara khama noo qáò-q'ooan úúa hãa ba.
Eẽ tsara xóé ko qõò ka tsara kòo wèé zi gúù zi ẽe kúrúsea hãa zi ka chóà.
Eẽ tsara xóé ko chóàa qõò, kam kò Jeso ba cúù-cuuse cgae tsara a, a hàà xu xg'ae a qõò,
igaba tsara kò qgóó tcgáíèa hãa, khama tsara kò táá bóòa q'ãa Me.
Me tẽè tsara a, a máá: “Dùú sa tsao xóé ko chóàa qõò?” témé. Ka tsara ko ncóó a téé, a tshúù-tcaoa hãa khama ii.

Me kò gatsara ka c'ẽem Kelopase ba xo̱a Me a máá: “A Tsáá cúí Tsi Tsia gáé Jerusalema koe cg'áè-kg'ao Tsia, ncẽe zi cáḿ zi ka gaa koe kúrúsea hãa zi gúù zi Tsi c'úùa hãa ka?” témé.

Me tẽè tsara a, a máá: “Dùútsa gúù zi?” témé. Tsara xo̱a Me a máá: “Jesom Nasareta dim ka, ncẽe kò porofiti ii ba, a kò tsééan koe hẽé, naka kg'uian koe hẽéthẽé kaisa qarian úúa hãa, Nqari ba hẽé naka wèé khóèan hẽéthẽé cookg'ai koe.
Kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé, naka gatá di xu tc'ãà-cookg'ai xu hẽéthẽéa kò qgóó Me, a x'ooan koe xgàra Me, a xgàu Me.
Igaba ta kò tc'ẽea máá, Gaam hàà gha Iseraele ne kgoaram ga Me e, ta tc'ẽea hãa! Ncẽe zi gúù zi wèé zi oose, ncẽea nqoana dim cáḿ ga me e, zi ncẽe zi gúù zi kúrúsea hãa.
Zi kò c'ẽe zi khóè zi gatá dis xg'aes di zi arekagu ta a, kaisa ntcùúkg'ai cgoa zi kò tc'ám̀s koe síí,
igaba zi kò tc'áróa ba síí táá hòò, a kò hàà bìrí ta a, moengele tsara zi bóòa hãa sa, ncẽe kò bìrí zi a máá, Jeso ba kg'õèa hãa, témé tsara.
Ne kò gatá cgoa kò hãa ne c'ẽe ne tc'ám̀s koe síí, a síí bóò si ẽe zi kò khóè zi mééa hãa khamaga ii, igaba ne kò Gabáa táá hòò Me,” ta tsara méé.
Me kò gatsara ka máá: “Tsóágase káà tc'ẽe tsao khóè tsao gáé, a tsao a porofitian ka nxàeèa gúùan dtcòm̀ ka qóḿ tcáó tsao o!
Krestem gha ncẽe zi gúù zi koe xgàrase, a ba a Gam di x'áàn koe tcãà sa gáé kò qaase tama?” tam méé.
A ba a Moshem dis Tcgãyas koe hẽé naka wèé xu porofiti xu di zi Tcgãya zi koe hẽéthẽé guu a tshoa-tshoa, a qãèse bìrí tsara a, wèé zi Tcgãya zi
Eẽ xu ko ncãa xu ko síím x'áém koe cúù, kam kò Jeso ba còoka ko nqáé khama ma kúrúse,
igaba tsara kò qarika dtcàrà Me a máá: “Hãa cgoa tsam m, ncẽeska i dqòa kg'oana, me cáḿ ba nqáéa hãa ke,” témé. Me kò síí cgae tsara a, xu síí xg'ae a hãa.
Eẽ xu tafolem koe ntcõe, kam kò péréan séè, a ts'ee-ts'eekg'ai i, a ba a khõá a máà tsara a.
I kò tcgáía tsara xgobekg'amse, tsara bóòa q'ãa Me. Me nxãaska tcgáí-q'ooa tsara koe kaà.
Tsara kò tẽèku a máá: “Tcáóa tsam gáé kò nxùrù tama, ẽem kòo dàòm q'oo koe kg'ui cgoa tsam m, a kòo
A tsara a kò gaa x'aè kaga tẽe, a Jerusalema koe ka̱bise. Gaa koe tsara ko síí ka tsara kò xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu 11 xu hẽé, naka ẽe kò hãa cgoa xua ne hẽéthẽé sao-xg'ae, ne xg'aea hãa,
a ne a ko máá: “Tseeguan kagam X'aiga ba tẽea, a ba a Simonem ka bóòèa hãa!” témé.
Tsara kò dùú sa kò dàòm q'oo koe kúrúse cgae tsara a sa chóà máá ne, naka tsara kò ma Jeso ba ẽem kò péréan khõá máá tsara a qãá q'oo koe ma bóòa q'ãa sa hẽéthẽé e.
Eẽ ne qanega hãa a ko ncẽes gúùs ka kg'ui kam kò X'aigam Jeso ba hàà xg'aekua ne koe téé, a ba a bìrí ne a máá: “Tòókuan méé i gatu cgoa hãa,” témé.
Ne kò kaisase q'aea hãa, a ne a area hãa, a tc'ẽea máá, dca̱u-soma ba ne bóòa hãa, ta tc'ẽea.
Igabam kò bìrí ne a máá: “Dùús domka tu q'aea hãa? Dùús domka tu ko ncẽeta ma ma tẽèsea máá?

Tshàua Te hẽé, naka nqàrèa Te hẽéthẽé bóò, naka tua Tíí ga Ra ii sa bóò: Qgóóa xám̀ Te, naka bóò, dca̱u-soma nea cgàa kana c'õá ga úú tama, ncẽe tu kò bóò Ra Tíí úúa hãa a,” tam méé.
Eẽm ko ncẽe sa mééa xg'ara kam kò tshàua ba hẽé naka nqàrèa ba hẽéthẽé x'áí ne.
Eẽ ne qanega dtcòm̀ tama, qãè-tcaoan hẽé naka arean hẽéthẽé domka, kam ko tẽè ne a máá: “C'ẽe gúù tc'õóè gha tu úúa hãa?” témé.
Ka ne ko x'ãèa kò hãam x'aù qàmà ba máà Me.
Me bóò Me ne ko koe ga séè a tc'õó me.

A ba a nxãaska bìrí ne a máá: “Ncẽea bìrí tuar kò hãa kg'uian Tiri ga a, ẽer kò gatu cgoa qanega hãa ka. Wèé gúùan ẽe Moshem di x'áè-kg'áḿan koe hẽé, naka Porofiti xu di góán koe hẽé, naka Pesalema zi koe hẽéthẽé Tíí ka góásea hãa méé i tseegukaguè,” témé.
A ba a kò gane di tc'ẽean xgobekg'am,
A ba a bìrí xu a máá: “Ncẽeta i ma góásea hãa: Kreste ba gha xgàrase, a ba a gha nqoana dim cáḿ ka x'ooan koe tẽe,
ke méé zi
Gatua ncẽe zi gúù zi di tu nxàea tseegukagu-kg'ao tu u.
Ra gha Tíí, Tirim Abom nqòòkagu tua hãa sa tsééa máá tu u, igabaga méé tu ncẽem x'áé-dxoom
Kam kò tchàa za úúa tcg'òó ne, Betania khama noose nqúù ka. A ba a x'õàa ba ghùi a ts'ee-ts'eekg'ai ne.
Eẽm hãa a ko ts'ee-ts'eekg'ai ne, kam kò gane koe séèa tcg'òóè, a ba a nqarikg'ai koe qaòkaguè.
Ka ne ko dqo̱m̀ Me, a kaisa qãè-tcaoan cgoa Jerusalema koe ka̱bise.
A ne a wèé x'aè ka tempelem koe hãa, a ko Nqari ba dqo̱m̀.
Tshoa-tshoases koem kò Kg'ui ba hàna, Me kò Kg'ui ba Nqarim cgoa hàna, Me kò Kg'ui ba Nqari Me e.
Nqarim cgoam kò tshoa-tshoases koe hàna.
Wèés gúù sa kò Gam koe guu a kúrúè, i Gam oose cúí gúù ga kúrúè tama, ẽe kúrúsea a.
Gam koe i kò kg'õèan hãa, i kò kg'õèan khóè ne di x'áà a.
I ko x'áàn ntcùúan q'oo koe x'áà, i ntcùúan tàà a hãa tama.
Nqarim ka kò tsééa tcg'òóèa hãam khóè ba kò hàna, cg'õèa ba kò Johane ii.
X'áàn kam gha hàà nxàea tseegukagu kam kò hààraa, nxãasega ne gha wèé ne khóè ne gam koe guu a dtcòm̀ ka.
X'áàm tama me e kò ii, igabam kò hààraa, nxãasegam gha hàà x'áàn ka nxàea tseegukagu ka.
Tseegu dim X'áàm, ncẽe ko wèém khóè ba x'áà-x'aa ba kò nqõómkg'ai koe hàà.
Nqõómkg'ai koem kò hãa, me kò nqõó ba Gam koe guu a kúrúè, igabam nqõó ba c'úù Mea.
Gam x'áé koem kò hàà, ne kò Gam x'áé di ne táá qãèse hààkagu Me.
Igabam kò wèé ne ẽe kò qãèse hààkagu Me ne, gane ncẽe ko Gam di cg'õèan koe dtcòm̀ ne, nxãa nem kò qarian máà, Nqarim di ne cóá ne ne gha ii ka.
Ncẽe ta ma q'ana hãa i ko ma cóán ábàè sa khama ne ma ábàè tama

Me kò Kg'ui ba cgàa ba kúrú, a ba a gatá koe x'ãè, cgóm̀kuan hẽé naka tseeguan hẽéthẽé ka cg'oèa hãase. Ta kaia x'áàn Gam di bóòa hãa, kaia x'áàn ncẽe Xõòm koe guu a cúíse ábàèam Cóám di i.

Johane ba kò Gam ka nxàea tseegukagu, a ba a q'au a máá: “Ncẽe ba kò Gam ga Me e, ncẽer kòo máá: ‘Gaam ẽe qãáa te koe ko hàà ba téé-q'ooan ka nqáé tea, tíí qanega hàà tamas cookg'ai koem kò hàna khama,’ témé ba.”
Gam di cg'oèa hãase hãan koe ta wèéa ta ga guu a chõò tama cgóm̀kuan hòòa.
X'áè ba kò Moshem koe guu a tcg'òóèa hãa khama, i cgóm̀kuan hẽé naka tseeguan hẽéthẽé Jeso Krestem koe guua.
Cúí khóè ga Nqari ba qanega bóò tama. Igabagam cúíse ábàèam Cóám ncẽe Nqari ii ba, a Xõòm dxùu koe ntcõóa-ntcõe ba, nxãa ba Nqari ba q'ãakagu ta a hãa.
Jerusalema di xu Juta xu kò peresiti xu hẽé naka tempelem koe ko hùi xu khóè xu
Xu tẽè me a máá: “Kháé tsi gáé nxãaska dìí tsia? Elija tsia?” témé. Me máá: “Gaar tama ra a,” témé.
Xu máá: “Kháé tsi gáé gaa tsi porofiti tsi tsia,
Ka xu ko nxãaska tẽè me a máá: “Kháé tsia nxãaska dìí tsia? Bìrí xae e naka xae ẽe tsééa óá xaea hãa ne koe xo̱an úú. Dìí tsia, ta tsi ga méé?” témé.
Me máá: “Tíí ra tchàa-xgóós q'oo koe ko q'aur dòm̀ ra a, a ko máá: ‘X'aigam
(Xu kò ncẽe xu khóè xu Farasai xu ka tsééa tcg'òóèa hãa.)
Ka xu ko tẽè me a máá: “Ncẽe Kreste tsi tama tsi kò ii, a Elija tsi tama tsi ii, a tsi a gataga gaa tsi porofiti tsi
Me Johane ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Tíí ra ko tshàan cgoa tcguù-tcguu, igaba xao gaxao ẽe xg'aekua xao koe téé-tẽe ba c'úùa hãa.
Gaam ẽe tíí qãá koe ko hàà ba, ncẽe Gam di nxàbo tca̱ian kgoara gar tc'ãò tama ba,” témé.
Ncẽe zi gúù zia kò Betania koe kúrúse, Jorotane ka ncìí za, ncẽe Johanem kòo tcguù-tcguu koe.
Me Johane ba xùrikom cáḿ ka Jeso ba bóò Me ko hàà, me máá: “Ghùu-coam Nqarim di ba tu bóò, ncẽe ko hàà nqõóm di chìbian xgàm a qõò cgoa ba!
Gaam ga Me e ncẽer kòo Gam ka kg'ui a ko máá: ‘Qãáa te koem ko Khóè ba hàà, ncẽe téé-q'ooan ka nqáé tea ba, tíí kò qanega hàà tamas cookg'ai koem kò hàna hãa khama,’ témé ba.
Tíí igabar kò dìím ii sa c'úùa hãa. Igabar kòo tshàan cgoa tcguù-tcguu, nxãasegam gha Iseraele ne koe x'áíè ka,” tam méé.
Me kò Johane ba ncẽes gúù sa nxàea tseegukagu a máá: “Tc'ẽe bar kò bóò Me nqarikg'ai koe guu a tcíbís khama ii a ko xõa cgae Me, a ba a kò hàà Gam koe x'ãè.

Tíí igabar kò dìím ii sa c'úùa hãa. Igabam kò ẽe kò tséé tea hãa, hààr gha tshàan cgoa tcguù-tcguu ka ba, bìrí te a máá: ‘Eẽ tsi gha Tc'ẽe ba bóò Me ko Gam koe xõa, a Gam koe hãa ba, nxãa ba Gaam Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽem cgoa gha tcguù-tcguum ga Me e,’ témé.
Ra bóòa hãa, a ra a ko nxàea tseegukagu Nqarim dim Cóám ga Me e sa,” tam méé.
Xùrikom cáḿ kam kò Johane gaicara gam di tsara xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao tsara cgoa téé-tẽe.
Eẽm ko
Eẽ tsara ko xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao tsara ncẽe sa kóḿ, ka tsara kò Jeso ba xùri.

Me Jeso ba ka̱bise a ntcẽè a bóò tsara a, tsara ko xùri Me, Me tẽè tsara a, a máá: “Dùú sa tsao ko qaa?” témé. Tsara xo̱a Me a máá: “Nda Tsi x'ãèa, Rabiè?” témé. (Ncẽem kg'ui ba ko ‘Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè’ témé, kg'uiam kò ka̱biè ne).

Me bìrí tsara a, a máá: “Hàà naka tsaoa bóò,” témé. Ka tsara ko qõò cgoa Me a síí ẽem kò x'ãèa hãa qgáìan bóò, a tsara a wèém cáḿ ẽe ba Gam cgoa dxãà. 4 di x'aè e kò ii dqòa di i.
Eẽ tsara khóè tsara ncẽe kò Johane ba kóḿ a
Tc'ãà dis gúùs Anteream kò kúrús kam kò káíkhoem Simone ba qaa, a bìrí me a máá: “Mesia ba tsam hòòa,” témé (ncẽem kg'ui ba ko ‘Kreste ba’ témé, kg'uiam kò ka̱biè ne).
Kam kò
Xùrikom cáḿ kam kò Jeso ba Galilea koe qõò sa bìríse. A ba a kò Filipim cgoa xg'ae, a bìrí me a máá: “Xùri Te,” témé.
Filipi ba kò Betesaida koe guua, Anterea ba hẽé naka Petere ba hẽéthẽé tsara guua hãam x'áé ba.

Filipi ba ko Nataniele ba sao-xg'ae a bìrí a máá: “Gaam Khóèm ẽe xu kò ko Moshe ba hẽé naka porofiti xu hẽéthẽé Gam ka góáa hãa ba tsam hòòa hãa! Jesom Nasareta di ba, Josefam ka Cóáse ba,” témé.
Me Nataniele ba tẽè me a máá: “Nasareta koe i ga qãè gúùan guu a tcg'oa?” témé, kam kò Filipi xo̱a me a máá: “Hàà naka tsam síí tsi bóò,” témé.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba Nataniele ba bóò me ko hàà kam kò gam ka nxàe a máá: “Iseraelem tc'áró-tc'aro ga a ncẽe e, cúí tshúù-ntcõa ga úú tama ba,” témé.

Me Nataniele ba bìrí Me a máá: “Nta Tsi ma q'ãa tea hãa?” témé. Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Qanega tsi kò faia dis hìis dòm̀ q'oo koe ntcõóa-ntcõe, me Filipi tcii tsi tamas cookg'ai koer kò bóò tsi,” témé.
Me Nataniele xo̱a a máá: “Rabiè, Tsáá Tsi Nqarim di Tsi Cóá Tsi i, Tsáá Tsi X'aiga Tsi i Iseraele di Tsi,” témé.

Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Ncãar bìrí tsi a máá: ‘Faia dis hìis dòm̀ q'oo koe tsi ntcõóa-ntcõe koer hòò tsia,’ témé domka tsi ko dtcòm̀, igabaga tsi gha ncẽe zi gúù zi nqáéa hãa zi bóò,” témé.
A ba a máá: “Tseegukar ko tseeguan bìrí xao o, a ko máá: Nqarikg'ai xao gha bóò i xgobekg'amsea hãa, i ko Nqarim di moengelean Khóèm dim Cóám koe q'ábà xõa,” témé.
Nqoana dim cáḿ kas kò séèkuan dis kõ̱è sa Kana
Me kò Jeso ba hẽé naka Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé gaas kõ̱ès séèkuan di sa tciia mááèa.
Eẽ i ko gõéan tcào kas kò Jesom ka xõò sa bìrí Me a máá: “Gõéan ne úú tama,” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí si a máá: “Khóè seè, kháé méér dùú sa kúrú? Tirim x'aè ba qanega hàà ta ga hãa ka,” témé.
Si Jesom ka xõò sa tséé-kg'ao xu bìrí a máá: “Eẽm ko bìrí xao os gúùs wèé sa méé xao kúrú,” témé.

Gaa koe xu kò nxõ̱án cgoa kúrúèa xu káná xu 6 xu tshàan di xu téé-tẽe, a xu a kò gaa koe tòóèa hãa Juta ne dis cau si i kò ii khama, xg'aàse di tshàan tòóa mááse sa. Me kò wèém káná ba 100 litara khama noo tshàan úúa.
Me Jeso ba bìrí xu a máá: “Káná xu tshàan cgoa cg'oè-cg'oe,” témé. Xu cg'oè-cg'oe xu, xu cg'oè a síí kg'áḿa xu koe téé.
Me bìrí xu a máá: “Ncẽeska xao xo̱be naka xaoa kõ̱ès dim tc'ãà-cookg'aim koe úú,” témé. Xu xo̱be e a xu a síí máà me e.

Eẽm ko kõ̱ès dim tc'ãà-cookg'ai ba tshàan ncẽe gõéan koe ka̱bièa xám̀, ncẽem kò nda i guua hãa sa c'úùa a, (igaba xu kò tséé-kg'ao xu ncẽe kò tshàan xàia hãa xu q'ana hãa nda i guua sa), kam kò séè-kg'ao ba tcii,

a bìrí me a máá: “Wèé ne khóè ne ko kuri ka̱re gõéan kg'aia tcg'òó a khóè ne máà. Eẽ ne ko khóè ne kg'áà xg'ara, ne i ko nxãaska nxãwa ẽe ka̱re taman tcg'òóè. Igaba tsi tsáá ka̱re gõéan ncẽem x'aè ba tòóa máána hãa,” témé.
Ncẽe sa kò kg'aikas x'áís ga si i, Jesom ko Kana
Ncẽe zi gúù zi qãá q'oo koem kò
Si kò Paseka dis kõ̱ès Juta ne di sa cúù si i, Me kò Jeso ba Jerusalema koe qõò.

Eẽm ko tempelem koe tcãà kam kò khóè ne bóò ne ko ghòèan hẽé, naka ghùuan hẽé naka tcíbían hẽéthẽé x'ámágu, ne c'ẽe ne tafolean koe ntcõóa-ntcõe a ko tãá nqõó di marian xg'áḿa q'aa.

Me kò dqùian cgoa tsa̱m ba kúrú, a ba a wèéa ne ga tempelem koe xhàiagu, ghùuan ga hẽé naka ghòèan ga hẽéthẽé cgoa, a ba a ghànèa qáú marian ko xg'áḿa q'aa ne di ntcõó-q'ooa ne, a ba a gane di qano marian tsa̱i-tsa̱ia q'aa.
A ba a ẽe kò tcíbían x'ámágu ne bìrí a máá: “Eẽ zi gúù zi tu ncẽe koe tcg'òó. Abom dim nquu ba tu táá x'ámágu-nquu ba kúrú guu!” témé.
Ka xu ko Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese ẽe ko góáèa hãa sa, ncẽe kòo máá: “Tsarim nquum di ncóóa ne ko cg'õo te,” témé sa.
Xu kò Juta xu xo̱a Me a máá: “Ndakas x'áí sa Tsi gha x'áí ta a, ncẽe zi gúù zi di qarian Tsi úúa hãa di sa?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Ncẽem tempele ba tu ko̱bè, nakar nqoana cáḿan q'oo koe tshàoa ghùi me,” témé.
Ka xu kò Juta xu máá: “Tempelem ncẽe kò 46 kurian séè a tshàoè ba Tsi gha Tsáá nqoana cáḿan q'oo koe ghùi dèe?” témé.
Igabam kòo Jeso ba tc'áróa ba dim tempele ba nxàe.
Eẽm ko x'ooan koe ghùièa xg'ara ka xu kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ẽem xg'ao mééa hãa sa tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese. A xu a
Eẽm ko Jeso ba Jerusalema koe hàna, Paseka dis kõ̱ès dim x'aèm ka, ka ne kò káí ne khóè ne x'áí zi ẽem kò kúrú zi bóò, a ne a Gam dim cg'õèm koe dtcòm̀.
Igabam ko Jeso ba táá tcom ne, wèé ne khóè nem q'ana hãa khama.
Gataga i kò Gam koe qaase tama, c'ẽem khóèm gha c'ẽe khóèan ka nxàea tseegukagu sa. Gabá kò Gam ka q'ana hãa khóèm koe hàna sa khama.
Me kò c'ẽem khóèm Farasai xu dim Nikodemase ta ko ma tciiè ba hàna, Juta ne dim tc'ãà-cookg'ai ba.

Jesom koem kò ntcùú ka hàà, a hàà bìrí Me a máá: “Rabiè, Nqarim koe guua Tsi xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tsi i sa ta q'ana hãa; cúí khóè ga Tsáá ko kúrú zi x'áí zi kúrúa hãa tite, Nqarim kò gaan cgoa hãa tama ne khama,” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Tseegukar ko tseeguan bìrí tsi, a ko máá: Khóèm kò ka̱base ábàè tama nem cuiskaga Nqarim di x'aian bóòa hãa tite,” témé.
Me Nikodemase ba bìrí Me a máá: “Khóè ba ga kháé ntama ma gàeseam hãa koe ábàè? Xõòs di ncãàn koe ba ko kháé gaicara tcãà, a nxãwa ábàè?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Tseegukar ko tseeguan bìrí tsi, a ko máá: Khóèm kò tshàan hẽé naka Tc'ẽe ba hẽéthẽé ka ábàè tama, nem cuiskaga Nqarim di x'aian koe tcana hãa tite.
Eẽ cgàam ka ábàèa sa cgàa si i, si ẽe Tc'ẽem ka ábàèa sa Tc'ẽe si i.
Táá méé tsi bìrí tsir kòo a ko máá: ‘Ka̱base méé tu ábàè,’ témé ne are guu.

Tc'ãá ba ko gam ko tc'ẽe xòè za tc'ãá, tsi ko gam di ts'oo-q'ooan kóḿ, igaba tsi cuiskaga ẽem guua hãa kana ẽem ko qõò qgáìan q'ãa tite. Me wèém khóèm ẽe Tc'ẽem ka ábàè ba gatà ii,” témé.
Me Nikodemase ba xo̱a Me a máá: “Ntama zi gha ma ncẽe zi gúù zi kúrúse?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Tsáá tsia Iseraele di tsi xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao tsi i, igaba tsia ncẽe zi gúù zi ka q'ãa tama?

Tseegukar ko tseeguan bìrí tsi, a ko máá: Sita q'ana hãa zi gúù zi ka ta ko kg'ui, a ta a ko ẽe ta bóòa hãa zi ka nxàea tseegukagu, igaba tu gatu ẽe ta ko gaas ka nxàea tseegukagu sa dtcòm̀ tama.
Nqõóm di zi gúù zi kar ko kg'ui cgoa tu u igaba tu dtcòm̀ tama, ka tua gha ntama ma dtcòm̀, ncẽè nqarikg'ai di zi gúù zi kar kòo kg'ui cgoa tu u ne?
Cúí khóè ga qanega nqarikg'ai koe qaò ta ga hãa, ẽe nqarikg'ai koe guu a xoana hãam oose, Khóèm dim Cóá ba, ncẽe nqarikg'ai koe hãa ba.
“Eẽm kò ma Moshe tchàa-xgóós koe cg'ao ba ma ghùi khamaga ma méém Khóèm dim Cóá ba ma ghùiè,
nakam gha nxãasega wèém

Nqari ba nqõó ba ncẽeta noose ncàm̀a hãa domkam kò Gam dim Cóám cúíse ábàèa hãa ba tcg'òóa hãa khama, nxãasegam gha dìím wèém ẽe ko Gam koe dtcòm̀ ba táá kaàkaguè, igabam gha chõò tamas kg'õè sa úú ka.
Nqari ba kò Gam dim Cóám gha hàà nqõó ba xgàra ka tsééa óá Me tama, igabam kò hààm gha nqõó ba kgoara ka tsééa óá Mea hãa.
Eẽ ko Gam koe dtcòm̀ ba xgàraè tite, igaba gaam ẽe Gam koe dtcòm̀ tama ba nxãakamaga xgàraèa hãa, Nqarim dim Cóám, ncẽe cúíse ábàèa hãam koem kò táá dtcòm̀ khama.
Ncẽea xgàrakus
Wèém khóèm ẽe ko cg'ãèan kúrú ba x'áàn hòrea, a x'áàn koe hàà tite khama, nxãasega i gha gam di
Igaba dìím wèém ẽe ko tseeguan kúrú ba ko x'áàn koe hàà, nxãasega i gha gam di tsééan qãèse bóòse ka, Nqarim ko ma tc'ẽe khamam ma kúrúa hãa sa,” tam méé.
Ncẽe zi gúù zi qãá q'oo koe xu kò Jeso ba hẽé naka Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé xu Jutea dim nqõóm koe qõò. Gaa koem kò síí gaxu cgoa ão, a ba a
Me kò thẽé Johane ba Ainone koe
Johane ba kò qanega qáé-nquus koe tcãàè ta ga hãa khama.
Xu kò Johanem di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu c'ẽem Jutam cgoa q'ano-q'anosean dis ntcoeku sa ghùi.
Ka xu kò Johanem koe síí, a bìrí me a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao tseè, ẽe kò tsáá cgoa Jorotane ka ncìí za hànam Khóè ba, ẽe tsi kò Gam ka nxàea tseegukagua hãa ba ko ncẽeska
Me Johane ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Khóè ba cuiskaga cúí gúù ga q'õòa hãa tite, nqarikg'ai koem kò guu naka máàè e tama ne.
Gaxao igaba xao ga tíí ka nxàea tseegukagu ẽer kòo máá: ‘Tíí ra Krester tama ra a, igaba ra Gam ko hààs cookg'ai koe tsééa tcg'òóèa hãa,’ témé ka.

Eẽ séè-kg'aos cgoa hàna ba séè-kg'ao me e, me séè-kg'aom dim tcáràm ẽe téé a ko komsana me ba ko kaisase séè-kg'aom dim dòm̀ ba qãè-tcaoa máá. Gaa domka i ncẽeska tiri qãè-tcaoan cg'oèa hãa.
Gam di cgáéan méé i kaisase càùse, naka i tiri cg'áré-cg'árésean kaisase nqãaka síí,” tam méé.

Eẽ tc'amaka guua ba wèé ne ka tc'amaka hàna. Eẽ nqõómkg'ai koe guua ba nqõómkg'ai di me e a ko nqõómkg'ai di zi gúù zi ka kg'ui. Eẽ nqarikg'ai koe guua hãa ba wèé ne tc'amkg'ai koe hàna.
Eẽm bóòa hãa, a kóḿa hãa gúùa nem ko nxàea tseegukagu, igaba i cúí khóè ga Gam ko nxàea tseegukagu sa dtcòm̀ tama.
Khóèm ẽe ko Gam ko nxàea tseegukagu sa dtcòm̀ ba ko Nqari ba tseegu di Me e sa nxàea tcg'òó.
Eẽm Nqari ba tsééa tcg'òóa hãa ba ko Nqarim di kg'uian kg'ui khama, tc'ãò-tc'ão sa nqáéa hãasem ko Nqari ba Tc'ẽe ba máà
Xõò ba Gam dim Cóá ba ncàm̀a hãa, a wèé zi gúù zi Gam tshàu q'oo koe tcana hãa.
Dìím wèém ẽe ko Cóám koe dtcòm̀ ba chõò tamas kg'õè sa úúa hãa, igaba ẽe ko Cóá ba xguì ba cuiskaga kg'õèan hòò tite, i gha Nqarim di xgóàn gaam koe hãa.

Jeso ba kò káí xgaa-xgaase-kg'aoan kúrú, a ba a Johane ba nqáéa hãase káí ne khóè ne tcguù-tcguu. Xu kò Farasai xu ncẽe sa kóḿ. (Igabam ko Jeso ba tcguù-tcguu tama, xu kòo Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ko tcguù-tcguu.) Eẽm ko Jeso ba ẽe kò nxàeè sa kóḿ, kam kò Jutea koe guu a ba a gaicara Galilea koe ka̱bise kg'oana.
Samaria dim nqõóm koe méém tcana tcg'oas gúù si i kò ii.
Me Samaria koe hànam x'áé-coam Sikare ta ko ma tciièm koe síí tcãà, c'ẽem xháràm Jakobem kò cóásem Josefa ba máà hãam koe.
Me kò Jakobem dim tsàù ba gaa koe hãa. Me kò Jeso ba qáòs qõòs koem guua hãa khama xhõea hãa, khamam kò gaam tsàùm qàe koe síí ntcõóa-ntcõe, koaba nqáè e kò ii.
Si ko Samaria dis khóè sa gaa koe hàà, tshàa nes gha hàà xài ka, Me Jeso ba bìrí si a máá: “Tshàan au Ter kg'áà,” témé.
(Xu kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu x'áém koe tcana hãa, síí xu gha tc'õoan x'ámá ka.)

Si Samaria dis khóè sa bìrí Me a máá: “Tsáá Tsi Juta Tsi i, ra tíí Samaria dir khóè ra a. Ka Tsia ga nxãaska ntama ma tshàan dtcàrà te?” témé. Juta ne hẽé naka Samaria ne hẽéthẽéa ko xg'ae qgáìa káà a khama.

Me Jeso ba xo̱a si a máá: “Nqarim dis máàku sa si kò q'ana hãa ne, a Dìím ko dtcàrà si sa q'ana hãa, ne si ga ko sáá dtcàrà Mea hãa, Me ga kò kg'õèan di tshàan máà sia hãa,” témé.
Si khóè sa bìrí Me a máá: “X'aigaè, xài cgoa Tsi ga gàba Tsi úú tama, me tsàù ba nqúù q'ane me e. Ka Tsia ko nxãaska gaa kg'õèan di tshàan nda hòò?

A Tsáá Tsia gatá ka xõòm Jakobem ka kaia hãa, ncẽe kò tsàù ba máà ta ba, i kò gabá hẽé, naka gam ka cóáse ga xu hẽé, naka gam di kg'oo-coan hẽéthẽé gam koe kg'áà ba?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a si a máá: “Wèém khóèm ncẽe tshàan ko kg'áà ba gha gaicara cáḿ.

Igaba dìím wèém ẽe gha tshàan ẽer gha máà me kg'áà ba gaicara chõò tamase cáḿa hãa tite. Igaba wèém ẽer gha ko ncẽe tshàan máàm koe i gha chõò tamas kg'õès di tshàan di tsgórèan kúrúse,” tam méé.

Si khóè sa bìrí Me a máá: “X'aigaè, ncẽe tshàan máà te, nakar gha nxãasega táá gaicara cáḿ guu, naka ra nxãasega ncẽe koe hàà xàian ka táá ncẽeta noom dàò ba qõò guu,” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí si a máá: “Qõò naka sia síí sarim khóè ba tcii na ka̱bise na hàà,” témé.
Si khóè sa xo̱a Me a máá: “Khóè bar úú tama,” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí si a máá: “Tseegu si ko, ẽe si ko máá, khóè ba si úú tama, témé ka.
5 xu khóè xu si kò úúa hãa, igaba si ncẽeska úúam khóè ba sarim tama me e. Eẽ si ko nxàe gúùa nea tseegu u,” témé.
Si khóè sa bìrí Me a máá: “X'aigaè, Tsáá Tsia porofiti Tsi i sar ko bóò.
Gatá ka xõò ga xua kòo ncẽem xàbìm koe còrè, igaba tu ko gatu máá, Jerusalema ba gaam qgáìm gaa koe méé ta còrèm ga me e, témé,” tas méé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí si a máá: “Khóè seè, dtcòm̀ ẽer ko méés gúù sa: X'aè ba ko hàà ncẽem xàbìm koe kana Jerusalema koe ga igaba tu Abo ba còrèa hãa tite ba ke.
Gatu Samaria tua kò c'úùa tu hãa gúùan còrè, ta ko sita

Igabam ko x'aè ba hàà, a nxãakamaga hààraa, ncẽe tseeguan di dqo̱m̀-kg'aoan gha Tc'ẽem koe hẽé naka tseeguan koe hẽéthẽé Abo ba dqo̱m̀ ba. Abo ba ko gatà ii ne dqo̱m̀-kg'ao ne qaa khama.
Nqari ba Tc'ẽe Me e, ke méé ne Gam di ne dqo̱m̀-kg'ao ne Tc'ẽe ba hẽé naka tseeguan koe hẽéthẽé dqo̱m̀ Me,” tam méé.
Si khóè sa bìrí Me a máá: “Mesiam Kreste ta ko ma tciiè ba ko hàà sar q'ana hãa. Eẽm ko hàà nem gha hàà wèé zi gúù zi ka bìrí ta a,” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a si a máá: “Tíí ncẽe ko sáá cgoa kg'ui Ra gar ga Ra a,” témé.

Xu gaa x'aè kaga Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ka̱bise. Eẽ xu ko hàà ka xu kò sao-xg'ae Me Me hãa a ko khóès cgoa kg'ui xu are. Igaba i ko táá cúía xu ga tẽè a máá: “Dùú sa Tsi ko qaa?” kana “Dùús domka Tsia ko gas cgoa kg'ui?” témé.
Kas ko gas dim gàbam xài cgoa di ba guu, a sa a x'áé-dxoom koe ka̱bise a síí khóè ne bìrí a máá:
“Hàà naka síí wèé zi gúù zi ẽer kúrúa hãa zi ka bìrí tea hãam Khóè ba bóò. A Gaam Krestem ga ba ga ii?” témé.
Ne x'áé-dxoom koe guu a ne a Gam koe síí.
Xu gaa x'aè kaga Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu Gam cgoa kg'ui a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'aoè, tc'õó,” témé.
Me bìrí xu a máá: “Tc'õó Ra gha tc'õoa ner Tíí úúa hãa, gaxao ka c'úùèa hãa a,” témé.
Xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu xóé a bìríku a máá: “Ncãa i gáé c'ẽe khóèan tc'õoan óága máá Me?” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí xu a máá: “Tiri tc'õoa nea Gaam ẽe tséé Tea hãam ko tc'ẽe sa kúrú si i, naka Gam dis tséé sa xg'ara-xg'ara sa hẽéthẽé e.

Ncẽeta tu gáé gatu méé tama: ‘4 nxoea nea qaùa hãa, me ko nxãwa x'aèm tc'õoan méé i khõáè di ba hàà,’ témé tama? Bóò, bìrí xao or ko, ghùi-kg'ai xao naka bóò xháràn ma x'ãéa hãa, a i a khõáè i gha sa tééa máána hãa.

Eẽ ko tc'õoan khõá ba ko surutaè, a ba a ko chõò tamas kg'õès di tc'áróan sáà-xg'ae, tsara gha nxãasega ẽe ko xhárà ba hẽé naka ẽe kò khõá ba hẽéthẽé tsara xg'ae a qãè-tcao.
Ncẽem kg'ui ba tseegu me e khama, ncẽe ko máá: ‘C'ẽe ba ko xhárà, me ko c'ẽe ba khõá!’ témé ba.
Tséé xaoa Ra hãa, síí xao gha ẽe xao tséé tama koe khõá ka. C'ẽe nea gaa koe tsééa hãa, xao ko gaxao gane di tsééan koe tcuù,” tam méé.

Ne kò káí ne Samaria ne ẽem x'áé-dxoom di ne Gam koe dtcòm̀, kg'uim khóès kò nxàea tseegukagua hãam domka, ncẽe kòo máá: “Wèé zi gúù zi ẽer kúrúa hãa zi kam bìrí tea hãa,” témé ba.
Eẽ ne ko Samaria ne Gam koe hàà, ka ne kò dtcàrà Me gane cgoam gha hãa sa, Me cám̀ cáḿan hãa cgoa ne.
Ne kò Gam di kg'uian domka kaisase káí ne dtcòm̀.

A ne a khóè sa bìrí a máá: “Ncẽeska ta ẽe si nxàea hãa gúùan domka cúí dtcòm̀ tama, igaba ta ncãa kóḿa mááse Me, a ta a ncẽem khóè ba nqõóm dim Kgoara-kg'ao Me e sa ncẽeska q'ana hãa,” ta ne méé.
Eẽ tsara cáḿ tsara qãá q'oo koem kò gaa koe tcg'oa a Galilea koe qõò.
(Jeso ba kò Gam ka nxàea tseegukagua hãa, porofiti ba gam dim x'áém koe dtcòm̀mè tamam khóè me e sa khama.)

Eẽm ko Galilea koe tcãà, ka ne kò Galilea di ne khóè ne qãèse hààkagu Me. Wèé zi gúù zi ẽem kò Jerusalema koe kõ̱ès dim cáḿ ka kúrúa hãa zi ne kò bóòa hãa khama, gane igaba ne ko gaas kõ̱ès koe hààraa khama.
Gaiam kò Kana
Eẽm ko Jeso ba Jutea koe guu a Galilea koe hààraa hãa sa kóḿ, kam kò Gam koe síí a dtcàrà Me, hààm gha gam dim cóá ba kg'õèkagu ka, ncẽe ko x'oos qàe koe hãa ba.
Me Jeso ba bìrí me a máá: “X'áí zi hẽé naka are-aresa zi gúù zi hẽéthẽé tu kò bóò tama ne tu cuiskaga dtcòm̀ tite,” témé.
Me x'aiga-coa ba bìrí Me a máá: “X'aigaè, cóám tirim x'óó tamas cookg'ai koe hàà,” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Tsarim cóá ba gha kg'õè ke qõò,” témé. Me khóè ba ẽem Jeso ba bìrí mea kg'uian dtcòm̀, a ba a qõò.
Qanegam dàòm q'oo koe hãa a ko qõò, ka xu kò gam di xu qãà xu qãè tchõàn gam dim cóá ba kg'õèa hãa di cgoa hàà xg'ae cgoa me.
Me dùútsa x'aèm kam kò cóá ba qãè sa tẽè xu, xu bìrí me a máá: “Ncẽe ncãa nqáém cáḿ ka i ncãa tcììan guu me, koaba di x'aè ka,” témé.

Me kò cóám ka xõò ba nxãaska q'ana hãa gaam x'aèm ẽem ka gam kò Jeso ba bìrí mea hãa a máá: “Tsarim cóá ba gha kg'õè,” témé sa. Ka ne kò gabá hẽé naka gam dim nquum di ne wèé ne hẽéthẽé dtcòm̀.
Ncẽea kò cám̀ dis x'áís ga si i, Jesom kò Jutea koe guu a Galilea koe hàà kam kò kúrúa hãa sa.
Ncẽe zi gúù zi qãá q'oo koem kò Jeso ba Jerusalema koe qõò, c'ẽes kõ̱ès Juta ne di sa kò gaa koe hàna khama.

Nxãaskas kò Jerusalema koe heke-kg'áḿ sa hàna, ncẽe kò ‘Ghùuan dis Heke-kg'áḿ sa’ ta ma tciiè sa. Me kò ncẽes heke-kg'áḿs qàe koe tèbe ba hãa, Hebera dis kg'uis ka ko ‘Betesata’ ta ma tciiè ba, 5 zi xàò-xao zi kò úúa hãa ba.
Gaa zi xàò-xao zi koe ne kò káí ne khóè ne tsàako ne hãa, káà tcgáí ne hẽé naka qõò tama ne hẽé naka nqo̱ara ne hẽéthẽé e.
Nxãaskam kò c'ẽem khóè ba gaa koe hàna, 38 kurian kòo úú a kò tsàa ba.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba bóò me, me gaa koe xóé-xõe, kam kò ncìísem tsàara hãa sa bóòa q'ãa, a tẽè me a máá: “A qãè kg'oana tsia?” témé.

Me ẽem tcìì-khoe ba xo̱a me a máá: “X'aigaè, cúí khóè gar úú tama ẽem kòo tshàa ba ko̱bi-ko̱bise ne gha gaam koe tcãà te e. Eẽr kò tcãà kg'oana ne i ko c'ẽe khóèan tíí ka tc'ãà a tcãà,” tam méé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí me a máá: “Tẽe naka tsarim tcoà ba séè naka tsia qõò,” témé.
Me gaam khóè ba kúúga qãè. A ba a gam dim tcoà ba séè, a qõò.
Eẽm cáḿ ba kò Sabata dim cáḿ me e.
Ka xu kò Juta xu ẽe ko qãèkaguèam khóè ba bìrí a máá: “Sabata dim cáḿ me e khama tsi tsarim tcoà ba tsi ga séè sa kgoara mááè tama,” témé.
Me xo̱a xu a máá: “Khóèm ẽe qãèkagu tea ba ncãa bìrí te a máá: ‘Tsarim tcoà ba séè naka tsia qõò,’ témé,” tam méé.
Ka xu kò tẽè me a máá: “Dìí ba ẽem khóè ba ncẽe ko máá, tcoà ba méé tsi séè naka qõò, témé ba?” ta xu méé.
Igabam kò ẽe qãèkaguèam khóè ba c'úùa hãa dìí Me e kò ii sa, Jeso ba kò qõòa hãa, ne kò gataga gaam qgáìm koe kò hãa ne khóè ne káí ne e thẽé khama.

Eẽ zi gúù zi qãá q'oo koem kò Jeso ba tempelem koe sao-xg'ae me, a bìrí me a máá: “Bóò, ncẽeska tsi qãè tsi i. Táá méé tsi gaicara chìbian kúrú guu, nxãasega i gha kaisase cg'ãè gúùan táá kúrúse cgae tsi ka,” témé.
Me gaam khóè ba tcg'oa, a síí Juta xu bìrí, Jeso Me e kò ii, ncẽe kò qãèkagu mea hãa ba sa.
Ka xu kò gaas kaga Juta xu
Me Jeso ba bìrí ne a máá: “Tirim Abo ba ko wèé x'aè ka tséé, ncẽeskaga igaba, Ra ko Tíí igaba thẽé tséé,” témé.

Gaa domkaga ne kò Juta ne cg'õo Me ne gham dàò ba kaisase tcg'aì-tcaoa hãase qaa, Sabata dim cáḿ di x'áèan cúím kò khõá tama, igabam kò thẽé máá, Nqari ba Gam ka Xõòm tc'áró-tc'aro Me e, ta mééa, a kòo Nqarim cgoa tc'ãò-tc'ãose.

Me Jeso ba xo̱a ne a máá: “Tseegukar ko tseeguan bìrí tu u, a ko máá: Cuiskagam Cóá ba c'ẽe gúù cúí ga kúrúa hãa tite, igabam gha ẽem ko Xõò ba bóò Me ko kúrús cúí sa kúrú. Wèés ẽem ko Xõò ba kúrú sam ko Cóá ba gataga thẽé kúrú khama.
Xõò ba Cóá ba ncàm̀a hãa, a ko wèé zi ẽem ko kúrú zi x'áí Me. A ba a gha ncẽe zi tséé zi ka kaia hãa zi
Eẽm ko Xõò ba ẽe x'óóa hãa ne ghùi a kg'õèkagu khamagam gha ma Cóá ba ẽem ncàm̀a hãa ne kg'õèkagu.
Abo ba cúí khóè ga xgàra tama, igabam Cóáse ba wèé qarian xgàran di máàna hãa,
nxãasega ne gha wèéa ne ga Cóá ba tcom ka, ẽe ne ma Xõò ba tcoma hãa khamaga ma. Eẽ Cóá ba tcom tama nea Xõòm ẽe tséé Mea hãa ba tcom tama.

“Tseegukar ko tseeguan bìrí tu u, a ko máá: Eẽ ko Tiri kg'uian komsana, a ko Gaam ẽe tséé Tea hãam koe dtcòm̀, ba chõò tamas kg'õè sa úúa hãa, a xgàrakuan koe tcãà tite, igabam x'ooan koe tcg'oara hãa, a kg'õèan koe tcana hãa.

Tseegukar ko tseeguan bìrí tu u, a ko máá: X'aè ba ko hàà, a nxãakamaga hààra xg'araa, ẽe x'óóa hãa ne gha Nqarim dim Cóám dim dòm̀ ba kóḿ ba, ne gha gane ẽe ko kóḿ Me ne kg'õè.
Eẽm ma Xõò ba ma Gam ka kg'õèan úúa hãa khamagam gataga thẽé Cóáse ba qarian máàna hãa, Gam kam gha kg'õèan úú di i.
A ba a
Táá méé tu ncẽes gúùs ka arekaguè guu, x'aè ba ko hàà wèé ne ẽe tc'ám̀ zi koe hàna ne gha Gam dim dòm̀ ba kóḿ ba ke,
a ne a gha

Tíí ra cúí gúù ga cúía kúrúa hãa tite. Eẽr ko ma Abom koe ma kóḿ khamar ko ma xgàra, i Tiri xgàra-q'ooan tchàno o, Tíí ko tc'ẽe sar qaa tama, igabar ko ẽe tséé Tea hãam ko tc'ẽe sa kúrú khama.
“Tíí kar kòo nxàea tseegukagua mááse nes Tiris nxàea tseegukagu sa cuiskaga tseegu di sa ii tite.
C'ẽe ba hàna ẽe ko Tíí ka nxàea tseegukagu ba, Ra q'ana hãa ẽem gha ko Tíí ka nxàea tseegukagus kg'ui sa tseegu di si i sa.
Johanem koe tu kò khóèan tsééa úú, me kò síí tseeguan nxàea tseegukagu.
Khóèan di nxàea tseegukagua ner ko dtcòm̀s tama si i, igabar ko ncẽe zi gúù zi kg'ui, kgoaraè tu gha ka.
Johane ba kò x'áà-x'aa-kg'ai cgoa dis gúùs ka̱ruko a ko x'áàs khama ii, tu kò x'aè-coam ka tu gha gam di x'áàn koe qãè-tcao sa tc'ẽe.

“Nxàea tseegukagu sar úúa, ncẽe Johanem dis kaga kaia hãa sa. Ncẽe zi tséé zim Abo ba máà Tea hãa, xg'ara-xg'ara zir gha ka, gazi ncẽer ko kúrú zi ko Tíí ka nxàea tseegukagu khama, Abom tséé Tea hãa sa.
Abom ncẽe tséé Tea hãa ba Tíí ka nxàea tseegukagua hãa. Tu gatu qanega dòm̀a ba kóḿ ta ga hãa, kana kg'áía ba igabaga tu bóò ta ga hãa.
Gam di kg'uian igaba i gatu koe hãa tama, ẽem tsééa hãa ba tu dtcòm̀ tama khama.
Tcgãya zi tu ko kaisase bóò q'oo, gatua tc'ẽea máá, gazi koe tu gha chõò tamas kg'õè sa hòò, ta tc'ẽea khama. Igabaga zi ko
Igabaga tu ko Tíí koe hààn xguì, hàà tu gha kg'õèan hòò ka.
“Dqo̱m̀kua ner khóèan koe qaa tama.
Igabar q'ana hãa nta ii tu khóè tu u sa, Nqarim di ncàm̀kuan tcáóa tu q'oo koe úú tama tu.
Abom dim cg'õèm cgoar hààraa, igaba tu kò táá séèa mááse Te. Igabaga ncẽè c'ẽem khóèm kòo gam di cg'õèan cgoa hàà ne tu ko séèa mááse me.
Nta tu gha ma dtcòm̀, ncẽè gatu ka c'ẽea ne koe cúíga tu kòo dqo̱m̀an qaara mááse, a tu a Nqarim cúím koe guua hãa dqo̱m̀an qaa tama ne?
“Igaba méé tu táá tc'ẽea máá, Nqarim cookg'ai koer gha Tíí chìbi-chibi tu u, ta tc'ẽea guu. Gatua gha chìbi-chibi tu um khóè ba Moshe me e, gatu di nqòòan tu gam koe tòóa hãa ba.
Ncẽè Moshe ba tu kò dtcòm̀a hãa, ne tu ga kò Tíí thẽé dtcòm̀ Tea hãa, Tíí kam góáa hãa khama.
Igaba ncẽè gam góáa hãa zi tu kò dtcòm̀ tama, ne tua gha nxãaska Tíí ko méé zi ntama dtcòm̀?” tam Jeso ba méé.
Ncẽe zi gúù zi qãá q'oo koem kò Jeso ba Galilea dim tshàam ka c'ẽe xòèa ba za tchoaba, ncẽe Tiberia di ta kòo ma tciiè e.
Si kò kaias xg'aes khóè ne di sa xùri Me, ẽe kòo tsàa ne khóè ne koem kò kúrú zi x'áí zi ne kò bóò khama.
Me Jeso ba xàbìm di c'ẽe xòèa ba za q'ábà qaò, a síí Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu cgoa gaa koe ntcõó.
Si kò Juta ne dis kõ̱ès Paseka di sa cúù si i.

Eẽm ko Jeso ba ghùi-kg'ai a ko kaias xg'aes khóè ne di sa bóò si ko Gam koe hàà, kam kò Filipi ba bìrí a máá: “Nda xae gha síí péréan x'ámá, ncẽe ne khóè ne gha hàà tc'õó o?” témé.
(Ncẽetam ko ma kúrúa bóòa ba domka tẽè me, tc'ẽea ba koem kò nxãakamaga q'ana hãa dùú sam gha kúrú sa khama.)
Me Filipi ba xo̱a Me a máá: “Khóèm ko 8 nxoean q'oo koe gàbakaguè maria ne cuiskaga tc'ãò tite, ncẽeta noo ne khóè ne tc'õókagua ne!” témé.
Me Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ka c'ẽem Anteream ncẽe Simonem Peterem ka káímkhoe ba kg'ui a máá:
“C'ẽem cóá ba ncẽe koe hãa, 5 xu péré xu hẽé naka cám̀ x'aù tsara hẽéthẽé qgóóa hãa ba, ka sa ncẽe sa dùú cgáé saa ncẽeta noo ne khóè ne koe?” témé.
Me Jeso ba máá: “Khóè ne xao bìrí naka ne ntcõó,” témé. Káí dcãa nea kò ẽem qgáìm koe hãa khama. Ne kò wèé ne khóè ne ntcõó, 5,000 khama noo xu khóè xu u kò ii.

Me Jeso ba nxãaska péré xu séè, a ba a Nqari ba qãè-tcaoa máá, a khóè ne ẽe koe kò ntcõóa-ntcõe ne máà xu, ne kò ẽe ne ko ma tc'ẽe khama ma tc'õó. A ba a kò x'aùan ka thẽé gataga hẽé.

Eẽ ne ko wèé ne tc'õóa xg'ara a ko xg'ãà, kam kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu bìrí a máá: “Sáà xg'ae péré qàmàn ẽe qaùa hãa a, naka i gha nxãasega táá cúí gúù ga nco̱iè guu,” témé.
Xu kò ẽe khóè ne ka kò tc'õóa qaùè péréan ka 12 xu q'ore xu péré qàmàn di xu tcãà, xu cg'oè, ẽe xu péré xu 5 xu koe guu a.
Eẽ ne ko khóè ne x'áís ẽem kò Jeso ba kúrúa hãa sa bóò, ka ne ko tshoa-tshoa a máá: “Tseegukagam Gaam porofitim ga Me e nqõóm koe ga ko hàà ba,” témé.
Me kò Jeso ba, hàà ne ko kgãà ka séè a x'aiga ba kúrú Me sa nxãakamaga q'ana hãa, khamam kò tcg'oaragu ne a xàbìm koe qõò.
Eẽ i ko dqòa ka xu kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu tshàam koe qõò,
a xu a síí dxòrom koe tcãà a tshàa ba tchoaba a Kaperenaume koe qõò. Ntcùú u kò ii, Me kò Jeso ba qanega hàà cgae xu ta ga hãa.
Tshàa ne kò ko̱bi-ko̱bise, kaiam tc'ãá ba kòo tc'ãá khama.
Eẽ xu ko 5 kana 6 di qáò-q'ooan khama noo kilomitaran qõò, ka xu kò Jeso ba bóò Me tshàam tc'amkg'ai koe ko náà qõò, a ko dxòrom koe cúù, ka xu kò q'ae.
Igabam kò bìrí xu a máá: “Tíí Ra a. Ke xao táá q'áò guu,” témé.
Ka xu kò dxòrom koem gha gaxu cgoa hãa sa qãè-tcaoa máána hãa, igabam kò dxòro ba ẽe xu kòo qõòm nqõóm koe kúúga síí tcãà, a síí góḿankg'ai koe téé.

Xùrikom cáḿ kas kò khóè ne dis xg'aes ẽe kò tshàam ka ncìí za hãa sa cúím dxòro ba hãa sa bóò, Me Jeso ba qanega Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu cgoa gaam koe tcãà ta ga hãa, igaba xu kò xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu cuiaga qõòa hãa sa.
Nxãaska xu kò c'ẽe xu dxòro xu Tiberia koe guua hãa xu, ẽem kò X'aiga ba péréan qãè-tcaoa máá xg'ara si xg'ae sa ntcõó a ko tc'õó qgáì qàe ka cúùse hàà.
Eẽs ko khóè ne dis xg'ae sa Jesom káà ii, xu Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu thẽé káà xu u sa bóòa q'ãa, ka ne kò dxòro xu koe tcãà a ne a Kaperenaume koe qõò, a síí Jeso ba qaa.
Eẽ ne ko tshàam ka ncìí za síí sao-xg'ae Me ka ne kò tẽè Me a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, ncẽe koe Tsi n-cáḿa hààraa?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a ne a máá: “Tseegukar ko tseeguan bìrí tu u, a ko máá: X'áí zi tu bóòa hãa domka tu qaa Te tama, igabaga tu péréan tc'õó a xg'ãà hãa domka a.

Táá méé tu kaàko tc'õoan tséé-kg'am guu, igaba méé tu chõò tamas kg'õès koe gha hãa tc'õoan tséé-kg'am, Khóèm dim Cóám gha máà tu u. Nqarim Abo ba Gam koe x'áí sa tòóa hãa
Ka ne ko nxãaska tẽè Me a máá: “Dùú sa ta gha kúrú, a nxãasega Nqarim ko tc'ẽe sa kúrú?” ta ne méé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a ne a máá: “Nqarim ko tc'ẽe sa ncẽe si i: Gaam ẽem tsééa hãam koe tu gha dtcòm̀ si i,” témé.
Ka ne kò nxãaska xo̱a Me a máá: “Dùútsa x'áí sa Tsi gha Tsáá kháé kúrú, ta nxãasega bóò a Tsáá koe dtcòm̀? Dùú sa Tsi gha kúrú?
Gatá ka xõò ga nea ko tchàa-xgóós koe Mana

Me Jeso ba bìrí ne a máá: “Tseegukar ko tseeguan bìrí tu u, a ko máá: Moshem tama me e kò ii, ẽe nqarikg'ai koe guua hãa péréan máà tu ua ba, igaba Abo Me e kò ii, ẽe tseegu di péréan nqarikg'ai koe guua hãa máà tu ua ba.
Nqarim di péréa ne Gaam ẽe nqarikg'ai koe guu a xoana hãam ga Me e khama, nqõó ba kg'õèan máàna hãa ba,” tam méé.
Ne bìrí Me a máá: “X'aigaè, ẽe péréan wèé cáḿ ka máà ta a,” témé.

Me Jeso ba bìrí ne a máá: “Tíí Ra kg'õèan dir Péré Ra a. Dìím wèém ẽe ko Tíí koe hàà ba cuiskaga xàbà hãa tite, me dìím wèém ẽe ko Tíí koe dtcòm̀ ba cuiskaga gaicara cáḿa hãa tite.
Igaba ẽer ma bìrí tua khama: bóò Tea tu hãa igaba tu qanega dtcòm̀ tama.
Wèém
Nqarikg'ai koer guu a xoana hãa, hààr gha Tíí ko tc'ẽe sa kúrú ka tamase, igaba ẽe tséé Tea hãam ko tc'ẽe sar gha hàà kúrú ka khama.
Ncẽea Gaam ẽe tséé Tea hãam ko tc'ẽes ga si i:
Ncẽea Abom ko ma tc'ẽe ga a khama: Wèém ẽe ko Cóá ba bóò, a ko Gam koe dtcòm̀ ba gha chõò tamas kg'õè sa úú. Ra gha nxãaska Tíí còo dim cáḿ ka x'ooan koe ghùi me,” tam méé.
Ne kò Juta ne tshoa-tshoa a Gam ka kg'ui-kg'uise, ncẽetam kò méé a máá: “Tíí Ra nqarikg'ai koe guu a xoana hãar Péré Ra a,” ta mééa hãa khama.

A ne a máá: “Ncẽe ba gáé Jesom tama baa, Josefam ka Cóáse ba, ncẽe xõò ba hẽé naka xõò sa hẽéthẽé khara ta q'ana hãa ba? Ntama ba gha ncẽeska máá: ‘Nqarikg'ai koer guu a xoana hãa,’ témé?” ta ne méé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a ne a máá: “Táá tu gatu ka kg'ui-kg'uise guu.
Cúí khóè ga cuiskaga Tíí koe hàà tite, Abom ncẽe tsééa óá Tea hãam kòo Tíí koe tsééa úú u ne cúí ga a, Ra gha còo dim cáḿ ka x'ooan koe ghùi ne.
Góásea i hãa porofiti xu di zi Tcgãya zi koe, a ko máá: ‘Wèéa nea gha Nqarim ka xgaa-xgaaè,’ témé. Me gha dìím wèém ẽe ko Abom koe komsana a ko Gam koe xgaa-xgaase ba Tíí koe hàà.
Cúí khóè ga Nqari ba bóò ta ga hãa, Gaam ẽe Nqarim koe guua hãam Cúím oose. Gaam Cúí ba Abo ba bóòa hãa.
Tseegukar ko tseeguan bìrí tu u, a ko máá: Gaam ẽe ko dtcòm̀ ba chõò tamas kg'õè sa úúa hãa.
Tíí Ra kg'õèan dir Péré Ra a.
Gatu ka tsgõose ga xua kò tchàa-xgóós koe Mana
Igaba nqarikg'ai koe guua hãa Péréan ga ncẽe e, ncẽe khóèan ga tc'õó, a táá x'óó o.

Tíí Ra kg'õèan dir Péré Ra a nqarikg'ai koe guua hãa Ra. Ncẽè c'ẽem khóèm kòo ncẽe Péréan tc'õó nem gha chõò tamase kg'õè. I ncẽe Péréan Tiri cgàa a, ncẽer gha nqõóm di kg'õèan di iise tcg'òó o,” tam méé.
Ne kò Juta ne xgóàse kg'ui cgoaku a máá: “Ntama ba gha ncẽem khóè ba cgàaa ba máà ta a ta tc'õó?” ta ne méé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí ne a máá: “Tseeguan kar ko tseeguan bìrí tu u, a ko máá: Khóèm dim Cóám di cgàan tu kò tc'õó tama, a tu a c'áòa ba kg'áà tama ne tu gatu koe kg'õèan úú tama.
Dìím wèém ẽe gha Tiri cgàan tc'õó, a Tiri c'áòan kg'áà ba chõò tamas kg'õè sa úúa hãa, Ra gha còo dim cáḿ ka x'ooan koe ghùi me.
Tirim cgàa baa tseegu dim tc'õo me e, i Tiri c'áòan tseegu di kg'áà gúù u khama.
Dìím wèém ẽe ko Tiri cgàan tc'õó a ko Tiri c'áòan kg'áà ba gha Tíí koe hãa, Ra gha Tíí gam koe hãa.
Eẽm ma kg'õèa hãam Abo ba ma tsééa óá Tea hãa, Ra Abom domka kg'õèa hãa, khamagam gha ma ẽe ko Tíía tc'õó Te ba Tíí domka kg'õè.
Ncẽea nqarikg'ai koe guu a xoana hãa Péréan ga a. Gatu ka tsgõose ga xua Mana
Ncẽe zi gúù zim kò ẽem kò Kaperenaume dim còrè-nquum koe hãa a ko xgaa-xgaa ka kg'ui.
Káí xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu Jesom di xu kò kóḿ Me, ka xu ko máá: “Ncẽe kg'uia nea qóḿ m. Dìína gha kóḿa q'ãa a?” témé.
Me kò Jeso ba Gam ka q'ana hãa, Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu kò gaan ka kg'ui-kg'uise sa, khamam kò tẽè xu a máá: “Ncẽes gúù sa gáé ko tshúù-tshuu tcáó xao o?
Kháé xaoa gha nta méé, ncẽè Khóèm dim Cóá ba xao kòo bóò Me ko ẽem ko kg'aia hãa koe qaò ne?
Tc'ẽe ba ko kg'õèan máàm ga Me e, me cgàa ba cúí hùi ga úú tama. Eẽr kò kg'ui cgoa tu u kg'uia nea kg'õèan ko máàm tc'ẽem koe guua hãa.

Igaba ne gatu ka c'ẽe ne hàna ncẽe dtcòm̀ tama ne,” tam méé. (Dìína dtcòm̀ tama, i gha dìín khóè ne tshàu q'oo koe tcãà Me sam kò Jeso ba tshoa-tshoases koe ga guu a q'ana hãa khama.)
Me gaia kg'ui a máá: “Gaa domkar kò bìrí tua hãa a ko máá: Cúí khóè ga Tíí koe hàà tite, ncẽè Abom kò kgoara máá a tama ne, témé,” tam méé.
Eẽm x'aèm koe guu ka ne kò káí ne xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao ne Gam di ne kháóka tòóa dìbise a táá xùri Me.
Me Jeso ba 12 xu tẽè a máá: “Gaxao igaba xaoa qõò kg'oana?” témé.
Me Simone Petere ba xo̱a Me a máá: “X'aigaè, dìín koe xae gha qõò? Tsáá Tsia chõò tama kg'õèan di kg'uian úúa hãa ka!
Dtcòm̀ xae ko, a xae a q'ana hãa Tsáá Tsia Nqarim di Tsi i sa, ncẽe Tcom-tcomsa Tsi,” tam méé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a a máá: “Tíí ga Ra gáé kò gaxao 12 xao nxárá tcg'òóa mááse tama? Igabam gaxao ka c'ẽe ba dxãwa me e,” témé.
(Jutasem, Simonem Isekariotem ka cóáse bam kòo nxàe, Jutase ba kò xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ka c'ẽe me e, igabam kò khóè ne tshàu q'oo koe hàà tcãà Me khama.)
Eẽ zi gúù zi qãá q'oo koem kò Jeso ba Galilea koe qõòa te, Juta ne
Me kò x'aèm Juta ne di zi xháì zi tshào dis kõ̱ès di ba cúù me e,
xu kò Jesom ka qõese ga xu bìrí Me a máá: “Ncẽe koe méé Tsi tcg'oa naka Tsia Jutea koe qõò, naka ne Tsari ne xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao ne síí nxãasega kúrú Tsi ko zi gúù zi bóò.
Cúí khóè ga káà a gaan di zi gúù zi gha xàìa hãase kúrú u, q'ãaè i gha sa i ko tc'ẽe ne. Gaa domka méé Tsi nqõóm koe x'áíse!” témé.
Xu kò Gam ka qõese ga xu igaba Gam koe dtcòm̀ tama khama.
Me Jeso ba bìrí xu a máá: “Tirim x'aèm qãè ba qanega hàà ta ga hãa, igaba i gaxao ka wèé x'aèan ga qãèa máá xaoa hãa.
Nqõó ba cuiskaga gaxaoa hòre xao o tite, igabam Tíía hòre Tea, cg'ãè zi tséé zi ẽem ko kúrú zir ko nxàea tseegukagu khama.
Qõò xao kõ̱ès koe gaxao ka. Tíí kam x'aè ba qanega hàà ta ga hãa khamar síí tite ke,” témé.
Ncẽetam ko méé kam kò Galilea koe qaù.
Eẽ xu ko qõese ga xu kõ̱ès koe qõò, kam kò Gam igaba thẽé xgoaba a qõò, khóè ne ka hòòè tamase igaba xàìa hãase.
Xu kò Juta xu kõ̱ès koe qaa Me a tẽè a máá: “Gaam Khóè ba nda?” témé.
Eẽ zi xg'ae zi khóè ne di zi koe i kò Gam ka káí kg'ui-kg'uisean hãa. Ne kò c'ẽe ne máá: “Qãèm khóè Me e,” témé, ne ko c'ẽe ne máá: “Eẽ ẽe, khóè nem ko ho̱àkagu,” témé.
Igaba i kò cúí khóè ga kgoarasease Gam ka kg'ui tama, Juta xu ne kòo bèe khama.
Me kò Jeso ba kõ̱ès nqáè koe tempelem koe tcãà, a xgaa-xgaa.
Ka xu kò Juta xu kaisase are a xu a tẽè a máá: “Ncẽem khóè ba ncẽe xgaa-xgaan ntama ma hòòa, ncẽe qanegam xgaa-xgaaè e tama ka?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Tiri xgaa-xgaa nea Tiri tama. Igaba i Gaam ẽe tséé Tea hãam koe guua.
Ncẽè c'ẽem khóèm kòo
Gaam ẽe ko cúíaga gam ka kg'ui ba ko dqo̱m̀kuan qaara mááse. Igaba gaam ẽe tséé mea hãam di dqo̱m̀kuan ko qaa ba tseegu di me e, i gam koe cúí cg'ãè ga káà a.
Moshe ba gáé x'áè-kg'áḿan máà tu u ta ga hãa? Gataga i ii, igaba i cúía tu ga x'áè-kg'áḿan ko méé sa kúrú tama! Dùús domka tu ko cg'õo Te tu gha sa tc'ẽe?” tam ma tẽè ne.
Si xg'ae sa xo̱a Me a máá: “Dxãwa tc'ẽean Tsi úúa hãa! Dìí na cg'õo Tsi kg'oana?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a ne a máá: “Cúís tséés are-aresa sar kò kúrú, tu kò wèéa tu ga are.

Moshe ba kò x'áè-kg'áḿan gatu di xu cóá xu tu gha q'ãe nqãa-qgai khòo di máà tua hãa, tu ko Sabata dim cáḿ ka gatu di cóán q'ãe nqãa-qgai khòo (ẽe x'áèa nea kò Moshem koe guu tama, a kò khóè xuku xu koe guua hãa igaba),

nxãasega tu gha Moshem di x'áè-kg'áḿan komsana ka. Kháé nxãaska ncẽè cóám kò ko Sabata dim cáḿ ka q'ãe nqãa-qgai khòoè, Moshem di x'áè-kg'áḿan gha táá ntcoeè ka, ne tu ko dùús domka xgóà cgae Tea máá, ncẽè Sabata dim cáḿ kar kò khóèm dim tc'áróm wèé ba qãèkagu ne?
Táá tu tcgáían di bóò-q'ooan cgoa bóòa tcg'òó guu, igaba méé tu bóòa tcg'òó qãè bóòa tcg'òóan cgoa,” tam méé.
Gaa domka ne kò c'ẽe ne khóè ne Jerusalema di ne tshoa-tshoa a tẽè a máá: “A gaam khóèm tama baa ncẽe cg'õoa ba ko qaaè ba?
Bóò tu, ncẽe gam ko kgoarasease kg'ui, igaba ne cúí gúù ga Gam ka kg'ui tama. A tseeguan kaga xu tc'ãà-cookg'ai xu ncẽem khóèm Kreste Me ii sa q'ana hãa?
Ncẽem khóèm guua hãa qgáìan ta q'ana hãa. Igaba Krestem ko hààm x'aèm ka i gha cúí khóè ga c'úùa hãa guuam hãa qgáì,” ta ne méé.

Kam kò nxãaska Jeso ba tc'amaka kg'ui, ẽem tempelem koe hãa a ko xgaa-xgaa ka a máá: “Tíí tu q'ãa Tea hãa, a tu a thẽé ẽer guua hãa qgáìan q'ana hãa. Tíí kar óágase tama, igabam ẽe tsééa óá Tea hãa ba tseegu di Me e, ncẽe tu gatu c'úùa hãa ba.
Tíí ra q'ãa Mea hãa. Gam koe gar guua hãa, Me tsééa óá Tea hãa khama,” témé.
Qgóó Me kg'oana xu kò hãa. Igaba i kò cúí khóè ga táá gaan di tshàuan tòó cgae Me, Gam dim x'aè ba kò qanega hàà tama khama.
Igaba ne kò ẽes xg'aes koe káí ne khóè ne Gam koe dtcòm̀ a ne a máá: “Krestem kò ko hàà ne ba gha hàà ncẽem khóèm kúrúa hãa zi x'áí zi nqáéa hãa zi kúrú?
Farasai xu kò khóè ne ko ma Gam ka ma kg'ui-kg'uise sa kóḿ, ka xu ko kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé naka Farasai xu hẽéthẽé tempelem di xu kòre-kg'ao xu tsééa úú, síí xu gha qgóó Me ka.
Me Jeso ba nxãaska máá: “Gatu cgoar gha qanega xòm̀ x'aè-coa ba hãa, a Ra a gha Gaam ẽe tséé Tea hãam koe ka̱bise.
Qaa Te tu gha, igaba tu hòò Te tite, a tu a ẽer hãa qgáì koe cuiskaga hàà tite,” témé.
Xu nxãaska Juta xu tẽèku a máá: “Ncẽem khóè ba gha nda koe qõò, xae gha táá hòò Me? Gatá di ne khóè ne tsa̱i-tsa̱isea hãa ne Gerika ne koe ba gha qõò, a síí Gerika ne xgaa-xgaa?
Dùú sa ba ko méé ncẽem ko máá: ‘Qaa Te tu gha, igaba tu hòò Te tite,’ a ko máá: ‘Hàna Ra gha hãa qgáì koe tu cuiskaga hàà tite,’ témé ka?” ta xu méé.
Còo dim cáḿ kõ̱ès dim kaiam kam kò Jeso ba tc'amaka kg'uia ghùi a máá: “Ncẽè c'ẽem khóèm kò cáḿa hãa ne méém Tíí koe hàà naka kg'áà.
Eẽ ko Tíí koe dtcòm̀ ba, ‘Kg'õèan di tshàan di tsgórèa ne gha ncãàa ba koe guu a ntcã̱a,’ ẽe zi ma
Eẽm kòo Jeso ba ncẽe gúùan nxàe kam kòo Tc'ẽem ka kg'ui, ẽe ko Gam koe dtcòm̀ ne gha hòò Me ka. Tc'ẽe ba
Gam di kg'uian ko kóḿse ka ne kò c'ẽe ne khóè ne máá: “Tseegukagam ncẽem khóè ba Porofiti Me e,” témé.
Ne kò c'ẽe ne máá: “Kreste Me e,” témé. Igaba ne kò c'ẽe ne tẽè a máá: “Haò! Ntama ba gha ma Kreste ba Galilea koe guu?
Tcgãya zi gáé máá: ‘Dafitem dis qhàòs koem Kreste ba guua hãa’ témé tama, Betelehema koe, Dafitem kò x'ãèa hãam x'áé ba?” ta xu ma tẽè.
Si kò Jesom domka kaias q'aa-q'aase sa khóè ne xg'aeku koe hãa.
C'ẽe nea kò qgóó Me kg'oana hãa. Igaba i kò táá cúí khóè ga gaan di tshàuan tòó cgae Me.
Ka xu kò tempelem di xu kòre-kg'ao xu
Xu kòre-kg'ao xu xo̱a a máá: “Cúí khóè ga Gam khama kg'ui ta ga hãa!” témé.
Ka xu kò Farasai xu xo̱a xu a máá: “Gaxao igaba ba gáé qàe-qae xaoa hãa?
Tc'ãà-cookg'ai xu ka c'ẽe baa, kana Farasai xu ka c'ẽem ga ba gáé Gam koe dtcòm̀aa?
Igaba ncẽe ne khóè ne, ncẽe x'áè-kg'áḿan c'úùa hãa nea cgúíèa!” ta xu méé.
Nikodemasem ncẽe kò Jesom koe kg'aia síía ba, gaxu ka c'ẽe kò ii ba, nxãa ba kò bìrí xu a máá:
“Gaxae dim x'áè-kg'áḿ ba koáé kuri khóèan xgàra, dùú sa i ko gaan koe kúrú sa kg'aia kóḿ tamase?” témé.
