Xu xo̱a me a máá: “Tsáá igaba tsi gáé Galilea di tsia?
[Me kò wèém khóè ba x'áéa ba koe ka̱bise.
Kam ko Jeso ba Olife dim xàbìm koe qõò.
Me kò ntcùúkg'ai cgoa gaicara tempelem koe síí, i kò wèé khóèan ga síí cgae Me, Me ntcõó a xgaa-xgaa ne.
Xu kò x'áè xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao xu hẽé naka Farasai xu hẽéthẽé khóès hãa a ko cg'áràn kúrú koe qgóóèa sa óá. A xu a hàà khóè ne cookg'ai koe tòó si.
A xu a bìrí Me a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, khóès ncẽe sa cg'árà nes hãa a ko kúrú koe qgóóèa.
Igabam kò Moshe x'áèan máà ta a, ncẽeta ii zi khóè zi méé zi nxõ̱án cgoa xg'áḿa cg'õoè di i, ka Tsi ko Tsáá nta méé?” témé.

Ncẽem kg'ui ba xu kò ko kg'ui, qáé Me xu gha qgáìan xu kò ko qaa khama, a xu a ko chìbi-chibi Me xu gha zi dàò-kg'áḿ zi qaa. Kam ko Jeso ba qám̀se, a tshàua ba cgoa góḿankg'ai koe góá.
Qanega xu hãa a ko tẽè Me kam ko tẽe a bìrí xu a máá: “Ncẽè c'ẽem khóèm káà chìbi iim kò gaxao xg'aeku koe hãa, ne méém tc'ãà naka nxõ̱á sa séè naka xao si,” témé.
A ba a gaicara qám̀se a góḿankg'ai koe góá.
Ncẽe sa xu ko kóḿ ka xu kò kaia xu koe guu a tshoa-tshoa a cúímana-cúí tcg'oara qõò. Me Jesom cúím ga ba síí qaù, naka gaas khóè sa hẽéthẽé e, si qanega gaa koe téé-tẽe.
Me Jeso tẽe a ba a tẽè si a máá: “Khóè seè, nda xua? Ncãa i gáé cúí khóè ga táá chìbi bóò si?” témé.

Si máá: “Ncãa i táá cúí khóè ga chìbi bóò te, X'aigaè,” témé. Me Jeso ba máá: “Nxãaskar Tíí igaba cúí gúù kaga chìbi bóò si tama, ke qõò, naka sia ncẽe koe guus ka táá gaicara chìbi kúrú guu,” témé.]

Me Jeso ba gaicara khóè ne cgoa kg'ui a máá: “Tíí Ra nqõóm dir X'áà Ra a. Dìím wèém ẽe gha xùri Te ba ntcùúan q'oo koe qõòa hãa tite, igabam gha kg'õèan di x'áàn úúa hãa,” témé.
Xu kò Farasai xu bìrí Me a máá: “Tsáá ka Tsi ko nxàea tseegukagu, khamas Tsáá ko Tsáá ka nxàea tseegukagu sa tchàno tama,” témé.

Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Tíí kar kò nxàea tseegukagu igabagas tiris nxàea tseegukagu sa tchàno si i, ẽer guua hãa qgáìa ner q'ana hãa, a Ra a gataga ẽer ko qõò qgáìan q'ana hãa. Igabaga xao gaxao ẽer guua hãa qgáìan hẽé, naka Ra ko qõò qgáìan hẽéthẽé c'úùa hãa khama.
Gaxaoa ko tc'áró ba xgàra, Tíí Ra cúí khóè ga xgàra tama.
Igaba ncẽè xgàrar kò ne i xgàra-q'ooa Te tchàno o, Tíí Ra Tíí ka cúíse xgàra tama khama, igaba Ra Abom ncẽe tsééa óá Tea hãam cgoa hãa.
Gaxao di x'áèan koe i góásea hãa a ko máá: ‘Cám̀ khóèan dis nxàea tseegukagu sa cgáé si i,’ téméè.
Gaas ẽe Tíí ka tseegu ii sar kò Tíía nxàea tseegukagu. Me ko gataga thẽé Abom ncẽe tsééa óá Tea hãa ba Tíí ka nxàea tseegukagu,” tam méé.
Xu nxãaska tẽè Me a máá: “Saò ba nda?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “C'úù Te xao hãa, a xao a Abom ga ba c'úùa hãa, a ncẽè q'ãa Tea xao kò hãa ne xao ga ko thẽé Abom ga ba q'ana hãa,” tam méé.
Jeso ba kò ncẽe kg'uian tempelem q'oo koem hãase kg'ui, aban ko tòóèm qgáìm qàe koe. Igaba i kò táá cúí khóè ga qgóó Me, Gam dim x'aè ba kò qanega hàà tama khama.
Me kò Jeso ba gaicara bìrí xu a máá: “Qõò Ra ko, xao gha qaa Te, a xao a gha gaxao di zi chìbi zi q'oo koe ga x'óó. Tíí ko qõò koe xao cuiskaga síí tite,” témé.
Xu nxãaska Juta xu tẽèku a máá: “Cg'õose ba gha? Ncẽem ko máá: ‘Tíí ko qõò koe xao cuiskaga síí tite’ témé ka?” témé.
Me bìrí xu a máá: “Gaxaoa nqãaka di xao o, Ra Tíí tc'amaka di Ra a; ncẽem nqõóm di xao o, Ra Tíí ncẽem nqõóm di tama.

Gaa domkar kò bìrí xao o, a ko máá: ‘Gaxao di chìbian koe ga xao gha x'óó,’ témé. Ncẽè Tíí Ra gaar ga Ra a tar ko méé sa xao ko dtcòm̀ tama, ne xao gha tseeguan kaga gaxao di chìbian koe x'óó,” tam méé.
Xu bìrí Me a máá: “Kháé Tsi Tsáá dìí Tsia?” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí xu a máá: “Ncẽer kò ma tshoa-tshoas koe guu a bìrí xao o khama cúí ga Ra ko méé.
Káí zi gúù zi Ra úúa hãa bóòa Ra ga tcg'òó a gaxao ka nxàe zi, igaba Gaam ẽe tsééa óá Tea ba tseegu di Me e, Ra ko ẽer kò Gam koe kóḿ sa nqõó ba bìrí,” tam méé.
Xõòm kam kò ko kg'ui cgoa xu sa xu kò kóḿa q'ãa tama.

Kam ko nxãaska Jeso ba bìrí xu a máá: “Eẽ xao ko Khóèm dim Cóá ba tc'amaka ghùia xg'ara, ne xao gha nxãwa q'ãa Gaar ga Ra a sa, a Tíí ka cúíse gúù zi kúrú tama, igaba Ra ko Abom ma xgaa-xgaa Tea hãa khama ma kg'ui.
Me Gaam ẽe tséé Tea hãa ba Tíí cgoa hãa, a cúíse guu Te ta ga hãa, wèé x'aè kar ko ẽe ko qãè-tcaokagu Me sa kúrú khama,” tam méé.
Ncẽe gúùa nem ko nxàe ka i ko káí khóèan Gam koe dtcòm̀.
Me Jeso ba nxãaska Gam koe ko dtcòm̀a ne Juta ne bìrí a máá: “Tirim kg'ui ba tu kò ko komsana a ko qgóó qari me, ne tu gha tseegukaga Tiri tu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao tu ii.
A tu a gha nxãaska tseeguan q'ãa, i gha tseeguan kgoara tu u,” témé.
Ne xo̱a Me a máá: “Abrahamam di ta cóá ta a, a ta a qanega c'ẽe khóè di qãà kúrú ta ga hãa, ka Tsi nta méé-q'ooa, ncẽe Tsi ko máá, kgoarasea ta gha hãa, témé ka?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a ne a máá: “Tseegukar ko tseeguan bìrí tu u, a ko máá: Dìím wèém ẽe ko chìbian kúrú ba chìbian dim qãà me e.
Me qãà ba chõò tamase x'áé koe hẽé tama, igabam ko cóá ba chõò tamase x'áé koe hẽé.
Gaa domkaga tu gha, ẽem ko Cóá ba kgoara tu u, ne tseeguan kaga kgoarasea hãa.
Abrahamam di tu cóá tu u sar q'ana hãa, igaba tu cg'õo Te kg'oana hãa, Tirim kg'ui ba tcáóa tu q'oo koe x'ãè-q'ooan úú tama khama.
“Tirim Xõòm koer bóòa hãa zi gúù zi kar ko kg'ui, tu ko gatu, gatu ka xõò ga xu koe tu kóḿa hãa zi kúrú,” tam méé.
Ne xo̱a Me a máá: “Gatá ka xõò ba Abrahama me e,” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí ne a máá: “Ncẽe Abrahamam di tu cóá tu kò ii ne tu ga ko Abrahamam ko kúrú zi kúrú.
Igaba tu ncẽeska cg'õo Te kg'oana, Tíí ncẽe Nqarim koer kóḿa tseeguan kò bìrí tu ur khóè Ra. Abrahama ba kò ẽeta ii gúù kúrú tama.
Gatu ka xõò ga xu kòo kúrú zi gúù zi tu ko kúrú,” tam méé.
Ne bìrí Me a máá: “Sita cg'áràn di ta cóá ta tama ta a; sita dim Xõòm cúím úúa ta hãa ba Nqari Me e,” témé.

Me Jeso ba bìrí ne a máá: “Ncẽè Nqarim kò gatu ka Xõò ba ii, ne tu ga kò ncàm̀ Tea hãa, Nqarim koe Ra guu a hààraa khama. Tiri qarian kar ncẽe koe hàà tama, igabam Gabá tsééa óá Tea hãa.
Dùús domka tua ẽer ko kg'ui sa kóḿa q'ãa tama? Eẽr ko kg'uis kóḿ ka tu ko tààè domka a.

Gatua gatu ka xõòm dxãwam di tu cóá tu u, a tu a gatu ka xõòm ko tc'ẽe zi gúù zi kúrú kg'oana. Tshoa-tshoases kagam kò cg'õo-kg'ao me e, a ba a tseeguan cgoa tchõà úú tama, tseegua nem úú tama khama. Ncẽe tshúù-ntcõan ábà cgoaèa hãa khamam ko ma kg'ui ii ba. Tshúù-ntcõa-kg'ao me e, a tshúù-ntcõan ka xõò me e khama.
Igabar ko Tíí tseeguan nxàe, domka tu Tíí koe dtcòm̀ tama.
Ndaka kg'áía tu ga chìbiga Ra a sa x'áí? Ncẽè tseegua ner kò ko nxàe, ne tu kháé nxãaska dùús domka dtcòm̀ Te tama?
Gaam ẽe Nqarim di ba ko Nqarim di kg'uian komsana, igaba tu gatu Nqarim di tama, gaa domkaga tu komsana a tama,” tam méé.
Xu Juta xu xo̱a Me a máá: “Tseegu tama xae gáé kò hãa ncẽe xae kòo máá: ‘Samaria di Tsi i, a Tsi a dxãwa tc'ẽean úúa hãa,’ témé ka,” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a a máá: “Dxãwa tc'ẽea ner úú tama, igabaga Ra Abo ba tcoma hãa, xao ko gaxao Tíí ntcoe Te.
Tíí Ra Tíí ka dqo̱m̀kuan qaara mááse tama, igabagam qaa a ko ba hàna, ncẽe gha xgàra ba.
Tseegukar ko tseeguan bìrí tu u, a ko máá: Dìím wèém ẽe gha Tirim kg'ui ba qgóóa qari ba chõò tamase x'óóa hãa tite, témé,” tam méé.

Xu kò Juta xu nxãaska bìrí Me a máá: “Dxãwa tc'ẽean Tsi úúa hãa sa xae ncẽeska q'ana hãa. Abrahama ba x'óóa, xu porofiti xu thẽé x'óóa hãa, igabaga Tsi ko Tsáá máá, dìím wèém ẽe ko Tsari kg'uian qgóóa qari ba chõò tamase x'óóan xám̀ tite, témé.
Gaxae ka xõòm Abrahamam ka Tsi Tsáá kaia? X'óóam hãa, xu gataga thẽé porofiti xu x'óóa hãa. Ka Tsi gáé Tsáá tc'ẽea máá, dìí cgáé Tsi ii, ta tc'ẽea?” ta xu méé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Ncẽè Tíí kòo dqo̱m̀se, ne i Tiri dqo̱m̀sean káà hùi i. Tíí ko dqo̱m̀ Te ba Abo Me e, ncẽe gaxao ko máá, gatu dim Nqari Me e, témé ba.
Igabaga xao c'úù Mea, Ra Tíí q'ãa Mea. Ncẽè c'úù Mea Ra hãa tar kòo méé ner nxãaska tshúù-ntcõa-kg'ao Ra a, gaxao khamaga ma. Igabaga Ra q'ãa Mea, a Ra a ko kg'uia ba qgóóa qari.
Gaxao ka xõòm Abrahama ba kò Tirim cáḿ bam ko hàà bóò khama qãè-tcaoa hãa, a kò bóò me a qãè-tcao,” tam méé.
Xu nxãaska Juta xu bìrí Me a máá: “Qanega Tsi 50 kuri ga úú tama, igaba Tsi Abrahama ba bóòa hãa dèe?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Tseegukar ko tseeguan bìrí xao o, a ko máá: Abrahamam ko ábàès cookg'ai koe, Ra hàna,” témé.
Ka xu ko nxõ̱án sáà, xao Me xu gha ka, igabam ko Jeso ba tempelem q'oo koe ts'ana tcg'oa a qõò.
Eẽm Jeso ba xóé a ko qõò kam kò káà tcgáíse ábàèa hãam khóèm cgoa xg'ae.

Ka xu kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu tẽè Me a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, dìín chìbi domka ba káà tcgáíse ábàèa? Gaam chìbia kana xõòa ba dia, ncẽe kúrú mem káà tcgáíse ábàèa hãa?” témé.

Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Ncẽem khóèm chìbi tama a, gataga xõòa ba di chìbi tama a, igabagas ncẽe sa kúrúse cgae mea hãa, nxãasega i gha Nqarim di qarian bóòè a ko gam koe tséé ka.
Qanega i koaba di x'aè e, ka méé xae ncẽe tsééa óá Tea hãam di tsééan kúrú, ntcùúa nea ko hàà ke, ncẽe cúí khóè ga tséé tite e.
Eẽr qanega nqõóm koe hãa x'aè kar nqõóm dir X'áà Ra a,” tam méé.
Ncẽe zi gúù zim ko kg'uia xg'ara kam kò góḿankg'ai koe tcg'ae, a kg'áḿ-tsharà ba cgoa tco̱àn kúrú a gaa tco̱àn khóèm tcgáí koe tcgáù,

a ba a gaam khóè ba bìrí a máá: “Qõò, naka tsia síí Siloame dim tèbem koe xg'aà-kg'ai,” témé. (Ncẽem kg'uim Siloame di ba ko máá ‘Tsééa úúèa’ témé.) Me ko qõò a síí xg'aà-kg'ai, a ba a ka̱bisem ko ka ko bóò.

X'áé qàea ba di ne khóè ne hẽé, naka kg'áíga kò ko bóò me, me ko dtcàrà ne hẽéthẽéa kò tẽèse a máá: “Ncẽea gáé gaam khóèm xg'ao ko káíse ntcõóa te a ko dtcàràm tama baa?” témé.
C'ẽe ne kò máá: “Gaam ga me e,” témé, ne ko c'ẽe ne máá: “Eẽ ẽe, kg'ama tsara tc'ẽèkua hãa,” témé. Me kò gaam khóè ba máá: “Tíí ga ra a,” témé.
Ne tẽè me a máá: “Kháé i nxãaska tcgáía tsi ntama ma xgobekg'ammèa?” témé.

Me xo̱a ne a máá: “Jeso ta ko ma tciièm Khóè ba kò tco̱àn kúrú a tcgáía te tcgáù, a bìrí te a máá, síí méér Siloame dim tèbem koe xg'aà-kg'ai, témé, ra síí xg'aà-kg'ai, a gaa koe ga bóò,” témé.
Ne tẽè me a máá: “Gaam khóè ba nda?” témé. Me xo̱a ne a máá: “C'úùa ra hãa,” témé.
Ka ne ko gaam khóèm ẽe kò káà tcgáíse ábàèa hãa ba séè a Farasai xu koe úú.
Nxãaskam kò, gaam cáḿ ẽem kò Jeso ba tco̱àn kúrú, a khóè ba xgobekg'am tcgáí ba Sabata di me e.
Ka xu ko Farasai xu khóè ba tẽè, ntama i ma qõòa hãa me ko bóò sa. Me xo̱a xu a máá: “Tco̱à nem kò tcgáía te koe tcgáù, ra síí xg'aà-kg'ai, a kò gaa koe ga guu a bóò,” témé.

Xu kò c'ẽe xu Farasai xu máá: “Ncẽem Khóè ba Nqarim koe guu tama, Sabata dim cáḿ bam qgóóa qari tama khama,” témé. Xu c'ẽe xu máá: “Ntama ba ga ma chìbi-kg'ao ba ncẽeta ii zi x'áí zi kúrú?” témé. Xu kò tc'ẽe-kg'áḿ zi koe q'aara hãa.
Ka xu ko ka̱bise a gaicara ẽe kò káà tcgáí ii ba bìrí a máá: “Xgobekg'am tcgáí tsia baa ka tsi ko tsáá Gam ka nta méé?” témé. Me xo̱a xu a máá: “Porofiti Me e,” témé.
Xu kò Juta xu qanega dtcòm̀ tama, káà tcgáí me e kò ii, a ba a kúrúè a ko ncẽeska bóò sa, khama xu khóèan tséé i síí xõò ga khara tcii.
A hàà tẽè khara a, a máá: “Ncẽea gakhao dim cóám ga baa, ncẽe kò koma káà tcgáíse ábàèa hãa ba? Kháé nxãaska i ntama ma qõòa hãa me ko ncẽeska bóò?” témé.
Khara xõò ga khara xo̱a xu a máá: “Sikham dim cóá me e sa kham q'ana hãa, a kham a gataga q'ana hãa, káà tcgáísem ábàèa hãa sa.

Igaba kham gakham ntama i ma qõòa hãa me ko ncẽeska bóò sa c'úùa hãa, naka dìín xgobekg'am tcgáí mea hãas ga sa hẽéthẽé e. Ke xao gaxao tẽèa mááse me, kuria ba tc'ãòa hãa, me gha xo̱ara mááse xao o ke,” témé.

Khara kò xõò ga khara ncẽeta ma xo̱a, Juta xu khara kòo bèe khama. Nxãakamaga xu kò kg'uia xg'ara hãa, ncẽè c'ẽem khóèm kò nxàea tseegukagu Jeso ba Kreste Me e sa, ne i gha gaa khóèan còrè-nquum koe xhàiaguè sa khama.
Gaa domka khara kò ko xõò ga khara máá: “Kuria ba tc'ãòa hãa, ke méé xu tẽè me,” témé.
Xu cám̀ dis ka gaam khóèm ẽe kò káà tcgáí ii ba tcii, a xu a bìrí me a máá: “Nqari ba dqo̱m̀

Me xo̱a xu a máá: “Chìbi-kg'ao ba ga ii kana ba ga chìbi-kg'ao tama sar tíí c'úùa hãa. Cúís gúùs tíí q'ana hãa saà: káà tcgáí ra a kò ii, igaba ra ko ncẽeska bóò si i,” témé.
Xu tẽè me a máá: “Dùú sa ba kò kúrú cgae tsi? Ntama ba kò ma tcgáía tsi xgobekg'am?” témé.

Me xo̱a xu a máá: “Ncãar nxãakamaga bìrí xao o, xao ncãa táá kóḿ te, ka xaoa ko dùús domka gaicara kóḿan gaan di qaa? Kana xaoa Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu kúrúse kg'oana thẽé?” témé.
Xu xhóré me a máá: “Tsáá tsia Gam di tsi xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao tsi i! Sixaea Moshem di xae xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xae e.
Nqarim xg'ao Moshem cgoa kg'ui sa xae q'ana hãa, igaba ncẽem Khóèm ka xae ndam guua sa c'úùa hãa,” témé.
Me khóè ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Cg'ãèse i are-aresa a, Me guua hãa qgáìan ga xao c'úùa hãa, igabagam xgobekg'am tcgáí tea hãa khama.
Nqari ba chìbi-kg'ao ne komsana tama sa ta q'ana hãa: igaba ncẽè c'ẽem khóèm kòo Nqari ba dqo̱m̀, a ko Gam ncàm̀a hãa sa kúrú, nem ko Nqari ba komsana me.
Xg'aom kò ntcõó a nqõó ba tshoa-tshoase ne ta qanega kóḿ naka i máá, dìím ga ba khóèm káà tcgáíse ábàèa ba xgobekg'am tcgáía hãa téméè ta ga hãa.
Ncẽem Khóèm kò Nqarim koe guu tama nem ga kò cúí gúù ga kúrú tama!” tam méé.
Xu gaa kg'uian ncẽe tc'amkg'ai koe xo̱a me a máá: “Chìbian q'oo koe tsi ábàèa, ka tsi tsáá dùú sa xgaa-xgaa xae e kg'oana?” témé. A xu a tchàa koe xhàiagu me.
Jeso ba kò gaam khóè ba xu xhàiagua hãa sa kóḿ, ẽem ko hòò me kam kò tẽè me a máá: “Khóèm dim Cóám koe tsia ko dtcòm̀?” témé.
Me gaam khóè ba tẽè Me a máá: “Kháé dìí baa, X'aigaè? Bìrí te Me nakar gha nxãasega Gam koe dtcòm̀!” témé.
Me Jeso ba máá: “Ncẽe tsi ko bóò, Me ko tsáá cgoa kg'ui ba, Gaam ga Me e,” témé.
Kam kò khóè ba máá: “Dtcòm̀r ko, X'aigaè,” témé, a cookg'aia ba koe cg'áé a dqo̱m̀ Me.
Me Jeso ba máá: “Xgàrar gha domkar ncẽem nqõóm koe hààraa, nxãasega ne gha ẽe káà tcgáí ne bóò, ne ẽe ko bóò ne káàn tcgáí ka,” témé.
Xu c'ẽe xu Farasai xu ẽem kòo ncẽe gúùan nxàe ka kò hãa cgoa mea xu kóḿ, a xu a tẽè Me a máá: “Dùú dèe? Sixae igaba xae thẽé káà tcgáí xaea dèe?” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí xu a máá: “Káà tcgáí xao kò ii ne xao ga ko ncẽeska chìbi úú tama. Igaba xao tcgáíga xao o sa bìrísea hãa, khama i gha gaxao di chìbian gataga ma hãa cgoa xao o.

“Tseegukar ko tseeguan bìrí tu u, a ko máá: Khóèm ẽe ghùu zi dis xgàris-kg'áḿ koe tcãà tama a ko nqurì si, kana c'ẽem dàòm ka q'ooa sa koe tcãà ba ts'ãà-kg'ao me e, a cg'ãè kúrú-kg'ao me e.
Igaba gaam ẽe ko xgàris-kg'áḿ koe tcãà ba ghùu zi dim kòre-kg'ao me e.
Xgàris-kg'áḿ ko xgobekg'am ba ko gaam ghùu kòre-kg'ao ba xgobekg'ama máá, zi ghùu zi kg'ui-q'ooa ba kóḿ, me gam di zi ghùu zi cg'õèa zi ka tcii, a tc'ãà-cookg'ai zi.
Eẽm kò gam di zi wèéa zi tcg'òóa xg'ara nem ko tc'ãà-cookg'ai zi, zi ghùu zi xùri me, kg'ui-q'ooa ba zi q'ana hãa khama.
Igaba zi cuiskaga tãám khóè ba xùri tite, a gha bèe me a qgóé, tãá khóèan di kg'ui-q'ooan zi c'úùa hãa khama,” tam méé.
Jeso ba kò ncẽes sere-sere sa gaxu koe tséékagu, igaba xu kò ẽem ko bìrí xu sa táá kóḿa q'ãa.
Kam ko nxãaska Jeso ba gaicara máá: “Tseegukar ko tseeguan bìrí xao o, a ko máá: Tíí Ra ghùu zi dir Xgàri-kg'áḿ Ra a.
Wèé xu ẽe kò Tíí ka tc'ãà a hàà xua ts'ãà-kg'ao xu u, a cg'ãè kúrú-kg'ao xu u, igaba zi kò ghùu zi táá komsana xu.
Tíí Ra Xgàri-kg'áḿ Ra a. Dìím wèém ẽe ko Tíí koe tcãà ba gha kgoaraè, a ba a gha tcãà a tcg'oa a gha dxòó-q'ooan hòò.

Ts'ãà-kg'ao ba kg'amaga hàà tama, a ts'ãà sa hẽé naka cg'õo sa hẽé naka ko̱be sa hẽéthẽé cúíga hààraa máána. Ra Tíí hààraa, nxãasega ne gha kg'õèan úú ka, a gataga kaisase úú u ka.
“Tíí ra qãèr ghùu Kòre-kg'ao Ra a. Me ko qãèm Kòre-kg'ao ba gam di kg'õèan ghùu zi tcg'òóa máá.

Gaam ẽe ghùu zi kòre dis tséés koe tcãàèa ba ghùu kòre-kg'aom tama me e, a ba a ghùu zi ka q'õòsem tama me e, ẽem ko ncuutshaan bóò i ko hàà nem ko ghùu zi guu a qgóé, me ncuutshaa ba hàà ntcàu zi a tsa̱i-tsa̱ia q'aa zi khama.
Ghùu zi kòre di tsééan máàèam khóè ba ko guu zi a qgóé. Kg'amagam máàèa hãa tséé e, khamam tchõà úú cgoa zi tama.
“Tíí ra qãèr Kòre-kg'ao Ra a, a Ra a Tiri zi ghùu zi q'ana, zi Tiri zi ghùu zi q'ãa Tea,
ncẽem ma Abo ba ma q'ãa Tea, Ra gataga Tíí ma q'ãa Mea khamaga ma. Ra ko Tiri kg'õèan ghùu zi tcg'òóa máá.

C'ẽe zi ghùu zir úúa hãa, ncẽem xgàrim-q'oo di tama zi. Gataga méér óága zi thẽés gúù si i, naka zi hàà kg'ui-q'ooa Te kóḿ naka zia ncẽe zi ghùu zi cgoa xg'ae naka cúí zi ghùu zi dis xg'ae sa kúrú, cúím kòre-kg'aom di zi.
“Ncẽes gúùs kam Abo ba ncàm̀ Tea, Tiri kg'õèa ner ghùu zi tcg'òóa máána hãa khama, nxãasegar gha gaicara séèa ka̱bi i ka.
Khóèm Tíí koe gha
Eẽ xu ko Juta xu ncẽe kg'uian kóḿ ka xu kò tc'ẽe-kg'áḿ zi koe gaicara q'aa.
Káí-kg'áía ne kò máá: “Dxãwa tc'ẽea nem úúa, a temea, ka ba ko dùús domka kóḿmè?” témé.
Igaba ne kò c'ẽe ne máá: “Ncẽe zi gúù zi ga táá dxãwa tc'ẽean ka tcãàèam khóèm ka mééè. Dxãwa ba káà tcgáím khóè bam ga xgobekg'am tcgáí di qarian úúa hãa ii?” témé.
Me x'aè ba tcãà, si tempelem ko ka̱ba-ka̱baè dis kõ̱è sa xóé Jerusalema dim x'áém koe. Sao di x'aè e kò ii.
Me kò Jeso ba tempelem koe hãa a ko caate, Solomonem dis xàò-xao sa ta ko ma tciiès xào-xaos koe.
Ka ne ko Juta ne Gam koe hààraa xg'ae, a nxa̱ma-nxa̱ma Me a máá: “Nta noo x'aèan Tsi ko hàà séè a ghùia tòó ta a? Ncẽè Kreste Tsi kò ii
Me Jeso ba xo̱a ne a máá: “Bìrí tu ur kò, igabaga tu kò táá dtcòm̀. Tséé zi ncẽer ko Abom cg'õè cgoa kúrú zia ko Tíí ka nxàea tseegukagu,
igaba tu dtcòm̀ tama, Tiri tu ghùu tu tama tu u khama.
Tiri zi ghùu zia ko kg'ui-q'ooa Te kóḿ, Ra q'ãa zia, zi ko xùri Te.
Chõò tama kg'õèa ner ko máà zi, zi chõò tamase kaà tite, i cúí khóè ga tshàu q'ooa Te koe séèa tcg'òó zi tite.
Abom ncẽe máà Te zia hãa ba wèé gúùan kaga kaia, i cúí khóè ga Abom tshàu q'oo koe séèa tcg'òó zia hãa tite.
Tíí hẽé naka Abo ba hẽéthẽé Tsama cúí Tsam m,” tam méé.
Ka ne ko Juta ne gaicara nxõ̱á zi sáà, xao Me ne gha ka,
igabam kò Jeso ba xo̱a ne a máá: “Káí zi tséé zi qãè zi Ra x'áí tua, Abom koe guua hãa zi. Ka tua ko gazi xg'aeku koe ndakas domka nxõ̱án cgoa xao Te?” témé.
Ne Juta ne xo̱a Me a máá: “C'ẽes tséés qãès domka ta xao Tsi tama, igaba Tsi ko Nqari ba cóè domka a, kg'ama Tsi khóè Tsi i, igaba Tsi ko Nqari Tsi ii khama ma séèse domka a,” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a ne a máá: “Gatu di X'áèan koe i gáé ncẽeta ma góásea naka máá: ‘Gatu kar ko máá: nqárì tu u,’ témé tama?
Eẽ
ne tua nxãaska gatu dìí tua ncẽe ko máá, Nqari bar ko cóè témé tu, Nqarim dir Cóá Ra a tar ko méé domka, Tíí ncẽe Abom nxárá tcg'òó, a nqõómkg'ai koe tsééa óá Ra!
Ncẽè Abom di zi tséé zir kò kúrú tama ne méé tu nxãaska táá Tíí koe dtcòm̀ guu.

Igaba ncẽè kúrú zir kòo, igaba tu kò Tíí koe dtcòm̀ tama ne méé tu nxãaska ẽer ko kúrú zi tséé zi koe dtcòm̀, naka tua gha nxãasega q'ãa naka kóḿa q'ãa, Abom Tíí koe hãa, Ra Tíía Gam koe hãa sa,” tam méé.
Ne gaicara qgóó Me ne gha sa tc'ẽe, Me tcg'oaragu ne.
Me nxãaska Jeso ba Jorotanem ka ncìí za ka xòèa ba koe ka̱bise, Johanem kò ko kg'aika khóè ne tcguù-tcguum qgáìm koe, a ba a síí gaa koe hãa.
Ne káí ne khóè ne Gam koe síí a ne a máá: “Johane ba xg'ao táá c'ẽes x'áís ga sa kúrú, igabam xg'ao ncẽem Khóèm ka bìrí ta a zi gúù zi wèé zia tseegu zi i,” témé.
Ne kò ẽem qgáìm koe káí ne khóè ne Jesom koe dtcòm̀.
Nxãaskam kò c'ẽem khóèm Lasaro ta ko ma tciiè ba ko tsàa, Betania koe guua ba, Maria sa hẽé naka gas ka káíkhoes Mareta sa hẽéthẽé sara dim x'áé-coa ba.
Ncẽes Maria sa gaas ncẽe kò X'aigam
Ka sara kò nxãaska khóè qõeku sara Jesom koe kg'uian tsééa úú, a máá: “X'aigaè, ẽe Tsi ncàm̀a hãa ba ko tsàa,” témé.
Eẽm ko ncẽe sa kóḿ, kam kò Jeso ba máá: “Ncẽes tcìì sa cuiskaga cg'õo mea hãa tite, igabas Nqari ba dqo̱m̀ di si i, nxãasegam gha Nqarim dim Cóá ba dqo̱m̀mè ka,” témé.
Me kò Jeso ba Mareta sa hẽé naka qõese sa hẽé naka Lasaro ba hẽéthẽé ncàm̀a.
Khama ẽem ko Lasaro ba ko tsàa sa kóḿ, kam kò cám̀ cáḿ tsara hãa ẽem ko hãam qgáìm koe.
A ba a nxãaska Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu bìrí a máá: “Hàà naka xae Jutea koe gaicara ka̱bise,” témé.
Xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu bìrí Me a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè, Juta ne ncãaga nxõ̱án cgoa xao Tsi kg'oana, igaba Tsia ko gaicara gaa koe ga ka̱bise?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a a máá: “Cáḿ ba gáé 12 aoaran úú tama? Koaba ka ko qõòm khóè ba cuiskaga cg'áéa hãa tite, ncẽem nqõóm di x'áà nem ko bóò khama.
Igaba ncẽè khóèm kò ko ntcùúan q'oo koe qõò nem ko cg'áé, x'áà nem úú tama khama,” tam méé.
Ncẽetam ko mééa xg'ara kam kò bìrí xu a máá: “Gaxae ka c'ẽem Lasaro ba x'óm̀a hãa, Ra ko gaa koe síí tc'oman koe ghùi me,” témé.
Xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu bìrí Me a máá: “X'aigaè, x'óm̀am kò hãa nem gha qãè,” témé.
Me kò Jeso ba x'óóam hãa sa nxàe, igaba xu kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu tc'ẽea máá, tc'oman ncẽe tseegu di Gam ko nxàe, ta tc'ẽea.
Kam kò nxãaska Jeso ba tchànose bìrí xu a máá: “Lasaro ba x'óóa hãa.
Ra gaxao domka qãè-tcaoa, káà ra a kò ii khama, nxãasega xao gha dtcòm̀ ka. Igaba hàà naka xae síí cgae me,” tam méé.
Kam kò Tomase
Eẽm ko Jeso ba hàà kam ko hàà sao-xg'ae, me Lasaro ba nxãakamaga 4 cáḿan tc'ám̀s q'oo koe úúa hãa.
(Nxãaska i kò Jerusalema koe guu a Betania koe síían 3 kilomitara khama noo.
Ne kò káí ne Juta ne hààraa, hàà ne gha Mareta sa hẽé naka Maria sa hẽéthẽé sara qgài-qgai tcáó ka, gasara ka káíkhoem di x'ooan koe.)
Eẽs ko Mareta sa Jesom ko hàà sa kóḿ kas kò tcg'oa a síí xg'ae cgoa Me, si kò Maria sa nquum q'oo koe hãa.
Si kò Mareta sa Jeso ba bìrí a máá: “X'aigaè, thuu Tsi kò ncẽe koe hãa nem ga kò tíí kíí ba x'óóa hãa tama.
Ra ncẽeskaga igaba q'anaa, wèés gúùs ẽe Tsi ko Nqarim koe dtcàrà sam gha Nqari ba máà Tsi sa,” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí si a máá: “Sáá kíí ba gha x'ooan koe tẽe,” témé.
Si Mareta sa xo̱a Me a máá: “Q'ana ra hãa me gha x'ooan koe tẽe, còo dim cáḿ x'ooan koe i ko tẽeèm ka,” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí si a máá: “Tíí Ra x'ooan koe Tẽe Ra a, a Ra a Kg'õè Ra a. Gaam ẽe ko x'óó igaba ko Tíí koe dtcòm̀ ba gha kg'õè,
me dìím wèém ẽe kg'õèa hãa a ko Tíí koe dtcòm̀ ba cuiskaga x'óó tite. Ncẽe sa sia ko dtcòm̀?” tam méé.
Si bìrí Me a máá: “Eè, X'aigaè, dtcòm̀ ra ko Kreste Tsi i sa, Nqarim di Tsi Cóá Tsi, ncẽe kòo nqõómkg'ai koe hàà Tsi,” témé.
Ncẽe zi gúù zis ko nxàea xg'ara kas kò qõò a síí qõeses Maria sa dxùukg'ai koe tciia tcg'òó a bìrí si a máá: “Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao ba ncãa hàà, a ko tcii si,” témé.
Eẽs ko ncẽe sa kóḿ kas kò qháése tẽe a síí cgae Me.
Nxãaskam kò Jeso ba qanega x'áé-coam koe tcãà ta ga hãa, igabam kò Maretas ncãa xg'ae cgoa Me koe ga qanega tẽe.

Eẽ kò Marias cgoa nquu q'oo koe hãa a ko qgài-qgai tcáó si ne Juta ne ko bóò, si ma qháése tẽe a tcg'oara hãa sa, ka ne kò còò si, tc'ám̀s koes ko síí hãa a kg'ae, ta ne kò tc'ẽea khama.

Eẽs ko Maria sa Jesom hãas qgáìs koe síí, a ko bóò Me kas kò nqàrè-kg'ama ba koe cg'áé a máá: “X'aigaè, thuu Tsi kò ncẽe koe hãa nem ga kò tíí kíí ba x'óóa hãa tama,” témé.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba bóò sis ko kg'ae, naka ẽe kò xùri si a hààraa ne Juta ne hẽéthẽé ko kg'ae, kam kò kaisase xg'aì, i tcáóa ba nxùrù.
Me tẽè ne a máá: “Nda koe tu xòó mea?” témé. Ne bìrí Me a máá: “X'aigaè, hàà naka bóò,” témé.
Me Jeso ba kg'ae.
Ne kò nxãaska Juta ne máá: “Bóò, nta noosem ncàm̀ mea sa,” témé.
Igaba ne kò c'ẽea ne máá: “Ncẽem khóèm ncẽe thuu káà tcgáím khóè ba xgobekg'am tcgáía hãa ba gáé kò táá ncẽem khóè ba kúrú me x'óóa hãa tite?” ta ma tẽèku.
Me kò Jeso ba gaicara kaisase xg'aìa hãase tc'ám̀s koe síí. Xòam q'oo koes kò hãa, si nxõ̱á sa kg'áḿa ba koe tòóèa.
Me Jeso ba máá: “Nxõ̱á sa tcg'òó,” témé.
Si ẽe kò x'óóa hãam khóèm ka qõeses Mareta sa bìrí Me a máá: “X'aigaè, ncẽem x'aèm kam hm̀m̀sam xg'ãò ba hãa, 4 cáḿa nem úúa a kg'ónòèa hãa khama,” témé.
Kam kò Jeso ba bìrí si a máá: “Bìrí si ta ga Ra gáé hãa, dtcòm̀ si kòo ne si gha Nqarim di x'áàn hòò sa?” témé.
Ka ne ko nxõ̱á sa tcg'òó. Me Jeso ba tc'amaka ghùi-kg'ai a máá: “Aboè, qãè-tcaoa Ra ko máá Tsi, kóḿ Tea Tsi hãa domka.
Q'ana Ra hãa wèé x'aè ka Tsi ko kóḿ Te sa, igabar ko ncẽe tẽe ne khóè ne domka ncẽe sa nxàe, nxãasega ne gha dtcòm̀, Tsáá Tsia tsééa óá Tea hãa sa ka,” témé.
Ncẽetam ko mééa xg'ara kam kò tc'amaka hãam dòm̀ cgoa q'au a máá: “Lasaroè, tchàa koe tcg'oa!” témé.

Me x'óóa kò hãam khóè ba tcg'oa, tshàua ba hẽé naka nqàrèa ba hẽéthẽéa kò lapian cgoa tcáḿmèa, i kg'áía ba c'ẽem qgáím cgoa tcáḿmèa. Me Jeso ba bìrí ne a máá: “Kgoara tcg'òó cgae me qgáía ne nakam qõò,” témé.
Nxãaska ne kò káí ne Juta ne ncẽe kò Maria sa dàra hãa ne, a kò Jesom kò kúrúa hãa zi gúù zi bóòa ne, Gam koe dtcòm̀.
Igaba ne kò c'ẽe ne Farasai xu koe síí a bìrí xu Jesom dùú sa kúrúa hãa sa.
Ka xu kò nxãaska kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé naka Farasai xu hẽéthẽé xg'ae sa tcii a tẽèku a máá: “Dùú sa xae gha kúrú? Ncẽem Khóè ba ko káí zi x'áí zi kúrú ka.

Guu Me xae kò Me ko ncẽe zi gúù zi qanega kúrú, ne i gha wèé khóèan Gam koe dtcòm̀, ne gha Roma ne nxãaska hàà sixae dim nqõó ba hẽé naka khóè ne hẽéthẽé xhùu cgae xae e,” ta xu méé.
Igaba gaxu ka c'ẽem Kaifase ta ko ma tciiè ba, ncẽe kò ẽem kurim ka kaiam peresiti ii ba kò kg'ui a máá: “Cúí gúù ga xao c'úùa hãa!
Bóòa xao gáé q'ãa tama, cúím khóè ba guu me wèé ne khóè ne x'óóa máá sa qãè si i, wèés qhàò sa guu si kaàkaguèan ka sa?” témé.
Ncẽe sam kò gam koe guuase nxàe tama, igabam kò ẽem kurim ka kaiam peresiti me e khama porofita, Jeso ba gha ko Juta dis qhàò sa x'óóa máá sa,
naka ẽes qhàòs cúís tama sa, igaba gataga Nqarim di ne cóá ne ncẽe tsa̱i-tsa̱isea xõe ne hẽéthẽé e, xg'ae-xg'ae nem gha, ne cúís gúù sa ii ka.
Xu kò nxãaska ẽem cáḿ koe ga guu a qg'áìku, cg'õo Me xu gha ka.

Me kò Jeso ba nxãaska táá kgoarasease Juta ne xg'aeku koe caate. Igabam kò gaa koe tcg'oa a tchàa-xgóós qàe koe hãam qgáìm koe qõò, Eferaime ta ko ma tciiè ba, a síí gaa koe Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu cgoa hãa.
Juta ne dis Pasekas dim x'aè ba kò cúù me e, ne kò Pasekas cookg'ai koe káí ne nqõóm koe guu a Jerusalema koe qõò, síí ne gha q'ano-q'anoè ka.
Ne kò Jeso ba qaa, a ne a ko ẽe ne tempelem q'oo koe hãa ka tẽèku, a ko máá: “Dùú sa tu ko tc'ẽe? Cuiskaga ba gáé kõ̱ès koe hàà tite?” témé.

Igaba xu kò kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé naka Farasai xu hẽéthẽé x'áèan tcg'òóa hãa, ncẽè c'ẽem khóèm kò ndam hãa sa q'ana hãa ne méém q'ãa-q'ãa xu sa, nxãasega xu gha qgóó Me ka.
6 cáḿan Paseka dim cáḿ cookg'ai di kam kò Jeso ba Betania koe qõò, Lasarom kò x'ãèa hãa koe, ncẽem kò x'ooan koe ghùia hãa ba.
Me kò Jeso ba gaa koe dqòa di tc'õoan máàè. Si kò Mareta sa nxa̱à máá xu, me kò Lasaro ba ẽe ko Jesom cgoa tc'õó xu ka c'ẽe me e.
Kas kò nxãaska Maria sa nareta cgoa cúí kúrúèa tshãán dim ts'óó-c'õám kaia ba
Igabagam kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ka c'ẽem Jutase Isekariote ba, (ncẽe gha hàà khóè ne tshàu q'oo koe tcãà Me ba) máá:
“Dùús domka ba kò ncẽem tshãá ba x'ámáguè tama, kurim di marian cgoa, naka i maria ba dxàua ne khóè ne máàè?” témé.
Ncẽes gúù sam kò dxàua ne khóè nem ncàm̀a hãa domka nxàe tama, igaba ts'ãà-kg'ao me e domka a. A kò mari dtcòbè sam qgóóa hãa khama, q'oo koe marian séèa mááse kg'oana.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a a máá: “Guu si tu, Tiri kg'ónò cáḿa nes tòóa máá mea ke.
Dxàua ne khóè ne cgoa tu wèé x'aè ka hãa, igaba tu wèé x'aè ka Tíí cgoa hãa tite,” tam méé.

Eẽs ko kaias xg'aes Juta ne di sa Jeso ba hàna sa kóḿ, ka ne kò gaa koe síí, Jesom domka cúí tamase, igaba ne gha kúúa hàà Lasaro ba bóò ka hẽéthẽé e, ncẽem kò x'ooan koe ghùia hãa ba.
Nxãaska xu kò kaia xu peresiti xu qg'áìku, Lasarom ga ba xu gha thẽé cg'õo sa.
Gaam domka ne kò ko káí ne Juta ne Jesom koe síí, a ne a ko Gam koe dtcòm̀ khama.
Q'uu dim cáḿ ka ne kò káí ne khóè ne ẽe kò kõ̱ès koe hààraa ne kóḿ, Jeso ba ko Jerusalema koe hàà sa.
Ka ne kò mokolane dis hìis di to̱àràn séè a tcg'oa, a síí xg'ae cgoa Me, a ne a q'au a máá:
“Hosana!
Ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa baa,
Gam ẽe ko X'aigam
ncẽe Iseraele dim X'aiga ba!”
ta ne méé.
Me kò Jeso ba donghi-coa ba hòò a ba a qábì me, ncẽe i ko ma góá tòóèa khamaga ma a ko máá:
“Táá q'áò guu, Sione di si cóá seè;
bóò, sarim X'aiga ba ko hàà,
donghi-coam koe qábìa ntcõó a ke,”
téméè khama.
Xu kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu tc'ãà dis ka ncẽe zi gúù zi kóḿa q'ãa tama. Igaba ẽem ko Jeso ba x'áàkaguè ka cúíga xu kò bóòa q'ãa, ncẽe zi gúù zi
Eẽm ko Lasaro ba tc'ám̀s koe tciia tcg'òó, a ko x'ooan koe ghùi me ka kò hãa cgoa Meas xg'ae sa kò Gam ka nxàea tseegukagu.
Ncẽes x'áí sam kúrúa hãa sa ne kò kóḿ, domka ne kò káí ne khóè ne síí xg'ae cgoa Me.
Ka xu kò Farasai xu nxãaska bìríku a máá: “Bóò tama xao gáé hãa, cúí gúù kúrú xae gha ga káà a sa? Bóò, wèém nqõó ba ko xùri Me!” témé.
Nxãaska xu kò ẽe kò qõò a síí ko Jerusalema dis kõ̱ès koe còrè ne xg'aeku koe c'ẽe xu Gerika xu hàna.
Ka xu kò Filipim koe hàà, ncẽe ko Betesaida dim x'áém Galilea dim koe guua ba, a dtcàrà me a máá: “Aboè, Jeso ba xae bóò kg'oana,” témé.
Me kò Filipi ba síí Anterea ba bìrí, tsara kò Anterea ba hẽé naka Filipi ba hẽéthẽé tsara síí Jeso ba bìrí.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a tsara a, a máá: “X'aè ba hààraa, Khóèm dim Cóám gha x'áàkaguè ba.
Tseegua ner ko bìrí xao o, a ko máá: Mabere cgùrim kòo góḿankg'ai koe tcheè, a x'óó tama, nem cúím cgùri me e. Igaba ẽem kòo x'óó nem ko káí cgùrian kúrú.
Khóèm ẽe gam dis kg'õè sa ncàm̀a hãa bas gha aaguse cgae, igaba khóèm ẽe gam dis kg'õè sa ncẽem nqõóm koe hòrea hãa ba gha chõò tamase hòò si.
Dìím wèém ẽe ko tsééa máá Te ba méém xùri Te, ẽer hàna koem gha Tirim tséé-kg'ao ba thẽé hãa, Me gha Abo ba ẽe ko tsééa máá Te ba dqo̱m̀.
“Ncẽeskas tiris tcáó sa tshúù qgáì koe hãa, ka Ra gha nta méé? ‘Aboè, ncẽem x'aèm koe kgoara Te,’ ta ra gha méé? Eẽ-ẽe, ncẽes gúùs domka ga Ra ncẽem x'aèm koe hààraa.
Aboè, cg'õèa Tsi x'áàkagu!” tam méé.
Kam kò dòm̀ ba nqarikg'ai koe guu a máá: “Ncãar x'áàkagu u, a Ra a gha gaia x'áàkagu u,” témé.
Gaa koe hànas xg'aes ko kóḿ kas kò máá, túúm ts'oo-q'oo o, témé. Ne ko c'ẽe ne máá: “Moengele ba ncãa kò kg'ui cgoa Me,” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a ne a máá: “Ncẽem dòm̀ ba gatu domka hààraa, Tíí domka tamase.
Ncẽe ba ncẽeska ncẽem nqõóm gha xgàraè dim x'aè me e, me gha ncẽeska x'aiga-coam ncẽem nqõóm di ba xhàiaguè.
Ra gha Tíí, nqõómkg'ai koer kòo ghùiè ne wèé khóèan Tíí koe tcéèa óá,” tam méé.
Ncẽe sam kò ko nxàe, hààm ko x'óós x'oo-kg'áḿ sam gha x'áí ka.

Si xg'ae sa xo̱a Me a máá: “X'áèan koe ta kóḿa hãa i ko máá, Kreste ba gha chõò tamase hãa, téméè, ka Tsi gáé ko Tsáá nta hẽés ka máá: ‘Khóèm dim Cóá ba gha ghùiè,’ témé? Khóèm dim Cóám ncẽe ba dìí baa?” ta ne méé.

Kam kò Jeso ba bìrí ne a máá: “X'áà ne gha cg'áré x'aè-coan gatu xg'aeku koe hãa. Ke tu qõòa te, qanega tu x'áàn úúa hãa x'aè ka, naka i gha nxãasega táá ntcùúan tcãà cgae tu u. Khóèm ẽe ko ntcùúan q'oo koe qõò ba c'úùa hãa nda koem ko qõò sa ke.

Eẽ tu qanega x'áàn úúa hãa x'aè ka méé tu gatu di tcoman x'áàn koe tòó, naka tua gha nxãasega x'áàn di tu cóá tu ii,” tam méé. Eẽm ko Jeso ba kg'ui cgoa nea xg'ara kam kò tcg'oa a qõò a síí xàì-kg'ai ne.
Jeso ba kò káí zi x'áí zi tcgáí-q'ooa ne koe kúrú, igaba ne kò qanega Gam koe dtcòm̀ tama.
nxãasega i gha porofitim Isaiam di kg'uian nxàea tseegukaguè ka, ncẽe ko máá:
“X'aigaè, dìí na gatá di kg'uian ncẽe ta nxàea hãa koe dtcòm̀aa?
Me gataga X'aigam dim x'õà ba dìín x'áíèa hãa?”
témé e.
Ncẽes gúùs domkaga ne kò dtcòm̀an ka tààè. Isaia ba kò gaicara máá:
“Gane di tcgáía nem kaàkagua hãa,
a tcáóa ne x'óó-x'ooa hãa,
nxãasega ne gha táá gane di tcgáían cgoa bóò ka,
a ne a gane di tcáóan cgoa táá kóḿa q'ãa ka,
a ne a Tíí koe táá ka̱bise,
Ra Tíí qãèkagu ne ka,”
tam Nqari ba mééa khama.
Isaia ba kò ncẽe zi gúù zi kg'ui,
Gatà i ii igaba xu kò káí xu tc'ãà-cookg'ai xu Gam koe dtcòm̀. Igaba xu kò Farasai xu domka gaxu di dtcòm̀an táá x'áí, nxãasega xu gha táá còrè-nquum koe xhàiaguè ka.
Khóè ne di dqo̱m̀kuan xu kaisase ncàm̀a hãa Nqarim dian ka khama.
Kam kò Jeso ba q'aua kg'ui a máá: “Khóèm kò ko Tíí koe dtcòm̀ nem Tíí koe cúí dtcòm̀ tama, igabam ko thẽé ẽe tsééa óá Team koe dtcòm̀.
Eẽm kòo bóò Te, nem ko Gaam ẽe tséé Tea hãa ba bóò.
Nqõóm koer X'áà iise hààraa, nxãasega i gha táá cúí khóè ẽe ko Tíí koe dtcòm̀ ga ntcùú q'oo koe hãa ka.
“Ncẽè khóèm kòo Tiri kg'uian kóḿ, igabam kò qgóóa qari i tama, ne Ra Tíí xgàra tama. Nqõó ba hàà xgàra di ser hàà tama, igaba Ra nqõó bar gha hàà kgoara ka hààraa khama.
Gam ẽe ko xguì Te, a kg'uia Te kóḿ tama ba xgàra me ko ba úúa: ẽer kg'uia hãa kg'uia ne gha còo dim cáḿ ka xgàra me.
Tíí ka Ra kg'uia mááse tama, igabam Abom ncẽe tséé Tea hãa ba x'áè Tea, dùú sar gha kg'ui a nxàe sa.
Ra q'ana hãa Gam di x'áè-kg'áḿa nea chõò tamas kg'õè si i sa. Gaa domkas wèés gúùs ẽer ko nxàe sa, Ra ko ẽem ma Abo ba ma bìrí Te sia hãa khama ko ma nxàe si,” tam méé.

Paseka dis kõ̱ès cookg'ai i kò ii. Me kò Jeso ba q'ana hãa, x'aè ba hààraa, ncẽem nqõó bam gha tcg'oaragu a Abom koe qõò di ba sa. Gam di ne khóè ne nqõóm koe hãa nem kò ncàm̀a hãa, khamam kò cg'oèasem ncàm̀ nea sa x'áí ne.
Dqòa di tc'õoa ne kò kúrúè, me dxãwa ba nxãakamaga Jutasem Isekariotem tcáó koe tcana, Simonem ka cóáse ba, Jeso bam gha khóèan tshàu q'oo koe tcãà ka.
Jeso ba kò q'ana, Abo ba wèé zi gúù zi Gam di qarian koe tòóa hãa sa, Me Nqarim koe guua hãa, a ba a ko Nqarim koe ga ka̱bise sa.
Kam kò nxãaska tc'õoan ko tc'õóè qgáì koe tẽe, a ba a tc'amakam ha̱na qgáían nxõ̱o, a tchùuse cgoa dim qgáí ba tcáḿ kháó.

A gaa koe guus ka, xg'aàse cgoa dis gàbas koe tshàan ntcã̱a, a Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu tshoa-tshoa a xg'aà nqàrè, a tcáḿ kháóam kò hãam qgáím tchùuse cgoa dim cgoa tchùu nqàrè xu.
A ba a Simonem Peterem koe hàà, me Petere ba bìrí Me a máá: “X'aigaè, hàà Tsia gáé ko Tsáá nqàrèa te xg'aà?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Ncẽer ko kúrú sa tsi cuiskaga ncẽeskaga bóòa q'ãa tite, igaba tsi gha nxãwa kháóka bóòa q'ãa si,” témé.
Kam kò Petere máá: “Cuiskaga Tsi nqàrèa te xg'aàra hãa tite,” témé. Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Ncẽè xg'aà nqàrè tsi tamar kò hãa ne tsi Tíí koe hãa tama,” témé.
Me Simone Petere ba máá: “Kháé nxãaska, X'aigaè, nqàrèa te cúí tamase, igaba tshàua te hẽé naka tcúúa te ga hẽéthẽé xg'áàò,” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a a máá: “Khóèm ẽe ncãa xg'aàse ba ko nqàrèa ba cúíga xg'aàn tc'ẽe, wèé tc'áróa ba ga q'ano o khama. Xao gaxao q'ano xao o, wèéa xaoa q'ano tama igaba,” témé.
Q'anam kò hãa dìí ba ko hàà khóè ne tshàu q'oo koe tcãà Me sa khama, gaa domkagam kòo máá: “Wèéa xao ga q'ano tama,” témé.
Eẽm ko nqàrèa xu xg'aà cgoa xg'ara kam kò Gam di zi qgáí zi hã̱a a ntcõó-q'ooa ba koe ka̱bise, a ba a tẽè xu a máá: “A bóòa xao ko q'ãa, ncẽer ncãa kúrú cgae xao o sa?
‘Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè,’ ta xao ko ma tcii Te, a ko máá: ‘X'aiga Tseè,’ témé, tseeguse, gaar ga Ra a domka.
Ra Tíí gaxao dir X'aiga, a Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Ra ncãa nqàrèa xao xg'aà, ke méé xao gaxao igaba thẽé gaxao ka c'ẽea xu di nqàrèan xg'aà.
Sere-sere sar kúrúa máá xaoa, ke méé xao gaxao igaba ẽer ma kúrúa hãa khamaga ma thẽé kúrú.
Tseegua ner ko bìrí xao o, a ko máá: Gam ka q'õòsem ka kaia hãam qãà ba káà me e, me gataga ẽe tsééèa hãa ba ẽe tséé meam ka kai tama.
Ncẽeska xao ncẽe zi gúù zi q'ana hãa, khama xao gha kúrú zi xao kòo ne ts'ee-ts'eekg'aiè.
“Wèéa xao gar nxàe tama, ẽer nxárá tcg'òóa hãa xur q'ana hãa. Igabas ko ncẽe sa
Ra ko kúrúse tama ias cookg'ai koe ncẽeska bìrí xao o, nxãasega xao gha ẽe i kòo kúrúse ne, Tíí ga Ra a sa dtcòm̀ ka.

Tseegu ner ko bìrí xao o, a ko máá: Wèém ẽe ko ẽer tsééa úúa hãa ba qãèse hààkagu ba ko Tíí ga Ra qãèse hààkagu, me ko dìím wèém ẽe ko Tíía qãèse hààkagu Te ba ẽe tsééa óága Tea ba qãèse hààkagu,” tam méé.

Ncẽetam ko Jeso ba mééa xg'ara ka i kò tcáóa ba tshúù qgáì koe hãa, Me kò nxàea tseegukagu a máá: “Tseegukar ko bìrí xao o a ko máá: Gaxao ka c'ẽe ba gha khóè ne tshàu q'oo koe tcãà Te, témé,” tam méé.
Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ko téé a bóòku, gaxu ka ndaka bam ko nxàe sa c'úùa hãase.
Me kò gaxu ka c'ẽem ncẽe kò Jesom ka kaisase ncàm̀mèa hãam xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao ba Gam koe ghãasea ntcõe.
Me kò Simone Petere ba gaam xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao ba tcgáía ba cgoa qãè a bìrí me a máá, ndaka bam ko nxàe sa tẽè Me, témé.
Me Jesom koe ntcõóa ghãase, a tẽè Me a máá: “X'aigaè, dìí baa?” témé.

Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Gaam ẽer ko ncẽes péré qàmà sa máà me e, ẽer kò gàbas q'oo koe tcguù-tcguu sia xg'ara ne,” témé. Eẽm ko gaas péré qàmà sa tcguù-tcguua xg'ara, kam kò Jutase Isekariote ba máà si, Simonem ka cóáse ba.
Eẽm ko Jutase ba péré qàmà sa séè kagam ko satana ba tcãà cgae me. Me Jeso ba bìrí me a máá: “Kúrú kg'oana tsi hãas gúù sa qháése kúrú,” témé.
Igaba tc'õóè ko qgáì koe i kò cúí khóè ga táá q'ãa, dùús domkam ko Jeso ba ẽeta méé sa.

Jutase ba kò mari dtcòbè sa úúa hãa khama xu kò c'ẽe xu tc'ẽea máá, Jeso ba ko bìrí me, kõ̱ès koe ko tc'ẽese zi gúù zim gha x'ámá sa, kana c'ẽe gúù-coa nem gha ẽe dxàua hãa ne máà sa, ta tc'ẽea.
Eẽm ko Jutase ba péréan séèa xg'ara kam kò kúúga tcg'oa. I kò ntcùú u.
Eẽm ko qõò, kam kò Jeso ba máá: “Ncẽeskam ko Khóèm dim Cóá ba x'áàkaguè, Me ko Nqari ba Gam koe x'áàkaguè.
Ncẽè Nqarim kò ko Gam koe x'áàkaguè, nem gha Nqari ba nxãaska thẽé Cóá ba Gam koe x'áàkagu, a ba a gha cúí q'oro x'áàkagu Me.
“Cóá xaoè, xòm̀ x'aèa ner gha hãa cgoa xao o. Qaa Te xao gha. Eẽr kò ma Juta ne ma bìría khamaga Ra ko ma ncẽeska bìrí xao o a ko máá: Eẽr ko qõò koe xao cuiskaga síía hãa tite.
“Ra ko ka̱bam x'áè-kg'áḿ ba máà xao o, a ko máá: Gaxao ka c'ẽe ne ncàm̀. Ncẽer ma ncàm̀ xaoa hãa khama méé xao ma gaxao ka c'ẽea ne thẽé ncàm̀.
Ncẽes gúùs ka i gha wèé khóèan q'ãa, Tiri xao xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xao o sa, gaxao ka c'ẽean xao kò ncàm̀a hãa ne,” tam méé.
Me Simonem Petere ba bìrí Me a máá: “X'aigaè, nda koe Tsi ko qõò?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Ncẽer ko qõò koe tsi cuiskaga kgoana naka xùri Tea hãa tite, igaba tsi gha kháóka nxãwa xùri Te,” témé.
Me Petere ba Gam ka máá: “X'aigaè, dùús domka ra gáé ga ncẽeskaga xùri Tsi tama? Tsáá domkar gha kg'õèa te tcg'òó,” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Tíí domka tsia gha kg'õèa tsi tcg'òó? Tseegukar ko tseeguan bìrí tsi a ko máá: Ghòrò ba kg'aea hãa tite, tsi gha nqoana q'oro xo̱ase Te,” témé.
“Táá méé i tcáóa tu nxùrù qgáì koe hãa guu. Nqarim koe hẽé naka Tíí koe hẽéthẽé tcoman úú.
Abom dim nquum q'oo koe i káí x'ãè-q'ooan hàna; ncẽè gatà i kò ii tama ner ga kò q'ãa-q'ãa tua hãa, síír ko x'ãè-q'ooan kg'ónòa máá tu u sa.
Ncẽè qõòr kòo a ko síí x'ãè-q'ooan kg'ónòa máá tu u, ner gha ka̱bise a hàà séèa mááse tu u, nxãasega tu gha gatu igaba thẽé síí Tíí hàna qgáì koe hãa ka.
Tu gataga qõòr kom qgáìm di dàòan q'ana hãa,” tam méé.
Me Tomase ba bìrí Me a máá: “X'aigaè, qõò Tsi kom qgáì ba xae c'úùa, ka xae ga ntama ma gaa qgáì dim dàò ba q'ãa?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Tíí Ra Dàò Ra a, a Tseegu Ra a, a Ra a Kg'õè Ra a. Tíí ka oose ko Abom koe síím khóèm cúím ga ba káà me e.
Ncẽè q'ãa Tea xao kò hãa ne xao ga kò thẽé Abo ba q'ana hãa. Igaba xao ncẽeska q'ãa Mea, a bóò Mea hãa,” tam méé.
Me Filipi bìrí Me a máá: “X'aigaè, Abo ba x'áí xae e, nxãaska xae gha qãè xae e,” témé.

Me Jeso ba bìrí me a máá: “Ncẽetar ma qáò x'aèan gaxao cgoa hãa igaba Tsi ko c'úù Te, Filipiè? Dìím wèém ẽe bóò Tea hãa ba Abo ba bóòa hãa. Nta tsi gha máá: ‘Abo ba x'áí xae e,’ témé?

A dtcòm̀ tama tsia Abom koer hãa, Me Abo ba Tíí koe hãa sa? Kg'uian ncẽer ko gaxao cgoa kg'ui nea Tíí koe guu nakar kg'ui i tama, igaba Abom ncẽe Tíí koe x'ãèa hãa ba ko tsééa ba kúrú.
Dtcòm̀ méé xao, Abom koer hãa, Me Gabá Tíí koe hãa sa. Ncẽè gatà i kò ii tama ne méé xao nxãaska dtcòm̀ are-aresa zi tséé zi ẽer ko kúrú zi domka.

Tseegua ner ko bìrí xao o, a ko máá: Dìím wèém ẽe ko Tíí koe dtcòm̀ ba gha ẽer ko Tíí kúrú sa kúrú, a ba a gha ncẽe tsééan ka kaia hãa tsééan kúrú, Tíí Ra ko Abom koe qõò khama.
A Ra a gha dùús wèés ẽe xao ko Tíí cg'õè koe dtcàrà sa kúrú, nxãasegam gha Abo ba Cóám koe guu a dqo̱m̀mè ka.
Ncẽè c'ẽes gúù sa xao kòo Tíí cg'õè koe dtcàrà ner gha kúrú si.
“Ncẽè ncàm̀ Tea xao kò hãa ne xao gha x'áè-kg'áḿa Te qgóóa qari.
Ra gha Abo ba dtcàrà Me gha c'ẽem Hùi-kg'ao ba tsééa úúa máá xao o, gaxao cgoa gha chõò tamase hãa ba.
Ncẽe ba tseeguan dim Tc'ẽe Me e. Nqõó ba cuiskaga hòò Me tite, bóò Meam hãa tite, a ba a c'úù Mea khama. Igaba xao gaxao q'ãa Mea, gaxao cgoam x'ãèa, a ba a gha gaxao koe hãa khama.
“Cuiskagar khãadoma-coa khama ma guu xaoa hãa tite, a gha ka̱bise a hàà cgae xao o.
Xòm̀ x'aè q'oo koem nqõó ba gaicara hòò Tea hãa tite, igaba xao gha gaxao hòò Te, kg'õèa Ra hãa domka, xao gha gaxao igabaga kg'õè khama.
Gaam cáḿ ka xao gha q'ãa, Tíí Ra Abom koe hãa, xao gaxao Tíí koe hãa, Ra Tíí gaxao koe hãa sa.

Dìím wèém ẽe x'áè-kg'áḿa Te úúa, a qgóóa qari ana ba gaam ncàm̀ Tea hãam ga me e. Gaam ẽe ncàm̀ Tea hãa ba gha Abom ka ncàm̀mè, Ra gha Tíí igaba thẽé ncàm̀ me a gha gaam koe x'áíse,” tam méé.
Me Jutase (ncẽe Isekariote tama ba) bìrí Me a máá: “X'aigaè, dùús domka Tsia gha x'áíse xae e, nqõó ba x'áíse tamase?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a a máá: “Ncẽè khóèm kò ncàm̀ Tea hãa nem gha kg'uia Te qgóóa qari, Me gha Abo ba ncàm̀ me, Tsam gha hàà cgae me, a Tsam a gha Sitsam di x'ãè-q'ooan gaam koe kúrú.
Gaam ẽe ncàm̀ Te tama ba kg'uia Te qgóóa qari tama; i gataga kg'uian ẽe xao ko kóḿ, Tíí koe guu tama, igaba i ncẽe tsééa óá Team Abom koe guua.
“Ncẽe gúùa ner bìrí xaoa hãa, ẽer kò qanega gaxao cgoa hãa ka.

Igaba Hùi-kg'aom ncẽe Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽe ii ba, ncẽem gha Abo ba Tiri cg'õèan cgoa tsééa óá ba, nxãa ba gha wèé gúùan ga xgaa-xgaa xao o, a ba a gha wèé gúùan ẽer bìrí xaoa hãa tc'ẽe-tc'ẽesekagu xao o.

“Tòókuan cgoar ko guu xao o, Tiri tòókua ner ko máà xao o. Nqõóm ko ma máà xao o khamar ma máà xao o tama. Táá méé i tcáóa xao nxùrù qgáì koe hãa guu, kana méé xao táá q'áò guu.

Kóḿ tea xao kò hãa Ra ko bìrí xao o a ko máá: ‘Qõò Ra ko, a Ra a gha ka̱bise a hàà cgae xao o,’ témé. Ncẽè ncàm̀ Tea xao kò hãa ne xao ga kò Abom koer ko qõò khama qãè-tcaoa, Abo ba Tíí ka kaia hãa khama.
Ra ncãa ncẽeska bìrí xao o, qanega i kúrúse tama cookg'ai koe, nxãasega xao gha ẽe i kòo kúrúse ne dtcòm̀ ka.
Gaicarar qáòse kg'ui cgoa xaoa hãa tite, ncẽem nqõóm dim x'aiga ba ko hàà khama. Cúí qari gam Tíí koe úú tama,
igaba méém nqõó ba q'ãa, Abo ba Ra ncàm̀a hãa, a ko Abom ma x'áè Tea hãa khama ma tséé sa.
“Tẽe xao ncẽeska, naka hààn xae qõò,” tam méé.
Tíí koe hãam nxã̱am wèém ẽe tc'áróan kúrú tama bam ko q'ãea tcg'òó, a ba a ko wèém nxã̱am ẽe ko tc'áróan kúrú ba dcàò, nxãasegam gha q'ano a káí tc'áróan kúrú ka.
Nxãakamaga tu ncẽer kò kg'ui cgoa tu um kg'uim ka q'anokaguèa.

Tíí koe tu hãa nakar Tíí gatu koe hãa. Cúím nxã̱am ga ba cúíam kò hãa ne tc'áróan kúrúa hãa tite, kg'om dis hìis koem kò hãa ne cúí ga a, gatu igaba tu gatà hẽéa tite, Tíí koe tu kò hãa ne cúí ga a.
“Tíí Ra Kg'om Ra a, tu gatu nxã̱a tu u. Gaam ẽe Tíí koe hãa, Ra Tíí gam koe hãa ba, gam káí tc'áróan ko kúrúm ga me e, Tíí ka oose tu cúí gúù ga kúrúa hãa tite khama.
Ncẽè khóèm kò Tíí koe hãa tama, nem ko nxã̱am khama ma xaoaguè, a ba a xgóó; ẽeta ii nxã̱a ne ko sáà xg'ae, a c'eean q'oo koe síí xaoa tcãà, a dàòè.
Ncẽè Tíí koe tu kò hãa, i Tiri kg'uian gatu koe hãa ne tu gha ẽe tu ko tc'ẽes wèé sa dtcàrà, a tu a gha kúrúa mááè si.
Si ko ncẽe sa Tirim Xõò ba x'áàkagu: káí tc'áróan tu gha kúrú, a tu a gha gatà iim dàòm ka Tiri tu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao tu ii.
Ncẽem ma Abo ba ncàm̀ Tea hãa khamagar ma ncàm̀ tu ua hãa. Ke méé tu ncẽeska Tiri ncàm̀kuan koe hãa.
Ncẽè Tiri x'áèan tu kò qgóóa qaria, ne tu gha Tiri ncàm̀kuan koe hãa, ncẽer ma Tirim Xõòm di x'áèan ma qgóóa qaria, a Gam di ncàm̀kuan koe ma hãa khamaga ma.
“Ncẽe gúùa ner bìrí tua hãa, nxãasega i gha Tiri qãè-tcaoan gatu koe hãa ka, naka gatu di qãè-tcaoan gha cg'oè ka hẽéthẽé e.
Tirim x'áè-kg'áḿ ba ncẽe me e: ncàm̀ gatu ka c'ẽea ne, ẽer ma ncàm̀ tua hãa khamaga ma.
Cúí khóè ga ncẽes ncàm̀s ka kaia hãas ncàm̀ sa úúa hãa tama, ncẽe khóèm ko ẽem ncàm̀a hãa ne khóè ne gam di kg'õèan tcg'òóa máá sa.
Tu gatu ẽer ko x'áè tu u sa tu kòo kúrú ne Tiri tu ncàm̀-khoe tu u.

Cuiskagar gaicara qãà ta ma tcii tua hãa tite, qãà ba gam ka q'õòsem ko dùú sa kúrú sa c'úùa hãa khama. Ncẽes gúùs téé-q'oo koe Ra ko ncàm̀-khoe tu ta ma tcii tu u, wèés gúùs ẽer Tirim Xõòm koe xgaa-xgaasea hãa sar q'ãakagu tua hãa khama.

Gatua nxárá tcg'òó Te ta ga hãa, igabar Tíí nxárá tcg'òó tua hãa, a Ra a qõò tu gha a síí tc'áróan kúrú ka nxárá tcg'òó tua, tc'áróan ncẽe gha qáò x'aèan hãa a, nxãasegam gha Abo ba wèés gúùs ẽe tu gha ko Tíí cg'õè koe dtcàrà sa máà tu u ka.
Ncẽea Ra ko ma x'áè tu u ga a, a ko máá, gatu ka c'ẽe ne ncàm̀, témé.
“Ncẽè nqõóm kò hòre tua hãa ne méé tu q'ãa, gatuam hòre tua hãa cookg'ai koem kò Tíía hòre Tea hãa sa.
Ncẽè nqõóm di tu kò ii nem ga kò nqõó ba gam di tu iise ncàm̀ tua hãa; igaba tu nqõóm di tu tama tu u, Ra kò nqõóm koe guu a nxárá tcg'òó tu u, gaa domkam ko nqõó ba hòre tu u.

Ncẽer kòo kg'ui cgoa tu u kg'uian méé tu tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese, a ko máá: ‘Qãà ba gam ka q'õòsem ka tc'amaka hãa tama,’ témé sa. Ncẽè xgàra Te ne kòo ne, ne gha gataga thẽé xgàra tu u. A ncẽè Tiri xgaa-xgaa ne ne kòo qgóóa qari ne ne gha gataga thẽé gatu dian igabaga qgóóa qari i.
Igaba ne gha wèé gúùan ncẽe ga Tiri cg'õèan domka kúrú cgae tu u, Gaam ẽe tsééa óá Tea hãa ba ne c'úùa hãa domka.
Ncẽè thuur kò hàà kg'ui cgoa ne tama ne, ne ga kò chìbian úú tama. Igaba ne ncẽeska gane di chìbian koe ne gha qgóóa mááèm
Gaam ẽe hòre Tea ba gataga Tirim Abo ba hòrea.
Ncẽè c'ẽe khóè ga qanega kúrú tama sar kò gane koe kúrú ta ga hãa, ne ne ga kò chìbi úú tama. Igaba ne
Igabas ko ncẽe sa x'áèan koe góásea hãa sa nxàea tseegukagu, ncẽe ko máá: ‘Hòrea ne máá tea hãas gúù sa káà si i,’ témé sa.
“Igaba ẽem kòo Hùi-kg'ao ba hàà, ncẽer gha Abom koe guu a gatu koe tsééa úú ba, tseeguan dim Tc'ẽe ba, ncẽe ko Abom koe guu a tcg'oa ba, nem gha Gabá Tíí ka nxàea tseegukagu.
Gatu igaba tu gha Tíí ka hàà nxàea tseegukagu, Tíí cgoa tu kò tshoa-tshoases koe ga guu a hãa khama.
“Ncẽe gúùan wèér bìrí xaoa hãa, nxãasega xao gha táá gaxao di dtcòm̀an aagu ka.
Còrè-nquuan koe ne gha xhàiagu xao o, me gha gataga x'aè ba hàà, wèém khóèm ẽe ko cg'õo xao om gha tc'ẽea máá, Nqari bam ko tsééa máá, ta tc'ẽea ba.
Ncẽe zi gúù zi ne gha kúrú cgae tu u, Abo ba kana Tíí ga Ra ne c'úùa hãa khama.
Igabar ncẽe gúùan bìrí xaoa hãa, nxãasega xao gha ẽem kòo gaan dim x'aè ba hàà ne tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese, gaan kar q'ãa-q'ãa xaoa hãa sa ka.
“A ra a kò ncẽe zi gúù zi tshoa-tshoas koe táá bìrí xao o, gaxao cgoar kò hãa khama.
Igabar ko ncẽeska Gam ẽe tséé óá Team koe qõò, igaba i gaxao ka cúía xao ga tẽè Te naka máá: ‘Nda koe Tsi ko qõò?’ témé tama.
Igaba ncẽe gúùa ner nxàea hãa domka xao tshúù-tcaoan ka cg'oè cgaeèa hãa.

Gatà i ii igabar ko tseeguan bìrí xao o: Gaxaoa i qãèa máá xaoa hãa qõòr gha sa. Ncẽè qõò tamar kò hãa nem Hùi-kg'ao ba hàà cgae xaoa hãa tite khama. Igaba ẽe qõòr kòo ner gha gaxao koe tsééa úú Me.
Eẽm kòo hàà nem gha hàà nqõó ba xgaa-xgaa a chìbi-chibi; chìbian domka hẽé, naka tchànoan domka hẽé, naka xgàrakuan domka hẽéthẽé e.
Chìbian ka
Tchànoan ka
Xgàra-kg'aman ka
“Qanegar káí zi gúù zi úúa, gaxao cgoar gha nxàe zi, igaba xao ncẽeska kgoana zia hãa tite.

Igaba ẽem kòo tseeguan dim Tc'ẽe ba hàà, nem gha wèé tseeguan koe úú xao o. Cuiskagam Gam koe guua zi ka kg'uia hãa tite, igabam gha ẽem ko kóḿs ka cúí kg'ui, a ba a gha hààko zi gúù zi ka bìrí xao o.
X'áàkagu Tem gha, ẽe Tiri ii sam gha séè, a ba a bìrí xao o si khama.
Wèéan ẽe Abom úúa hãa nea Tiri i. Gaa domkar ko máá: Eẽ Tiri ii sam gha
“X'aè-coa ba xao hòò Tea hãa tite, a xao a gha gaicara x'aè-coam qãá q'oo koe hòò Te,” tam méé.

Xu kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu c'ẽe xu tẽèku a máá: “Dùú sa ba ko nxàe, ncẽem ko máá: ‘X'aè-coa ba xao hòò Tea hãa tite, a xao a gha gaicara x'aè-coam qãá q'oo koe hòò Te,’ témé ka, a ko gataga máá: ‘Tirim Xõòm koer ko qõò domka a,’ témé?” ta xu méé.
Xu hãa a tẽèse a ko máá: “Dùú sa ba koáé nxàe: ‘X'aè-coam q'oo koe,’ tam kòo méé ne? Dùú sam ko nxàe sa xae kóḿa q'ãa tama,” ta xu méé.

Me kò Jeso ba bóòa q'ãa, ncẽes gúùs ka xu tẽè Me kg'oana hãa sa, khamam kò nxãaska bìrí xu a máá: “Ntar ko méé sa xao koáé tẽèku, ncẽer ko máá: ‘X'aè-coam q'oo koe xao hòò Tea hãa tite, a xao a gha gaicara x'aè-coam qãá q'oo koe hòò Te,’ témé ka?

Tseegua ner ko bìrí xao o, a ko máá: Kg'ae xao gha, a gha thõò-tcaoase kg'ae, igabam gha nqõó ba qãè-tcaoa hãa. Thõò-tcaoa xao gha hãa, igaba i gha gaxao di thõò-tcaoan ka̱bise a qãè-tcao sa ii.

Eẽ khóès kòo cóán ábà di thõò koe hãa nes tshúù-tcaoa hãa, gas dim x'aè ba hààraa khama. Igaba ẽes ko cóán ábà xg'ara nes gaicara thõòan tc'ẽe-tc'ẽese tama, qãè-tcaoan ẽe cóá nea nqõómkg'ai koe ábàèa hãa di domka.
Khama xao gaxao ncẽeska tshúù-tcaoan úúa hãa, igabar gha gaicara hàà bóò xao o, xao gha qãè-tcao, i cúí khóè ga gaxao di qãè-tcaoan séè cgae xaoa hãa tite.
Eẽm cáḿ ka xao cuiskaga cúí gúù ga dtcàrà Tea hãa tite. Tseegukar ko tseeguan bìrí xao o, a ko máá: Wèés gúùs ẽe xao ko Tíí cg'õè cgoa Abom koe dtcàrà sam gha máà xao o.
Ncẽeska igaba xao qanega cúí gúù ga Tíí cg'õè cgoa dtcàrà tama. Dtcàrà, máàè xao gha ke, naka xaoa gha nxãasega qãè-tcaoan ka cg'oè.
“Ncẽe gúùa ner kò sere-sere zi cgoa bìrí xao o, igabam ko x'aè ba hàà, gaxao cgoar gaia sere-sere zi cgoa kg'uia hãa tite ba, igabar gha hàà kgoarasea hãase Tirim Xõòm ka bìrí xao o.
Eẽm cáḿ ka xao gha Tíí cg'õè koe dtcàrà. Gaxao téé-q'oo koer gha Abo ba hàà dtcàrà, tar méé tama.
Abo ba Gam ka ncàm̀ xaoa hãa, ncàm̀ Tea xao hãa domka, a xao a Nqarim koer guua sa dtcòm̀a hãa khama.
Abom koer guu a nqõóm koe hààraa. A Ra a ko gaicara nqõó ba guu, a Abom koe ka̱bise,” tam méé.
Xu kò nxãaska Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu máá: “Bóò, ncẽeska Tsi ko kgoarasea hãase kg'ui, a Tsi a cúís sere-seres ga sa tséékagu tama.
Ncẽeska xae ko bóò wèé gúùan Tsi q'ana hãa sa, a Tsi a gataga c'ẽe khóè ga gha tẽè Tsi sa qaa tama. Ncẽes gúùs domka xae ko dtcòm̀ Nqarim koe Tsi guua hãa sa,” ta xu méé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Ncẽeska xaoa ko dtcòm̀?

Bóò, x'aè ba ko hàà, a ba a hààraa xg'ara, ẽe xao gha wèéa xao ga x'áéa xao koe guu a tsa̱i-tsa̱ise ba, a xao a gha cúíse qaù Te. Igabar cúíse hãa tama, Tirim Xõò ba Tíí cgoa hãa khama.

“Ncẽe gúùa ner bìrí xaoa hãa, nxãasega xao gha Tíí koe tòókuan úú ka. Ncẽem nqõóm koe xao gha qóḿan cgoa qgóóku. Igaba méé xao tòón tcáó! Nqõó bar tààa hãa ke,” tam méé.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba ncẽe sa kg'uia xg'ara kam ko nqarikg'ai koe ghùi-kg'ai a máá: “Aboè, x'aè ba hààraa. Tsarim Cóá ba x'áàkagu, nakam gha nxãasega Tsarim Cóá ba x'áàkagu Tsi,
wèé ne khóè ne tc'amkg'ai koe Tsi qarian máà Mea hãa ke, nxãasegam gha chõò tamas kg'õè sa wèé ne ẽe Tsi máà Mea hãa ne máà ka.
Si chõò tamas kg'õè sa ncẽe si i: q'ãa Tsi ne gha, Tsáá Tsia cúísega tseegu di Tsi Nqari Tsi i sa, naka Jeso Krestem ncẽe Tsi tsééa óága hãa ba
Nqõómkg'ai koer x'áàkagu Tsia hãa, ẽe Tsi kò máà Tea hãa tsééan kúrúa xg'ara-xg'ara ka.
Ke ncẽeska, Aboè, hàna Tsia koe x'áàn máà Te, ncẽe nqõóm tshoa-tshoase tama cookg'ai koer kò Tsáá cgoa úúa hãa a.
“Eẽ Tsi kò nqõómkg'ai koe guu a máà Te xu khóè xu koer kò Tsari cg'õèan q'ãakagu. Tsari xu u kò ii, Tsi kò máà Te xu, xu kò Tsarim kg'ui ba qgóóa qaria.
Ncẽeska xu q'ana, ẽe Tsi máà Tea hãa gúùan wèéa Tsáá koe guua hãa sa.
Eẽ Tsi kò máà Tea kg'uia ner máà xua hãa khama, xu kò cám̀ tshàua máá a. A xu a kò tseeguan kaga q'ãa, Tsáá koer guua hãa sa, a kò Tsáá Tsia tséé Tea hãa sa dtcòm̀.
Nqõó bar còrèa máá tama, a ko gaxu ẽe Tsi máà Tea hãa xu còrèa máá, Tsari xu u khama.
Wèés ẽer úúa hãa sa Tsari si i, si wèés ẽe Tsi úúa sa Tiri si i. Ra gaxu koe guu a x'áàkaguèa.

Nqõómkg'ai koe Ra gaia hãa tite, igaba xu gaxu qanega nqõómkg'ai koe hãa, Ra ko Tíí sencgaga Tsáá koe síí. Tcom-tcomsa Tsi Abo Tseè, Tsarim cg'õèm di qarian cgoa xgáèa máá xu - cg'õèm ncẽe Tsi máà Tea ba, naka xu gha nxãasega cúí ii, ncẽe Tsam ma cúí ii khamaga ma.

Eẽr kò gaxu cgoa hãa kar kòo xgáèa máá xu, a ẽe Tsi kò máà Tea hãam cg'õèm cgoa kòre xu. Cúía xu ga kò táá aaguse, gaam ẽe kò kaàkaguèm gha sa tééa máána hãam cúím oose,
“Igabar ko ncẽeska Tsáá koe síí, a Ra a ko ncẽe zi gúù zi kg'ui, nqõómkg'ai koer qanega hãase, nxãasega xu gha Tiri qãè-tcaoan ka cg'oèa hãa ka.
Tsarim kg'ui bar máà xua, me nqõó ba hòre xua, nqõóm di xu tama xu u khama, ncẽer Tíí ma nqõóm di tama khamaga ma.
Tiri còrèa ne máá, nqõóm koe méé Tsi séèa tcg'òó xu, témé tama, igaba méé Tsi ẽe cg'ãè iim koe xgáèa máá xu si i.
Nqõóm di xu tama xu u, ncẽer Tíí ma nqõóm di tama khamaga ma.
Tcom-tcomsakagu xu tseeguan cgoa, Tsarim kg'ui ba tseeguan di me e ke.
Eẽ Tsi ma nqõómkg'ai koe ma tsééa óá Tea hãa khamagar ma nqõómkg'ai koe tsééa úú xua hãa.
Gaxu domkar ko tcom-tcomsakaguse, nxãasega xu gha gaxu igaba thẽé tseeguan koe tcom-tcomsakaguè ka.
“Gaxu cúí xur còrèa máá tama. Eẽ gha gaxu di kg'uian koe guu a Tíí koe dtcòm̀ ner ko gataga thẽé còrèa máá,

wèéa ne ga gha cúí ii sa, ẽe Tsi ma Tsáá Aboè Tíí koe hãa, Ra ma Tíí Tsáá koe hãa khamaga ma. Gane igaba méé ne thẽé Gatsam koe hãa, nakam gha nxãasega nqõó ba Tsáá Tsia tséé óá Tea hãa sa dtcòm̀.
Eẽ Tsi máà Tea hãa x'áà ner máà nea, nxãasega ne gha cúí ii ka, ncẽe Tsam ma Gatsam ma cúí ii khamaga ma.

Tíí Ra gane koe hãa, Tsi Tsáá Tíí koe hãa, nxãasega ne gha cg'oèase cúí ii ka, me gha nxãasega nqõó ba q'ãa, Tsáá Tsia tsééa óá Tea hãa sa ka, a Tsi a ncàm̀ nea, ẽe Tsi ma ncàm̀ Tea hãa khamaga ma ka.

“Aboè, ẽe Tsi máà Tea hãa ne gha Tíí cgoa ncẽer hãa koe hãa sar ko tc'ẽe, nxãasega ne gha Tiri x'áàn bóò, ncẽe Tsi máà Tea hãa a, nqõóm tshoa-tshoase tama cookg'ai koe Tsi kò guu a ncàm̀ Tea hãa khama.
Abo Tsi tchàno Tseè, ẽetam ga ma nqõó ba c'úù Tsia igaba Ra Tíí q'ãa Tsia, ne q'ana hãa Tsáá Tsia tsééa óá Tea sa.
Cg'õèa Tsir q'ãakagu nea, a Ra a gha kúrú i q'ãaè, nxãasega i gha ncàm̀kuan ncẽe Tsi kò ncàm̀ Tea hãa gane koe hãa ka, Ra gha gataga thẽé Tíí ga Ra gane koe hãa ka,” tam ma còrè.

Eẽm ko Jeso ba còrèa xg'ara, kam kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu cgoa xgoaba, a Kiterone dim dòm̀ ba tchoaba. C'ẽem xòèm koem kò Olife di zi hìi zi dim xhárà ba hãa. Xu kò Gabá hẽé naka Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé xu gaa koe tcãà.
Nxãaskam kò Jutasem, ncẽe kò khóè ne tshàu q'oo koe tcãà Me ba gaam qgáì ba q'anaa, Jeso ba kò gaa koe káí-kg'aise Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu cgoa xg'ae khama.

Me kò nxãaska Jutase ncõo-kg'ao xu dis xg'ae sa hẽé naka kaia xu peresiti xu ka c'ẽea xu hẽé naka Farasai xu hẽéthẽé cgoa gaa koe síí. X'áà zi xu kò qgóóa, lampian hẽé naka ncõo gàban hẽéthẽé e.
Me kò Jeso ba wèéan ẽe gha hàà kúrúse cgae Me sa q'ana hãase tcg'oa a tẽè xu a máá: “Dìí ba xao ko qaa?” témé.
Xu xo̱a Me a máá: “Jesom Nasareta di Me e,” témé.
Me Jeso ba máá: “Tíí ga Ra a,” témé. (Me kò Jutasem, khóè ne tshàu q'oo koe tcãàku-kg'ao ba gaxu cgoa téé-tẽe.)
Eẽm ko Jeso ba máá: “Tíí ga Ra a,” témé, ka xu kò tééa dìbi, a xu a góḿankg'ai koe cg'áé.
Me kò gaicara tẽè xu a máá: “Dìí ba xao ko qaa?” témé. Xu máá: “Jesom Nasareta di Me e,” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a xu a máá: “Ncãar bìrí xao o, ncẽe ga Ra a sa. A ncẽè Tíí xao kòo qaa Te ne méé xao nxãaska ncẽe xu khóè xu guu naka xu qõò,” témé.
kg'uian ẽem kg'uia hãa gha nxãasega tseegukaguè ka, ncẽe kòo máá: “Eẽ Tsi kò máà Te xu kar c'ẽem ga ba qanega aagu tama,” témé sa.

Me kò nxãaska Simonem Petere ba ntcàu bam úúa hãa khama tsgúùa tcg'òó me, a kaiam peresitim dim qãà ba gáò, a kg'áò xòè dim tcee ba xg'aoa tcg'òó. (Qãàm di cg'õèa ne kò Malekose e.)
Kam kò nxãaska Jeso ba Petere ba bìrí a máá: “Ka̱bi tsarim ntcàu ba naka qòè! Cuiskaga Ra gáé ga Abom máà Tea hãas kubis
Si kò nxãaska ncõo-kg'ao xu dis xg'ae sa hẽé, naka gaas dim tc'ãà-cookg'ai ba hẽé, naka Juta di xu tc'ãà-cookg'ai xu hẽéthẽé Jeso ba qgóó, a qáé,
a xu a kg'aia Anasem koe úú Me, ncẽe kò Kaifasem ka c'uìse ii ba, ncẽe kò ẽem kurim ka kaiam peresiti ba ii ba.
Kaifase ba gaam khóèm Juta xu kò tc'ẽe sa máàm ga me e, a máá: “Qãè e gha ii, ncẽè c'ẽem khóèm kòo khóè ne x'óóa máá ne,” témé ba.

Simonem Petere ba hẽé naka c'ẽem xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao ba hẽéthẽéa kò Jeso ba xùri. Ncẽem xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao ba kò kaiam peresitim ka q'ãaèa, khamam kò Jesom cgoa kaiam peresitim x'áé koe tcãà.

Igabam kò Petere ba tchàa koe téé, xhàrom-kg'áḿ koe. Kam ko c'ẽem xgaa-xgaase-kg'aom ncẽe kò kaiam peresitim ka q'ãaèa ba ka̱bise a tcg'oa, a dxàe-coas ẽe kò xhàrom-kg'áḿ koe hãas cgoa kg'ui, a Petere ba q'oo koe tcãà.

Si kò qãàs ẽe kò xhàrom-kg'áḿ koe tẽe sa Petere ba bìrí a máá: “A tsáá tsia gáé ncẽem khóèm di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ka c'ẽe tsi tama tsia?” témé. Me xo̱a a máá: “Gaar tama ra a,” témé.

Qgàisa a kò ii, xu kò qãà xu hẽé naka tempelem di xu kòre-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé xu ẽe xu kò dxùua hãas c'ees koe téé-tẽe, a ko x'oò-x'oose. Petere ba kò gataga thẽé gaxu cgoa téé-tẽe, a ko x'oò-x'oose.
Me kò nxãaska kaiam peresiti ba Jeso ba tẽè, Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ka hẽé naka Gam di xgaa-xgaan ka hẽéthẽé e.

Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Xgobekg'amseaser kò wèém nqõóm cgoa kg'ui, a Ra a kò ko wèé x'aè ka còrè-nquuan koe hẽé, naka tempelem koe hẽéthẽé xgaa-xgaa, ncẽe wèé Jutan ko xg'ae koe. Cúí gúù gar kò táá xàìase nxàe.
Kháé tsia ko dùús domka tẽè Te? Tẽè ẽe kò kóḿ Tea hãa ne, tseeguan kaga ne q'ana dùú sar nxàea hãa sa,” tam méé.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba ncẽe gúùan kg'uia xg'ara kam kò c'ẽem kòre-kg'aom, cúùse kò tẽe ba Jeso ba x'ábú, a máá: “Ncẽea Tsi ga ko ma kaiam peresiti ba ma xo̱a gaa?” témé.

Me Jeso ba xo̱a me a máá: “Ncẽè c'ẽe gúùan cg'ãè Ra kò kg'uia hãa ne méé tsi nxàea tseegukagu, dùú sa cg'ãè si i sa. Igaba ncẽè tchànoser kò kg'uia hãa ne tsi ko dùús domka x'ábú góó Tea máá?” témé.
Me nxãaska Anase ba kaiam peresitim Kaifasem koe tsééa úú Me, qanegam qáéèa hãase.
Eẽm Simonem Petere ba hãa a ko kùru-kuruse kam kò tẽèè a máá: “Tsáá tsia gáé Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu ka c'ẽe tsi tama tsia?” témé. Me xo̱ase a máá: “Gaar tama ra a,” témé.

Me kò c'ẽem qãàm kaiam peresitim di ba, ncẽe Peterem kò xg'aoa tcg'òó tceeam khóèm dim qhàò ba tẽè me a máá: “Gaam cgoa ra gáé kò Olife dim xháràm q'oo koe bóò tsi tama?” témé.
Me gaicara Petere xo̱ase e, me kò kúúga ghòrò ba tshoa-tshoa a kg'ae.

Xu kò Juta xu Jeso ba Kaifasem dim nquum koe guu a, Roma ne dim tc'ãà-cookg'aim dim nquum koe úú. Gaa x'aèan ẽe ka i kò kaisa ntcùúkg'ai cgoa a. Xu kò Juta xu táá xu gha cg'uriga domka nquum q'oo koe táá tcãà, nxãasega xu gha Paseka di tc'õoan tc'õó ka.
Khamam kò Pilato ba tcg'oa a síí cgae xu, a tẽè xu a máá: “Dùútsa chìbi sa xao ko ncẽem Khóè ba tcee?” témé.
Xu xo̱a me a máá: “Chìbi kúrú-kg'ao tamam kò ii ne xae ga kò tsáá koe óá Me tama,” témé.

Me Pilato nxãaska bìrí xu a máá: “Séèa xao mááse Me, naka xaoa síí gaxao di x'áèan cgoa xgàra Me,” témé. Xu Juta xu xguì a bìrí me a máá: “Igaba xae c'ẽem khóè ba xae gha x'ooan koe xgàra di qari úú tama,” témé.
ẽem kò Jeso ba kg'uia hãa, nta iis x'oo sam gha hàà x'óó di kg'uian gha hàà nxãasega tseegukaguè ka.
Me kò nxãaska Pilato ba ka̱bise a nquum q'oo koe tcãà, a Jeso ba tcii, a tẽè Me a máá: “A Tsáá ga Tsia Juta ne di Tsi x'aiga Tsi?” témé.
Me Jeso ba xo̱a a máá: “Tsáá ka tsi ko ma cuiaga tẽè Tea, kana c'ẽe khóèa Tíí ka tsáá cgoa kg'uia hãa?” témé.

Me Pilato xo̱a a máá: “Kháé tíí ga ra gáé Juta raa? Tsari ne khóè ne hẽé naka Tsari xu kaia xu peresiti xu hẽéthẽéa tíí tshàu q'oo koe tcãà Tsia. Ka Tsia dùú sa kúrúa hãa?” témé.

Me Jeso ba xo̱a a máá: “Tiri x'aia nea ncẽem nqõóm di tama. Ncẽè gatà i kò ii, ne xu ga kò Tiri xu tséé-kg'ao xu ncõo sa x'ãà hãa, nxãasegar gha táá Juta ne tshàu q'oo koe tcãàè di sa. Igaba i ncẽeska Tiri x'aian ncẽem nqõóm di tama a,” tam méé.

Me Pilato nxãaska tẽè Me a máá: “Kháé Tsia x'aiga Tsia?” témé. Me Jeso ba xo̱a a máá: “X'aiga Ra a, ta tsi ko méé. Gaas gúùs domkaga Ra ábàèa, a Ra a ncẽes gúùs domkaga nqõómkg'ai koe hààraa, hààr gha nxãasega tseeguan nxàea tseegukagu ka. Wèé khóèan ẽe tseeguan dia ko kg'uia Te komsana,” tam méé.
Me Pilato ba bìrí Me a máá: “Tseegua nea dùúa?” témé.
Ncẽes gúù sam ko mééa xg'ara kam kòo tchàa koe tcg'oa, a gaicara Juta xu koe síí, a bìrí xu a máá: “Cúí chìbi gar hòò cgae Me tama gaan kam gha chìbi-chibiè e.
Igaba i gatu di cau u, Paseka di x'aè ka méér c'ẽem chìbi-kg'ao ba kgoara máá tu u sa. Ka tu ko tc'ẽe, Juta ne dim X'aiga ba méér kgoara máá tu u sa?” témé.
Xu q'au a xo̱a me a máá: “Eẽ-ẽe, Gam ka tamase, Barabase ba máà ta a,” témé. Barabase ba kò ts'ãà-kg'ao me e.
Nxãaskam kò Pilato ba Jeso ba séè a úú, Me síí qoaè.
Xu kò ncõo-kg'ao xu dxàman cgoa kúrúèas cábá sa kabea xg'ae a cábákagu Me, a xu a nco̱àm qgáí ba hã̱akagu Me,
a téé a qõòa máá Me a ko máá: “Tcgáíò, Juta ne di Tsi X'aiga Tseè!” témé. A xu a tshàua xu cgoa x'ábú góó Me.
Me kò Pilato ba gaicara tcg'oa a Juta xu bìrí a máá: “Bóò, tcg'òó ra ko a gaxao koe óá Me, nxãasega xao gha q'ãa, tíí ra cúí chìbi ga hòò cgae Me tama sa ka,” témé.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba tcg'oa, dxàman dis cábá sa cábá hãase, a nco̱àm qgáí ba ha̱na, kam ko Pilato bìrí xu a máá: “Bóò! Ncẽe ga Me e khóè ba!” témé.

Eẽ xu ko kaia xu peresiti xu hẽé naka tempelem di xu kòre-kg'ao xu hẽéthẽé ko bóò Me, ka xu kò q'au a máá: “Xgàu Me! Xgàu Me!” témé. Igabam kò Pilato xo̱a xu a máá: “Gaxao séè naka síí xgàu Me, tíí ra cúí chìbi ga hòò cgae Me tama ke,” témé.
Xu Juta xu xo̱a a máá: “X'áèan ta úúa; gaa x'áèan ẽe ka méém x'óós gúù si i, Nqarim dim Cóá Me e tam ko méé khama,” ta xu méé.
Eẽm ko Pilato ncẽes gúù sa kóḿ kam kò kaisase q'áò,
a ba a ka̱bise a gaicara nquum q'oo koe tcãà, a Jeso ba tẽè a máá: “Nda koe Tsi guua?” témé. Igabam kò Jeso ba táá cúí xo̱a ga kúrú.
Me Pilato ba tẽè Me a máá: “Tíí cgoa kg'uian Tsi tc'ẽe tama? C'úùa Tsia, qaria ner úúa, kgoara Tsir gha di i kana xgàu Tsi di i sa?” témé.

Me Jeso ba xo̱a a máá: “Cúí qari ga tsi Tíí koe úú tama, ncẽè nqarikg'ai koe tsi kò guu naka máàè e tama ne. Gaa domkam gaam ẽe tshàu q'ooa tsi koe tcãà Tea ba chìbiga me e, kaias chìbi sa,” tam méé.
Gaa koe guus kam kò Pilato ba Jeso bam gha kgoara cgoa dàòan qaa, igaba xu kò Juta xu q'au a ko máá: “Eẽ tsi kòo ncẽem khóè ba kgoara ne tsi

Eẽm ko Pilato ncẽe kg'uian kóḿ kam kò Jeso ba tchàa koe tcg'òó, a ba a xgàra-kg'aom dis ntcõó-q'oos koe síí ntcõó, ‘Nxõ̱án dim nqáḿ ba’ ta ko ma tciièm qgáìm koe (Hebera dis kg'uis ka ko Gabata ta ma tciiè ba).
Paseka dim cáḿ ba kg'ónòsea máá dim cáḿ me e kò ii, i kò koaba di x'aè e. Kam kò Pilato ba Juta ne bìrí a máá: “Bóò, ncẽe ga Me e gatu dim X'aiga ba,” témé.
Igaba xu kò q'au a máá: “Tcg'òó Me! Tcg'òó Me! Xgàu Me!” témé. Me Pilato tẽè xu a máá: “Kháé méér gaxao dim X'aiga ba xgàu dèe?” témé. Xu
Me kò nxãaska Pilato máà xu Me, nxãasegam gha xgàuè ka.
Xu kò nxãaska ncõo-kg'ao xu Jeso ba séè,
Me Gam dis xgàu sa dcẽé a tcg'oa, a ‘Tcúú c'õá’ ta ko ma tciiès qgáìs koe síí (ncẽè ko Hebera dis kg'uis ka ko ‘Gologota’ ta ma tciiè sa).
Gaa koe xu kò xgàu Me, naka c'ẽe tsara khóè tsara hẽéthẽé e Gam cgoa, cúí ba c'ẽe xòèa ba za, me c'ẽe ba c'ẽe xòèa ba za, Me Jeso ba nqáè koe téé.
Me kò Pilato x'áí sa góá hãa, a xgàus koe qáéa tòó sia; ncẽetas kòo ma nxáráse: “NASARETA DIM JESO BA, JUTA NE DIM X'AIGA BA,” ta ma ma.

Ne kò káí ne Juta ne ncẽes x'áí sa nxárá, ẽem kò Jeso ba xgàuèam qgáì ba kò x'áé-dxoom ka cúù me e khama. Si kò x'áí sa Hebera dis kg'uis ka hẽé, Latini dis ka hẽé naka Gerika dis ka hẽéthẽé góáèa.

Xu kò nxãaska kaia xu peresiti xu Juta ne di xu Pilato ba bìrí a máá: “Táá góá naka máá: ‘Juta ne dim X'aiga ba,’ témé guu, igaba máá: ‘Ncẽem khóè ba kòo máá, Juta ne dim X'aiga Me e,’ témé,” ta xu méé.
Me Pilato xo̱a a máá: “Eẽr góá hãa sar góá hãa,” témé.

Eẽ xu ko ncõo-kg'ao xu Jeso ba xgàu ka xu kò qgáía ba séè, a 4 zi dtcõò zi cgoa q'aa-q'aa a, si dtcõò sa khóèm di sa ii, me q'oo koe ko hã̱aèm qgáím cúí ba qaù. Ncẽem qgáí ba kò qgãé-dàò úú tama, a cúí xòè koe tc'amaka guu a nqãaka xõas koe qgãéèa.
Xu kò bìríku a máá: “Hààn xae táá tòà me guu, igaba hàà naka xae cgúúan ntcòo naka bóò dìína gha séè me sa,” témé. Ncẽe sa kò kúrúse, ẽe
“Qgáía Te xu kò q'aa-q'aaku,
a Tiri qgáían domka cgúúan ntcòo,”
témé sa. Ncẽea ncõo-kg'ao xu kò hẽé ga a.
Jesom dis xgàus qàe koes kò xõò sa tẽe, naka Gam ka xõòs ka qõese sa hẽé, Marias ncẽe Kelopasem dis khóè sa, naka Maria Magatalena sa hẽéthẽé e.

Eẽm ko Jeso ba xõò sa ẽe koe bóò, naka xgaa-xgaase-kg'aom ẽem kò ncàm̀a hãa ba hẽéthẽé e me qàea sa koe tẽe, kam kò xõò sa bìrí a máá: “Khóè seè, sarim cóám ga me e ncẽe ba!” témé.
A ba a xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao ba bìrí a máá: “Bóò, saòs ga si i ncẽe sa,” témé. Me kò xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao ba ẽem x'aèm koe guu a séè a x'áéa ba koe úú si.
Wèé gúùa nea xg'ara hãa sa q'ana hãasem kò Jeso ba ncẽes gúùs qãá q'oo koe máá: “Cáḿa raa!” témé. Ncẽes gúù sa kò kúrúse,
Si kò tsa̱u tshàan ka cg'oèa hãas gàba sa hãa, khama xu kò tsa̱u tshàan ka cg'oèa hãas x'úrú sa tcììka-tcamkuan dim hìim koe tòó, a ghùi a kg'áḿa ba koe úú.
Eẽm ko Jeso ba tsa̱u tshàan kg'áà xg'ara kam kò máá: “Xg'ara-xg'araèa ia!” témé. A ba a tcúúa ba qám̀, a sónòa tcg'òó.

Kg'ónòsean dim cáḿ me e kò ii, me kò q'uu dim cáḿ ba cgáém cáḿ Sabata di me e. Ne kò Juta ne Sabata dim cáḿ ka i gha tc'áróan xgàuan koe tceesea téé sa tc'ẽe tama, khama ne kò Pilato ba dtcàrà c'õán gha khõáè, i tc'áróan xòóè sa.
Xu kò nxãaska ncõo-kg'ao xu hàà, a hàà tc'ãà dim khóèm di c'õán khõá, ncẽe kò Jesom cgoa xgàuèa ba, naka c'ẽem dian hẽéthẽé e.
Igaba ẽe xu ko Jesom koe hàà, ka xu kò sao-xg'ae Mem nxãakamaga x'óóa hãa, xu kò táá c'õáa ba khõá.
Igabam kò ncõo-kg'ao xu ka c'ẽe ba Jeso ba kg'áó-xgàom cgoa gáò dxàbè, i kúúga qháése c'áòan hẽé naka tshàan hẽéthẽé gaa koe guu a ntcã̱a.
(Khóèm ẽe kò bóò o ba kò nxàea tseegukagu u, si gam dis nxàea tseegukagu sa tseegu si i. Me q'anaa, tseegu sam ko nxàe sa,
Ncẽe zi gúù zia kò kúrúse, ẽe
Si ko c'ẽes Tcgãyas

Ncẽe zi gúù zi qãá q'oo koem kò Josefam Arimatea di ba, ncẽe kò Jesom di xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao ii ba, Jesom dim tc'áró ba xàìa hãase Pilatom koe dtcàrà, Juta nem kòo q'áò khama. Me kò Pilato ba kgoara máá me me. Me hàà a Gam dim tc'áró ba séè.
Nikodemasem ncẽe kò kg'aia Jeso ba ntcùú ka dàraa hãa ba kò hãa cgoa mea. Nikodemase ba kò tshãán hẽé, naka tcgáùse di nxúìan hẽéthẽé óá, 30 qóḿ-q'ooan khama noo o.
Jesom dim tc'áró ba tsara kò séè, a tsara a tshãán cgoa xg'ae-xg'ae a q'úú qgáí cgoa kúrúèa ko̱àn cgoa tcáḿ me. Ncẽe sa kò caus Juta ne ko ma kg'aiga kg'ónòkus ga si i.
Eẽm kò Jeso ba xgàuèa hãam qgáìm koem kò xhárà ba hãa, me kò ka̱bam ha̱ém tc'ám̀s di ba xháràm q'oo koe hãa, ncẽe cúí khóè ga qanega gam koe kg'ónòè tama ba.
Juta ne dim cáḿ kg'ónòsean di me e kò ii, si kò tc'ám̀ sa cúù si i, khama ne kò Jeso ba gas koe ga kg'ónò.
Tc'ãà dim cáḿ bekem dim di ntcùúkg'ai cgoa, qanega i ntcùú u koes kò Maria Magatalena sa tc'ám̀s koe hàà, a hàà nxõ̱á sa bóò si tc'ám̀s-kg'áḿ koe ghànèa tcg'òóèa.

Si ko Simonem Peterem koe hẽé naka c'ẽem xgaa-xgaase-kg'aom koe hẽéthẽé qgóéa síí, ncẽe kò Jesom ka ncàm̀mèa ba, a síí bìrí tsara a a máá: “X'aiga ba xu tc'ám̀s koe séèa tcg'òóa hãa, ta c'úùa hãa nda koe xu úú Mea hãa sa!” tas méé.
Me kò nxãaska Petere gaam xgaa-xgaase-kg'aom cgoa xgoaba, tsara tc'ám̀s koe qõò.
Wèéa tsara ga kòo qàrò, igabam kò gaam xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao ba Petere ba qgóéa guu, a tc'ám̀s koe tc'ãà a síí.
Téém ko a qám̀se a xhõo a bóò kam kò q'úú qgáí cgoa kúrúèa ko̱àn cúí ga bóò i gaa koe hãa, igabam kò táá q'oo koe tcãà.
Me kò nxãaska Simonem Petere ba kháóka xùri me a hàà, a hàà tc'ám̀s koe tcãà; a q'úú qgáìan cgoa kúrúèa ko̱àn bóò i gaa koe xõe,
naka kg'ónò cgoa dim qgáím ncẽe kò Jesom tcúú koe hãa ba hẽéthẽé e. Qgáí ba kò ko̱àn cgoa hãa tama a kò cúíaga qabesea ntcõe.
Me kò nxãaska gaam xgaa-xgaase-kg'aom, ẽe kò tc'ám̀s koe tc'ãà a síí ba, q'oo koe tcãà thẽé, a bóò, a dtcòm̀.
Qanega tsara kò
Tsara kò nxãaska xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao tsara x'áé koe ka̱bise a dìbi.
Igabas kò Maria sa tc'ám̀s ka tchàa koe téé a ko kg'ae. Eẽs hãa a ko qanega kg'ae kas kò qám̀se a tc'ám̀s q'oo koe xhõo a bóò,

a sa a cám̀ moengele tsara q'úúse ha̱na tsara bóò, tsara Jesom dim tc'áróm kò xõe koe ntcõóa-ntcõe, c'ẽe ba kò tcúúa ba kò hãa koe ntcõe, me c'ẽe ba nqàrèa ba kò hãa koe ntcõóa-ntcõe.
Tsara tẽè si a máá: “Khóè seè, dùús domka si ko kg'ae?” témé. Si máá: “Tirim X'aiga ba xu tcg'òóa hãa, ra c'úùa hãa nda xu úú Mea sa!” témé.
Ncẽetas ko méé kas kò ka̱bise a Jeso ba bóò Me tééa-tẽe, igabas kò Jeso Me e sa táá bóòa q'ãa.

Me Jeso ba bìrí si a máá: “Khóè seè, dùús domka si ko kg'ae? Dìí ba si ko qaa?” témé. Xhárà-kg'ao Me e, tas kò tc'ẽea hãa khamas kò bìrí Me a máá: “Aboè, ncẽè tsáá ga tsi kò séè Mea hãa ne bìrí te nda koe tsi xòó Mea hãa sa, nakar séè Me,” témé.
Me Jeso ba bìrí si a máá: “Mariaè!” témé.
Si tééa ka̱bise a q'óá-kg'ai Me, a Hebera dis kg'uis ka máá: “Raboni!” témé. (Ncẽe sa ko máá: ‘Xgaa-xgaa-kg'ao Tseè,’ témé.)

Me Jeso ba bìrí si a máá: “Táá qgóó Te guu, qanega Ra Abom koe ka̱bise ta ga hãa ke. Igaba méé si Tíí qõe ga xu koe qõò naka síí bìrí xu naka máá: ‘Ka̱biser ko Tirim Abom koe, gaxao dim Abo ba; a Tirim Nqari ba, gaxao dim Nqari ba,’ ” témé.
Si kò Maria Magatalena sa xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu koe qõò a síí bìrí xu a máá: “X'aiga bar bóòa hãa!” témé. A sa a bìrí xu ncẽe zi gúù zim bìrí sia sa.

Tc'ãà dim cáḿ bekem dim di dqòan ka xu kò xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu xg'aea hãa, i kò Juta ne di bèean ka nquu-kg'áḿan qarika tcẽekg'ammèa. Kam kò Jeso ba hàà xg'aekua xu koe téé a ba a bìrí xu a máá: “Tòókuan méé i gaxao cgoa hãa!” témé.
Eẽm ko ncẽe sa mééa xg'ara kam kò tshàua ba hẽé naka xòèa ba hẽéthẽé x'áí xu. Eẽ xu kò xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu X'aiga ba bóò ka xu kò qãè-tcao.
Me gaicara Jeso ba bìrí xu a máá: “Tòókuan méé i gaxao cgoa hãa! Ncẽem ma Abo ba ma tsééa óá Tea khamaga Ra ko ma tsééa úú xao o ke,” témé.
Eẽtam ko mééa xg'ara kam kò dqòm̀a tcãà cgae xu u, a máá: “Tcom-tcomsam Tc'ẽe bar ko máà xao o.
Ncẽè c'ẽe khóèan xao kòo gaan di chìbian qgóóa máá ne i qgóóa mááèa, a ncẽè qgóóa máá a tama xao kò hãa, ne i qgóóa mááè tite,” tam méé.
Nxãaskam kò Tomasem (ncẽe Didimo ta kòo ma tciièm) 12 xu ka c'ẽe ba gaxu cgoa hãa tama, ẽem kò Jeso hààraa ka.
Khama xu kò c'ẽe xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu bìrí me a máá: “Ncãa xae X'aiga ba bóò!” témé.

Igabam kò bìrí xu a máá: “Cgabìan di xg'ama ner kòo tshàua ba koe bóò tama, a tshàua te gaa xg'aman koe tcãà tama, naka tshàua te xòèa ba koe tcãà tama ner cuiskaga dtcòm̀a hãa tite,” tam méé.

Bekem qãá q'oo koe xu kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu nquum koe gaicara xg'aea hãa, me kò Tomase ba hãa cgoa xua. Nquu-kg'áḿ ne kò tcẽekg'amsea hãa, igabam kò Jeso ba gaxu xg'aeku koe hàà téé, a máá: “Tòókuan méé i gaxao cgoa hãa!” témé.

A nxãaska Tomase ba bìrí a máá: “Tshàua tsi ncẽe koe tcãà, naka tsia tshàua Te bóò. Tchoanà tshàua tsi naka xòèa Te koe tcãà a. Káíse tc'ẽe-tc'ẽesean cgoa q'aa naka dtcòm̀,” témé.
Me Tomase xo̱a Me a máá: “Tiri Tsi X'aiga Tseè, a tiri Tsi Nqari Tseè!” témé.
Me nxãaska Jeso ba bìrí me a máá: “Ncẽe tsi ncãa bóò Te ka tsia ko dtcòm̀? Eẽ bóò tama igaba ko dtcòm̀ nea ts'ee-ts'eekg'aièa!” témé.
Jeso ba kò Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu cookg'ai koe káí zi x'áí zi c'ẽe zi kúrú, ncẽes tcgãyas koe góáse tama zi,
igaba i ncẽean góáèa hãa, nxãasega tu gha dtcòm̀, Jeso ba Krestem Nqarim dim Cóá Me e sa ka, a tu a gha dtcòm̀an ka Gam dim cg'õèm koe kg'õèan úú ka.
Ncẽe zi gúù zi qãá q'oo koem kò Jeso ba gaicara Gam di xu xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu koe x'áíse, Tiberia dim tshàam koe. Ncẽetam ma x'áísea.

Simonem Petere ba hẽé, naka Tomase ba hẽé (ncẽe kò Didimo ta ma tciiè ba), naka Nataniele ba hẽé, ncẽe kò Kana koe guua ba, Galilea di i, naka Sebetem di tsara cóá tsara hẽé, naka xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao tsara c'ẽe tsara hẽéthẽé xua kò xg'aea hãa.

Simonem Petere ba kò c'ẽe xu bìrí a máá: “Qõòr ko a síí x'aùan qgóó,” témé. Xu máá: “Qõò cgoa tsi xae gha,” témé. Xu tcg'oa a xu a síí dxòrom koe q'ábà, igaba xu kò ẽem ntcùúm ka táá cúí gúù ga qgóó.
Kaisa ntcùúkg'ai cgoam kò Jeso ba tshàam-kg'áḿ koe téé-tẽe, igaba xu kò xgaa-xgaase-kg'ao xu táá Jeso Me e sa bóòa q'ãa.
Me Jeso ba tcii xu a máá: “Cóá xaoè, cúí x'aù ga xao gáé hòò tama?” témé. Xu xo̱a Me a máá: “Eẽ-ẽe!” témé.

Me bìrí xu a máá: “Gaxao dis c'uisí sa kg'áò xòèan dxòrom di koe xaoa tcãà, c'ẽe gúù xao gha hòò ke,” témé. Xu xaoa tcãà si, a xu a dxòrom q'oo koe tcéèa tcãà sa ka tààè, x'aùan di káí-q'ooan ka.
